sourceString: Rapidly increasing cumulative incidence of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in the European Union/European Economic Area and the United Kingdom, 1 January to 15 March 2020
targetString: Faafitaanta xawliga ah ee dhacdooyinka guud ee kiisaska cudurka coronavirus (COVID-19) ee gudaha Midawga Yurub/Aaga Dhaqaale ee Yurub iyo Boqortooyada Ingiriis, 1dii Janaayo ilaa 15ka Maarso 2020
translated: Si xawli ah ayaa kordhisay dhacdooyinka guud ee cudurka coronavirus (COVID-19) ee gudaha Midowga Yurub/Aaga Dhaqaalaha Yurub iyo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska, 1dii Janaayo ilaa 15ka Maarso 2020

sourceString: The cumulative incidence of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) cases is showing similar trends in European Union/European Economic Area countries and the United Kingdom confirming that, while at a different stage depending on the country, the COVID-19 pandemic is progressing rapidly in all countries.
targetString: Dhacdooyinka guud ee kiisaska  coronavirus (COVID-19) ayaa muujinaya isbadalo la mid ah Midawga Yurub/Aaga Dhaqaale ee Yurub iyo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska oo xaqiijiyay midaas,  halka marxaladdo kala gadisan oo ku  xidhan wadanka, cudurka caalamiga ah ee COVID-19 ayaa si xawli ah ugu faafaya dhamaan wadanada.
translated: Dhacdooyinka guud ee kiisaska cudurka coronavirus (COVID-19) ayaa muujinaya isbadal la mid ah Midawga Yurub/Aaga Dhaqaale ee Yurub iyo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska oo xaqiijiyay taas, iyadoo marxaladdo kala duwan oo ku xidhan wadanka, cudurka safmarka ah ee COVID-19 ayaa si xawli ah ugu kordhaya dhamaan wadamada oo dhan.

sourceString: Based on the experience from Italy, countries, hospitals and intensive care units should increase their preparedness for a surge of patients with COVID-19 who will require healthcare, and in particular intensive care.
targetString: Ayadoo la tixraacayo khibrada laga helay Talyaaniga , wadanada, isbitaalada iyo qeybaha daryeelka dagdagga ah waa in ay kordhiyaan diyaar garawgooda ah in ay daba galaan bukaanada qaba COVID-19 kuwaas oo u baahaan daryeel caafimaad, gaar ahaan daryeelka dagdagga ah.
translated: Iyadoo lagu salaynayo khibradaha laga helay Talyaaniga, wadamada, isbitaalada iyo qaybaha daryeelka degdegga waa in ay kordhiyaan diyaargarowgooda ah in ay kacsiiyaan bukaanada qaba COVID-19 kuwaas oo u baahan doona daryeel caafimaad, gaar ahaan daryeelka degdegga ah.

sourceString: On 31 December 2019, a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown aetiology was reported in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.
targetString: 31kii Diseembar 2020,  koox kiisas burunkiito ah oo aan la aqoon asalkooda ayaa laga sheegay Wuhan, Gobalka Hubei, Shiinaha.
translated: 31kii Diseembar 2019, koox kiisas burunkiito ah oo aan la aqoon aetiology ayaa laga soo sheegay Wuhan, Gobalka Hubei, Shiinaha.

sourceString: On 9 January 2020, the China Center for Disease Control and Prevention reported the causative agent as being a novel coronavirus now referred to as severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: 9kii Janaayo 2020, Xarunka Xakamaynta iyo ka Hortaga Cuduradda ee Shiinaha ayaa sheegtay waxa sababa coronavirus cusub oo hadda la yiraahdo xanuunka ba'an ee habka neefsashada ee calaamadaha coronavirus 2(SARS-CoV-2).
translated: ["9kii Janaayo 2020, Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo KaHortaga Cudurada ee Shiinaha ayaa sheegtay in walaxda sababta uu yahay coronavirus cusub oo hadda loo yaqaan astaanta ba'an ee neefmareenka ba'an ee astaanta coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2)."]

sourceString: Since, the illness resulting from SARS-CoV-2 infection has been named coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
targetString: ilaa intii, xanuunka ka dasha caabuqa  SARSA-CoV-2 lagu magacaabay  cudurka coronavirus (COVID-19).
translated: Ilaa intii, xanuunka ka dhasha caabuqa SARS-CoV-2 waxaa loo bixiyey cudurka coronavirus (COVID-19).

sourceString: Evidence to date is that ca 80% of individuals with COVID-19 have a mild disease, i.e. a respiratory tract infection with or without pneumonia, and most of these recover.
targetString: Cadaynta ilaa ayaa in ca 80% dadka qaba COVID-19 ay leeyihiin xanuun yar, sida caabuqa kudhaca habka neefsashada ee la jiranka ama la jiritaan la'aanta burunkiito, inta badana way ka bogsadaan
translated: Cadaynta ilaa iyo hadda waxay tahay in ca 80% dadka qaba COVID-19 ay qabaan xanuun fudud, sida caabuqa tuubooyinka neefmareenka ee leh ama aan lahayn burukiito, badanaa kuwan way ka bogsadaan.

sourceString: In ca 14% cases, COVID-19 develops into a more severe disease requiring hospitalisation while the remaining 6% cases experience critical illness requiring intensive care.
targetString: ca 14% kiisas, COVId-19 ayaa u hormaraya xanuun aad u ba'an oo u baahnaanaya daaweyn  halka 6% kiisaska soo hartayna ay la tacaalaan xanuun halis ah oo u baahnaanaya daryeel dag dag ah.
translated: ["ca 14% kiisaska, COVID-19 wuxuu u ku dhacaa xanuun aad u ba'an oo u baahnaanaya daaweyn halka 6% kiisaska soo hartayna ay la tacaalaan xanuun halis ah oo u baahan daryeel degdeg ah."]

sourceString: The mortality of patients hospitalised due to COVID-19 is ca 4%.
targetString: Dhimashada bukaanada la dawaynayo ee COVID-19 waa ca 4%.
translated: Dhimashada bukaanada la jifsiiyay ee COVID-19 waa ca 4%.

sourceString: In this study, we assess the trends in the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 in each European Union/European Economic Area (EU/EEA) country and the United Kingdom (UK) and compare them to that of Hubei Province, China.
targetString: daraasaddan, waxaan qiimaynaynaa isbadalada dhamaan dhacdooyinka COVID-19 ee wadan kasta oo Midawga Yurub ah/Aaga Dhaqaale ee Yurub (EU/EEA) iyo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska (UK) oo aan la barbar dhigno Gobalka Hubei. Shiinaha.
translated: Daraasadan, waxaanu qiimeynaynaa isbadallada ku jira dhacdooyinka guud ee COVID-19 ee mid kasta oo ka mid ah Midawga Yurub/Aaga Dhaqaale ee Yurub (EU/EEA) iyo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska (UK) oo isbarbardhigno kuwa Gobolka Hubei, Shiinaha.

sourceString: We also compare the current number of COVID-19 cases in EU/EEA countries and the UK with that in Italy during 31 January–15 March 2020.
targetString: Sidoo kale waxaan barbar dhigaynaa tirada hadda ee kiisaska COVID-19 ee gudaha wadanada Midawga Yurub/Aaga Dhaqaale ee Yurub UE/EEA iyo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska UK iyo mida Talyaaniga inta lagu jiro 31 Janaayo-15 Maarso 2020
translated: Waxaan sidoo kale isbarbardhignaa tirada hadda ee kiisaska COVID-19 ee dalalka Midawga Yurub/Aaga Dhaqaalaha Yurub/Aaga Dhaqaalaha Yurub iyo UK iyo UK iyo mida Talyaaniga inta lagu jiro 31 Janaayo-15 Maarso 2020.

sourceString: COVID-19 cases in EU/EEA countries and the UK
targetString: Kiisaska COVID-19 ee gudaha wadamada Midawga Yurub/Aaga Dhaqaale ee Yurub EU/EEA iyo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska UK
translated: Kiisaska COVID-19 ee ka jira wadamada Midawga Yurub/Agga Dhaqaalaha Yurub/Agga Dhaqaalaha Yurub Yurub/Agga Dhaqaalaha Yurub Yurub/AGGA UA iyo UK

sourceString: Subsequent to China, COVID-19 underwent further geographical spread and the dynamic of the COVID-19 pandemic in the rest of the world currently follows that of this country.
targetString: Kaddib Shiinaha, COVID-19 wuxuu ku faafay dhul badan juquraafi ahaan xawligga cudurka saf-mareenka ah ee COVID-19 ee inta kale aduunka hadda waa mid la mid ah sida kan wadankan
translated: Kaddib Shiinaha, COVID-19 wuxuu ku faafay juquraafi ahaan firfircooni dheeraad ah iyo firfircoonida cudurka faafa ee COVID-19 ee adduunka intiisa kale hadda waa mid la mid ah tan wadankan.

sourceString: On 11 March 2020, the Director General of the World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a pandemic.
targetString: 11Maarso 2020, Agaamisha Guud ee Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka (WHO) wuxuu u aqoonday COVID-19 cudur caalami ah
translated: ["11 maarso 2020, Agaasimaha Guud ee Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka (WHO) ayaa u aqoonsatay COVID-19 inuu yahay cudur caalami ah."]

sourceString: In the 5 March issue of Eurosurveillance 2020, Spiteri et al. reported on the first European confirmed COVID-19 cases according to the WHO case definition.
targetString: 5tii maarso arinta Eurosurveilance 2020, Spiteri et al.  waxay sheegtay kiiskii ugu horeegay ee COVID-19 ee Yurub sida ay qeexday Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka WHO
translated: Arrinta 5tii Maarso ee Eurosurveilance 2020, Spiteri et al. waxay sheegtay kiisaskii ugu horreeyay ee Yurub ee la xaqiijiyay ee COVID-19 marka loo eego qeexitaanka kiisaska WHO.

sourceString: In the EU/EEA, the first three confirmed cases were reported by France on 24 January 2020 in persons returning from Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.
targetString: Gudaha Midawga Yurub/Aaga Dhaqaale ee Yurub EU/EEA,  saddexda kiis ee ugu horeeyay ee la xaqiijiyay ayaa laga sheegay 24tii Janaayo 2020 qof kasoo laabanayay Wuhan, Gobalka Hubei, Shiinaha.
translated: Gudaha Midawga Yurub/Aaga Dhaqaalaha Yurub/EEA, sadexda keys ee ugu horeeyay ee la xaqiijiyay ayaa laga diiwaan galiyay Faransiiska 24kii Janaayo 2020, dadka kasoo laabanayay Wuhan, Gobalka Hubei, Shiinaha.

sourceString: As at 15 March 2020, COVID-19 cases had been detected in all 30 EU/EEA countries and the United Kingdom (UK), whereby between 31 December 2019 and that date included, 39,768 cases and 1,727 deaths had been reported, with 17,750 cases and 1,441 deaths from Italy alone.
targetString: 15kii Maarso 2020, kiisaskii ugu horeeyay ee COVID-19 ayaa lagu wada arkay dhamaan 30 ka dal ee Midawga Yurub/Aaga Dhaqaale ee Yurub EU/EEA iyo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska (UK), halka intii u dhaxaysay 31 Diseembar 2019 iyo tariikhdaas la xusay, la shaaciyay 39,768 kiis iyo 1,727 dhimasho, la jranka 17,750 kiis iyo 1,441 dhimasho oo Talyaaniga kali ah.
translated: Sida laga soo bilaabo 15kii Maarso 2020, kiisaska COVID-19 ayaa laga helay dhamaan 30ka dal ee Midawga Yurub/Aaga Dhaqaalaha Yurub Yurub/Aaga Dhaqaalaha Yurub Aaga Yurub/Aaga Dhaqaalaha Yurub Aaga Yurub/Aaga UK (UK), halka inta u dhaxaysa 31 Diseembar 2019 iyo taariikhdaas la xusay, 39,768 kiis iyo 1,727 dhimasho ayaa lasoo sheegay, iyadoo 17,750 kiis iyo 1,441 dhimasho ay u dhinteen Talyaaniga oo keliya.

sourceString: Obtaining cumulative number and cumulative incidence of COVID-19 cases
targetString: Helida tirada guud iyo dhacdooyinka guud ee kiisaska COVID-19
translated: Helitaanka tirada guud iyo dhacdooyinka guud ee kiisaska COVID-19

sourceString: At the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC), the notified COVID-19 case counts in each country worldwide, obtained from only official sources such as the countries’ Ministry of Health, national and regional health authorities and the WHO, are updated each day at 8:00 a.m.
targetString: Xarunta ka Hortaga iyo Xakamaynta Cuduradda ee Yurub (ECDC), tirada kiisaska COVID-19 ee la shaaciyayee wadan kasta oo aduunka ah, oo laga helay illo rasmi ah oo kali ah sida wasaaradaha caafimaadka ee wadaanka, madaxda caafimaad ee heer qaran iyo heer gobol ba iyo Hay'ada Caafimaadka aduunka WHO, ayaa maalin kasta la shaaciyaa abaarihii 8:00 am
translated: ["Xarunta Ka Hortaga iyo Xakamaynta Cudurada ee Yurub (ECDC), tirada kiisaska COVID-19 ee la shaaciyay ee dal kasta oo aduunka oo dhan ah, oo laga helay ilo rasmi ah oo kaliya sida Wasaaradda Caafimaadka ee dalalka, madaxda caafimaadka heer qaran iyo heer goboleed iyo hay'adaha caafimaadka ee WHO, ayaa la cusboonaysiiyaa maalin kasta abbaaraha 8:00 subaxnimo."]

sourceString: These data were used for assessing the trends of COVID-19 in EU/EEA and the UK, and comparing them to that in Italy.
targetString: Macluumaadkan waxaa loo adeegsaday qiimaynta isbadallada COVID-19 ee gudaha EU/EEA iyo UK iyo in lala barbar-dhigo mida Talyaaniga.
translated: Xogtan waxaa loo isticmaalay in lagu qiimeeyo isbeddelka COVID-19 ee EU/EEA iyo UK, iyo iyaga oo taas la barbardhigay Italy.

sourceString: As a proxy of the prevalence of active COVID-19 cases, we calculated the 14-day truncated cumulative incidence of COVID-19 cases, thus taking into account the natural course of COVID-19, in each EU/EEA country and the UK, during the 1 January–15 March 2020 period.
targetString: Sida madaxda tabinta kiisaska dadka ku dhacay COVID-19, waxaan xisaabinay 14 maalin ee la gaabiyay dhacdooyinka guud ee kiisaska COVID-19, sidaas awgeed ayadoo lagu xisaabtamayo koorsada dabiiciga ah ee COVID-19 ee wadan kasta oo a tirsan EU/EEA iyo UK, inta lagu jir mudada 1 Janaayo-15 Maarso 2020.
translated: Iyada oo wakiil ka ah baahsanaanta kiisaska firfircoon ee COVID-19, waxaan xisaabinay 14-ka maalin ee la gaabiyay dhacdooyinka guud ee kiisaska COVID-19, sidaas awgeed iyadoo la tixgelinayo koorsada dabiiciga ah ee COVID-19, ee wadan kasta oo ka tirsan EU/EEA iyo UK, inta lagu guda jiro mudada 1 Janaayo-15 Maarso 2020.

sourceString: We also presented the cumulative number of notified cases of each country as at 15 March 2020 8:00 a.m. compared with that of Italy for the 31 January–15 March 2020 period.
targetString: Waxaan soo bandhignay tirada guud ee kiisaska la ogaaday ee wadanka kasta 15kii Maarso 2020 8:00 a.m. marka la barbar dhigay mida Talyaaniga mudadda 31 Janaayo-15 Maarso 2020.
translated: Waxa kale oo aanu soo bandhignay tirada guud ee kiisaska la ogaysiiyay ee waddan kasta iyadu markay ahayd 15 Maarso 2020 8:00 a.m. marka la barbar dhigo ta Talyaaniga muddada 31-15ka Maarso 2020.

sourceString: Trends of COVID-19 in EU/EEA countries and the UK
targetString: Isbadallada COVID-19 ee gudaha wadanada EU/EEA iyo UK
translated: Isbeddelyada COVID-19 ee gudaha wadamada EU/EEA iyo UK

sourceString: The trends in the 14-day truncated cumulative incidence of COVID-19 cases in EU/EEA countries and the UK generally followed that of Hubei Province (China) (Figure 1).
targetString: Isbadalada 14 ka maalin dhacdooyinka guud ee lasoo gaabiyay ee kiisaska COVID-19 ee gudaha wadamada EU/EEA iyo UK ayaa guud ahaan ku socda mida Gobalka Hubei (Shiinaha) (jaantuska 1).
translated: Isbadalada 14ka maalmood ee dhacdooyinka guud ee lasoo gaabiyay ee kiisaska COVID-19 ee ka dhacay wadamada EU/EEA iyo UK ayaa guud ahaan raacay mida Gobolka Hubei (China) (Jadwalka 1).

sourceString: For the EU/EEA and the UK overall, the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 started to increase around 21 February and then increased sharply around 28 February 2020 (Supplementary material).
targetString: Guud ahaan EU/EEA iyo UK, dhacdooyinka guud ee kiisaska COVID-19 ayaa bilawday in ay kordhaan ku dhawaadka 21 Febraayo oo hadana si xawli ah ku kordhay ku dhawaadkii 28 Febraayo 2020 (Shay kaalmooti ah).
translated: ["Guud ahaan EU/EEA iyo UK, dhacdooyinka guud ee COVID-19 ayaa bilawday inay kordhaan ku dhawaad 21 Febraayo ka dibna si ba'an ayay u kordheen ku dhawaad 28 Febraayo 2020 (Shay kaalmooti ah)."]

sourceString: This was mostly driven by the rapid increase in the number of reported cases from Italy, but all other EU/EEA countries and the UK showed similar increasing trends of the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 (Supplementary material).
targetString: Midan waxay ka laga keenay faafitaanka xawliga ah ee tirada kiisaska laga shaaciyay Talyaaniga, lakiin dhamaan wadamada kale ee EU/EEA iyo UK ayaa muujinaya isbadal kordhaya ee tirada guud ee dhacdooyinka COVID-19 (Shay kaalmooti ah).
translated: Tani badanaa waxaa horseeday kororka xawliga ah ee tirada kiisaska laga soo sheegay Talyaaniga, lakiin dhamaan wadamada kale ee EU/EEA iyo UK ayaa muujiyey isbadallada kordhaya ee kordhaya ee tirada guud ee dhacdooyinka COVID-19 (Shay kaalmooti ah).

sourceString: Figure 2 shows the cumulative number of COVID-19 cases, in EU/EEA countries and the UK compared with that in Italy for the 31 January–15 March 2020 period.
targetString: Jaantuska 2 wuxuu muujinaya tirada guud ee kiisaska COVID-19, ee gudaha wadamada EU/EEA iyo UK oo la barbar-dhigay mida Talyaaniga laga bilaabo mudada 31 Janaayo-15 Maarso 2020
translated: Jadwalka 2aad wuxuu muujinayaa tirada guud ee kiisaska COVID-19, ee ka jira wadamada EU/EEA iyo UK marka la barbardhigo kuwa Talyaaniga mudada 31 Janaayo-15 Maarso 2020.

sourceString: It highlights that, as at 15 March 8:00 a.m., 15 other EU/EEA countries and the UK had already reported a total number of cases comparable to that of Italy just 3 weeks prior or less.
targetString: Waxay tusinaysaa in,  15kii Maarso 8:00 a.m., in 15 wadan oo kale oo ka mid EU/EEA iyo UK ay horaan shaaciyeen tirada guud ee kiisaska oo la barbar-dhigi karo mida Talyaaniga 2 isbuuc ka hor ama ka yar uun.
translated: Waxay muujinaysaa in, 15kii Maarso 8:00 a.m., in 15 wadan oo kale oo ka mid EU/EEA ah iyo UK ay hore u soo sheegeen tirada guud ee kiisaska oo la barbar-dhigi karo tii Talyaaniga oo keliya 3 asbuuc ka hor ama ka yar.

sourceString: Our results indicate that the number of notified cases of COVID-19 is rapidly increasing in the EU/EEA and the UK.
targetString: Natiijadayadu waxay tusaysaa in tirada la ogaaday ee kiisaska COVID-19 in ay si xawli ah ku kordhayaan gudaha EU/EEA iyo UK.
translated: Natiijooyinkeenu waxay tilmaamayaan in tirada la ogaysiiyay ee kiisaska COVID-19 ay si xawli ah ku kordhayaan eu/EEA iyo UK.

sourceString: The observed trends in the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 suggest that the pandemic is progressing at a comparable speed in all countries.
targetString: Isbadadllada la arkay ee dhacdooyinka guud ee COVID-19 waxay  soo jeedinaysaa in cudurkan caalamiga ah oo ku faafayo xawli la is barbar-dhigi karo dhamaan wadanada.
translated: Isbeddelyada la arkay ee dhacdooyinka guud ee COVID-19 waxay soo jeedinaysaa in cudurka faafa uu ku socdo xawaare isbarbardhig leh dhamaan wadamada.

sourceString: This is despite countries being at different stages, variations in national public health responses, and possibly different case definitions in countries and different protocols for selecting patients that must be tested for confirmation of COVID-19, including catch-up testing.
targetString: Tani waxay imaanaysaa iyadoo dalalku ay kukala duwanyihiin heerarka, kala duwanaashaha ka jawaabista caafimaadka dadwaynaha ee qaran, iyo suurtagalnimada qeexitaanka kiisaska kala duwan ee dalalka iyo maamuusyada kala duwan ee xulashada bukaanada ay tahay in la baaro si loo xaqiijiyo COVID-19, ee ay kamid tahay baaritaanka la qabsashada.
translated: Tani waxay ku jirtaa iyadoo dalalku ay marxalado kala duwan marayeen, kala duwanaanshaha ka jawaab celinta caafimaadka dadwane ee qaran, iyo suurtagalnimada qeexitaanka kiisaska kala duwan ee dalalka iyo borotokoolada kala duwan ee xulashada bukaanada ay tahay in la baaro si loo xaqiijiyo COVID-19, oo ay ku jirto baaritaanka la qabsashada.

sourceString: Early March 2020, doctors in the affected regions of Italy described a situation in which ca 10% of patients with COVID-19 required intensive care and media sources reported that hospitals and intensive care units in these regions had already reached their maximum capacity.
targetString: Horaantii Maarso 2020, dhakhaatirta jooga gobollada uu saameeyay ee Talyaaniga ayaa sheegay xaalad taas oo 10% bukaanada uu hayo COVID-19 ay u baahnaayeen qaybta daryeelka degdegga  halka ilaha warbaahintu ay soo tabiyeen in isbitaalada iyo qalabka daryeelka ee goballadani ay gaadheen meeshii ugu saraysay ee qaadi kareen.
translated: Horaantii Maarso 2020, dhakhaatiirta jooga gobollada uu saameeyay ee Talyaaniga ayaa sharaxay xaalad taas oo 10% bukaanada uu hayo COVID-19 ay u baahnaayeen daryeel deg deg ah, ilaha warbaahintuna waxay soo sheegeen in isbitaalada iyo qaybaha daryeelka degdegga ee gobolladan ay horey u gaadheen awoodooda ugu badan.

sourceString: Data on admission of COVID-19 cases in a hospital and/or an intensive care unit are currently available at EU/EEA level for only 6% and 1% cases, respectively (data not shown).
targetString: Xogta diwaangelinta kiisaska COVID-19 ee isbitaallada iyo/mise qaybta daryeelka degdegga ah in hadda laga heli karo heerka EU/EEU oo kali ah kiisaska 6% iyo 1%, siday isugu xigaan(xogta lama muujin).
translated: Xogta ku saabsan celceliska kiisaska COVID-19 ee isbitaallada iyo/ama qaybta daryeelka degdegga ah ayaa hadda laga heli karaa heerka EU/EEA oo kaliya kiisaska 6% iyo 1%, siday isugu xigaan (xogta lama muujin).

sourceString: They should, however, be collected in a systematic fashion to complement current surveillance data that focus on the number of reported cases and the number of deaths.
targetString: Waa in, si kasta ha ahaatee, loo uruuriyaa  qaab nidaamsan si loogu baddelo xogta indha ku haynta ee hadda taas oo diirada saarta tirada kiisaska lasoo sheegay iyo tirada dhimashooyinka.
translated: Waa in, si kasta ha ahaatee, loo uruuriyaa qaab nidaamsan si loo dhamaystiro xogta kor joogtaynta ee hadda oo diiradda lagu saarayo tirada kiisaska lasoo sheegay iyo tirada dhimashada.

sourceString: A study performed in 2010–11 showed a large variation in the availability of intensive care and intermediate care beds in Europe, ranging from 29.2 in Germany to 4.2 beds per 100,000 population in Portugal.
targetString: Daraasad la sameeyay 2010-11 ayaa muujisay kala duwanaan baahsan ee helitaanka daryeelka degdegga iyo sariiraha daryeelka dhexe ee Yurub, iyadoo u dhaxaysa 29.2 Jarmalka ilaa 4.2 sariirood 100,000 qofba bulshada Burtaqiiska.
translated: Daraasad la sameeyay 2010-11 ayaa muujiyay kala duwanaansho balaaran oo ku saabsan helitaanka daryeelka degdegga iyo sariiraha daryeelka dhexe ee Yurub, laga bilaabo 29.2 Jarmalka ilaa 4.2 sariirood halkii 100,000 oo qof ee Portugal.

sourceString: This means that countries may have more or less resources than Italy (12.5 intensive care and intermediate care beds per 100,000 population in 2010–11).
targetString: Tani waxay ka dhigantahay in dalalka ay lahaan karaa dakhli ka badan ama ka yar midka Talyaaniga (12.5 daryeelka degdegga iyo sariiraha daryeelka dhexe ee 100,000 ee qofba bulshada  intii lagu jiray 2010-11)
translated: Tani waxay ka dhigantahay in dalalka ay lahaan karaan dakhli ka badan ama ka yar kan Talyaaniga (12.5 daryeelka degdegga ah iyo sariiraha daryeelka dhexe ee 100,000 ee qofba bulshada intii lagu jiray 2010-11)

sourceString: Modelling scenarios related to healthcare capacity saturation, with estimates for each EU/EEA country and the UK of the prevalence of hospitalised COVID-19 cases associated with a > 90% risk of exceeding intensive care bed capacity, are provided in the sixth update of the ECDC rapid risk assessment on COVID-19.
targetString: Marxaladaha naqshadaynta ee la xiriira isu gaynta xajmiga daryeelka caafimaadka, oo leh qiyaaso dal walba oo ka tirsan EU/EEA iyo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska ee mudnaan siinta kiisaska isbitaalka la dhigay ee COVID-19 ee la xiriira a > 90% khatarta xad dhaafitaanka mugga sariirta daryeelka degdegga, ayaa lagu muujiyay cusboonaysiinta lixaad eee ECDC qiimaynta khatarta degdegga ee COVID-19.
translated: Marxaladaha naqshadaynta ee la xiriira isu gaynta awooda daryeelka caafimaadka, oo leh qiyaaso dal kasta oo ka tirsan EU/EEA iyo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska ee baahsanaanta kiisaska isbitaalka la dhigay ee COVID-19 ee la xiriira kiisaska khatarta > 90% ee xad dhaafka awooda sariirta daryeelka degdegga, ayaa lagu bixiyay cusboonaysiinta lixaad ee ECDC qiimaynta khatarta degdegga ah ee COVID-19.

sourceString: Since cases have so far clustered in certain regions in EU/EEA countries and the UK, and hospitals and intensive care units usually serve a defined regional catchment population, information about cases and intensive care beds should preferably be made available at the Nomenclature of territorial units for statistics 2 (NUTS-2) level.
targetString: Maadaama kiisaska ilaa xad ay korayaan gobollada qaarkood ee dalalka EU/EEAiyo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska, iyo isbitaallada iyo qaybaha daryeelka degdegga oo caadiyan u adeega la qabsiga bulsho gobol oo qeexan, macluumaadka kusaabsan kiisaska iyo sariiraha daryeelka degdegga waa in laga dhigaa kuwa si mudnaan ah laga heli karo aaga Magacbixinta qaybaha tirakoobka 2 (NUTS-2)heerka.
translated: Maadaama kiisaska ilaa hadda ay ku biireen gobollada qaar ee ku yaal dalalka EU/EEA iyo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska, iyo isbitaalada iyo qaybaha daryeelka degdegga waxay caadiyan u adeegaan la qabsiga bulsho gobol oo qeexan, macluumaadka ku saabsan kiisaska iyo sariiraha daryeelka degdegga waa in si mudnaan ah laga heli karaa aaga Magacbixinta qaybaha tirakoobka 2 (NUTS-2) heerka.

sourceString: The experience from Italy and the current trends in other countries show that the COVID-19 pandemic is progressing rapidly in the EU/EEA and the UK.
targetString: Khibrada Talyaaniga iyo jihooyinka hadda ee dalalka kale ayaa muujinaya in cudurka caalamiga ee COVID-19 uu hor ugu socdo si xawli ah EU/EEA iyo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska.
translated: Khibrada Talyaaniga iyo isbeddelka hadda ee dalalka kale ayaa muujinaya in cudurka faafa ee COVID-19 uu si xawli ah ugu socdo EU/EEA iyo UK.

sourceString: Countries, hospitals and intensive care units should thus prepare themselves for a scenario of sustained community transmission of SARS-CoV-2 and an increase in the number of patients with COVID-19 requiring healthcare, and in particular intensive care, such as the one occurring in the affected regions of Italy.
targetString: Dalalka, Isbitaalada iyo qaybaha daryeelka degdegga waa inay isu diyaariyaan marxallad ah isu gudbinta bulshada joogtaysan ee SARS-CoV-2 iyo kor u kaca tirada bukaanada uu hayo COVID-19 ee u baahan daryeel caafimaad, iyo gaar ahaan daryeelka degdegga, sida kan ka dhacaya gobollada uu saameeyay ee Talyaaniga.
translated: Dalalka, isbitaalada iyo qaybaha daryeelka degdegga waa inay isku diyaariyaan marxalad gudbinta bulshada joogtaysan ee SARS-CoV-2 iyo kororka tirada bukaanada uu hayo COVID-19 ee u baahan daryeel caafimaad, gaar ahaan daryeelka degdegga, sida kan ka dhacaya gobollada uu saameeyay ee Talyaaniga.

sourceString: As pointed out in the recent ECDC rapid risk assessment, a rapid, proactive and comprehensive approach is essential to delay the spread of SARS-COV-2, with a shift from a containment to a mitigation approach, as the anticipated rapid increase in the number of cases may not provide decision makers and hospitals enough time to comprehend, accept and adapt their response accordingly if not implemented ahead of time.
targetString: Sida lagu xusay qiimaynta khatarta xawliga ah ee dhawaan, la tacaalitaan xawli ah, shaqaynaya oo dhamaystiran ayaa aasaasi u ah si loo dib dhigo fiditaanka SARS-COV-2, iyadoo laga guurayo habka  xakamaynta laguna wareegayo yaraynta, iyadoo kor u kaca xawliga ah ee la la rajaynayo ee tirada kiisaska laga yaabo inaysan siin karin go'aan gaarayaasha iyo isbitaalada wakhti ku fulan oo ay ku fahmaan, aqbalaan ayna kula qabsadaan falcelintooda si waafaqsan hadii aan la dhaqan gelinin waqti ka hor.
translated: ["Sida lagu xusay qiimayntii dhawaan ee khatarta xawliga ah ee ECDC, qaab xawli ah, firfircooni leh oo dhamaystiran ayaa aasaasi u ah dib u dhigista fiditaanka SARS-COV-2, iyadoo laga guurayo habka xakamaynta oo loo guurayo dhanka xakamaynta, maadaama kororka xawliga ah ee la filayo ee tirada kiisaska laga yaabo inaysan siin karin go'aan gaarayaasha iyo isbitaalada waqti ku filan oo ay ku fahmaan, aqbalaan oo ay kula qabsadaan jawaab celintooda si waafaqsan hadii aan la fulinin waqti ka hor."]

sourceString: The rapid risk assessment also lists the public health measures to mitigate the impact of the pandemic.
targetString: Qiimaynta khatrta xawliga ah wuxuu sidoo kale liiska ku darayaa talaabooyinka caafimaadka bulshada si loo yareeyo saamaynta cudurka caalamiga ah.
translated: Qiimaynta khatarta xawliga ah ayaa sidoo kale liiska ku darsamay talaabooyinka caafimaadka bulshada si loo yareeyo saameynta cudurka faafa.

sourceString: There is a short window of opportunity during which countries have the possibility to further increase their control efforts to slow down the spread of SARS-CoV-2 and decrease the pressure on healthcare.
targetString: Waxaa jira fursad yar oo ay dalalka ay haystaan suurtagalnimo ay kor ugu sii qaadi karaan dadaaladooda xakamayn si ay hoos ugu dhigaan fiditaanka SARS-COV-2 ayna hoos ugu dhigaan cadaadiska saaran daryeelka caafimaadka.
translated: Waxaa jira fursad gaaban oo ay dalalku haystaan suurtagalnimada inay sii kordhiyaan dadaaladooda xakamayntooda si ay hoos ugu dhigaan fiditaanka SARS-CoV-2 iyo hoos u dhigista cadaadiska saaran daryeelka caafimaadka.

sourceString: Failing this, it is likely that the healthcare systems of other EU/EEA countries will face a surge of patients that require intensive care within the coming days or weeks.
targetString: Fashilitaanka tan, waxay u badantahay in nidaamyada daryeelka caafimaad ee dalalka kale ee EU/EEA ay wajihi doonaankor u kac wayn ee bukaanada u baahan daryeel degdegga maalmaha mise todobaadyada soo socda.
translated: Fashilinta tan, waxay u badan tahay in nidaamyada daryeelka caafimaad ee dalalka kale ee EU/ETA ay wajihi doonaan kororka bukaanada u baahan daryeel degdeg ah maalmaha ama toddobaadyada soo socda.

sourceString: The outbreak of Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), has thus far killed over 3,000 people and infected over 80,000 in China and elsewhere in the world, resulting in catastrophe for humans.
targetString: Dilaacitaanka xanuunka Coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19), ee uu sababay calaamada xanuunka neefmareenka ba'an (SARS) coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), ayaa ilaa hadda dilay in ka badan 3,000 oo qof wuxuuna ku dhacay in ka badan 80,000  gudaha Shiinaha iyo meelaha kale ee caalamka, kaasoo sababay musiibo bini'aadmi.
translated: ["Dilaacitaanka cudurka Coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19), oo uu sababay calaamadaha neefmareenka ba'an (SARS) ee coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), ayaa ilaa hadda dilay in ka badan 3,000 oo qof wuxuuna ku dhacay in ka badan 80,000 oo qof gudaha Shiinaha iyo meelaha kale ee adduunka, taasoo keentay musiibo bini'aadamka ka dhacda."]

sourceString: Similar to its homologous virus, SARS-CoV, which caused SARS in thousands of people in 2003, SARS-CoV-2 might also be transmitted from the bats and causes similar symptoms through a similar mechanism.
targetString: Si lamid ah fayruuskeeda u eg, SARS-CoV,  kaas oo sababay SARS kumanaan qof intiii lagu jiray 2003, SARS-CoV-2  ayaa sidoo kale ka gudbi kara fiidmaaraha oo sababaya calaamado lamid ah iyadoo uu marayo qaab lamid ah.
translated: Si lamid ah fayruuskeeda isu eg, SARS-CoV, kaas oo sababay SARS kumanaan qof sanadkii 2003, SARS-CoV-2 ayaa sidoo kale laga gudbin karaa fiidmeerta wuxuuna sababi karaa calaamado lamid ah iyada oo loo marayo qaab lamid ah.

sourceString: However, COVID-19 has lower severity and mortality than SARS but is much more transmissive and affects more elderly individuals than youth and more men than women.
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, COVID-19 wuxuu leeyahay ba'naan iyo dhimasho hoosaysa  marka loo eego SARS laakiin way ka gudbitaan badantahay waxayna saamaynaysaa inta badan dadka waawayn marka loo fiiriyo dhalinyarta iyo rag badan marka loo fiiriyo haweenka.
translated: ["Si kasta ha noqotee, COVID-19 wuxuu leeyahay ba'an iyo dhimasho hoosaysa marka loo eego SARS lakiin way ka gudbin badantahay wuxuuna saameeyaa shaqsiyaadka waayeelka ah marka loo eego dhalinyarada iyo ragga marka loo eego dumarka."]

sourceString: In response to the rapidly increasing number of publications on the emerging disease, this article attempts to provide a timely and comprehensive review of the swiftly developing research subject.
targetString: Ka falcelinta tirada sida xawliga ah u kordhaysa ee daabacaadaha cudurada soo ifbaxaya, maqaalakani wuxuu isku dayayaa inuu keeno aragti dhamaystiran oo waqti leh oo ku saabsan mawduuca cilmi baarista sida fudud u hormaraya.
translated: Ka falcelinta tirada sida xawliga ah u kordhaysa ee daabacaadaha ku saabsan cudurka soo ifbaxaya, maqaalkani wuxuu isku dayayaa inuu keeno dib-u-eegis dhamaystiran oo waqtigeeda ku habboon oo ku saabsan mawduuca cilmi baarista sida degdegga ah u hormaraya.

sourceString: We will cover the basics about the epidemiology, etiology, virology, diagnosis, treatment, prognosis, and prevention of the disease.
targetString: Waxaan daboolaynaa aasaaska ku saabsan culuumta cudurada faafa, asal ahaanta cudurka, fayruus barashada,baaritaanka, daweynta, saadaalinta sababaha xanuunka, iyo ka hortaga xanuunka.
translated: Waxaan dabooli doonaa aasaaska ku saabsan cudurada safmareenka, asal ahaan, fayruuska, baadhitaanada, daweynta, saadaalinta, iyo ka hortagga cudurka.

sourceString: Although many questions still require answers, we hope that this review helps in the understanding and eradication of the threatening disease.
targetString: Inkastoo sua'aalo badan ay wali u baahanyihiin jawaabo, waxaan rajaynaynaa in aragtidan ay caawiso fahanka iyo cidhib tirka xanuunka hanjabaya.
translated: ["Inkastoo su'aalo badan ay wali u baahan yihiin jawaabo, waxaan rajeyneynaa in dib u eegistan ay caawiso fahamka iyo ciribtiridda cudurka hanjabaya."]

sourceString: The Spring Festival on January 25, 2020 has become an unprecedented and unforgettable memory to all Chinese who were urged to stay indoors for all the holiday and for many weeks after due to the outbreak of a novel viral disease.
targetString: Xaflada guga ee Janaayo 25, 2020 waxay ku noqotay xasuus aan horay loo arag oona la hilmaamayn dhamaan Shineeska kuwaas oo loo sheegay inay guryaha ku jiraan fasaxa oo dhan todobaadyo badan kadib markuu dilaacay xanuunka fayruuska cusub.
translated: ["Xaflada Gu'ga ee Janaayo 25, 2020 waxay u noqotay xasuus aan horay loo arag, oo aan la ilaawin oo dhan Shiineyska kuwaas oo lagu booriyay inay gudaha joogaan dhamaan fasaxa fasaxa oo dhan iyo todobaadyo badan ka dib marka ay sabab u tahay dilaacitaanka cudurka fayraska cusub."]

sourceString: The virus is highly homologous to the coronavirus (CoV) that caused an outbreak of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) in 2003; thus, it was named SARS-CoV-2 by the World Health Organization (WHO) on February 11, 2020, and the associated disease was named CoV Disease-19 (COVID-19).
targetString: Fayruuska wuxuu si wayn ugu egyahay coronavirus (CoV) kaas oo sababay dilaaca xanuunka calaamadaha neefmareenka ba'an(SARS) intii lagu jiray 2003; sidaa daraadeed, waxaa lagu magacaabay SARS-CoV-2 oo ay yeeshay Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka(WHO) Febraayo 11, 2020, iyo xanuunka la xiriirana waxaa lagu magacaabay CoV Xanuun-19(COVID-19).
translated: ["Fayruusku wuxuu aad ugu ekyahay coronavirus (CoV) kaas oo sababay dilaaca calaamada xanuunka neefmareenka ba'an (SARS) sanadkii 2003; sidaas awgeed, waxaa loo magacaabay SARS-CoV-2 oo ay hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka u qaabilsantahay (WHO) Febraayo 11, 2020, cudurka la xiriirana waxaa loo magacaabay Cudurka CoV-19 (COVID-19)."]

sourceString: The epidemic started in Wuhan, China, and quickly spread throughout the entire country and to near 50 others all over the world.
targetString: Xanuunka safmareenku wuxuu ka bilawday Wuhan, Shiinaha, wuxuna si dhakhsa ah ugu faafay dalka oo dhan iyo in ku dhaw 50 kale oo daafaha caalamka ah.
translated: Safmareenku wuxuu ka bilawday Wuhan, Shiinaha, wuxuuna si dhakhso ah ugu faafay wadanka oo dhan iyo in ku dhow 50 kale oo ku kala nool daafaha dunida.

sourceString: As of March 2, 2020, the virus has resulted in over 80,000 confirmed cases of COVID-19, with more than 40,000 patients discharged and over 3,000 patients who died.
targetString: Ilaa Maarso 2, 2020, fayruuska wuxuu sababay in ka badan 80,000 kiisas la xaqiijiyay oo COVID-19 ah, iyadoo in ka badan 40,000 oo bukaan ay ka bogsoodeen in ka badan 3,000 oo bukaana ay u dhinteen.
translated: Ilaa Maarso 2, 2020, fayraska wuxuu sababay in kabadan 80,000 oo kiisas la xaqiijiyay oo COVID-19 ah, iyadoo in ka badan 40,000 oo bukaan ay ka baxeen in ka badan 3,000 oo bukaanna ay u dhinteen.

sourceString: WHO warns that COVID-19 is “public enemy number 1” and potentially more powerful than terrorism.
targetString: Hay'ada Caafimaadka aduunka waxay ka digaysaa in COVID-19 uu yahay "cadawga 1aad ee bulshada" uuna suurtagalyahy inuu ka awood badanyahay argagixisanimada.
translated: Hay\'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka ayaa ka digtay in COVID-19 uu yahay "cadowga cadowga 1aad ee bulshada" ayna suurtagal tahay inuu ka awood badanyahay argagixisada.

sourceString: According to PubMed (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/), in less than two months, over 200 papers have been published on COVID-19 including its virology, epidemiology, etiology, diagnosis, and treatment since the first report on January 7, 2020 that determined the sequence of the virus isolated from multiple patients.
targetString: Sida laga soo  xigtay PubMed (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/), wax ka yar laba bilood, in ka badan 200 oo waraaq ayaa laga daabacay COVID-19 oo ay kamid tahay culuumtiisa fayruuska, barashadiisa culuumta faafta, barashada asalkiisa, baaritaankiisa, iyo daaweyntiisa ilaa iyo markii ugu horaysay ee lasoo sheegay Janaayo7, 2020 kaas oo muujiyay isku xigitaanka sida fayruuska loogu karaantiilay dhawr bukaan.
translated: ["Sida laga soo xigtay PubMed (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/), wax ka yar laba bilood, in ka badan 200 oo waraaqood ayaa lagu daabacay COVID-19 oo ay kujirto dareenkiisa fayraska, cudurada faafa ee epidemiology, asalkiisa, baadhitaanada, iyo daaweynta tan iyo warbixintii ugu horaysay ee 7dii Janaayo, 2020 kaas oo go'aamiyay taxanaha fayraska ee laga karkaray bukaano kala duwan."]

sourceString: This review attempts to summarize the research progress in the new and swiftly developing subject area.
targetString: Tafatirkan wuxuu isku dayayaa inuu soo koobo hor u socodka cilmi baarista ee aaga mawduuca cusub ee sida fudud u hormaraya.
translated: Dib-u-eegistan waxay isku dayeysaa in ay soo koobto horumarka cilmi baarista ee aaga mawduuca cusub ee sida fudud u hormaraya.

sourceString: Whenever possible, we will try to compare COVID-19 with SARS and another CoV-caused disease, Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS, an outbreak in 2012).
targetString: Marwalaba oo suurtagal ah, waxaan isku dayaynaa inaan COVID-19 barbardhigno SARS iyo xanuun kale uu sababayCoV, Xanuunka neefmareenka ee Bariga Dhexe (MERS, oo dilaacay 2012).
translated: Marwalba oo suurtagal ah, waxaan isku dayi doonaa inaan COVID-19 barbardhigno SARS iyo xanuun kale oo uu sababay CoV, astaanta neefmareenka ee Bariga Dhexe (MERS, oo dilaacay 2012).

sourceString: We will also discuss what we have learned so far regarding the prevention and prognosis of the disease as well as some remaining yet urgent questions.
targetString: Waxaan sidoo kae ka hadli doonaa waxaan ilaa hadda baranany iyadoo la tixgalinayo ka hortga iyo saadaalinta sababaha xanuunka iyo sidoo kale su'aalo kale oo harsan oo weliba degdeg ah.
translated: ["Waxaan sidoo kale ka wada hadli doonaa waxyabihii aan ilaa hadda barannay ee ku saabsan ka hortagga iyo saadaasha cudurka iyo sidoo kale su'aalo kale oo harsan oo haddana degdeg ah."]

sourceString: CoVs have been traditionally considered nonlethal pathogens to humans, mainly causing approximately 15% of common colds 4.
targetString: CoVs waxaa si dhaqan ahaan ah loogu yaqaanay caabuq aan bin'aadanka dilin, isagoo inta u badan sababaya wax ku dhaw 15% ee hargabyada 4.
translated: ["CoV yada ayaa dhaqan ahaan loo yaqaanay jeermis aan bin'aadanka dilin, isagoo inta badan sababaya qiyaas ahaan 15% ee hargabyada caadi ahaan 4."]

sourceString: However, in this century, we have encountered highly pathogenic human CoVs twice, i.e., SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, which caused an outbreak originally in China in 2003 and Saudi Arabia in 2012, respectively, and soon spread to many other countries with horrible morbidity and mortality.
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, qarnigan, waxaan la kulanay cudur keenaha bini'aadamka CoVs oo wayn laba mar, sida SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV, kuwaas oo sababay dilaacitaan uu ka bilawday Shiinaha 2003 iyo Sacuudiga 2012, siday isugu xigaan, oo si dhakhsa ah ugu fiday dalal kale oo badan isagoo lahaa caafimaad darro xun iyo dhimasho.
translated: ["Si kastaba ha ahaatee, qarnigan, waxaan la kulanay cudur jeermis aad u jeermis leh ee CoVs bini'aadanka coVs laba jeer, sida SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV, kuwaas oo sababay dilaacitaankii asal ahaan ka dilaacay Shiinaha 2003 iyo Sacuudiga 2012, siday isugu xigaan, iyo ugu dhakhsaha badan ugu faafay dalal kale oo badan oo leh xanuun naxdin leh iyo dhimasho."]

sourceString: Therefore, the current COVID-19 is the third CoV outbreak in the recorded history of humans.
targetString: Sidaa daraadeed, COVID-19 hadda waa dilaacitaanka CoV kii saddexaad ee taariikhda bini'aadanka la diwaan galiyay.
translated: ["Sidaa daraadeed, COVID-19 ee hadda dilaacay CoV waa kii saddexaad ee ka dilaacay taariikhda bini'aadanka la duway."]

sourceString: As shown in Fig. ​Fig.1,1, clusters of pneumonia that had unknown origins were first reported from Wuhan on December 31, 2019 to the China National Health Commission.
targetString: Sida lagu muujiyay Jaantuuska 1,1, kooxaha koolba'aariyada kuwaas oon faracooda la aqoon ayaa markii ugu horaysay laga soo sheegay Wuhan Diseembar 31, 2019 oo ku aadanayd Guddiga Caafimaadka qaran ee Shiinaha.
translated: Sida ka muuqata Fidinta. Janaayo 1,1, kooxo burukiito ah oo aan la aqoon asalkooda ayaa markii ugu horaysay laga soo sheegay Wuhan Diseembar 31, 2019 guddiga caafimaadka qaranka Shiinaha.

sourceString: Seven days later the sequence of the CoV was released.
targetString: Toddobo maalin kadib siduu isugu xigo CoV ayaa lasoo daayay.
translated: Toddobo maalin kadib xigitaanka CoV ayaa lasoo daayay.

sourceString: On January 15, 2020 the first fatal case from Wuhan was reported.
targetString: Janaayo 15, 2020 dhimashadii ugu horaysay Wuhan ayaa lasoo sheegay.
translated: Janaayo 15, 2020 ayaa lasoo sheegay kiiskii ugu horeeyay ee u dhintay Wuhan.

sourceString: Meanwhile, the epidemic rapidly spread to the neighboring cities, provinces, and countries.
targetString: Isla wakhtigii, xanuunka safmareenku wuxuu si xawli ah ugu faafay magaalooyinka dariska la ah, gobollada iyo dalalaka.
translated: Dhanka kale, safmareenka ayaa si xawli ah ugu faafay magaalooyinka dariska la ah, gobollada iyo wadamada.

sourceString: On January 20, the infection of health-care providers was reported, suggesting that human-to-human transmission was possible.
targetString: Janaayo 20, xanuun qaaditaanka daryeelayasha caafimaadka ayaa lsoo sheegay, taas oo soo jeedinaysa in bini'aadamku isu gudbiyo ay suurtagal tahay.
translated: ["Janaayo 20, caabuqa ay ku dhaceen daryeelayaasha caafimaadka ayaa lasoo sheegay, taas oo soo jeedisay in bini'aadamku isu gudbiyo ay suurtagal tahay."]

sourceString: On January 23, the city of Wuhan was locked down with all its public transportation stopped.
targetString: Janaayo 23, magaalada Wuhan ayaa xayiraad lagu soo rogay iyadoo dhamaan gaadiidka dadwaynaha la joojiyay.
translated: Janaayo 23, magaalada Wuhan ayaa xayiraad lagu soo rogay iyadoo dhamaan gaadiidka dadweynuhu joojiyeen.

sourceString: On January 24 the first clinical study on the disease reported that, out of 41 patients with confirmed cases, only 21 had direct contact with the Wuhan seafood market that was considered the starting site of the infection from an unknown animal source.
targetString: Janaayo 24 daraasadii caafimaad ee xanuunka ee ugu horaysay ayaa sheegtay, in 41 bukaan ee ah kiisaska la xaqiiyay, kali ah 21 ayaa taabasho toos ah la lahyd suuqa cuntada badda ee Wuhan kaas oo loo mlaynayo inuu yahay goobta uu ka billawdo caabuqu khayraad xoolo oon la garanayn.
translated: Janaayo 24 daraasadii caafimaad ee ugu horaysay ee ku saabsan cudurka ayaa sheegtay in, 41 bukaan ee qaba kiisaska la xaqiijiyay, 21 kaliya ay si toos ah ula tacaabteen suuqa cunnada badda ee Wuhan kaas oo loo tixgaliyay inuu yahay goobta uu ka bilaabanayo caabuqa oo ka yimid il xoolo oo aan la garanayn.

sourceString: On January 30, WHO declared the outbreak a global health emergency.
targetString: Janaayo 30, Hay'ada caafimaadka aduunka waxay ku dhawaaqday  inuu dilaacitaanku yahay xaalad caafimaad oo degdegga caalamka oo dhan
translated: ["Janaayo 30, hay'ada caafimaadka ayaa ku dhawaaqday in dilaacista ay tahay xaalad caafimaad oo caalami ah oo degdeg ah."]

sourceString: By the time of this report, the disease has already spread throughout China and near 50 other countries all over the world (Fig. ​(Fig.2).2).
targetString: Waqtiga warbixintan, xanuunka wuxuu ku faafay Shiinaha iyo ku dhawaad 50 dal oo daafaha caalamka ah(Jaantuuska 2)
translated: Waqtiga warbixintaan la gaarayo, cudurka wuxuu goor hore ku faafay wadanka Shiinaha iyo in ku dhow 50 wadan oo kale oo daafaha dunida ah (Fig. (Fig.2).2).

sourceString: As the situation is rapidly evolving, the final scope and severity of the outbreak remain to be determined.
targetString: Maadaama xaaladu si xawli ah ay isu bedelayso, ballaca ugu dambeeya iyo ba'naanta dilaacitaanka waxay yihiin kuwa jooga.
translated: ["Maadaama xaaladu si xawli ah ay isu bedelayso, haddana baaxadda ugu dambaysa iyo ba'naanta dilaacitaanka ayaa ah mid aan la xaqiijin karin."]

sourceString: On February 11, 2020, a multi-center study on 8,866 patients including 4,021 confirmed COVID-19 patients presented a more updated illustration of the epidemic as follows (https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/UlBi-HX_rHPXa1qHA2bhdA).
targetString: Febraayo 11, 2020, daraasad xarumo badan oo lagu sameeyay 8,866 bukaan oo ay kamid yihiin 4,021 bukaan oo COVID-19 laga xaqiijiyay ayaa soo bandhigay muuqaal si badan loo cusboonaysiiyay oo ku saabsan xanuunka safmarka ah sida soo socota (https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/UIBi-HX_rHPXa1qHA2bhdA).
translated: Febraayo 11, 2020, daraasad xarumo badan oo lagu sameeyay 8,866 bukaan oo ay ku jiraan 4,021 bukaan oo la xaqiijiyay oo COVID-19 ah ayaa soo bandhigay sawir dheeri ah oo la cusbooneysiiyay ee saf-mareenka sida soo socota (https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/UlBi-HX_rHPXa1qHA2bhdA).

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 infected people of all ages, but mainly at the age of 30-65.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 dadka uu ku dhacay ee da' kasta leh, laakiin ugu badnaan da'da 30-65.
translated: ["SARS-CoV-2 dadka uu ku dhacay ee da' kasta leh, laakiin inta badan da'doodu u dhexayso 30-65."]

sourceString: Almost half (47.7%) of the infected individuals were over 50 years old, very few were under 20, and only 14 infected individuals were under the age of 10.
targetString: Ku dhawaad kalabar (47.7%) ee dadka uu ku dhacay waxay ka waynaayeen 50 sano, wax aad u yar ayaa ka yaraa 20, kali ah 14 dadkii uu ku dhacay ayaa ka yaraa da'da 10.
translated: ["Ku dhawaad kala bar (47.7%) oo ka mid ah dadka uu ku dhacay waxay ka waynaayeen 50 sano, wax aad u yar ayaa ka yaraa 20, 14 qof oo keliya ee uu ku dhacayna waxay ka yaraayeen da'da 10."]

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 infected more men (0.31/100,000) than women (0.27/100,000).
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu ku dhacay rag badan (0.31/100,000) marka loo barbardhigo haweenka (0.27/100,000).
translated: SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu ku dhacay rag badan (0.31/100,000) marka loo eego dumarka (0.27/100,000).

sourceString: COVID-19 expanded in clusters mainly in and around Hubei.
targetString: COVID-19 wuxuu u fiday kooxo inta ugu badan gudaha iyo agagaarka Hubei.
translated: COVID-19 wuxuu ku fiday kooxo inta badan gudaha iyo agagaarka Hubei.

sourceString: COVID-19 took an average of 5 (2-9) days from onset to diagnosis.
targetString: COVID-19 wuxuu qaatay celcelis 5 (2-9) maalmood ku dhicitaanka ilaa baaritaanka.
translated: COVID-19 wuxuu qaatay celcelis ahaan 5 (2-9) maalmood tan iyo bilowgii baadhitaanka cudurka.

sourceString: The average incubation period was 4.8 (3.0-7.2) days.
targetString: Celceliska mudada uu haynayo waxay ahayd 4.8 (3.0-7.2) maalmood.
translated: Celceliska mudada xanaanada waxay ahayd 4.8 (3.0-7.2) maalmood.

sourceString: The average time from onset to death was 9.5 (4.8-13) days.
targetString: Celceliska waqtiga uu ku dhacay ilaa dhimashada waxay ahayd 9.5(4.8-13) maalmood.
translated: Celceliska waqtiga u dhaxeeya bilowga ilaa dhimashada waxay ahayd 9.5 (4.8-13) maalmood.

sourceString: The basic reproductive number (R0) was 3.77 (95% CI: 3.51-4.05), and the adjusted R0 was 2.23-4.82.
targetString: Tirada taranka aasaasiga ah (RO) waxay ahayd 3.77 (95% Cl: 3.51-4.05), iyo RO la badellay wuxuu ahaa 2.23-4.82.
translated: Tirada taranka aasaasiga ah (R0) waxay ahayd 3.77 (95% CI: 3.51-4.05), iyo R0 la beddelay wuxuu ahaa 2.23-4.82.

sourceString: The number of infected people increased exponentially before 23 Jan. 2020, matching the time of massive transportation before the Spring Festival in China.
targetString: Tirada dadka xanuunka qaaday kor ayay u kacday si xawli ah ka hor 23 janaayo. 2020, iyadoo ku aadan waqtiga gaadiidka xad dhaafka ah ee xaflada guga ee Shiinaha.
translated: ["Tirada dadka uu ku dhacay caabuqa ayaa kor u kacday si xawli ah ka hor 23kii Janaayo. 2020, taas oo u dhiganta wakhtigii gaadiidka ballaaran ka hor xafladda gu'ga ee Shiinaha."]

sourceString: The mortality of patients with confirmed cases was 1.44% (95% CI: 1.10-1.86%), and the adjusted mortality of all the patients was 3.06% (95% CI: 2.02-4.59%).
targetString: Dhimashada bukaanada leh kiisaska la xaqiijiyay waxay ahayd 1.44% (95% CI: 1.10-1.86%), iyo mida wax laga bedellay ee dhimashada bukaanada waxay ahayd 3.06% (95% CI: 202-4.59%).
translated: Dhimashada bukaanada leh kiisaska la xaqiijiyay waxay ahayd 1.44% (95% CI: 1.10-1.86%), iyo isbedelka dhimashada ee dhamaan bukaanada waxay ahayd 3.06% (95% CI: 2.02-4.59%).

sourceString: Three major risk factors for COVID-19 were sex (male), age (≥60), and severe pneumonia.
targetString: Saddex qodob oo khatar wayn ku ah COVID-19 waxay ahaayeen galmada (labka), da'da (>=60), iyo kolba'aariyada xumaatay.
translated: ["Saddex qodob oo khatar wayn ugu jira COVID-19 waxay ahaayeen galmada (labka), da'da (≥60), iyo burukiitada ba'an."]

sourceString: CoVs are a subfamily of large and enveloped viruses containing a single strand of sense RNA.
targetString: CoVs waa qoys hoosaad katirsan fayruusyo waawayn oo dahaadhan kuwaas oo ka kooban hal xarigle dareenka RNA.
translated: CoV yada waa hoosaad ka kooban fayruusyo waa wayn oo duuuban oo ka kooban hal xarig oo dareenka RNA ah.

sourceString: They can be divided into four genera, i.e., alpha, beta, gamma, and delta, of which alpha- and beta-CoVs are known to infect humans.
targetString: Waxaa loo qaybin karaa afar qaybood, sida, alpha, beta, gamma iyo delta, kuwaas oo alpha iyo betalagu yaqaan inay ku dhacaan bina'aadanka.
translated: ["Waxaa loo qaybin karaa afar qaybood, sida, alpha, beta, gamma iyo delta, kuwaas oo alpha- iyo beta-CoVs lagu yaqaan inay ku dhacaan bina'aadanka."]

sourceString: The envelope spike (S) glycoprotein binds to its cellular receptors angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) and dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4) for SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, respectively, and then membrane fusion occurs.
targetString: Xuubka sare(S) glycoprotein wuxuu ku dhagayaa unugeeda dareemaha angiotensin-baddelaha enzyme 2 (ACE2) iyo dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4) ee loogu talagalay SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV, siday isugu xigaan, kadibna xuub isu imaatinka ayaa dhaca.
translated: Dillaacitaanka baqshadda (S) glycoprotein wuxuu ku dhagayaa unugeeda dareemayaasha angiotensin-beddelaya enzyme 2 (ACE2) iyo dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4) ee loogu talagalay SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV, siday isugu xigaan, kadibna isu imaamaynta xuubka ayaa dhacda.

sourceString: The viral RNA genome is released into the cytoplasm; after replication of the viral genome, genomic RNA accompanied by envelope glycoproteins and nucleocapsid proteins forms virion-containing vesicles, which then fuse with the plasma membrane to release the virus.
targetString: Genome RNA ee fayruuska leh waxaa lagu sii daayaa cytoplasm; kadib tarmida fayruuska genome, genomic RNA uu weheliyo xuubka.
translated: RNA fayruuska genome wuxuu ku sii daayaa cytoplasm; ka dib marka la tarmo genome fayruuska, RNA genomic RNA oo ay la socdaan glycoproteins envelope iyo borotiinka nucleocapsid waxay samaystaan caadi-sidaha fayruusku ku jiro, kuwaas oo markaa ku fiyuusa xuubka plasma si loo sii daayo fayraska.

sourceString: The first genomic sequence of SARS-CoV-2 was reported on January 10, 2020.
targetString: isku xigitaanka ugu horeeya genomic SARS-CoV-2 waxaa lasoo sheegay Janaayo 10, 2020.
translated: Isku xigitaanka ugu horreeya ee genomic SARS-CoV-2 ayaa lasoo sheegay Janaayo 10, 2020.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 was found to be a new type of beta-CoV with more than 99.98% genetic identity among 10 sequenced samples collected from the original site of the outbreak, the Huanan Seafood Market in Wuhan.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 waxaa la ogaaday inuu yahay nooc cusub oo beta-CoV oo leh in ka badan 99.98% aqoonsiga genematic oo ka tirsan 10 tijaabo oo isku xiga oo laga soo aruuriyay meeshii ugu horaysay uu ka dilaacay, suuqa cuntada badda ee Huanan ee ku yaala Wuhan.
translated: SARS-CoV-2 ayaa la ogaaday inuu yahay nooc cusub oo ah beta-CoV oo leh in ka badan 99.98% aqoonsiga hidde oo ka mid ah 10 tijaabo oo isku xiga oo laga soo aruuriyay goobtii uu ka dilaacay, suuqa qufulka badda ee Huanan ee ku yaala Wuhan.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is genetically more similar to SARS-CoV than to MERS-CoV.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 hidda ahaan wuxuu u egyahay SARS-CoV marka loo barbardhigo MERS-CoV
translated: SARS-CoV-2 hidde ahaan wuxuu u eg yahay SARS-CoV marka loo eego MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Through transmission electron microscopy, SARS-CoV-2 particles were found in ultrathin sections of human airway epithelium.
targetString: Iyadoo loo marayo  gudbinta elektaroonka maykraskoobka, dhibcaha SARS-CoV-2 waxaa lagu arkay qayb aad u dhuuban oo xuubka neefmareenka bin'aadanka ah.
translated: ["Iyada oo loo marayo gudbinta eltaroonka microscopy, shaybaar SARS-CoV-2 ayaa lagu arkay qaybaha aadka u dhuuban ee epithelium-ka neef-mareenka ee bini'aadanka."]

sourceString: Human ACE2 was found to be a receptor for SARS-CoV-2 as well as SARS-CoV.
targetString: ACE2 bini'aadanka waxaa la ogaaday inuu yahay qabtaha SARS-CoV-2 iyo sidoo kale SARS-CoV.
translated: ["ACE2 bini'aadanka waxaa la ogaaday inuu yahay halbowle u ah SARS-CoV-2 iyo sidoo kale SARS-CoV."]

sourceString: However, the S protein of SARS-CoV-2 binds to human ACE2 more weakly than that of SARS-CoV, which is coincident with the fact that SARS-CoV-2 causes less severe infection in patients than SARS-CoV.
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, borotiinka S ee SARS-CoV-2  wuxuu ku dhagayaa ACE2 bini'aadanka si aad uga daciifsan SARS-CoV, taas oo la babacdhacaysa xaqiiqada ah in SARS-CoV-2 uu sababo caabuq halis yar bukaanada marka loo eego SARS-CoV.
translated: ["Si kastaba ha ahaatee, borotiinka S ee SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu ku dhagayaa ACE2 bini'aadanka si ka daciifsan SARS-CoV, kaas oo la dhacsan xaqiiqada ah in SARS-CoV-2 uu sababo caabuq halis yar bukaanada marka loo eego SARS-CoV."]

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 can also form a novel short protein encoded by orf3b and a secreted protein encoded by orf8.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu sidoo kale samaysan karaa borotiin gaaban oon caadi ahayn oo uu la socdo orf3b iyo borotiin layska soo saaray oo uu la socdo orf8.
translated: SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu sidoo kale samaysan karaa borotiin gaaban oo aan caadi ahayn oo uu la socdo orf3b iyo borotiin soo saaray oo uu la socdo orf8.

sourceString: The orf3b of SARS-CoV-2 may play a role in the viral pathogenicity and inhibit the expression of IFNβ; however, orf8 does not contain any known functional domain or motif.
targetString: orf3b ga SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu door ka ciyaari karaa caabuqnimada fayruuska iyo inuu xayiro qeexitaanka IFNB; si kastaba ha ahaate, orf8 kuma jiro meel la garanayo oo shaqaynaysa mise ueedo.
translated: Orf3b ee SARS-CoV-2 ayaa door ka ciyaari kara caabuqyada fayruuska isla markaana hor joogsan kara qeexitaanka IFNC; Si kastaba ha ahaatee, orf8 kuma jiro wax domain ah oo la yaqaanno domain ama ujeeddo.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, Zhou, et al., reported the cryo-EM structure of the full-length human ACE2 at 2.9 Å resolution in complex with the amino acid transporter B0AT1.
targetString: Febraayo 18, 2020, Zhou, et al., waxay soo sheegtay qaabka cryo-EM oo dheerar buuxa ACE2 bini'aadanka meesha 2.9 A iskudarka la walaaqay ee aashitada amino gudbisa B0AT1.
translated: ["Febraayo 18, 2020, Zhou, et al., waxay soo sheegtay qaab-dhismeedka cryo-EM ee dhererka buuxa ee ACE2 bini'aadamka ee 2.9 Å oo adag oo leh qaadaha amino acid B0AT1."]

sourceString: They found that the complex, which had open and closed conformations, was assembled as a dimer and the ACE2-B0AT1 complex can bind two S proteins, which provides evidence for CoV recognition and infection.
targetString: Waxay ogaadeen in isku jirka, kaas oo furay hadana xiray xaqiijimooyinka, waxaan isugu gaynay isku jirka sidii mid daciif ah iyo ADCE2-B0AT1 waxay isugu dhagi karaan labo borotiinka S ah, kaas oo tusa cadaynta aqoonsiga CoV iyo caabuqa.
translated: Waxay ogaadeen in isku dhafka, kaas oo furay isla markaana xiray asal ahaan, ayaa la isugu keenay sidii hoos udhac iyo ACE2-B0AT1 complex wuxuu ku dhagi karaa labo borotiin S ah, kaas oo bixinaya cadayn aqoonsigii CoV iyo caabuq.

sourceString: B0AT1 may become a therapeutic target for drug screening to suppress SARS-CoV-2 infection.
targetString: B0AT1 wuxuu noqon karaa bartilmaameed daawayn ee baarista daawada si loo xannibo caabuqa SARS-CoV-2.
translated: B0AT1 wuxuu noqon karaa bartilmaameed daaweyneed ee baarista daawada si loo xakameeyo caabuqa SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: The origin and intermediate host
targetString: Xanuun qaadaha asalka ee uu kasoo bilawdey iyo kan dhexe.
translated: Qofka uu kasoo billaabo iyo kan dhexe ee martida ah

sourceString: It has been known that both SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV originated from bats and were transmitted to humans via civet cats and camels, respectively.
targetString: waxaa la ogaaday in labadaba SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV ay kasoo farcameen fiidmaarta loona gudbiyay bini'aadanka iyadoo loo marayo bisadaha iyo geela siday isugu xigaan.
translated: ["Waxaa la ogaaday in labadaba SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV ay kasoo farcameen fiidmaaraha loona gudbiyay bini'aadanka ayadoo la isticmaalayo bisadaha bisadaha iyo geela, siday isugu xigaan."]

sourceString: Through a phylogenetic comparison of SARS-CoV-2 with other CoVs, bats were considered the native host of SARS-CoV-2 as the new virus is 96% identical to two SARS-like CoVs from bats called bat-SL-CoVZX45 and bat-SL-CoVZX21.
targetString: Iyadoo loo marayo isbarbardhiga taariikhda faraca noolaha  ee SARS-CoV-2 iyo CoV yada kale, fiid-merrta ayaa loo aqoonsaday xanuun qaadaha asalka ah ee SARS-CoV-2 maadaama uu fayruuska cusub uu 96% la midyahay labo SARS-CoV ahaan oo kale ah oo laga helay fiid-meeraha oo lagu magacaabay fiid-meer-SL-CoVZX45 iyo fiidmaar-SL-CoVZX21.
translated: Iyadoo loo marayo isbarbardhiga qaabdhismeed ee SARS-CoV-2 iyo CoV yada kale, fiid-meerta ayaa loo aqoonsaday xanuun sidaha asalka ah ee SARS-CoV-2 maadaama uu fayruuska cusub uu 96% la mid yahay laba SARS-CoV yada oo kale ah oo ka yimid fiid-meeraha oo la dhaho fiid-meer-SL-CoVZX45 iyo fiid-meer-SL-CoVZX21.

sourceString: However, what intermediate host helped the virus cross the species barrier to infect humans remains unknown, and the transmission route is yet to be elucidated.
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, wuxuu xanuun qaadaha dhexe uu ka caawiyay fayruuska inuu gudbo xayndaabka noolaha ee inuu ku dhaco bini'aadanka ayaa waxay tahay mid aan la garanayn, jidka uu ugu gudbayana wali ma cada.
translated: Si kasta ha ahaatee, waxa uu dhexdhexaadka u ah hayaha daran ee ka caawiyay fayraska inuu ka gudbo xayndaabka noolaha inuu ku dhaco bina aadamka, lamana oga dariiqa gudbinta wali ma cada.

sourceString: Ji, et al., proposed snakes as a carrier of the virus from bats to humans which involved homologous recombination within the S protein.
targetString: Ji, et al., waxay soo eedisay masasku inay yihiin kasoo qaadayaasha fayruuska fiidmaarta una soo gudbinayaan bini'aadanka kaas oo ay ku jirto isu gayn isu eg ee gudaha borotiinka S.
translated: ["Ji, et al., waxay soo jeedisay masasku inay yihiin kuwa sida fayraska ee fayraska ka yimid fiidmaarta una gudbaya bini'aadanka kaasoo ku lug lahaa isku mid ahaansho isku mid ah gudaha borotiinka S."]

sourceString: According to a study, researchers in Guangzhou, China, suggested that pangolins - long-snouted, ant-eating mammals often used in traditional Chinese medicine - are the potential intermediate host of SARS-CoV-2 based on 99% genetic homology in a CoV discovered in pangolins and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Marka loo eego daraasad, cilmi baarayaasha ku sugan Gangzhou, Shiinaha, waxay soo jeediyeen in qarandid, qudhaanja cunaha caanaha caba in badanaa loo isticmaalay daawa dhaqameedka Shiinaha - ay yihiin suurtagalnimada ugu dhaxaysa ee xanuun qaaadaha SARS-CoV-2 iyadoo lagu duulayo 99% hidde isu eegaha CoV ee lagu ogaaday qarandida iyo SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Sida laga soo xigtay daraasad, cilmi baarayaasha ku sugan Gangzhou, Shiinaha, waxay soo jeediyeen in qarandidada , naasleyda cuna oo dheer cuna ay inta badan ku isticmaalaan daawada dhaqanka Shiinaha - ay yihiin suurtagalnimada ugu dhaxaysa ee xanuun qaadaha SARS-CoV-2 iyadoo lagu salaynayo 99% hidde isu eegista CoV ee lagu ogaaday qarandida iyo SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: However, 1% difference spread all over two genomes is still a big difference; thus, conclusive results for concrete evidence are awaited (Fig. ​(Fig.33).
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, 1% kala duwanaanshaha ayaa ku faafay dhamaan labo macluumaadka hidda sidaha ayaa wali ah kala duwaanasho wayn, sidaa daraadeed, natiijoyinka isku jira ee cadaymaha adag ayaa la sugayaa (Jaantuuska 33)
translated: Si kasta ha noqotee, 1% farqiga u dhaxeeya ayaa ku faafay dhamaan labo genome ayaa weli ah farqi weyn; sidaas awgeed, natiijooyinkii lagu soo gabagabeeyay ee caddaymo la taaban karo ayaa la sugayaa (Fig. (Fig.33).

sourceString: The physicochemical properties of SARS-CoV-2 are largely not yet known.
targetString: Hababka kiimiko muuqdaha ee SARS-CoV-2 ayaan wali si wayn loo aqoon.
translated: Sifooyinka kiimiko ee kiimikada jireed ee SARS-CoV-2 ayaan wali si wayn loo aqoon.

sourceString: SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV can survive in vitro for 48 hours in a dry environment and up to 5 days under 20 °C and 40%-50% humidity.
targetString: SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV waxay ku noolaan karaan vitro 48 saac jawi qalalan iyo ilaa 5 maalmood wixii ka hooseeya 20C iyo 40%-50% huurka.
translated: SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV waxay ku noolaan karaan vitro ilaa 48 saacadood jawi qalalan iyo ilaa 5 maalmood wixii ka hooseeya 20 (C) iyo 40%-50% huurka.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 may possess similar properties.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu lahaan karaa habab lamid ah.
translated: SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu lahaan karaa guryo lamid ah.

sourceString: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 is sensitive to ultraviolet rays and heat at 56 °C for 30 minutes; ether, 75% ethanol, chlorine-containing disinfectant, peracetic acid, chloroform, and other fatty solvents, but not chlorhexidine, can effectively inactivate the virus.
targetString: Waxa lasoo sheegay in SARS-CoV-2 uu xasaasiyad ku qabo shucaaca qoraxda iyo kulaylka 56C ee 30 daqiiqo gudahood, ether, 75% ethanol, caabuq dilaha uu ku jiro chlorine, aashitada paracetic, chloroform, iyo isku jir kale oo xaydh leh, laakiin aan ahayn chlorhexidine, waxay si wax ku ool ah u saari karaan fayruuska.
translated: Waxaa lasoo sheegay in SARS-CoV-2 uu xasaasiyad u leeyahay radiyada ultraviolet iyo kulaylka ee 56 °C muddo 30 daqiiqo ah; ether, 75% ethanol, jeermiska jeermiska ee uu ku jiro chlorine, peracetic acid, chloroform, iyo kuwa kale ee dufanka leh, laakiin maahan chlorhexidine, waxay si wax ku ool ah u kicin karaan fayraska.

sourceString: The entire human population generally lacks immunity to SARS-CoV-2 and hence is susceptible to the novel virus.
targetString: Guud ahaan dhamaan bulshada bini'aadanku waxay laadahay difaaca jirka ku aadan SARS-CoV-2 sidaa daraadeed waxay u nugulyihiin fayruuska cusub.
translated: ["Guud ahaan bulshada bini'aadanka oo dhan waxay la'dahay difaaca jirka ee SARS-CoV-2 sidaa daraadeed waxay u nugul yihiin fayruuska cusub."]

sourceString: Currently, no detailed study has been reported regarding the immunological response to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Waqti xaadirkan, ma jirto daraasad faahfaahsan oo lasoo sheegay oo ku salaysan  ka jawaab celinta difaaca jir ahaaneed ee SARS-CoV-2
translated: Waqti xaadirkan, ma jirto daraasad faahfaahsan oo lasoo sheegay oo ku saabsan jawaab celinta difaaca jir ahaaneed ee SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Thus, we can only refer to previous studies on other CoVs, especially SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV (Fig. ​(Fig.4).4).
targetString: Sidaas awgeed, waxaanu tixraaci karnaa oo kaliya daraasadihii lasoo hore ee CoV yada kale, gaar ahaan SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV (Fig. (Fig.4)4).
translated: Sidaas awgeed, waxaan tixraaci karnaa oo kaliya daraasadihii hore ee CoV yada kale, gaar ahaan SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV (Fig. (Fig.4).4).

sourceString: In general, after a virus invades the host, it is first recognized by the host innate immune system through pattern recognition receptors (PRRs) including C-type lectin-like receptors, Toll-like receptor (TLR), NOD-like receptor (NLR), and RIG-I-like receptor (RLR).
targetString: Guud ahaan, kadib marka fayruuska soo weeraro  xanuun qaadaha, marka kobaad waxaa aqoonsada habka difaaca dabiicga ah ee jirka ayadoo u muraysa qaab aqoonsi dareemayaal ah (PRR yo) oo ay ku jiraan C-type dareemayaal shabaha lectin, dareemayaal Toll-like (TLR) , dareemayaal NOD-Like (NLR) iyo dareemayaal RIG-l-like (RLR).
translated: Guud ahaan, kadib marka fayruus uu soo weeraro xanuun qaadaha, marka ugu horeysa waxaa aqoonsada nidaamka difaaca dabiiciga ah ee asalka ah iyada oo loo marayo qaab aqoonsi dareemayaal ah (PRs) oo ay ku jiraan dareemayaal nooca C-ga ee lectin-like, dareemayaal Toll-like (TLR) , dareemayaal NOD-like (NLR) iyo dareemayaal RIG-i-like (RLR).

sourceString: Through different pathways, the virus induces the expression of inflammatory factors, maturation of dendritic cells, and synthesis of type I interferons (IFNs) which limit the spreading of the virus and accelerate macrophage phagocytosis of viral antigens.
targetString: Iyadoo loo marayo dariiqyo kala duwan, fayruus ka ayaa ka dhigaa sababaha muujiya bararka, waynaanshaha unugyada neerfaha denderitic, iyo samaynta type I interferons (IFN yo) taasoo xakamaynaysa faafitaanka fayruuska iyo xawliga macrophage phagocoytosis ee antijiinka fayraska.
translated: Iyada oo loo marayo dariiqyo kala duwan, fayruusku wuxuu keenaa muujinta asbaabaha bararka, kor u qaadista unugyada dendritic, iyo isku-darka nooca I interferons (IFNs) kuwaas oo xaddidaya faafitaanka fayraska iyo xawliga macrophage phagoytosis ee antigens-ka fayraska.

sourceString: However, the N protein of SARS-CoV can help the virus escape from the immune responses.
targetString: Si kasta ha ahaate, borotiinada N ee SARS-CoV ayaa ka caawin kara fayruuska in uu ka baxsado jawaab celinta difaaca jirka.
translated: Si kasta ha ahaate, borotiinka N ee SARS-CoV wuxuu ka caawin karaa fayruuska inuu ka baxsado jawaabaha difaaca jirka.

sourceString: Soon, the adaptive immune response joins the fight against the virus.
targetString: dhawaan, jawaab celinta la qabsiga difaaca jirka ayaa ku biiraysa dagaal ka lagula jiro fayruuska.
translated: Dhawaan, jawaab celinta la qabsiga difaaca jirka ayaa ku biiraysa dagaalka ka dhanka ah fayraska.

sourceString: T lymphocytes including CD4+ and CD8+ T cells play an important role in the defense.
targetString: Dheecaanada dhiiga cad ee T oo ay ku jiraan unugyada  CD4+ iyo CD8+ T waxay door muhiim ah ka qaataan difaaca.
translated: Dheecaanada dhiiga ee T oo ay ku jiraan unugyada CD4+ iyo CD8+ T waxay door muhiim ah ka qaataan difaaca.

sourceString: CD4+ T cells stimulate B cells to produce virus-specific antibodies, and CD8+ T cells directly kill virus-infected cells.
targetString: Unugyada CD4+ waxay kiciyaan unugyada B si ay usoo saaraan anti-boodhiyo fayruus difaacida khaas u ah, iyo unugyda CD8+ T kuwaas si toos ah u dilla unugyada caabuqa fayruuska ka qaaday.
translated: Unugyada CD4+ T waxay kiciyaan unugyada B si ay u soo saaraan anti-boodhiyo fayruus oo khaas ah, iyo unugyada CD8+ T si toos ah u dilaan unugyada caabuqa fayruuska ku dhacay.

sourceString: T helper cells produce proinflammatory cytokines to help the defending cells.
targetString: Caawiyayaasha unugyada T waxay soo saaraan kalmeeyaha bararitaanka unugyada cytokines si ay u caawiyaan difaacida unugyada.
translated: Kaaliyaha unugyada T waxay soo saaraan unugyada bararka (proinflammatory cytokines) si ay u caawiyaan difaaca unugyada.

sourceString: However, CoV can inhibit T cell functions by inducing apoptosis of T cells.
targetString: Si kasta ha ahaatee, CoV wuxuu xakamayn karaa shaqooyinka unuga T asoogo ka dhigaya unugyada T kuwa dhinta.
translated: Si kasta ha ahaatee, CoV wuxuu xakamayn karaa shaqooyinka unugga T isagoo soo saaraya apoptosis unugyada T.

sourceString: The humoral immunity including complements such as C3a and C5a and antibodies is also essential in combating the viral infection.
targetString: Difaaca jirka aadamaha oo ay ku jiraan difaacayaasha sida C3a iyo C5a iyo anti-boodhiyo ayaa sidoo kale ah kuwa aasaas u ah la dagalaanka caabuqa fayruuska.
translated: Difaaca jirka qoyaanka oo ay ku jiraan isku darka C3a iyo C5a iyo anti-boodhiyo-yaasha ayaa sidoo kale ah kuwa aasaas u ah la dagaalanka caabuqa fayraska.

sourceString: For example, antibodies isolated from a recovered patient neutralized MERS-CoV.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, anti-boodhiyo laga soo baxshay bukaan bogsaday waxay dhexdhexaadiyeen MERS-CoV.
translated: Tusaale ahaan, anti-boodhiyo laga soo saaray bukaan bogsaday waxay dhexdhexaadiyeen MERS-CoV.

sourceString: On the other hand, an overreaction of the immune system generates a large number of free radicals locally that can cause severe damages to the lungs and other organs, and, in the worst scenario, multi-organ failure and even death.
targetString: Dhinaca kale, la falgalida xad dhaaf ka ah ee habka difaaca jirka ayaa dhaliya   unugyo badan oo isku si u shaqaynaya si maxali ah kuwaas oo u sababi kara   wadnaha iyo xubno kale ba dhaawacyo halis ah, iyo, xaalada ugu xun,shaqayn la'aanta xubno badan iyo waliba dhimasho.
translated: ["Dhinaca kale, falcelin xad dhaaf ah ee habka difaaca jirka ayaa dhaliya tiro badan oo radical-yo bilaash ah oo maxalli ah si maxalli ah u keeni kara dhaawac ba'an oo ku dhaca sambabada iyo xubno kale, iyo, marxaladda ugu xun, hawl-galka xubno badan iyo xataa dhimasho."]

sourceString: The SARS-CoV-2 infection, featured by clustering onset, is more likely to affect elderly people with comorbidities and pregnant women.
targetString: Caabuqa SARS-CoV-2, oo laguu astaameeyay kooxeyn socota, ayaa u badan in caabuqa la qaadsiiya dadka da'ada ah ee  qaba cuduro hore iyo haweenka uur ka ah
translated: ["Caabuqa SARS-CoV-2, oo lagu astaameeyay kooxayn bilaabashada, ayaa u badan inuu saameeyo dadka waayeelka ah ee qaba cuduro la'aanta ah iyo haweenka uur leh."]

sourceString: It is common that for people who are exposed to a large number of viruses or whose immune functions are compromised, they have higher chance to be infected than others.
targetString: Waa wax caadi ah in dadka u nugul fayrasyo tirada badan ama kuwa shaqada difaacooda jirka aysan saraynin, waxay haystaa fursado aad u badan oo ah in la qaadsiiyo caabuqa marka la barbae dhigo kuwa kale.
translated: Waa wax iska caadi ah in dadka u nugul fayrasyada tiro badan ama ay shaqada difaaca jirka hoos u dhac ku yimaado, waxay haystaan fursado badan oo ay ku qaadi kareen in ay ka badan yihiin kuwa kale.

sourceString: The estimated mean incubation period of SARS-CoV-2 is 1-14 days, mostly 3-7 days based on a study of the first 425 cases in Wuhan.
targetString: Celcelis ahaanta la qiyaasay ee mudadda xanaanada ee SARS-CoV-2 ayaa ah 1-14 maalmood, inta badan 3-7 maalmood  sida laga soo xiganayo daraasadda 425 kiis ee u horeeyay Wuhan.
translated: Celceliska lagu qiyaasay mudada xanaanada ee SARS-CoV-2 ayaa ah 1-14 maalmood, inta badan 3-7 maalmood iyadoo lagu salaynayo daraasad lagu sameeyay 425 kiis ee ugu horeeyay ee Wuhan.

sourceString: However, a study on 1,099 cases demonstrates that the incubation period was 3 days on average and ranged from 0 to 24 days.
targetString: Si kasta ha ahaatee, daraasad lagu sameeyay 1,099 kiis ayaa tilmaamaysa in ay mudadda xanaanada ahayd 3 malmood celcelis ahaan oo loo dhaxaysiiyay 0 ilaa 24 maalmood.
translated: Si kasta ha ahaatee, daraasad lagu sameeyay 1,099 kiis ayaa tilmaamaysa in mudadda xanaanada ay ahayd 3 maalmood celcelis ahaan oo loo dhaxaysiiyay 0 ilaa 24 maalmood.

sourceString: A more recent study, as described above, demonstrates that the incubation period was 4.8 (3.0-7.2) days based on the demography of 8,866 cases.
targetString: Daraasad dheeri ah oo hadda ah, sida lagu qeexay kor, ayaa tilmaamaysa in ay mudadda xanaanada ay ahayd 4.8 (3.0-7.2) maalmood sida laga soo xiganayo tirakoobida 8,866 kiisas.
translated: Daraasad dheeri ah oo hada la sameeyay, sida lagu qeexay kor ku xusan, ayaa muujinaysa in mudadda xanaanada ay ahayd 4.8 (3.0-7.2) maalmood iyadoo lagu salaynayo tiraadda dadka ee 8,866 kiisas.

sourceString: It is very important for health authorities to adjust the effective quarantine time based on the most accurate incubation period, thus preventing infected but symptomless people from transmitting the virus to others.
targetString: Aad ayay muhiim ugu tahay madaxda caafimaadka in ay hagaajiyaan karantiil muddo ah oo waxtar leh ee inta badan mudadda saxda ah ee xanaanada, taas oo ka hortagaysa in la is qaadsin lakiin dadka aan calaamadaha muujinaynin  u gudbinta fayraska dadka kale.
translated: ["Aad ayay muhiim ugu tahay mas'uuliyiinta caafimaadka inay hagaajiyaan waqtiga karantiilka ee wax ku ool ah iyadoo lagu salaynayo mudadda saxda ah ee xanaanada, taas oo ka hortagaysa dadka qaba caabuqa laakiin aan calaamadaha muujinayn inay u gudbiyaan fayraska dadka kale."]

sourceString: As a common practice, individuals exposed to, or infected by, the virus are usually required to be quarantined for 14 days.
targetString: Sida caadadaha ah, shaksiyaadka u nugul, ama kuwa qaaday, fayraska ayaa sida caadiga ah loo baahanyahay in la karantiilo 14 maalmood.
translated: Sida caadiyan oo kale ah, shakhsiyaadka u nugul, ama ay qaadeen, fayraska ayaa sida caadiga ah loo baahanyahay in la karantiilo 14 maalmood.

sourceString: Should the quarantine time be extended to 24 days?
targetString: Mudadda karantiilida miyaa loo kordhiyaa 24 maalmood?
translated: Mudadda karantiilka miyaa loo kordhiyaa 24 maalmood?

sourceString: Fever is often the major and initial symptom of COVID-19, which can be accompanied by no symptom or other symptoms such as dry cough, shortness of breath, muscle ache, dizziness, headache, sore throat, rhinorrhea, chest pain, diarrhea, nausea, and vomiting.
targetString: Qandhada badanaa waa calaamadaha ugu waaweyn uguna horeeya ee COVID-19, midaas oo ay wehelin karaan calaamado la'aan ama calaamado kale sida qufac qalalan, neefsasho yaraan, murqo xanuun, caajis, madax xanuun, dhuun xanuun, dhiif badan, feedha xanuun, shuban, lalabo, iyo mataq.
translated: ["Qandhada badanaa waa calaamadaha ugu waaweyn uguna horeeya ee COVID-19, kuwaas oo ay wehelin karaan calaamado la'aan ama calaamado kale sida qufac qalalan, neefsasho yaraan, murqo xanuun, madax xanuun, madax xanuun, dhuun xanuun, dhiif xanuun, dhiif xanuun, feedha xanuun, shuban, lalabo, iyo mataq."]

sourceString: Some patients experienced dyspnea and/or hypoxemia one week after the onset of the disease.
targetString: Bukaanada qaar waxay la tacaaleen neefsasho yaraan iyo oksijiinka oo ku yar jirkooda  hal isbuuc uun ka dib bilaabashada cudurka
translated: ["Bukaanada qaar waxay la kulmeen neefsasho la'aan iyo dhiig-bax ama hypoxemia hal isbuuc ka dib bilowgii cudurka."]

sourceString: In severe cases, patients quickly progressed to develop acute respiratory syndrome, septic shock, metabolic acidosis, and coagulopathy.
targetString: Kiisaska halista ah, bukaanadu si dagdag ah ayay hormar uga sameeyaan in uu cudurku u hormaro astaamaha xanuunka ba'an ee hab neefsiga, caabuqa halw gabiya hal bawlayaasha, asid jidhka fadhiista iyo dhiig bixitaan.
translated: ["Xaaladaha halista ah, bukaanada si dhakhso ah ayay u gudbeen si ay u yeeshaan astaanta neef-mareenka ba'an, naxdinta septic, acidosis-ka dheef-shiid kiimikaadka, iyo coagulopathy."]

sourceString: Patients with fever and/or respiratory symptoms and acute fever, even without pulmonary imaging abnormalities, should be screened for the virus for early diagnosis.
targetString: Bukaanada qaba qandhada iyo/ama calaamadaha neef mareenka iyo qandho ba'an, xataa ayada oon la sawirin ciladaha xididadda wadnaha dhiiga geeya, waa in lagaa baaraa fayraska si daqso ah baadhitaano laguu sameeyo
translated: ["Bukaanada qaba qandhada iyo/ama calaamadaha neefmareenka iyo qandho ba'an, xataa ayadoo aan la sawirin ciladaha xun ee wadnaha, waa in laga baaro fayraska si waqti hore looga baaro."]

sourceString: A demographic study in late December of 2019 showed that the percentages of the symptoms were 98% for fever, 76% for dry cough, 55% for dyspnea, and 3% for diarrhea; 8% of the patients required ventilation support.
targetString: Daraasad tirakoob ah oo la sameeyay dhamaadkii Diseembar 2019 ayaa tusisay in calaamadaha boqoleyda ahaayeen 98% oo qandha ah,78% oo ah qufac qalan, 55% neefsasho la'aan ah, iyo 3% shuban ah; 8% ka mid ah bukaanada waxay u baahnaanyeen tageerid neef-siineed.
translated: ["Daraasad tira kooban oo la sameeyay dabayaaqadii Diseembar 2019 ayaa tusisay in calaamadaha boqoleyda ay ahaayeen 98% oo qandho ah, 76% oo ah qufac qalalan, 55% oo neefsasho la'aan ah, iyo 3% shuban; 8% ka mid ah bukaanada waxay u baahnaanayaan in laga caaro hawo-galin."]

sourceString: Similar findings were reported in two recent studies of a family cluster and a cluster caused by transmission from an asymptomatic individual.
targetString: Natiijooyin la mid ah ayaa lagu soo sheegay laba daraasadood oo hada  ah oo koox qoys ah oo kooxda waxay sababtay gudbinta cudurka ee qof aan calaamadaha muujinaynin.
translated: Natiijooyin la mid ah ayaa lagu soo warramay laba daraasadood oo dhawaan lagu sameeyay koox qoys ah iyo koox ay sababtay gudbinta qof aan calaamadaha muujinayn.

sourceString: Comparably, a demographic study in 2012 showed that MERS-CoV patients also had fever (98%), dry cough (47%), and dyspnea (55%) as their main symptoms.
targetString: Barbar dhig ahaan, daraasadda tirakoobka ee 2012 ayaa tusaysa in bukaanada MERS-CoV sidoo kale ay qabaan qandho (98%), qufac qalalan (47%). iyo neefsasho yaraan (55%) ayaa ahaa calaamadaha ugu waaweyn.
translated: ["Isbarbardhiga, daraasad tirakoobka ah ee 2012 ayaa muujisay in bukaanada MERS-CoV ay sidoo kale qabaan qandho (98%), qufac qalalan (47%), iyo neefsasho la'aan (55%) oo ah calaamadahooda ugu waaweyn."]

sourceString: However, 80% of them required ventilation support, much more than COVID-19 patients and consistent with the higher lethality of MERS than of COVID-19.
targetString: Si kasta ha ahaate, 80% ka mid ah waxay u baahanyihiin tageero neef-siin, inta waxaa sii dheer bukaanada COVID-19 iyo khatarta u dhimashada MERS oo joogta ah marka la barbar dhigo COVID-19.
translated: Si kasta ha noqotee, 80% ka mid ahi waxay u baahnaayeen taageero neefsashada, si aad ah ayaa uga badan bukaanada COVID-19 oo si joogto ah u khaas ahaan dilaaga badan ee MERS marka loo eego COVID-19.

sourceString: Diarrhea (26%) and sore throat (21%) were also observed with MERS patients.
