sourceString: However, only N95 (series # 1860s) masks can protect against the inhalation of virions as small as 10 to 80 nm, with only 5% of the virions being able to penetrate completely; SARS-CoV-2 is similar to SARS-CoV in size and both are approximately 85 nm.
targetString: Si kasta ha noqotee, kaliya N95 ( taxane # 1860 yo) masarada afka lagu duubto waxay ilaalin karaan nuugista fayras aad u yaryar sida 10 ilaa 80 nm xilliga neefsashada, awood ahaan 5% kaliya oo fayraska ah ayaa awoodo in uu u gudbo si dhamaystiran; SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu la mid yahay SARS-CoV dhinaca xajmiga labadooduna  qiyaas ahaan waaa 85 nm.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, kaliya N95 (taxane # 1860s) maaskaro ayaa ka difaaci kara in la neefsado fayrasyada yaryar sida 10 illaa 80 nm, iyadoo 5% kaliya ee fayraska ay awoodaan in ay si buuxda u dhex galaan; SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu la mid yahay SARS-CoV xajmi ahaan labadabana waa qiyaas ahaan 85 nm.

sourceString: Since particles can penetrate even five surgical masks stacked together, health-care providers in direct contact with patients must wear N95 (series # 1860s) masks but not surgical masks.
targetString: Madaama ay walxaha yariiska ah ka gudbi karaan xataa shan masarka afka lagu daboosha ah ee qaliinada oo la isdulsaaray, bixiyayaasha daryeelka caafimaad ee si toos ula macaamilaya bukaanada waxaa ku qasab ah in ay xirtaan N95 (taxanaha # 1860 yadii) masarka afka lagu daboosha lakiin ma aha masarada afka lagu daboosho ee qaliinka.
translated: Maadaama walxaha ay dhex geli karaan xataa shan maaskaro qalliinka ah oo isku duubay, daryeel bixiyayaasha daryeelka caafimaad ee si toos ah ula xiriira bukaanada waa inay xirtaan maaskarada N95 (taxanaha # 1860s) laakiin aanay xiran maaskarada qalliinka.

sourceString: In addition to masks, health-care providers should wear fitted isolation gowns in order to further reduce contact with viruses.
targetString: Waxaa dheer masarka afka lagu xirto, bixiyayaasha daryeelka caafimaad waa in ay xirtaan dhar ayagoo dhan la dhan oo difaaca si  loo sii dhimo taabashada fayruusyada.
translated: ["Marka laga soo tago afduubka afka lagu xirto, bixiyayaasha daryeelka caafimaadku waa inay xirtaan dhar go'doomin ah oo lagu rakibay si loo sii yareeyo taabashada fayruusyada."]

sourceString: Viruses can also infect an individual through the eyes.
targetString: Fayruusyadu qofka waxay ka gali karaan indhaha.
translated: Fayruusyadu qofka waxay ka qaadi karaan indhaha.

sourceString: On January 22, 2020, a doctor was infected with SARS-CoV-2 although he wore an N95 mask; the virus might have entered his body through his inflammatory eyes.
targetString: Janaayo 22, 2020, dhaqtar ayuu ku dhacay SARS-CoV-2 inkastoo uu xirtay masarka afka lagu daboosho ee N95, waxaa macquul ah in uu fayraska ka galay jidhkiisa asagoo maraya indhahiisa.
translated: Janaayo 22, 2020, dhaqtar wuxuu ku dhacay SARS-CoV-2 inkastoo uu xirnaa maaskaro N95; waxaa laga yaabaa in fayraska uu jirkiisa ka galay indhihiisa oo bararsan.

sourceString: Thus, health-care providers should also wear transparent face shields or goggles while working with patients.
targetString: Sidaas awgeed, bixiyayaasha daryeelka caafimaad waa inay xirtaan gaashaan waji oo wax laga dhex arko ama okiyaalo marka ay ka shaqaynayaan bukaanada.
translated: Sidaas awgeed, bixiyayaasha daryeelka caafimaadku waa inay xirtaan gaashaan wajiga ama okleyaal daahfuran inta ay ka shaqaynayaan bukaanada.

sourceString: For the general public in affected or potentially affected areas, it is highly suggested that everybody wash their hands with disinfectant soaps more often than usual, try to stay indoors for self-quarantine and limit contact with potentially infected individuals.
targetString: Dadweynaha jooga goobaha la saameeyay ama la saamayn karo, waxaa si adag loogu soo jeediyay in uu qof kasta ku dhaqo gacmihiisa sabuun jeermis dilla ah in ka badan sidii hore, inay guryaha joogaan si ay si shaksi ahaaneed isu karantiilaan oo ay yareeyaan la macaamilka dadka ay suurtagal tahay inuu ku dhacay caabuqa.
translated: Dadweynaha ku nool goobaha ay saameeyeen ama laga yaabo in ay saameeyeen, waxaa si weyn loogu soo jeediyay in qof kasta uu gacmihiisa ku dhaqo saabuun jeermis dillaac ah in ka badan sidii hore, ay isku dayaan inay gudaha joogaan si ay iskood u karantiilaan oo ay yareeyaan la taabashada dadka ay suurtagal tahay inuu ku dhacay caabuqa.

sourceString: Three feet is considered an appropriate distance for people to stay away from a patient.
targetString: Saddex baac ayaa loo aqoonsaday inay tahay masaafada ku haboon dadka in ay ka fogaadaan bukaanka.
translated: Sadex baac ayaa loo arkaa inay tahay masaafada ku haboon dadka inay ka fogaadaan bukaanka.

sourceString: These actions are effective methods to lower the risk of infection as well as prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: Ficilladani waa habab waxtar u leh hoos udhiga khatarta caabuqa iyo sidoo kale ka hortaga faafitaanka fayruuska.
translated: Tallaabooyinkani waa habab waxtar leh oo lagu yaraynayo khatarta caabuqa iyo sidoo kale ka hortagga faafitaanka fayraska.

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV-2 came as a new virus to the human world, its high homology to SARS-CoV as reported on 7 January 2020 should have caused high alert to China based on her deep memory of the SARS outbreak in 2003.
targetString: Inkastoo SARS-CoV-2 uu u imaaday sidii fayras ku cusub dunida aadamaha, wuxuu aad ugu eegyahay SARS-CoV sida lagu soo waramay 7 dii Janaayo 2020 wuxuuna sababay feejignaan sareysa Shiinaha ayadoo ku salaysan xasuusta qotoda dheer ee dilaaca SARS 2003.
translated: Inkastoo SARS-CoV-2 uu u yimid sidii fayruus ku cusub dunida aadamaha, wuxuu aad ugu eg yahay SARS-CoV sida lagu soo waramay 7dii Janaayo 2020 wuxuu sababay feejignaan sareysa Shiinaha ayadoo ku saleysan xasuusta qotoda dheer ee dilaacitaanka SARS ee 2003.

sourceString: However, not until 19 January 2020 did the director of the Center of Disease Control of Wuhan comfort the citizens by saying that the novel virus has low contagiousness and limited reproductivity from human to human and that it is not a problem to prevent and contain the disease.
targetString: Si kasta hanoqotee, ilaa 19 kii Janaayo 2020 agaasimaha xarunta xakamaynta cudurka ee Wuhan muusan dajinin  shacabka asagoo dhahaya fayruuska cusub wuxuu leeyahay awood hoosaysa oo faafitaan iyo xakamaynta taranka ee bina'adaamka dhexdooda taasna dhib ma aha si looga hortago loona joojiyo cudurka.
translated: ["Si kastaba ha ahaatee, ma ahan ilaa 19 janaayo 2020 agaasimaha xarunta xarunta xakameynta cudurada ee Wuhan wuxuu u tacsiyeeyay muwaadiniinta isagoo sheegay in fayraska cusub uu leeyahay faafitaanka hooseeya iyo taranka oo kooban oo ka yimaada bini'aadanka bini'aadanka ilaa aadanaha iyo in aysan dhibaato ku aheyn in laga hortago oo xanuunka la xakameeyo."]

sourceString: This message remarkably relaxed the alarm of the public, especially when the entire country was preparing for the Spring Festival, and the critical time was missed to contain the disease at its minimal scale in Wuhan.
targetString: Fariinta waxay si cajiib ah u dabcisay walaaca dad weynaha, gaar ahaan marka wadanka oo dhan uu isu diyaarinayay Dabaal dagga Guga, waqti muhiim ahna la baajiyay si loo joojiyo cudurka qiyaas ahaan meesha ugu yar gudaha Wuhan.
translated: Fariintaan ayaa si cajiib ah u nasatey walaaca dad weynaha, gaar ahaan markii dalka oo idil uu isku diyaarinayay xafladda guga, waqtiga muhiimka ahna la waayay si loo xakameeyo cudurka oo ah qiyaasta ugu yar ee Wuhan.

sourceString: The disease control agencies in China may take this hard lesson and make critical improvements in the future.
targetString: Hay'adaha xakamaynta cudurka ee Shiinaha waxaa laga yaabaa in ay qaatan casharkan adag oo ay ka sameeyaan hormaritaano waaweyn mustaqbalka.
translated: ["Hay'adaha xakamaynta cudurka ee Shiinaha ayaa laga yaabaa in ay qaataan casharkan adag oo ay ka sameeyaan hormarin muhiim ah mustaqbalka."]

sourceString: For example, these agencies should be (1) more careful when making public announcements as every word counts to citizens and can change their attitude and decisions; (2) more sensitive and reactive to unusual information from clinics rather than waiting for formal reports from doctors or officials; (3) more restrictive to contain a potential epidemic at its early stage rather than attempting to comfort the public; and (4) more often to issue targeted and effective drills to increase the public's awareness about epidemic diseases and to test and improve the response system of the society periodically.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, hay'adahan waa in ay (1) taxadar badan suubiyaan marka ay samaynayaan ogeysiinada dadweyna maadaama eray kasta oo shacabka loo sheego uu badali karo dareenkooda iyo gooaanadooda; (2) dareen iyo falcelitaan badan oo ka yimaada macluumaadka aan caadiga ahayn ee ka imaanayo xarumaha caafimaadka inta ay ka sugi lahaayeen warar rasmi ah dhaqaatiirta iyo madaxda; (3) xayiraado badan si loo joojiyo suurta galnimada faafitaanka saf-mareenka marxaladeeda hore intii la isku dayi lahaa in la dajiyo dadweynaha; iyo (4) intaa waxaa dheer in loo qaybiyo agab la bartilmaamedsaday oo waxtar leh si loo kordhiyo wacyi galinta dadweynaha oo ku saabsan cudurka safmareenka ah iyo si loo tijaabiyo korna loogu qaado habka jawaab celinta bulshada in mudda ah.
translated: ["Tusaale ahaan, hayʼadahan waa inay (1) taxadar dheeraad ah si aad ah uga taxadaraan marka ay sameynayaan wacyigelinta dadweynaha maadaama eray kasta oo lagu tiriyo shacbiga ayna wax ka beddeli karaan habdhaqankooda iyo go'aamadooda; (2) in ka badan xasaasi ah oo ka jawaabid badan macluumaadka aan caadiga ahayn ee xarumaha caafimaadka halkii ay ka sugi lahaayeen warbixino rasmi ah dhakhaatiirta ama saraakiisha; (3) xayiraad badan oo xannibaad ku ah in la joojiyo saf-mareenka la bilaabo halkii la isku dayi lahaa in la qaboojiyo dadweynaha; iyo (4) badanaaba in lasoo saaro dhoolatusyo la bartilmaameedsaday oo wax ku ool ah si loo kordhiyo wacyi gelinta dadweynaha ee ku saabsan cudurada saf-mareenka ah iyo si loo tijaabiyo loona hagaajiyo hannaankii jawaab celineed ee bulshada oo joogta ah."]

sourceString: The outbreak of COVID-19 caused by the novel virus SARS-CoV-2 started in the end of December 2019.
targetString: Dilaaca COVID-19 ee uu sababay fayraska cusub ee SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu bilawday dhamaadkii Diseembar 2019.
translated: Dilaacitaanka COVID-19 ee uu sababay fayruuska cusub SARS-CoV-2 ayaa bilaabmay dhammaadkii Diseembar 2019.

sourceString: In less than two months, it has spread all over China and near 50 other countries globally at the time of this writing.
targetString: Wax ka yar laba billood, waxuu ku faafay dhamaan Shiinaha iyo in ka badan 50 dal aduunka oo dhan xilliga qormadan.
translated: Wax ka yar laba bilood, wuxuu ku faafay dhammaan Shiinaha iyo in ka badan 50 dal oo caalamka ah xilliga uu qoraalkan dhacayo.

sourceString: Since the virus is very similar to SARS-CoV and the symptoms are also similar between COVID-19 and SARS, the outbreak of COVID-19 has created a sense of SARS recurring.
targetString: Madaama uu fayruusku aad ula mid yahay SARS-CoV calaamadahana ay ka simanyihiin COVID-19 iyo SARS, dilaaca COVID-19 wuxuu abuuray dareen dib usoo noqoshada SARS ah.
translated: Maadaama uu fayruusku aad ugu eg yahay SARS-CoV iyo calaamadaha ayaa sidoo kale la mid ah kuwa u dhexeeya COVID-19 iyo SARS, dilaacitaanka COVID-19 wuxuu abuuray dareen ah in SARS uu soo laalaabanayo.

sourceString: However, there are some remarkable differences between COVID-19 and SARS, which are essential for containing the epidemic and treating the patients.
targetString: Si kasta ha ahaate, waxaa jira farqiyo cajiib ah oo u dhexeeya COVID-19 iyo SARS,  midaas oo aasaas u ah joojinta saf-mareenka iyo daaweynta bukaanada.
translated: Si kasta ha noqotee, waxaa jira farqiyo cajiib ah oo u dhexeeya COVID-19 iyo SARS, kuwaas oo aasaas u ah joojinta safmareenka iyo daawaynta bukaanada.

sourceString: COVID-19 affects more elderly individuals than youth and more men than women, and the severity and death rate are also higher in elderly individual than in youth.
targetString: COVID-19 wuxuu aad u saameeyaa dadka waayeelka marka la barbar dhigo da'a yarta iyo ragga marka loo eego dumarka, heerka halista iyo dhimashada sidoo kale waxay ku badantahay dadka da'da ah marka loo eego dhali yarta.
translated: ["COVID-19 wuxuu saameeyaa dadka waayeelka ah marka loo eego dhallinyarada iyo raga ka badan kan dumarka, heerka halista iyo dhimashada ayaa sidoo kale ka sareeya dadka da'da ah marka loo eego dhalinyarta."]

sourceString: SARS has higher mortality than COVID-19 (10.91% versus 1.44%).
targetString: SARS wuxuu leeyahay dhimasho aad uga saraysa marka loo eego COVID-19 (10.91% kasoo horjeeda 1.44%).
translated: SARS wuxuu leeyahay dhimasho aad uga saraysa marka loo eego COVID-19 (10.91% oo kasoo hor jeedda 1.44%).

sourceString: COVID-19 patients transmit the virus even when they are symptomless whereas SARS patients do so usually when they are severely ill, which causes much greater difficulty to contain the spread of COVID-19 than SARS.
targetString: Bukaanada COVID-19 waxay gudbiyaan fayraska xataa ayaga oo aan lahayn wax calaamada ah halka bukaanada SARS sidaas oo kale ahaayeen marka ay aad u xanuunsanyihiin, kaas oo sababa dhibaato weyn sidii loo joojin lahaa faafitaanka COVID-19 marka loo eego SARS.
translated: Bukaanada COVID-19 waxay gudbiyaan fayraska xataa ayaga oo aan lahayn wax calaamada ah halka bukaanada SARS sidaas oo kale sameeyaan marka ay aad u xanuunsanyihiin, kaas oo sababa dhibaato wayn oo ah in la xakameeyo faafitaanka COVID-19 marka loo eego SARS.

sourceString: This partially explains why SARS-CoV-2 spread much faster and broader than SARS-CoV.
targetString: Tani qayb ahaan waxay sharaxaysaa sababta SARS-CoV-2 uu si xawli ah uga faafid badanyahay ugana balaaranyahay SARS-CoV.
translated: Tani waxay qayb ahaan sharaxaysaa sababta SARS-CoV-2 uu si xawli ah oo xawli ah ugu faafay si kana balaadhan SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The regular RNA assay for SARS-CoV-2 can be negative in some COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Tijaabada RNA ee joogtada ee SARS-CoV-2 waxay noqon karta mid aan cudurka laga helin qaybo kamid ah bukaanada COVID-19.
translated: Talaabada RNA ee joogtada ah ee SARS-CoV-2 ayaa laga waayi karaa cudurka COVID-19 qaar kamid ah.

sourceString: On the other hand, cured patients can be positive for the virus again.
targetString: Dhinaca kale, bukaanada la daweeyay waa laga heli karaa cudurka markale.
translated: Dhinaca kale, bukaanada la daweeyay ayaa laga heli karaa markale fayraska.

sourceString: These findings dramatically increase the risk of virus spreading.
targetString: .Natiijooyinka waxay si lama filaan ah u kordhiyaan khatarta faafitaanka fayraska
translated: Natiijooyinkan ayaa si lama-caadi ah u kordhiya khatarta faafitaanka fayraska.

sourceString: Given such rapid progress in research on COVID-19, several critical issues remain to be solved, as follows:
targetString: Marka la eego horumarka degdegga ah ee baadhitaanada COVID-19, arimo badan oo cakiran ayaa lagu xalin doona, sida soocota:
translated: Marka la eego horumarka degdegga ah ee baadhitaanada COVID-19, arrimo badan oo muhiim ah ayaa weli la xalinayaa, sida soo socota:

sourceString: Where did SARS-CoV-2 come from?
targetString: Halkee ayuu SARS-CoV-2 ka yimid?
translated: Halkee ayuu SARS-CoV-2 ka yimid?

sourceString: Although 96% genetic homolog was found between SARS-CoV-2 and two bat SARS-like CoVs, we still cannot conclude that SARS-CoV-2 is from bats.
targetString: Inkastoo 96% hidde side isu eeg laga helay oo u dhexeeya SARS-CoV-2 iyo labo fiid-meer SARS u eeg CoV yo, wali kumasoo gabagabayn karno in SARS-CoV-2 ka yimid fiid-meer.
translated: Inkastoo 96% hidde isu eekaanshaha la helay inta u dhaxaysa SARS-CoV-2 iyo labo fiid-meer SARS u eg CoV yada, wali kuma soo gabagabayn karno in SARS-CoV-2 uu ka yimid fiid-meer.

sourceString: What animal was the intermediate species to transmit the virus from the original host, say bats, to humans?
targetString: Xayawaankee ayaa ah noolaha dhexdhexaadka ee faafitaanka faysaka ee kusoo faafay xanuun sidaha, aan dhahno fiid-meer, ilaa bina adamka?
translated: Xayawaankee ayaa ahaa noolaha dhexdhexaadka ah ee u gudbiyay fayraska kasoo gaaray xanuun sidahaha asalka ah, yidhaahdo fiidmaarta, ilaa bina aadamka?

sourceString: Without knowing answers to #1 and 2, we cannot efficiently cut the transmission, and the outbreak can relapse at any time.
targetString: Iyadoon la aqoon jawaabaha #1 iyo 2, kuma jari karno gudbinta si wax ku ool ah dilaacistana way kasii xumaan kartaa waqti kasta.
translated: Iyada oo aan la ogeyn jawaabaha #1 iyo 2, ma jari karno gudbinta si wax ku ool ah, dilaacitaankane wuu ka sii xumaan karaa waqti kasta.

sourceString: Although molecular modeling and biochemical assays have demonstrated that SARS-CoV-2 binds to ACE2, how exactly does the virus enter the airway cells and cause subsequent pathological changes?
targetString: In kastoo baadhitaanada qaabaynta moodhalada iyo kiimikada ay muujisay in SARS-CoV-2 uu ku dhago ACE2, sidee buu si sax ah u galaa fayrasku hawa mareenka unugyada oo uu ku sababaa isbadalladda baadhitaanada dagdagga ah?
translated: Inkastoo samaynta qaabaynta molecular iyo kiimikada noolaha ay muujisay in SARS-CoV-2 uu ku dhago ACE2, sidee buu si sax ah u galaa fayrasku hawo mareenka unugyada oo uu ku sababaa isbeddelada cudurada ee is xiga?

sourceString: Does the virus also bind ACE2-expressing cells in other organs?
targetString: Fayraska miyuu ku dhagayaa ACE2 ee qeexaya unugyada halwbawlayaal kale?
translated: Fayruusku miyuu ku xidhaa ACE2 ee muujinaya unugyada ku jira xubno kale?

sourceString: Without clear answers to these questions, we cannot achieve fast and accurate diagnosis and effective treatment.
targetString: La'aanta jawaabo cad ee su'aalahan, ma gaadhi karno baadhitaano degdeg ah saxna ah iyo daaweyn waxtar leh.
translated: ["La'aanta jawaabo cad ee su'aalahan, ma gaari karno baadhitaano degdeg ah oo sax ah iyo daaweyn waxtar leh."]

sourceString: How long will the epidemic last?
targetString: Intee in dhan ayuu cudurka saf-mareenka sii socon doonaa?
translated: ["Muddo intee le'ede ayuu cudurka saf-mareenka sii soconayaa?"]

sourceString: How is the virus genetically evolving during transmission among humans?
targetString: Sidee ayuu fayraska hidde ahaan u hormaraa inta lagu jiro isu gudbinta bina adamka dhexdiisa?
translated: Sidee ayuu fayraska hidde ahaan u bedbeddaa inta lagu jiro isu gudbinta bina aadamka dhexdiisa?

sourceString: Will it become a pandemic worldwide, die down like SARS or relapse periodically like the flu?
targetString: Ma waxay noqon doontaa cudur caalami ah aduunka oo dhan, hoos udhaca sida SARS ama kasii xumaanshaha muddo ahaaneed sida hargabka?
translated: Ma waxay noqon doontaa cudur caalami ah aduunka oo dhan, hoos udhaca sida SARS ama kasoo kabasho muddo ahaaneed sida ifilada?

sourceString: It is essential but may take some time to search for answers to the above and many other questions.
targetString: Waa muhiim balse waxaa laga yaaba in ay qaadato waqti si loo raadiyo jawaabaha suaalaha kore iyo suaalo kale ba.
translated: ["Waa lagama maarmaan laakiin waxaa laga yaabaa inay qaadato waqti si loo raadiyo jawaabaha su'aalaha kor ku xusan iyo suaalo kale oo badan."]

sourceString: However, with whatever expense it may demand, we have no other choice but to stop the epidemic as soon as possible and bring our life back to normal.
targetString: Si kasta ha noqotee, kharash kasta oo ay u baahato, ma haysano ikhtiyaar kale balse waa in aan joojinaa cudurkan caalamiga ah sida ugu dhakhsaha badan uguna macquulsan oo aan nolosha kusoo celinaa sidii hore ee caadiga ah.
translated: Si kasta ha noqotee, kharash kasta oo ay u baahato, ma haysano ikhtiyaar kale oo aan ahayn in aan joojino cudurka saf-mareenka sida ugu dhakhsaha badan ee suurtagalka ah oo aan nolosheena ugu soo celino si caadi ah.

sourceString: Zoonotic origins of human coronaviruses
targetString: Asalka cudurada xooluha qaadsiiyaan bina'adamka ee  koronafayraska
translated: ["Asalka cudurada xoonotics ee coronaviruses ee bina'adamka"]

sourceString: Mutation and adaptation have driven the co-evolution of coronaviruses (CoVs) and their hosts, including human beings, for thousands of years.
targetString: Isbadalka hidde sidaha iyo la qabsiga ayaa keenay wada qiimaynta coronavirus (CoV) iyo xanuun sidehooda, ay ku jiraan bina'adamka, kumanaan sanno.
translated: ["Isbadalka iyo la qabsiga ayaa horseeday wada qiimaynta coronavirus (CoV) iyo xanuun sidaha, oo ay ku jiraan bini'aadanka, kumanaan sanno."]

sourceString: Before 2003, two human CoVs (HCoVs) were known to cause mild illness, such as common cold.
targetString: Ka hor 2003, laba CoVs (HCoVs) oo aadanaha ku dhaca ayaa lagu yaqaanay inay keenaan jirro fudud, sida hargabka caadiga ah.
translated: ["Ka hor 2003, laba CoVs (HCoVs) ee bini'aadanka ayaa lagu yaqaanay inay sababaan xanuun fudud, sida hargabka caadiga ah."]

sourceString: The outbreaks of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) and the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) have flipped the coin to reveal how devastating and life-threatening an HCoV infection could be.
targetString: Dilaacista xanuunka ba'an ee hab neefsiga (SARS) iyo astaamaha xanuunka  neef mareenka ee Barigga Dhexe (MERS) ayaa badalay shilinka si uu u mujiiyo sida ay halis u tahay naftana halis ugalinaysa caabuqa HCoV.
translated: ["Dilaacitaanka calaamadaha ba'an ee neefmareenka ba'an (SARS) iyo astaanta neefmareenka ee Bariga Dhexe (MERS) ayaa badalay shilinka si uu u muujiyo sida ay halis u tahay una halis galinaysa caabuqa HCoV."]

sourceString: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 in central China at the end of 2019 has thrusted CoVs into the spotlight again and surprised us with its high transmissibility but reduced pathogenicity compared to its sister SARS-CoV.
targetString: Soo bixitaankii SARS-CoV-2 ee bartamaha Shiinaha dhammaadkii sanadka 2019 ayaa mar kale hoos u dhigay fursadaha CoVs isla markaana wuu naga yaabiyay awooddiisa gudbineed ee aadka u sareeya laakiin waxay hoos u dhigtay faafitaanka marka loo eego walaasheed SARS-CoV.
translated: Soo bixitaanka SARS-CoV-2 ee bartamaha Shiinaha dhammaadkii 2019 ayaa mar labaad iftiimiyay iftiinka CoV yada oo naga yaabisay awooddiisa gudbineed ee aadka u sareeya laakiin waxay hoos u dhigtay faafitaanka marka loo eego walaasheed SARS-CoV.

sourceString: HCoV infection is a zoonosis and understanding the zoonotic origins of HCoVs would serve us well.
targetString: caabuqa fayraska bina adamka ee korona(HCoV) waa cudur ay qaadsiiyaan xooluhu bini adamka fahamka asalka caabuqyada fayraska ee bina adamka(HCoVs).
translated: Infekshanka HCoV waa cudurada caabuqa ee caabuqa xayawaanka iyo fahamka asalka cudurka xoojinta ee HCoV yada ayaa si wacan noogu adeegi lahaa.

sourceString: Most HCoVs originated from bats where they are non-pathogenic.
targetString: Badanaa HCoV waxay kasoo farcameen fiidmeero lakiin ma aha kuwa cudurka qaadsiin kara.
translated: Badanaa HCoV yada waxay kasoo farcameen fiidmeeraha halkaas oo ay yihiin kuwa aan jeermis lahayn.

sourceString: The intermediate reservoir hosts of some HCoVs are also known.
targetString: Xanuun sideyaasha dhexe ee kaydiya qaar kamid HCoV yo ayaa sidoo kale loo yaqaana.
translated: Kaydiyayaasha dhexe ee kaydiya qaar kamid HCoV yada ayaa sidoo kale loo yaqaanaa.

sourceString: Identifying the animal hosts has direct implications in the prevention of human diseases.
targetString: Aqoonsiga xayawaanka martida loo yahay waxay saameyn toos ah ku leeyihiin ka hortagga cudurrada aadanaha.
translated: Aqoonsiga xayawaanka martida u ah waxay saamayn toos ah ku leeyihiin ka hortagga cudurrada aadanaha.

sourceString: Investigating CoV-host interactions in animals might also derive important insight on CoV pathogenesis in humans.
targetString: Baritaanka la macaamilka qaadaaha xanuunka CoV ee xayawaanka ayaa sidoo kale keeni karta fahan muhiim oo kusaabsan hormaritaanka cudurka CoV ee bina adamka dhexdiisa.
translated: Baaritaanka isdhexgalka xanuunka CoV ee xoolaha ayaa sidoo kale keeniaysa fahan muhiim ah oo ku saabsan cudurka CoV ee bina aadamka.

sourceString: In this review, we present an overview of the existing knowledge about the seven HCoVs, with a focus on the history of their discovery as well as their zoonotic origins and interspecies transmission.
targetString: Dib u eegsitan, waxaan kusoo bandhigaynaa dulmarka guud aqoonta laga hayo todobo HCoV yo, anagoo mawjada saarayna taariikhdooda helitaan iyo sidoo kale asal ahaantoda iyo isu gudbinta noolaha dhexdiisa.
translated: Dib u eegistan, waxaanu soo bandhigaynaa guudmarka guud ee aqoonta hada jirta ee ku saabsan todobada HCoV yada, iyadoo diiradda la saarayo taariikhda helitaanka iyo sidoo kale asalka cudurada xoolaha ka tagay iyo gudbinta noolaha kala noocyadooda kala nooca ah.

sourceString: Importantly, we compare and contrast the different HCoVs from a perspective of virus evolution and genome recombination.
targetString: Muhiimad ahaan, waxaan isbarbar dhignaa oo kala saarnaa farqiga u dhexeeya HCoV yada ee ka imaanaya fikradaha qiimaynta fayraska iyo isku dhafka hidde sidaha.
translated: Muhiimad ahaan, waxaan isbarbar dhignaa oo ka duwan HCoV yada kala duwan ee ka imaanaya aragtida qiimaynta fayraska iyo isku dhafka hidde sidaha.

sourceString: The current CoV disease 2019 (COVID-19) epidemic is discussed in this context.
targetString: Cudurka faafa ee CoV 2019 (COVID-19) ee hada ayaa looga hadlay xaaladdaan.
translated: Saf-mareenka hadda jira ee CoV 2019 (COVID-19) ayaa looga hadlay xaaladan.

sourceString: In addition, the requirements for successful host switches and the implications of virus evolution on disease severity are also highlighted.
targetString: Intaas waxaa dheer, shuruudaha loo baahanyahay isbedelka xanuun sidaha si guul ah iyo go'aamada kama dambaysta ah ee qiimaynta fayraska ee halista cudurka ayaa sidoo kale la sheegay.
translated: Intaa waxaa dheer, shuruudaha isbedelka xanuun-sidayaasha si guul leh iyo saamaynta qiimeynta fayraska ee halista cudurka ayaa sidoo kale la muujiyey.

sourceString: Coronaviruses (CoVs) belong to the family Coronaviridae, which comprises a group of enveloped, positive-sensed, single-stranded RNA viruses.
targetString: Coronaviruse yadu (CoVs) waxay kasoo jeedaan qoyska Coronaviridae, kaas oo ka kooban kooxo isku duuban,oo hida sidaha tusiya, fayrasyada hal-xarriglaha ah ee RNA.
translated: Coronaviruses (CoVs) waxay kasoo jeedaan qoyska Coronaviridae, kaas oo ka kooban koox isku duubatay, oo dareen leh dareen fiican leh, fayrasyada hal-xariglaha ah ee RNA.

sourceString: These viruses harbouring the largest genome of 26 to 32 kilobases amongst RNA viruses were termed “CoVs” because of their crown-like morphology under electron microscope.
targetString: Fayrasyadan waxay hoy ka dhigtaan hidde sidaha ugu weyn oo ah 26 ilaa 32 kilobases oo ka mid ah fayrasyada RNA ee lagu magacaabay "CoV" sababtoo ah culuumta qaabka noola ah marka lagu fiiriyay maykoroskoob yar.
translated: Fayrasyadan oo hoy u ah hida sidaha ugu weyn ee 26 ilaa 32 kilobases oo ka mid ah fayrasyada RNA ayaa lagu magacaabay "CoVs" sababtoo ah cilmiga qaabdhismeedka taaj oo kale ah marka loo eego mikroskoobka elektoronka.

sourceString: Structurally, CoVs have non-segmented genomes that share a similar organization.
targetString: Qaab dhismeed ahaan, CoV yada waxay leeyihiin hidde side aan qaybsanayn si ay ula wadaagaan hal urur.
translated: Qaab dhismeed ahaan, CoV yada waxay leeyihiin hidde sidaha aan qaybsanayn ee la wadaaga urur la mid ah.

sourceString: Approximately two thirds of the genome contain two large overlapping open reading frames (ORF1a and ORF1b), which are translated into the pp1a and pp1ab replicase polyproteins.
targetString: Qiyaas ahaan saddex meelood laba meel oo ah hidde sidaha wuxuu ka koobanyahay laba  unug oo waaweyn oo aqriya fariimaha (ORF1a iyo ORF1b), kaasoo loo turjumay pp1a iyo pp1b replicase polyprotiens.
translated: Qiyaas ahaan saddex meelood laba meelood oo hidde sidaha wuxuu ka kooban yahay laba xarumood oo waaweyn oo akhris furan oo isku duuban (ORF1a iyo ORF1b), kuwaas oo loo tarjumay pp1a iyo pp1b replicase polyprotiens.

sourceString: The polyproteins are further processed to generate 16 non-structural proteins, designated nsp1~16.
targetString: Polyprotien yada ayaa markale loo hawlgaliyay si ay usoo saaran 16 borotiino aan qaab-dhismeed lahayn, oo loo qaabeeyay nsp1~16.
translated: Polyproteins ayaa la sii farsameeyay si ay u soo saaraan 16 borotiino aan qaab-dhismeed lahayn, oo loo qaabeeyay nsp1~16.

sourceString: The remaining portion of the genome contains ORFs for the structural proteins, including spike (S), envelope (E), membrane (M) and nucleoprotein (N).
targetString: Qaybta soo hartay ee hidde sidaha wuxuu ka koobanyahy ORF yo loogu tala galay qaab-dhismeedka borotiinada, oo ay ku jiraan spikes (s), envelope (E),), membrane (M) iyo nucleoprotien (N).
translated: Qaybta soo hartay ee hidde sidaha wuxuu ka kooban yahay ORFs ee borotiinka qaab-dhismeedka, oo ay ku jiraan spike (S), envelope (E), membrane (M) iyo nucleoprotein (N).

sourceString: A number of lineage-specific accessory proteins are also encoded by different lineages of CoVs.
targetString: Tiro borotiino gaar ah oo isku xigxiga ayaa la galiyay meeshii ay ka unkameen meelo ka duwan ee CoVs.
translated: Tiro borotiino gaar ah oo isku xigxiga ayaa la galiyo oo ay ka kooban yihiin qaybo ka duwan ee CoV yada.

sourceString: Based on the difference in protein sequences, CoVs are classified into four genera (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV and delta-CoV), among which the beta-CoV genera contains most HCoVs and is subdivided into four lineages (A, B, C and D).
targetString: Iyadoo lagu salaynayo kala duwanaanshaha isku xigitaanka borotiinka, CoV-yada waxaa loo kala saara afar qaybood (alpha-CoV, bet-CoV, gamma-CoV iyo delta-CoV), kaas oo qaybta bet-CoV ay ka kooban tahay HCoV-yada intooda badan loona sii qaybiyo afar noocyo hore( A, B, C iyo D).
translated: Iyadoo lagu salaynayo kala duwanaanshaha isku xigitaanka borotiinka, CoV yada waxaa loo kala saaraa afar qaybood (alpha-CoV, bet-CoV, gamma-CoV iyo delta-CoV), kaas oo qaybta bet-CoV ay ka kooban tahay HCoV yada intooda badan waxaana loo qaybiyaa afar farac (A, B, C iyo D).

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence has shown that bats and rodents serve as the gene source of most alpha-CoVs and beta-CoVs, while birds are the main reservoir of gamma-CoVs and delta-CoVs.
targetString: Cadaynta daraasada farac ogaanshaha waxay muujisay in fiidmeerta iyo jiirarka ay yihiin hidde sidaha inta badan alpha-CoVs iyo beta-CoVs, halka shimbiraha ay yihiin kaydka ugu wayn ee gamma-CoVs iyo delta-CoVs.
translated: Cadaynta daraasada daraasada ayaa muujisay in fiidmaaraha iyo jiirarka ay yihiin hidde sidaha inta badan alpha-CoV yada iyo beta-CoV yada, halka shimbiruhu ay yihiin kaydka ugu wayn ee gamma-CoVs iyo delta-CoVs.

sourceString: For thousands of years, CoVs have constantly crossed species barriers and some have emerged as important human pathogens.
targetString: Kumanaan sano, CoVs ayaa waxay gudbayeen xayndaabka noocyada noolaha kuwana waxay lasoo ifbaxeen inay yihiin jeermis muhiim u ah bina aadamka.
translated: Kumanaan sanno, CoV yada waxay si joogta ah uga gudbayeen xayndaabka noolaha qaarna waxay soo ifbaxeen inay yihiin jeermis muhiim u ah bina aadamka.

sourceString: To date, seven human CoVs (HCoVs) are known.
targetString: Ilaa hadda, toddobo CoV-yada(HCoV) ee bini'aadanka ayaa la ogyahay.
translated: ["Ilaa hadda, toddobo CoV-yada ah ee bini'aadanka (HCoV) ayaa la ogyahay."]

sourceString: Among them HCoV-229E and HCoV-NL63 are alpha-CoVs.
targetString: Waxaa kamid ah HCoV-229E iyo HCoV-NL63 kuwaas oo ah alpha-CoV.
translated: Waxaa kamid ah HCoV-229E iyo HCoV-NL63 waa alpha-CoV.

sourceString: The other five beta-CoVs include HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV), Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Shanta kale ee beta-CoV yada waxaa kamid ah HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, coronavirus ka astaanta xanuunka neefmareenka ee ba'an (SARS-CoV), coronavirus ka astaanta neefmareenka Bariga Dhexe (MERS-CoV) iyo SARS-CoV-2.
translated: ["Shanta kale ee beta-CoV yada waxaa ka mid ah HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, coronavirus-ka astaanta neef-mareenka ba'an ee ba'an (SARS-CoV), coronavirus-ka astaanta neefmareenka Bariga Dhexe (MERS-CoV) iyo SARS-CoV-2."]

sourceString: HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63 usually cause mild symptoms, like common cold and/or diarrhea.
targetString: HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 iyo HCoV-NL63 waxay inta badan sababaan calaamado fudud, sida hargab caadi ah iyo/ama shuban.
translated: HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 iyo HCoV-NL63 waxay badanaa sababaan calaamado fudud, sida hargab caadi ah iyo/ama shuban.

sourceString: In contrast, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and the newly-identified SARS-CoV-2 are highly pathogenic, causing severe lower respiratory tract infection in relatively more patients with a higher chance to develop acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and extrapulmonary manifestations.
targetString: Taa badalkeed, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV-2 ee mardhaw la ogaaday ayaa si wayn jeermis u leh, iyagoo sababaya caabuqa neefmareenka hoose oo ba'an marka loo fiiriyo bukaano badan oo leh fursad wayn  oo ay ku qaadi karaan astaanta walaaca neefmareenka ba'an(ARDS) iyo calaamadaaha saamaynta kabaxsan sanbabada.
translated: ["Taa badalkeeda, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV-2 ee dhawaan la ogaaday ayaa ah jeermis jeermis aad u leh, iyagoo sababaya caabuqa ba'an ee neefmareenka hoose ee marka la qiyaaso bukaano badan oo leh fursad sare oo ay ku qaadi karaan astaanta walaaca neef-mareenka ba'an (ARDS) iyo calaamadaha ka baxsan galmada."]

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain, B814, was isolated from the nasal discharge of patients with common cold in mid-1960s.
targetString: Jeermiskii ugu horeeyay ee HCoV-229E, B814, waxaa laga soo saaray dheecanka sanka ee bukaanada uu hayay hargabka ee bartankii 1960-meeyadii.
translated: Jeermiskii ugu horeeyay ee HCoV-229E, B814, ayaa laga helay dheecaanka sanka ee bukaanada qaba hargabka caadi ah bartamihii 1960-yadii.

sourceString: Since then, more knowledge was accumulated through extensive studies on HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, both of which cause self-limiting symptoms.
targetString: Ilaa iyo markaas, aqoon badan ayaa la kororsaday iyadoo loo marayo daraasaad qotodheer oo ku saabsan HCoV-229E iyo HCoV-OC43, labada oo sababaya calaamadaha nafsad xanibidda.
translated: Ilaa iyo markaas, aqoon badan ayaa la kororsaday ayadoo loo marayo daraasaad balaadhan oo ku saabsan HCoV-229E iyo HCoV-OC43, labadaba waxay sababaan calaamadaha is-xannibaada.

sourceString: Indeed, the concept had been widely accepted that infection with HCoVs is generally harmless until the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: Xaqiiq ahaan, mawduuca ayaa si balaaran loo aqbalay in caabuqa la socda HCoV-yada uu guud ahaan yahay dhibaata la'aan ilaa iyo dilaacitaanka SARS.
translated: ["Xaqiiq ahaan, fikrada ayaa si balaaran loo aqbalay in caabuqa la jirka HCoV yada uu guud ahaan yahay dhibaata la'aan ilaa uu dilaacay SARS."]

sourceString: The SARS outbreak occurred in 2003 is one of the most devastating in current history, infecting over 8,000 people with a crude case fatality of approximately 10%.
targetString: Dilaacitaanka SARS wuxuu dhacay 2003  waana mid kamid ah kuwa ugu ba'naa taariikhda hadda, isagoo ku dhacay in kabadan 8,000 oo qof dhimashaduna ay ku dhawayd 10%.
translated: ["Dilaacitaanka SARS wuxuu dhacay 2003 waa mid ka mid ah kuwa ugu ba'an taariikhda hadda, isagoo ku dhacay in kabadan 8,000 oo qof oo qaba dhimasho kiisas cayriin oo ah qiyaastii 10%."]

sourceString: Ten years later, the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) outbreak resulted in a persistent epidemic in the Arabian Peninsula with sporadic spreading to the rest of the world.
targetString: Toban sano kadib,  dilaacitaanka astaanta neefmareenka ee Bariga Dhexe(MERS) wuxuu sababay safmareen joogta ah oo ku dhaca Jasiirada Carbeed iyo goosgoos ku faafaya cdunida inteeda kale.
translated: Toban sano kadib, dilaacitaanka cudurka neef-mareenka ee Bariga Dhexe (MERS) ayaa sababay saf-mareen joogto ah oo ku dhaca Jasiirada Carabta iyadoo goos-goos-goos ah oo ku faafta aduunka intiisa kale.

sourceString: The 2019 novel HCoV (2019-nCoV), which has subsequently been renamed SARS-CoV-2, is the causative agent of the ongoing epidemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), which has claimed more than 3,120 lives and infected more than 91,000 people as of March 3, 2020.
targetString: HCoV(2019-nCOV) 2019 een caadiga ahayn, kaas oo si isku xigta loogu magac daray SARS-CoV-2, waa shayga sababa safmareenka cudurka cusub ee coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19), kaas oo dilay in ka badan 3,120 nafood isagoona ku dhacay in ka badan 91,000 oo qof ilaa Maarso 3, 2020.
translated: HCoV-ga cusub ee 2019 (2019-nCoV), oo si is xigta loogu magac daray SARS-CoV-2, waa shakada sababta u ah safmareenka socda ee cudurka coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19), kaas oo galaaftay in ka badan 3,120 nafood wuxuuna ku dhacay in ka badan 91,000 oo qof ilaa Maarso 3, 2020.

sourceString: The alarm has been ringing and the world has to prepare for the coming pandemic of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Ganbaleelka wuu garaacmayay aduunkuna waa inay u diyaar garowdaan cudurka faafa ee soo socda ee SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Alaarmiga wuu soo dhawaayay aduunkuna waa inay udiyaar garowdaa cudurka faafa ee soo socda ee SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: All seven HCoVs have a zoonotic origin from bats, mice or domestic animals.
targetString: Dhamaan toddobada HCoV-yo waxay leeyihiin faraca xanuun xoolaha kasoo gudba ee ka yimid fiidmaaraha, jiirka mise xoolaha gurijoogta ah.
translated: Dhamaan todobada HCoV-yada waxay leeyihiin asal ahaan xoola dhaqatada xoolaha ee ka yimid fiidmaaraha, jiirka ama xoolaha guri jooga ah.

sourceString: Multiple lines of evidence support an evolutionary origin of all HCoVs from bats, where viruses are well adapted and non-pathogenic but show great genetic diversity.
targetString: Dhawr talaabo oo cadayn ah waxay taageerayaan farac isbadbadalayay ee dhamaan HCoV-yada  oo ka yimid fiidmaaraha, halka fayruusyada ay si fiican ula qabsaeen aysana caabuq lahayn laakiin ay muujinayaan kala duwanaansho hiddo oo wayn.
translated: Cadaymo badan ayaa taageeraya asalka isbadelka ah ee dhamaan HCoV yada ee ka yimaada fiidmeerta, halkaas oo fayruusyada ay si fiican ula qabsadeen oo aysan jeermis lahayn laakiin ay muujinayaan kala duwanaansho hidde oo wayn.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic has presented enormous medical, scientific, social and moral challenges to China and the world.
targetString: Safmareenka COVID-19 wuxuu Shiinaha iyo caalamka hor keenay caqabado waawayn oo dhanka caafimaadka, saynis ahaan, bulsho iyo akhlaaq ah.
translated: Saf-mareenka COVID-19 ayaa Shiinaha iyo caalamkaba usoo bandhigay caqabado ballaaran oo dhanka caafimaadka, saynis ahaan, bulsho iyo akhlaaqeedba.

sourceString: Tracing the zoonotic origins of HCoVs provides a framework to understand the natural history, driving force and restriction factors of species jumping.
targetString: Baarista asalka xanuunka xoolaha ka gudba ee HCoVs waxay keenayaan qaab lagu fahmo taariikhda dabiiciga ah, awooda kaxaynaysa iyo qodobada xanibaada ee booditaanka nooca noolaha.
translated: Raadinta asalka cudurka xayawaanka ka gudba ee HCoVs waxay keenaysaa qaab lagu fahmo taariikhda dabiiciga ah, kaxaynta xoogga iyo asbaabaha xanibaadaha ee boodboodka noolaha.

sourceString: This might also guide or facilitate the search for the reservoir, intermediate and amplifying animal host(s) of SARS-CoV-2, with important implications in the prevention of future spillovers.
targetString: Tani waxay sidoo kale hagi kartaa ama ay fududayn kartaa raadinta kaydka, dhexdhexaadka iyo kobcinta xoolaha xanuun sidaha ee SARS-CoV-2, oo leh natiijooyin muhiim ah ee ka hortaga ku faafitaanka meela kale ee mustaqbalka.
translated: Tani waxay sidoo kale hagi kartaa ama ay fududayn kartaa raadinta kaydka kaydka, dhexdhexaadka iyo kobcinta xoolaha xanuun sidayaasha (s) ee SARS-CoV-2, oo leh natiijo muhiim ah ee ka hortaga daadadka mustaqbalka.

sourceString: In this review we present an overview of the zoonotic origins, interspecies transmission and pathogenesis of HCoVs.
targetString: Dib u eegistan waxaan soo bandhigaynaa soo koobitaanka faraca xanuunka xoolaha ka gudba,  u gudbinta noolaha kale iyo habka hormarka xanuunka HCoV.
translated: Dib u eegistan waxaan ku soo bandhigaynaa muuqaalka guud ee asalka xanuunka xoolaha ka qaadsiiya xoolaha, isu gudbinta noolaha kala noolaha kala duwan iyo jeermiska cudurka HCoVs.

sourceString: Particularly, we highlight and discuss the common theme that parental viruses of HCoVs are typically non-pathogenic in their natural reservoir hosts but become pathogenic after interspecies transmission to a new host.
targetString: Gaar ahaan, waxaan iftiimanaynaa oona ka wada hadlaynaa mawduuca guud ee asalka fayruusyada HCoV-yada ayaa caadiyan ah kuwa jeermis la'aan ah dhanka noolaha ay ku dhacaaan ee kaydka dabiiciga ah laakiin waxay noqonayaa kuwa jeermis leh kadib isu gudbinta noolayaal kala duwan una gudbayo xanuun side kale.
translated: Gaar ahaan, waxaan iftiiminaynaa oo aan ka wada hadlaynaa mawduuca guud ee asalka fayruusyada HCoV yada ayaa caadi ahaan aan jeermis ku ahayn ee ku dhaca kaydka dabiiciga ah laakiin waxay noqonayaan kuwa jeermis leh kadib marka ay isu gudbiyaan noolayaal kala noolayaal ah oo u gudbayo xanuun qaade cusub.

sourceString: We also review the trend of HCoV evolution in which the increase in transmissibility often comes with the decrease in pathogenicity.
targetString: Waxaan sidoo kale dib u eegaynaa jihada uu ka farcamay HCoV taas oo kor u kaca isu gudbinta ay badanaa timaado markuu hoos u dhaco jeermisnimadiisu.
translated: Waxaan sidoo kale dib u eegaynaa isbedelka qiimaynta HCoV kaas oo kor u kaca isu gudbintu inta badan ku timaado hoos u dhaca jeermisku.

sourceString: The outcome of the ongoing SARS-CoV-2 outbreak is also discussed in this context.
targetString: Natiijada SARS-CoV-2 ee socda oo dilaacay ayaa sidoo kale lagaga hadlay madashan.
translated: Natiijada SARS-CoV-2 ee socota dilaacitaanka ayaa sidoo kale looga hadlay madashan.

sourceString: Animal CoVs have been known since late 1930s.
targetString: CoV-yada xoolaha ayaa la yaqaanay ilaa iyo dhamaadkii 1930-meeyadii.
translated: CoV-yada xoolaha ayaa la yaqaanay ilaa iyo dhamaadkii 1930-yadii.

sourceString: Before the first isolation of HCoV-229E strain B814 from the nasal discharge of patients who had contracted common cold, different CoVs had been isolated in various infected animals, including turkey, mouse, cow, pig, cat and dog.
targetString: Ka hor aragtida jeermiskii koowaad ee HCoV-229E B814 ee waxa sanka kasoo baxa bukaanada qaaday hargabka, CoV-yo kala duwan ayaa la karantiilay dhawr xoolo oo uu ku dhacay, iyadoo ay kamid yihiin digirinka, jiirka, lo'da, doofaarka, bisada iyo eyga.
translated: ["Ka hor karkariin go'doominta koowaad ee HCoV-229E B814 ee ka soo baxa dheecaanka sanka ee bukaanada uu ku dhacay hargabka caadiga ah, CoV yo kala duwan ayaa lagu karkarinayay xayawaanno kala duwan oo uu ku dhacay, oo ay kamid yihiin digirka, jiirka, lo'da, doofaarka, bisada iyo eyga."]

sourceString: In the past decades, seven HCoVs have been identified.
targetString: Tobaneeyadii sano ee u dambeeyay, toddobo HCoV-yo ayaa la ogaaday.
translated: Tobankii sano ee la soo dhaafay, toddobo HCoV-yo ayaa la ogaaday.

sourceString: A brief summary of the history of HCoV discovery in chronological order (Table ​1) would be informative and instructive.
targetString: Soo koobitaan gaaban oo ku saabsan taariikhda ogaanshaha HCoV ee habka uu isugu xigo (Jadwalka 1aad) ayaa noqon doona mid macluumaad leh waxna tusaya.
translated: ["Soo koobitaan gaaban oo ku saabsan taariikhda ogaanshaha HCoV ee habka uu u kala horeeyo (Jadwalka 1aad) wuxuu noqonayaa mid macluumaad leh oo waxkuba'ool ah."]

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain was isolated from the respiratory tract of patients with upper respiratory tract infection in the year of 1966, and was subsequently adapted to grow in WI-38 lung cell lines.
targetString: Jeermiska HCoV-229E u horeeyay waxaa lagu arkay neefmareenka bukaanada leh caabuqa neefmareenka kore sanadku markuu ahaa 1966, waxaana si is xigta loo qabadsiiyay inuu ku koro dhinacyada unuga sanbabka ee WI-38.
translated: Jeermiskii ugu horeeyay ee HCoV-229E ayaa laga soo saaray neefmareenka bukaanada qaba caabuqa tuubooyinka kore ee neefmareenka sanadkii 1966, waxaana markii dambe la qabsaday inuu ku koro khadadka u unugyada sambabada ee WI-38.

sourceString: Patients infected with HCoV-229E presented with common cold symptoms, including headache, sneezing, malaise and sore-throat, with fever and cough seen in 10~20% cases.
targetString: Bukaanada uu ku dhacay HCoV-229E waxay muujiyeen calaamadaha hargabka, oo ay kamid yihiin madax xanuun, hindhiso, deganaasho la'aan iyo cuna xanuun, leh qandho iyo qufac lagu arko 10-20% kiisaska.
translated: Bukaanada uu ku dhacay HCoV-229E waxay soo bandhigeen calaamadaha hargabka, oo ay ka mid yihiin madax xanuun, hindhiso, hindhiso, xumo iyo dhuumaha xanuun, oo leh qandho iyo qufac lagu arkay 10-20% kiisaska.

sourceString: Later in 1967, HCoV-OC43 was isolated from organ culture and subsequent serial passage in brains of suckling mice.
targetString: Dhamaadkii 1967, HCoV-OC43 waxaa laga helay dhaqanka unuga iyo maritaanka taxanaha isku xiga ee maskaxda jiirka.
translated: Dabayaaqadii 1967, HCoV-OC43 waxaa laga helay dhaqanka xubnaha iyo maritaanka taxanaha ah ee isku xiga ee maskaxda jiirka nuugista.

sourceString: The clinical features of HCoV-OC43 infection appear to be similar to those caused by HCoV-229E, which are symptomatically indistinguishable from infection with other respiratory tract pathogens such as influenza A viruses and rhinoviruses.
targetString: Calaamadaha baaritaanka caabuqa HCoV-OC43 wuxuu u muuqdaa inuu lamidyahay kuwa ay sababeen HCoV-229E, kuwaas oo calaamad ahaan aan laga garan karin caabuqa leh jeermisyada kale ee neefmareenka sida fayraasyadaa influenza A iyo fayraasyada rhino.
translated: Astaamaha caafimaad ee caabuqa HCoV-OC43 ayaa u muuqda inuu la mid yahay kuwa uu sababay HCoV-229E, kuwaas oo si calaamado ahaan aan lagu kala saari karin caabuqa leh jeermisyada kale ee neefmareenka sida fayrasyada influenza A iyo fayrasyada rhino.

sourceString: Both HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 are distributed globally, and they tend to be predominantly transmitted during the season of winter in temperate climate.
targetString: Labadaba HCoV-229E iyo HCoV-OC43 ayaa ku faafay aduunka oo dhan, waxay na u badantahay in si weyn la isugu gudbiyo inta lagu guda jiro xilliga jilaalka ee heerkulka cimilada.
translated: Labadaba HCoV-229E iyo HCoV-OC43 ayaa ku faafay aduunka oo dhan, waxayna u muuqdaan in si badan loo kala qaado inta lagu guda jiro xilliga jilaalka xilliga jilaalka ee heerkulka cimilada.

sourceString: Generally, the incubation time of these two viruses is less than one week, followed by an approximately 2-week illness.
targetString: Guud ahaan, mudadda uusan soo mujin labadan fayras way ka yartahay hal isbuuc, waxaana xiggaa qiyaas ahaan laba isbuuc oo xanuun ah.
translated: Guud ahaan, mudadda uu ku faafo labadan fayras waa wax ka yar hal isbuuc, waxaana ku xiga qiyaastii 2-isbuuc oo xanuun ah.

sourceString: According to a human volunteer study, healthy individuals infected with HCoV-229E developed mild common cold.
targetString: Sida laga soo xiganayo daraasadda ikhtiyaariga ee aadamiga ah, shaqsiyaadka caafimaadka ee uu ku dhacay HCoV-229E waxay lahaayeen hargab dhexdhexaad ah.
translated: ["Sida laga soo xigtay daraasad iskaa wax uqabso ah ee bini'aadanka, shaqsiyaadka caafimaadka qaba ee uu ku dhacay HCoV-229E waxay lahaayeen hargab dhexdhax yar."]

sourceString: Only a few immunocompromised patients exhibited severe lower respiratory tract infection.
targetString: Kaliya bukaano yar oo difaacooda jirka hooseeya ayaa muujiyay caabuqa ba'an oo ku dhaca tuubooyinka hoose ee neef-mareenka.
translated: ["Kaliya bukaano yar oo difaacooda jirka hooseeyo ayaa muujiyay caabuqa ba'an ee tuubooyinka hoose ee neefmareenka."]

sourceString: SARS, also known as “atypical pneumonia”, was the first well documented HCoV-caused pandemic in human history and the etiological agent is SARS-CoV, the third HCoV discovered.
targetString: SARS, ayaa sidoo kale loo yaqaan "burukiito caadiga ah", ayaa markii ugu horeysay si fiican loo diwaan galiyay in uu yahay cudur caalami ah oo uu sababo HCoV taariikhda bina aadamka iyo asbaabaha asalka u ah waa SARS-CoV, HCoV sadexaad ayaa la ogaaday.
translated: SARS, oo sidoo kale loo yaqaano "sanboorka caadiga ah", ayaa markii ugu horaysay si fiican loo diwaan galiyay cudur caalami ah oo uu sababo HCoV taariikhda bina aadamka iyo asbaabaha asbaabaha ah waa SARS-CoV, HCoV kii sadexaad ee la ogaaday.

sourceString: The first case of SARS can be traced back to late 2002 in Guangdong Province of China.
targetString: Kiiskii ugu horeeyay ee SARS ayaa waxaa dib logu raadi raaci karaa dhamaadkii 2002 gudaha gobolka Guangdong ee Shiinaha.
translated: Kiiskii ugu horeeyay ee SARS ayaa dib loo raad raaci karaa ilaa dhamaadkii 2002 gudaha gobolka Guangdong ee Shiinaha.

sourceString: The SARS epidemic resulted in 8,096 reported cases with 774 deaths, spreading across many countries and continents.
targetString: Saf-mareenka SARS waxaa ka dhashay 8,096 kiis oo lasoo sheegay oo leh dhimashada 774, asagoo ku faafaya wadama iyo qaarado badan.
translated: Saf-mareenka SARS waxaa ka dhashay 8,096 kiis oo lasoo sheegay oo leh dhimashada 774, isagoo ku faafaya wadamo iyo qaarado badan.

sourceString: Apart from the super-spreaders, it was estimated that each case could give rise to approximately two secondary cases, with an incubation period of 4 to 7 days and the peak of viral load appearing on the 10th day of illness.
targetString: Marka laga reebo faafiyayaasha ugu waaweyn, waxaa lagu qiyaasay in kiis walba uu keeni karo qiyaas ahaan laba kiis oo dheeri ah, inta lagu guda jiro mudadda uusan muujineyn calaamadaha cudurka oo ah 4 ilaa 7 maalmood iyo awooda ugu saraysa fayraska oo ka muuqanaya maalinta 10aad ee jirada.
translated: Marka laga reebo faafiyayaasha ugu sareeya, waxaa lagu qiyaasay in kiis kastaa uu sababi karo qiyaastii laba kiis oo dheeri ah, oo leh mudadda uu ku gudbaya cudurka ee 4 ilaa 7 maalmood iyo sarraynta fayraska oo ka muuqanaya maalinta 10aad ee jirada.

sourceString: Patients infected with SARS-CoV initially present with myalgia, headache, fever, malaise and chills, followed by dyspnea, cough and respiratory distress as late symptoms.
targetString: Bukaanada qaba SARS-CoV marka hore waxay leeyihiin murqo xanuun, madax xanuun, qandho, caajis iyo qabaw, waxaana soo raaca neefsaha xumo, qufac iyo dhibaato neef-mareenka oo ah caalamada danbe.
translated: ["Bukaanada uu ku dhacay SARS-CoV waxay markii hore la kulmaan myalgia, madax xanuun, qandho, caajis iyo qaboojyo, waxaana ku xiga neefsasho la'aan, qufac iyo dhibaato neef-mareenka oo ah caabuqyada soo daahay."]

sourceString: Lymphopenia, deranged liver function tests, and elevated creatine kinase are common laboratory abnormalities of SARS.
targetString: Yaraanta dhiiga cad, tijaabooyinka yaraanta shaqada beerka, iyo creatine kinase kor loo qaaday ayaa ah dhibaatooyin shaybaar ee caadiga ah ee SARS.
translated: Lymphopenia, tijaabooyinka shaqooyinka beerka oo daahsan, iyo creatine kinase oo kor loo qaaday ayaa ah ciladaha shaybaarka caadiga ah ee SARS.

sourceString: Diffuse alveolar damage, epithelial cell proliferation and an increase of macrophages are also observed in SARS patients.
targetString: Faafitaanka daawacyada alveolar, xuubka daloolada jirka oo tarmaya iyo kororka macrophages ayaa sidoo kale lagu arkay bukaanada SARS.
translated: Faafitaanka dhaawaca alveolar, taranka unugyada unugyada ee epithelial iyo kororka macrophages ayaa sidoo kale lagu arkay bukaanada SARS.

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of patients subsequently require intensive care and mechanical ventilation.
targetString: Qiyaas ahaan 20-30% ayaa ugu danbeyn u baahan daryeel caadimaad oo dagdaga iyo neef-siin mashiineed
translated: Qiyaas ahaan 20-30% ka mid ah bukaanada ayaa si is xiga u baahan daryeel caafimaad oo degdeg ah iyo hawo-maroojin maskaxeed.

sourceString: In addition to lower respiratory tract, multiple organs including gastrointestinal tract, liver and kidney can also be infected in these severe cases, usually accompanied with a cytokine storm, which might be lethal particularly in immunocompromised patients.
targetString: Intaas waxaa dheer si aad hoos ugu dhigto tuubooyinka hoose ee neef-mareenka, halbawlaayaal badan oo ay ku jiraan tuubooyinka xiidmaha, wadnaha iyo kalida ayaa sidoo kale la qaadsiin karaa caabuqa kiisaskan ba'an, badanaa waxaa weheliya siidaynta cytokine, kaas oo laga yaabo in uu halis ku yahay gar ahaan bukaanada awoododa difaac hooseyso.
translated: ["Intaas waxaa dheer si uu hoos ugu dhigo tuubooyinka neef-mareenka, xubno badan oo ay ku jiraan tuubooyinka xiidmaha caloosha, beerka iyo kelyaha ayaa sidoo kale lagu qaadi karaa kiisaskan ba'an, badanaaba waxaa weheliya duufaan cytokine ah, kaas oo laga yaabo inuu halis ku yahay khaas ahaan bukaanada difaaca jirka hooseeyo."]

sourceString: The virus was first isolated from the open lung biopsy of a relative of the index patient who travelled to Hong Kong from Guangzhou.
targetString: Fayraska markii ugu horeysay waxaa laga karantiilay baaritaano furan oo sanbabka laga qaaday bukaanada ka ag dhaw kuwaas oo u safray Hong Kong kana yimid Guangzhou.
translated: Fayruuska markii ugu horaysay waxaa laga kaciyay baaritaanka furan ee sambabada ee qof qaraabo la ah bukaanada tignoolajiga kuwaas oo u safray Hong Kong kana yimid Guangzhou.

sourceString: Since then, tremendous efforts have been dedicated to HCoV research.
targetString: Ilaa markaas, dadaalo aad u badan ayaa loo horey in badhitaano cilmiyeed lagu sameeyo HCoV.
translated: Ilaa iyo markaas, dadaalo aad u badan ayaa loo qoondeeyay cilmi baarista HCoV.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 was isolated from a 7-month-old child from the Netherlands during late 2004.
targetString: HCoV-NL63 ayaa waxaa loo karantiilay canug 7-bilood jir ah oo Netherlands ka yimid intii lagu jiray dhamaadkii 2004.
translated: HCoV-NL63 waxaa loo karkariyay cunug 7-bilood jira oo Netherlands ka yimid intii lagu jiray dabayaaqadii 2004.

sourceString: It was initially found to be prevalent in young children, the elderly and immunocompromised patients with respiratory illnesses.
targetString: Markii hore waxaa la ogaaday in uu si aad ah ugu faafo caruurta yaryar, dadka da'da ah iyo bukaanada difaacoodu jirku hooseeyo oo qaba xanuunada neef-mareenka.
translated: ["Markii hore waxaa la ogaaday in uu ku faafay caruurta yaryar, dadka da'da ah iyo bukaanada difaacooda jirka hoos u dhigay ee qaba xanuunada neef-mareenka."]

sourceString: Presentation of coryza, conjunctivitis, fever, and bronchiolitis is common in the disease caused by HCoV-NL63.
targetString: Muujinta bararka xuubka sanka, bararka insha, qandho, iyo bararka tuubooyinka neef-mareenka ayaa ah wax u caada ah cudurka uu sababo HCoV-NL63.
translated: Muujinta bararka coryza, daacuunka, qandho, iyo bararka sanbabka ayaa u badan cudurka uu sababo HCoV-NL63.

sourceString: Another independent study described the isolation of the same virus from a nasal specimen from an 8-month-old boy suffering from pneumonia in the Netherlands.
targetString: Daraasad kale oo madax banaan ayaa lagu qeexay karantiilida isla cudurkan oo baritaano sanka laga qaaday wiil 8-bilood jira oo la xanuunsan burukiito gudaha Netherlands.
translated: Daraasad kale oo madax banaan ayaa lagu qeexay karantiilida isla fayraska oo laga helay muunad sanka laga qaaday wiil 8 bilood jira oo la xanuunsan burunkiito gudaha Netherlands.

sourceString: Although it was identified in Netherlands, it is actually distributed globally.
targetString: Inkastoo lagu arkay Netherlands, xaqiiqdii aduunka oo dhan ayay ku faaftay.
translated: Inkastoo lagu aqoonsaday Netherlands, run ahaantii adduunka oo dhan ayaa lagu faafiyaa.

sourceString: It has been estimated that HCoV-NL63 accounts for approximately 4.7% of common respiratory diseases, and its peak incidence occurs during early summer, spring and winter.
targetString: Waxaa lagu qiyaasay in HCoV-NL63 ayaa ah qiyaas ahaan 4.7% cudurada caadiga ah ee neef-mareenka, dhacdooyinkeeda ugu sareeya na waxay dhacaan bilawga  xagaaga, guga iyi jilaalka.
translated: Waxaa lagu qiyaasay in HCoV-NL63 uu yahay ku dhawaad 4.7% cudurada caadiga ah ee neef-mareenka, dhacdooyinkeeda ugu sareeyana waxa ay dhacaan bilowga xagaaga, guga iyo jiilaalka.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 is associated with obstructive laryngitis, also known as croup.
targetString: HCoV-NL63 waxaa la halmaala bararka dhuunta oo xiraayo, sidoo kale loo yaqaan bararka dhuunta.
translated: HCoV-NL63 waxaa lala xariirinayaa dhuunta caloosha ku dhacda, oo sidoo kale loo yaqaanno bararka dhuunta.

sourceString: In the same year, HCoV-HKU1 was isolated from a 71-year-old man who had been hospitalized with pneumonia and bronchiolitis in Hong Kong.
targetString: Isla sanadkaas, HCoV-HKU1 waxaa laga helay nin 71-jir ah kaas oo laga daaweynayay burunkiito iyo bararka tuubooyinka neef-mareenka gudaha Hong Kong.
translated: Isla sanadkaas, HCoV-HKU1 waxaa laga helay nin 71 jir ah kaas oo laga daaweeyay burunkiito iyo bararka neef-mareenka ee Hong Kong.

sourceString: Besides community-acquired pneumonia and bronchiolitis, HCoV-HKU1 was reported to be associated with acute asthmatic exacerbation.
targetString: Ka sokow burukiitada ay bulshada dhexdeeda is qaadsiisay iyo bararitaanka tuubooyinka neef-mareenka, HCoV-HKU1 ayaa la sheegay in uu weheliyo xiiq ba'an oo kasii daraysa.
translated: ["Ka sokow burukiitada bulshadu is qaadsiisay iyo bararka neef-mareenka, HCoV-HKU1 ayaa lagu soo waramay inuu la xiriiro xiiq ba'an oo kasii daraya."]

sourceString: Similar to HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 was found worldwide, causing mild respiratory diseases.
targetString: Mid la mid ah HCoV-NL63,HCoV-229E iyo HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 ayaa laga helay aduunka oo dhan, asaago sababaya cudurada neef-mareenka oo fudud.
translated: Si lamid ah HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E iyo HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 ayaa laga helay aduunka oo dhan, kaas oo sababaya cudurada neef-mareenka oo fudud.

sourceString: All these four community-acquired HCoVs have been well adapted to humans and are generally less likely to mutate to cause highly pathogenic diseases, though accidents did occur for unknown reasons as in the rare case of a more virulent subtype of HCoV-NL63, which has recently been reported to cause severe lower respiratory tract infection in China.
targetString: Dhamaan afar tan HCoVs yada ee bulshada laga helay ayaa si wanaagsan ula qabsaday bina aadamka oo guud ahaan ka yar in ay korto oo ay keento cudur faafa oo aad usareeya, inkastoo dhacdooyin ay dheceen sababo aan la ogayn balse ay naadir tahay in kuwa u badan noocyada fayras ee HCoV-NK63, kaas oo hada la soo sheegay in uu sababo caabuqa ba'an ee u tuubooyinka hoose ee neef-mareenka ee gudaha Shiinaha.
translated: ["Dhamaan afartan HCoVs ee bulshadu heshay ayaa si fiican ula qabsaday bina aadamka waxayna guud ahaan ka yar tahay in ay isbad-bararaan si ay u sababaan cudurro jeermis wayn leh, inkastoo shilal uu dhacay sababo aan la garanayn sababo aan la garanayn sida kiis dhif ah oo noocyo badan oo fayras ah oo ah HCoV-NL63, kaas oo dhawaan la soo sheegay inuu sababo caabuq ba'an oo ku dhaca tuubooyinka hoose ee neef-mareenka ee gudaha Shiinaha."]

sourceString: Generally, when these HCoVs acquire the abilities to transmit efficiently and to maintain themselves continuously within humans, they also become less virulent or pathogenic.
targetString: Guud ahaan, marka HCoV yada u baahdaan  awoodaha gudbitaan oo waxtar leh iyo in ay sii wadaan in ay si joogta usii jooga bina adamka dhexdiisa, waxay noqdaan kuwa uyar sun ahaan ama kuwa jeermis badan oo faafa.
translated: Guud ahaan, marka HCoV yadani ay helaan awooda ay ku kala gudbi karaan si hufan iyo in ay si joogta ah isu hayaan bina aadamka dhexdiisa, waxay sidoo kale noqonayaan kuwa fayraska ku yar ama jeermis faafa.

sourceString: MERS-CoV was first isolated in 2012 from the lung of a 60-year-old patient who developed acute pneumonia and renal failure in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: MERS-CoV ayaa markii ugu horeysay laga helay 2012 kii wadnaha bukaan 60-jir ah kaas oo lagu arkay burukiito ba'an iyo kalyo fadhiisi gudaha Sacuudi Carabiya.
translated: ["MERS-CoV ayaa markii ugu horeysay laga helay 2012 kii wadnaha bukaan 60-jir ah kuwaas oo Sacuudiga uu ku dhacay burukiito ba'an iyo kalyo la'aan ba'an."]

sourceString: Whereas most of the laboratory-confirmed cases originate from the Middle East, imported cases with occasional secondary spreads to close contacts have been reported in various European countries and Tunisia.
targetString: Halka inta badan kiisaska lagu xaqiijiyay baaritaano shaybaar oo ay kasoo farcantay Bariga Dhexe, kiisaska lasoo dhoofiyay oo leh faafitaan dheeri ah dadka la macaamila ayaa laga soo sheegay wadamo kala duwan oo Yurub ah iyo Tuniisiya.
translated: Halka inta badan kiisaska la xaqiijiyay ee sheybaarka lagu xaqiijiyay ay ka soo farcanto Bariga Dhexe, kiisaska lasoo dhoofiyay oo mararka qaar ay ku fidday dadka la macaamila ay la macaamileen ayaa laga soo sheegay wadamo kala duwan oo Yurub ah iyo Tuniisiya.

sourceString: Another secondary outbreak occurred in South Korea in 2015 with 186 confirmed cases.
targetString: Faafitaan kale oo dheeri ah ayaa ka dhacay Kuuriyada Koonfureed sanadkii 2015 iyada oo 186 kiis na la xaqiijiyay.
translated: Dilaac kale oo dheeri ah ayaa ka dhacay Kuuriyada Koonfureed sanadkii 2015 iyadoo 186 kays la xaqiijiyay.

sourceString: Clinical manifestations of MERS resemble those of SARS, characterized by progressive acute pneumonia.
targetString: Muujimaha caafimaad ahaaneed ee MERS waxay shabahaan kuwa SARS, kuwaas oo lagu sifeeyay burunkiito ba'an oo aad u hormaraysa.
translated: ["Muujimaha caafimaad ee MERS waxay u egyihiin kuwa SARS, oo lagu astaameeyey burukiito ba'an oo aad u hormaraysa."]

sourceString: Unlike SARS, many patients with MERS also developed acute renal failure, which is thus far unique for MERS among HCoV-caused diseases.
targetString: Si ka duwan MERS, bukaano badan oo qaba MERS ayaa lagu arkay kalyo fadhiisi, kaas oo si aad ah uga duwan MERS ka ay sababaan cudurada HCoV.
translated: ["Si ka duwan SARS, bukaano badan oo qaba MERS ayaa sidoo kale yeeshay kalyo failure ba'an, taas oo si aad ah uga duwan MERS ka mida cudurada uu sababo HCoV."]

sourceString: More than 30% of patients present with gastrointestinal symptoms, such as diarrhea and vomiting.
targetString: In ka badan 30% bukaanada qaba calaamadaha xiidmaha caloosha, sida shuban iyo mataq.
translated: In ka badan 30% bukaanada qaba calaamadaha xiidmaha calyaxda, sida shuban iyo mataq.

sourceString: As of February 14, 2020, over 2500 laboratory confirmed cases were reported with a high case fatality of 34.4%, making MERS-CoV one of the most devastating viruses known to humans.
targetString: Sida Febraayo 14, 2020 la xusay, in ka badan 2500 shaybaar oo kiisaskooda la xaqiijiyay ayaa lagu soo waramay in ay leeyihiin kiisas dhimasho oo sareeya oo ah 34.4%, kaas oo ka dhigaya MERS-CoV mid ka mid ah  fayrasyada ugu baabi'intanbadan inta bina aadamka ogyahay.
translated: ["Sida Febraayo 14, 2020, in ka badan 2500 shaybaar oo kiisaska la xaqiijiyay ayaa lagu soo waramay in ay leeyihiin kiisas dhimasho oo sareeya oo ah 34.4%, taas oo ka dhigaysa MERS-CoV mid ka mid ah fayrasyada ugu baaba'naa ee bini'aadanka la ogyahay."]

sourceString: During middle to late December 2019, clusters of pneumonia patients retrospectively known to be associated with SARS-CoV-2 infection were detected in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.
targetString: Inta lagu jiray bartamaha ilaa dhamaadka Diseembar 2019, kooxo bukaano ah o qaba burukiito ayaa si qiyaas qaadasho ah la ogaaday in ay la halmaalaan caabuqa SARS-CoV-2 ayaa lagu arkay gudaha Wuhan, Gobalka Hubei, Shiinaha.
translated: Inta lagu jiro bartamaha ilaa dabayaaqada Diseembar 2019, kooxo bukaano ah oo qaba burukiito ayaa si waxtar leh loo ogaa inay la halmaalaan caabuqa SARS-CoV-2 ayaa lagu ogaaday Wuhan, Gobalka Hubei, Shiinaha.

sourceString: World Health Organization declared the ongoing outbreak of lower respiratory tract infection caused by SARS-CoV-2 a Public Health Emergency of International Concern and also named the disease COVID-19.
targetString: Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ayaa shaacisay dilaacitaanka socda ee caabuqa tuubooyinka hoose ee neef-mareenka oo uu sababay SARS-CoV-2 oo ah Xaalad Degdeg ah ee Caafimaadka Dadweynaha ee Walaaca Caalamiga ah oo sidoo kale na lagu magacaabay cudurka COVID-19.
translated: ["Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ayaa ku dhawaaqday dilaacitaanka socda ee caabuqa neefmareenka hoose ee neef-mareenka oo uu sababay SARS-CoV-2 oo ah Xaalad Degdeg ah oo Caafimaad Oo Guud ee Walaaca Caalamiga ah oo sidoo kale lagu magacaabay cudurka COVID-19."]

sourceString: As of March 3, 2020, 90,053 cases have been confirmed worldwide, with a crude case fatality of 3.4%.
targetString: Laga bilaabo Maarso 3, 2020, 90,053 kiis ayaa la xaqiijiyay aduun waynaha oo dhan, oo leh kiis dhimasho oo ah 3.4%.
translated: Laga bilaabo Maarso 3, 2020, 90,053 kiisas ayaa la xaqiijiyay aduun waynaha oo dhan, oo leh kiis dhimasho ah oo ah 3.4%.

sourceString: Notably, the case fatality in Hubei, China is 4.2%, whereas the one outside of it is 1.2%.
targetString: Si xusitaan mudan, kiiska dhimashada ee Hubei, Shiinaha waa 4.2%, halka kan ka baxsana uu yahay 1.2%
translated: Si xusid mudan, kiiska dhimashada ee ka dhacay Hubei, Shiinaha waa 4.2%, halka kan ka baxsan uu yahay 1.2%.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 causes severe respiratory infection like SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, presented as fever, cough and dyspnea.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu sababaa caabuqa neef-mareenka ee ba'an sida SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV,  loo muujiyo sida qandho ahaan, qufac iyo yaraanta oksijiin.
translated: ["SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu sababaa caabuqa neef-mareenka ee ba'an sida SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV, oo loo muujiyo sida qandho ahaan, qufac iyo neefsasho la'aan."]

sourceString: Diarrhea is also seen in some patients.
targetString: Shuban ayaa sidoo kale lagu arkay bukaanada qaar.
translated: Shuban ayaa sidoo kale lagu arkay bukaanada qaar.

sourceString: Pneumonia is one of the most severe symptoms and can progress rapidly to acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Burukiitadu waa mid ka mid ah calaamaha aadka u ba'an si xawli ah wuxuuna si dhaqso leh ugu gudbi karaa xanuunka ba'an ee neef-mareenka.
translated: ["Burukiitooyinka ama baba'anta waa calaamadaha ugu daran wuxuuna si xawli ah ugu gudbi karaa xanuunka ba'an ee neef-mareenka."]

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are very similar due to high nucleotide sequence homology of 82%, they cluster into different branches in the phylogenetic tree.
targetString: Inkastoo SARS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV-2 ay leeyihiin isku eekaansho badan  isku mid ahaanshaha taxanaha nucleotide oo ah 82%, waxay u qaybiyaan moocyo kala duwan oo ah geedka kooxeynta isbadallada noolaha.
translated: Inkastoo SARS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV-2 ay aad isugu eekaayeen sababtoo ah isku eekaanshaha taxanaha nucleotide ee sareeya ee ah 82%, waxay ku biiriyaan laamo kala duwan oo ka tirsan geedka qaab dhismeedka noolaha.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is apparently less pathogenic but more transmissible compared to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ayaa sida cad ka jeermis yar balse ka faafi og marka la barbardhigo SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV.
translated: SARS-CoV-2 ayaa sida muuqata ka jeermis yar balse ka faafid badan marka la barbardhigo SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Asymptomatic subjects infected with SARS-CoV-2 have been reported and might contribute to its rapid spreading around the world.
targetString: Maadooyinka aan muujinaynin calaamadaha caabuqa SARS-CoV-2 ayaa la soo sheegay lagana yaabaa in ay ka qayb qaadan karaan faafitaankiisa xawliga ah ee aduunka oo dhan.
translated: Maadooyinka aan calaamadaha muujinayn ee ku dhaca SARS-CoV-2 ayaa lasoo sheegay lagana yaabaa inay ka qayb qaataan faafitaankiisa xawliga ah ee aduunka oo dhan.

sourceString: Comparing and contrasting SARS-CoV-2 with the other six HCoVs reveal similarities and differences of great interest.
targetString: Isbarbardhiga iyo kala saarista SARS-CoV-2 ee lixda HCoV yada kale ayaa soo saaray isku mid ahaanshooyin iyo kala duwaanshooyin mudnaanta weyn.
translated: Isbarbardhiga iyo kala saarida SARS-CoV-2 iyo lixda HCoV yada kale waxay daaha ka rogeen isku mid ahaanshada iyo kala duwaanshaha xiisaha weyn leh.

sourceString: First, the incubation period and the duration of the course of HCoV disease are very similar.
targetString: Ugu horeyn, mudadda uusan soo bixin iyo inta lagu jiro mudadda cudurka waa mid aad isugu eeg.
translated: Ugu horrayn, mudadda uu cudurku ku faano iyo mudadda uu ku socdo xanuunka HCoV ayaa aad isugu eg.

sourceString: In this regard, SARS-CoV-2 follows the general trend of the other six HCoVs.
targetString: Sidaas daraadeed, SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu raaca isbadallada guud ahaaneed ee lixda HCoV yada kale.
translated: Arrintaan, SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu raacaa isbedelka guud ee lixda HCoV yada kale.

sourceString: Second, the severity of symptoms of COVID-19 lies between SARS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs (i.e. HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63).
targetString: Marka labaad, halista calaamadaha COVID-19 waxay u dhaxaysaa SARS-CoV iyo afarta HCoV yada ay bulshada isqaadsiiso (tusaale ahaan HCoV-2229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 iyo HCoV-NL63).
translated: ["Marka labaad, ba'naanta calaamadaha COVID-19 waxay u dhaxaysaa SARS-CoV iyo afarta HCoV yada ay bulshada isqaadsiisay (tusaale ahaan HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 iyo HCoV-NL63)."]

sourceString: On one hand, SARS-CoV-2 infection exhibits features that are more commonly seen during infection with community-acquired HCoVs, including the presentation of non-specific, mild or even no symptoms.
targetString: Dhinaca kale, waxaa la arkay inta lagu jiray caabuqa bulshada isqaadsiiso ee HCoVs, oo ay ku jiraan soo bandhigida aan khaas ka ahayn , kuwa fudud ama xata calaamad la'aanta ah.
translated: ["Dhinaca kale, caabuqa SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu muujinayaa astaamo badanaa lagu arko inta lagu jiro caabuqa leh HCoV yada bulshada isqaadsiiso, oo ay ku jiraan soo bandhigida aan khaas ahayn, kuwa khafiifka ah ama xataa calaamado la'aanta."]

sourceString: On the other hand, a small subset of severe cases of COVID-19 can also be seen as in the case of SARS-CoV infection, although the ratio is a bit lower.
targetString: Dhinaca kale, qaybaha yaryar ee kiisaska ba'an ee COVID-19 ayaa sidoo la arki karaa sida kiiska caabuqa SARS-CoV oo kale, inkastoo saamiga uu xoggaa yaryahay.
translated: ["Dhinaca kale, qayb yar oo ka mid ah kiisaska ba'an ee COVID-19 ayaa sidoo kale loo arki karaa inay yihiin kiisaska sars-CoV, inkastoo saamiga uu yara hooseeyo."]

sourceString: Third, the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 also shows interesting patterns characteristic of both community-acquired HCoVs and SARS-CoV.
targetString: Mida seddexaad, gudbinta SARS-CoV-2 waxay sidoo kale muujineysaa astaamo xiisa leh oo caan ku ah labada bulsho helaan HCoVs iyo SARS-CoV labaduba.
translated: Tan seddexaad, gudbinta SARS-CoV-2 ayaa sidoo kale muujinaysa astaamo xiiso leh oo astaamo u leh labada bulsho ay isqaadsiiso HCoVs iyo SARS-CoV labadaba.

sourceString: On one hand, the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 is at least as high as that of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: Dhinaca kale, awooda gudbin ahaaneed ee SARS-CoV-2 ayaa ah ugu yaraan mid saraysa sida tan HCoV yada ay bulshadu isqaadsiiso.
translated: Dhinaca kale, awooda gudbin ee SARS-CoV-2 ayaa ugu yaraan saraysa sida tan HCoV yada bulshadu isqaadsiisay.

sourceString: On the other hand, it remains to be verified whether the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 decreases after passages in humans as in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: Dhinaca kale, wali waa in la xaqiijiyaa in awooda gudbin ahaaneed ee SARS-CoV-2 ay hoos u dhacdo kadib marka ay u gudubto bina adamka sida kiisaska SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV.
translated: Dhinaca kale, wali waa in la xaqiijiyaa in awooda gudbin ee SARS-CoV-2 ay hoos u dhacdo ka dib marka ay u gudubto bina aadamka sida kiisaska SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Finally, same as the other HCoVs, SARS-CoV-2 can be detected in fecal samples.
targetString: Ugu dambeyn, kuwa kale oo la mid HCoV yada, SARS-CoV-2 ayaa laga heli karaa sambalada saxarada
translated: Ugu dambeyntii, la mid ah HCoV yada kale, SARS-CoV-2 ayaa laga heli karaa sambalada saxarada.

sourceString: Whether fecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2 plays an important role as in the case of SARS-CoV at least under some circumstance remains to be clarified by future studies.
targetString: In gudbinta SARS-CoV-2 ee saxaro afka laga qaatay ah ay door muhiim ka qaadatay sida kiisaska SARS-CoV ugu yaraan duruufaha qaar kood waa in wali lagu xaqiijiyaa daraasaddaha mustaqbalka
translated: In gudbinta SARS-CoV-2 ee saxaaro afka laga qaatay ay ka ciyaarayso door muhiim ah sida kiisaska SARS-CoV ugu yaraan duruufaha qaar ayaa wali ah mid lagu cadaynayo daraasada mustaqbalka.

sourceString: It is also of particularly great interest to see whether SARS-CoV-2 might exhibit seasonality as in the cases of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: Sidoo kale si gaar ah oo mudnaan weyn leh waa in loo arkaa in SARS-CoV-2 laga yaabo inay muujiso kala duwanaansho muddo ahaaneed sida kiisaska bulshada helaan HCoVs.
translated: Sidoo kale si gaar ah u dan wayn ayaa leh in la arko in SARS-CoV-2 laga yaabo inuu muujiyo xilliyeed sida kiisaska HCoV yada bulshada heshay.

sourceString: Nevertheless, the features of SARS-CoV-2 including its transmissibility, pathogenicity and sustainable spreading after passages in humans will be influential on the ultimate fate of the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19.
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaate, astaamaha SARS-CoV-2 oo ay ku jiraan awoodideeda gudbin ahaaneed, mida jeermis ahaaneed iyo faaftiaankeeda waaraa kadib marka ay u gudubto bina aadamka ayaa noqon doona saamaynaha ugu danbeeya ee dilaacistaanka socota ee COVID-19.
translated: Si kastaba ha noqotee, astaamaha SARS-CoV-2 oo ay ku jiraan awoodiseeda gudbin ahaaneed, jeermiskiisa iyo faafitaanka waara ka dib marka uu u gudbo bina aadamka ayaa saamayn ku yeelan doona masiibada ugu dambaysa ee dilaacitaanka socda ee COVID-19.

sourceString: All four community-acquired HCoVs causing mild symptoms have been well adapted to humans.
targetString: Dhamaan afarta HCoVs ee bulshadu heleen kaaso sababaya calaamado fudud ayaa si wanaagsan bina aadamku ula qabsaday.
translated: Dhamaan afarta HCoVs ee bulshadu heshay ee sababaya calaamado fudud ayaa si wanaagsan bina aadamka ula qabsaday.

sourceString: From another perspective, it might also be true that humans have been well adapted to these four HCoVs.
targetString: Dhinaca kale marka la eego, waxaa laga yaabaa in ay run noqoto in uu bina aadamka si wanaagsan ula qabsaday afartan HCoVs.
translated: Dhinaca kale marka la eego, waxaa laga yaabaa inay run tahay in bina aadamka si wanaagsan ula qabsaday afartan HCoVs.

sourceString: In other words, both could be the survivors of ancient HCoV pandemics.
targetString: Marka si kale loo dhigo, labaduba waxay noqon karaan ka badbaadayaasha HCoV ga faafa ee qadiimiga ah.
translated: Marka si kale loo dhigo, labaduba waxay noqon karaan kuwa ka badbaaday cudurka faafa ee HCoV qadiimiga ah.

sourceString: HCoVs that cause severe diseases in humans and humans who developed severe HCoV diseases have been eliminated.
targetString: HCoV yada u sababa bina adamka cuduradda halista ah iyo bina aadamka lagu arkay cuduradda halista ah ee HCoV ayaa la ciribtiray.
translated: HCoV yada ku sababa bina adamka cuduro halis ah iyo bina aadamka lagu arkay cudurada halista ah ee HCoV ayaa la ciribtiray.

sourceString: For this to happen, HCoVs have to replicate in humans to sufficient extent to allow the accumulation of adaptive mutations that counteract host restriction factors.
targetString: Si ay tan u dhacdo, waa in uu ku tarmaa bina aadamka ilaa xad ku filan oo u ogalaanaysa la qabsasho isbadallada korrin guud taas oo la dagaalanta asbaabaha xayiraadeed ee xanuun-sidaha.
translated: Si ay tani u dhacdo, HCoVs waa inay ku tarmaan bina aadamka ilaa xad ku filan si ay u oggolaato in la qabsasho isbadallada korrinsiga ah ee isbadallada taas oo la dagaalanta asbaabaha xayiraada xanuun-sidaha.

sourceString: In this sense, the longer the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak persists and the more people that it infects, the greater chance that it will fully adapt to humans.
targetString: Dareenkan, dheeraanshaha sii adkaysiga dilaacitaanka SARS-CoV-2 iyo dadka badan ee caabuqa qaadaya, waa fursadaha ugu waaweyn ee si wanaagsan ula qabsan karto bina aadamka.
translated: ["Dareenkan, dheeraanshaha sii adkaysiga dilaacitaanka SARS-CoV-2 iyo dadka badan ee caabuqa qaadaya, waa fursada wayn ee uu si buuxda ula qabsan karo bini'aadanka."]

sourceString: If it adapts well, its transmission in humans would be difficult to stop by quarantine or other infection control measures.
targetString: Haddi ay ula qabsato si fiican, u gudbitaankeeda bina aadamka way adkaan doontaa in ay joojiso karantiilka ama talaabooyinka kale ee xakamaynta caabuqa kale.
translated: Haddii ay si fiican ula qabsato, u gudbitaankeeda bina aadamka way adkaan doontaa in ay joojiso karantiilka ama talaabooyinka kale ee xakamaynta caabuqa.

sourceString: For many years, the four community-acquired CoVs circulate in human populations, triggering common cold in immunocompetent subjects.
targetString: Sanaddo badan, afarta CoVs ee bulshada heleen oo ku wareegsan bay'ada bina aadamka ayagoo ku kicinaya hargab dadka difaacooda jirka fiicanyahay.
translated: Sanado badan, afarta CoVs ee bulshadu heshay waxay ku wareegayaan dadka bina aadamka, iyagoo ku kicinaya hargab badan ee maadooyinka difaaca jirka hooseeya.

sourceString: These viruses do not need an animal reservoir.
targetString: Fayrasyadana uma baahna xayawaan kaydiya ah.
translated: Fayrasyadan uma baahna xayawaan kaydiye ah.

sourceString: In contrast, highly pathogenic SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV have not adapted to humans well and their transmission within humans cannot be sustained.
targetString: Marki la is barbardhigo, jeermiska badan ee SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV maysan la qabsanin bina aadamka si wanaagsan u gudbitaankooda aadanaha lama kala joojin karo.
translated: ["Taa badalkeeda, jeermiska badan ee SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV aysan la qabsan bini'aadanka si wanaagsan iyo gudbitaankooda bina aadamka gudahood lama sii wadi karo."]

sourceString: They need to maintain and propagate in their zoonotic reservoirs and seek the chance to spillover to susceptible human targets, possibly via one or more intermediate and amplifying hosts.
