sourceString: For example, defects in the activation of pro-inflammatory response in bats efficiently reduce the pathology triggered by CoVs.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, ciladaha keenaya jawaab celinta waxyaalaha bararka keena ee fiidmeerta ayaa si waxtar leh hoos ugu dhigta jeermisyada ay kiciyaan CoV yada.
translated: Tusaale ahaan, cilladaha ka jira howl galinta jawaab celinta bararka ee fiidmeerta ayaa si waxtar leh u yareeya cudurada ay kiciyaan CoV yada.

sourceString: Besides, the natural killer cell activity in bats is suppressed due to upregulation of inhibitory natural killer cell receptor NKG2/CD94 and low expression level of major histocompatibility complex class I molecules.
targetString: Waxaa dheer, dilaaga dabiiciga ah ee hawlaha unugyada fiidmeerta ayaa lacadaadiyay sababtoo ah kordhinta kicinta xanibidda dilayaasha dabiiciga ah ee dareemaha unuga NKG2/CD94 iyo heerka qeexitaan ee hooseeya ee wada jirka molecule ka Fasalka I.
translated: Ka sokow, dilaaga dabiiciga ah ee hawlaha unugyada fiidmeerta ayaa la xakameynayaa sababtoo ah kor u qaadista xakamaynta xakamaynta dilaaga dabiiciga ah ee dareemaha unuga NKG2/CD94 iyo heerka qeexitaanka hooseeya ee molecules-ka fasalka I ee muhiimka ah ee muhiimka ah.

sourceString: Moreover, the high level of reactive oxygen species (ROS) generated from high metabolic activity of bats could both suppress CoV replication and affects proofreading by exoribonuclease, thus providing the selection pressure for the generation of virus strains highly pathogenic when introduced into a new host.
targetString: Kasokow, heerka sare ee kicinta oksijiinka noolaha (ROS) kaas oo ka dhashay hawlaha dheef-shiidka kiimikada ee fiidmeeraha ayaa labaduba cadaadiya taranka CoV iyo saamaynta dib u akhrinta exoribonuclease, taas oo siinaysa xulashada cadaadiska ee soo sarista noocyada fayraska jeermiska badan leh marka la galiyo xanuun-qaade cusub.
translated: ["Intaa waxaa dheer, heerka sare ee noolaha ogsijiin ee reactive (ROS) ee ka dhashay waxqabadka dheef-shiidka ee sare ee fiidmeeraha ayaa labaduba cadaadin kara taranka CoV waxayna saamayn ku yeelan karaan faa'iidaynta exoribonuclease, taas oo keenaysa xulashada cadaadiska soo saarista noocyada fayraska jeermiska badan leh marka lagu galiyo xanuun qaade cusub."]

sourceString: More pathogenic CoV strains might also evolve by recombination, leading to the acquisition of novel proteins or protein features for host adaptation.
targetString: Noocyo badan oo ah jeermisyada sababa CoV ayaa laga yaabaa in ay si tartiib ah u koraan ayagoo dib isugu dhafmaya, taas oo keenaysa helitaanka borotiinada cusub ama borotiino leh astaamaha la qabsashada xanuun-sidaha.
translated: Noocyo badan oo jeermis ah oo coV ah ayaa laga yaabaa inay sidoo kale u kordhaan dib isugu dhafka, taasoo keenaysa helitaanka borotiinada cusub ama astaamaha borotiinada ee la qabsashada xanuun-sidayaasha.

sourceString: Thus, it is not by chance that three novel HCoVs have emerged in the past two decades.
targetString: Sidaas awgeed, si bakhtiyaa nasiib ah ma aha in saddexda HCovs ee cusub ee hada soo shaac-bexeen inta lagu jiray labaatankii sanno ee lasoo dhaafay.
translated: Sidaas awgeed, si gooni ah ma aha in saddexda HCoV yada ee cusubi ay soo baxeen labaatankii sano ee la soo dhaafay.

sourceString: CoVs are non-pathogenic or cause mild symptoms in their reservoir hosts such as bats and camels.
targetString: CoV yada waa kuwa aan jeermis lahayn ama aan u sababin calaamado fudud kaydiyayaashoda xanuun-side sida fiid-meeraha iyo geela.
translated: CoV yada waa kuwa aan jeermis lahayn ama waxay u geeyaan calaamado fudud kaydiyeyaashooda xanuun-sida fiid-meeraha iyo geela.

sourceString: They replicate robustly without eliciting a strong host immune response.
targetString: Waxay u tarmaan si xoog ah iyaga oo aan mancinayn jawaab celinta adag ee difaaca jirka xanuun-sidaha.
translated: Waxay u tarmaan si xoogan iyagoon kicinayn jawaab celinta difaaca jirka ee xanuun-sidaha oo xoog leh.

sourceString: Herein lie the secrets of why asymptomatic carriers are seen and what causes the severe cases in human infection.
targetString: Halkan waxaa ka jira sirta sababta loo arko dadka xanuun-sidayaasha ee aan wax calaamad ah muujinin iyo waxa sababa kiisaska ba'an ee caabuqa bina aadamka.
translated: ["Halkan waxaa ka jiifa sirta sababta loo arko dadka sida aan wax calaamad ah muujinin iyo waxa keena kiisaska halista ah ee caabuqa bini'aadanka."]

sourceString: The severe symptoms are mainly due to the hyperactivation of immune response and the cytokine storm wherein the stronger the immune response, the more severe the lung damage.
targetString: Calaamadaha ba'an ayaa ah kuwa badanaa sabab u ah hawl-galinta aadka ee ka jawaab celinta difaaca iyo dhibaatada cytokine halka jawaab celinta difaaca jirka ee adag,  ay u badantahay dhaawac ba'an oo wadna la dhaawaco.
translated: ["Calaamadaha ba'an ayaa inta badan waxaa sabab u ah hawsha kacdoonka ee ka jawaab celinta difaaca jirka iyo duufaanka cytokine oo ay jawaab celinta difaaca jirka oo xoogan, taas oo ba'an ay u baʼantahay dhaawaca wadnaha."]

sourceString: In contrast, in asymptomatic carriers, the immune response has been de-coupled from CoV replication.
targetString: Taa badalkeed, xanuun-sidayaaha aan calaamadaha muujinin, jawaab celinta difaaca jirka waxaa kala gooyay taranka CoV.
translated: Taa badalkeedu, kuwa siday calaamadaha aan calaamadaha muujinin, jawaab celinta difaaca jirka ayaa laga deyriyay taranka CoV.

sourceString: The same strategy of delinking the immune response might have beneficial effects in anti-SARS-CoV-2 therapy.
targetString: Istaraajiyada lamidka ah ee xiriirka loogu jarayo jawaab celinta difaaca jirka ayaa laga yaaba in ay u leedehey saamayn faaiido leh daaweynta la dagaalanka SARS-CoV-2
translated: ["Istaraatiijiyada lamidka ah ee lagu baabi'inayo jawaab celinta difaaca jirka ayaa laga yaaba inay leedahay saamayn faaiido leh ee daaweynta la dagaalanka SARS-CoV-2."]

sourceString: The interferon response is particularly strong in bats.
targetString: Jawaab celinta interferon ayaa si gaar ah ugu xoogan fiidmeeraha.
translated: Jawaab celinta interferon ayaa si gaar ah ugu xoogan fiidmeeraha.

sourceString: Thus, administration of type I interferon at least in the early phase of SARS-CoV-2 infection in humans should be beneficial.
targetString: Sidaas awgeed, qaadashada nooca I interferon ugu yaraan marxalada hore ee caabuqa SARS-CoV-2 ee bina aadamka ayaa ah mid faaido leh.
translated: ["Sidaas awgeed, qaadashada nooca I interferon ugu yaraan marxaladda hore ee caabuqa SARS-CoV-2 ee bina aadamka waa inuu faa'iido u leeyahay."]

sourceString: In addition, NLRP3 inflammasome activation in bats is defective.
targetString: Intaas waxaa dheer, NLRP3 ga inflammasome ee fiidmeeraha waa mid cillad leh.
translated: Intaas waxaa dheer, NLRP3 inflammasome fiidmeerta ayaa ah mid cillad leh.

sourceString: By this reasoning, inhibition of NLRP3 inflammasome with MCC950 might be useful in the treatment of COVID-19.
targetString: Sababayntan, xanibaada NLRP3 inflammasome ee leh MCC950 ayaa waxtar u leh daaweynta COVID-19.
translated: Sababahan awgiis, xakamaynta NLRP3 inflammasome ee LEH MCC950 ayaa laga yaabaa inay waxtar u leedahay daawaynta COVID-19.

sourceString: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 follows the general theme by which SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV arose.
targetString: Soo ifbaxa SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu dabasocdaa mawduuca guud kaas oo SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV ay kasoo baxeen.
translated: Soo ifbaxa SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu daba socdaa mawduuca guud kaas oo SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV ay kasoo bexeen.

sourceString: Whereas a bat beta-CoV sharing 95% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV has been found, there also exists a bat-CoV sharing 96% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Halka fiidmeerta beta-CoV ay la wadaagayso 95% isu eekaansho nucleotide SARS-CoV ayaa la ogaaday, sidoo kale waxaa jira CoV fiidmaar kaas oo la wadaagaya 96% isu ekaansho nucleotide SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Halka fiidmeerta beta-CoV ay la wadaagayso 95% isu eekaansho nucleotide SARS-CoV ayaa la ogaaday, sidoo kale waxaa jira CoV fiidmaar kaas oo la wadaagaya 96% isu eg nucleotide SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Whereas civets and other animals in the markets have been found to harbour viruses identical to SARS-CoV, immediate intermediate hosts for SARS-CoV-2 have not been identified.
targetString: Halka bisadaha baadiyaha iyo xoolaha kale ee suuqa ku jira la ogaaday inay kaydiyaan fayruusyada lamidka ah SARS-CoV, xanuun sidaha dhexe ee ugu dhaw ee SARS-CoV ayaan la aqoonsanin.
translated: Halka bisadaha bisadaha iyo xayawaanada kale ee ku sugan suuqa la ogaaday inay kaydiyaan fayruusyada lamidka ah SARS-CoV, xanuun sidaha dhexe ee ugu dhaw ee SARS-CoV lama aqoonsanin.

sourceString: Pangolin beta-CoVs strikingly homologous to SARS-CoV-2 have been found, indicating that pangolins might serve as one of intermediate hosts or pangolin beta-CoVs could contribute gene fragments to the final version of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Beta-CoVs pangolin ee sida wayn ugu eeg SARS-CoV-2 ayaa la ogaaday, iyagoo muujinaya in pangolins ka ay noqon karaan mid kamid ah xanuun sidayaasha dhexdhexaadka ah mise beta-CoVs pangolin ayaa siin kara qayb hidde ah nooca u dambeeya ee SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Beta-CoV yada pangolin si aad ah ugu eeg SARS-CoV-2 ayaa la ogaaday, iyagoo muujinaya in pangolins ay noqon karaan mid kamid ah xanuun sidaha dhexdhexaadka ah mise beta-CoV yada pangolin ayaa soo kordhin kara qaybaha hidde sidaha nooca ugu dambeeya ee SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Although questions remain, there is no evidence that SARS-CoV-2 is man-made either deliberately or accidentally.
targetString: Inkastoo su'aaluhu ay taaganyihiin, ma jirto cadeyn in SARS-CoV-2 ay tahay mid bini aadam sameeyay si ula kac ah ama si kama'a ah.
translated: ["Inkastoo su'aaluhu ay taagan yihiin, ma jirto cadeyn muujinaysa in SARS-CoV-2 uu yahay mid bini aadam sameeyay si ula kac ah ama si kama'a ah."]

sourceString: CoVs have returned to the limelight due to the recent outbreak of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: CoV yada waxay u laabteen iftiinka cad sababtoo ah dilaacitaanka dhaw ee SARS-CoV-2.
translated: CoV yada waxay dib ugu soo laabteen iftiinka iftiinka sababtoo ah dilaacitaanka dhawaan ee SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: The study of CoVs in bats and other animals has drastically changed our perception of the importance of zoonotic origins and animal reservoirs of HCoVs in human transmission.
targetString: Daraasada CoV yada ee fiidmaaraha iyo xoolaha kale ayaa si wayn u badashay fikradeena ah muhiimada asalka xanuunka xoolaha ee u gudba bini'aadanka iyo deegaanka xoolaha ee HCoV yada ee u gudbinta bini'aadanka.
translated: ["Daraasada CoV yada ee fiidmaaraha iyo xoolaha kale ayaa si wayn u badashay fikradaheena muhiimada asalka xanuunka xoolaha ee u gudba bini'aadanka iyo keydka xoolaha ee HCoV yada ee u gudbinta bini'aadanka."]

sourceString: Pervasive evidence has shown that SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 have a bat origin and are transmitted to humans via intermediate hosts.
targetString: Cadeynta balaaran ayaa muujisay in SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV-2 ay leeyihiin asal fiidmeer loona gudbiyo bini aadamka iyadoo loo marayo xanuun side dhexdhexaad ah.
translated: ["Cadaynta baahsan ayaa muujisay in SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV-2 ay leeyihiin asal fiidmeer waxaana loogu gudbiyaa bini'aadanka ayadoo loo marayo qatarta dhexdhexaadka ah."]

sourceString: Given that SARS-CoV infection originates from the contact between humans and civets in the markets, closing wet markets and killing civets therein could have effectively ended the SARS epidemic.
targetString: Hadii caabuqa SARS-CoV uu kasoo farcamay is taabashada bini aadamka iyo bahalka loo yaqaan civets ee suuqa taala, xiritaanka suuqyada qoyan iyo dilitaanka civets markaas wuxuu si wax ku ool ah uu dhamayn lahaa safmareenka SARS.
translated: Hadii caabuqa SARS-CoV uu kasoo farcamay is taabashada bini aadamka iyo civets ee suuqa, xiritaanka suuqyada qoyan iyo dilida civets ee ku jira ayaa si wax ku ool ah usoo afjari lahaa safmareenka SARS.

sourceString: By the same reasoning, pangolins should be removed from wet markets to prevent zoonotic transmission, in view of the discovery of multiple lineages of pangolin beta-CoVs closely related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Sababaynta lamidka ah, pangolin yada waa in laga saaraa suuqyada qoyan si looga hortago gudbinta xanuunka xoolaha ee u gudba bini'aadanka, marka la eego ogaanshaha dhawr noole ee pangolin beta-CoV yada ayaa si dhaw ula xiriira SARS-CoV-2.
translated: ["Sababaynta lamidka ah, pangolin yada waa in laga saaraa suuqyada qoyan si looga hortago gudbinta xanuunka xoolaha ee u gudba bini'aadanka, marka la eego ogaanshaha dhawr nooc ee pangolin beta-CoV yada si dhaw ula xiriira SARS-CoV-2."]

sourceString: However, whether and how SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted to humans through pangolins and other mammals remain to be clarified in future investigations.
targetString: Si kasta ha ahaatee, hadii iyo sida SARS-CoV-2 loogu gudbiyo bini aadamka isagoo u maraya pangolin iyo naaslayaasha kale ayaa ah mid in lagu cadeeya ah baaritaanada mustaqbalka.
translated: Si kasta ha noqotee, hadii iyo sida SARS-CoV-2 loogu gudbiyo bina aadamka iyadoo loo marayo pangolin-yada iyo naasalayda kale ayaa ah mid ay yihiin in la cadeeyo baaritaanada mustaqbalka.

sourceString: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has existed in dromedary camels for a long time.
targetString: Dhinaca kale, MERS-CoV ayaa ku jiray geela halka kurus leh mudo dheer.
translated: Dhinaca kale, MERS-CoV waxa uu ku jiray geela ku jira geela meesha kulaylka ku jira muddo dheer.

sourceString: These camels serve as an important tool for transportation as well as a main source of meat, milk, leather and wool products for the local people.
targetString: Geelan waxaa waaye qalab muhiim ah oo gaadiid ah iyo sidoo kale isha ugu wayn ee laga hello hilib, caano, maqaar iyo alaabta dhogorta ee ka hellaan dadka maxalliga ah.
translated: Geelani waxaa loo adeegaa qalab muhiim u ah gaadiidka iyo sidoo kale isha ugu weyn ee laga helo hilibka, caanaha, maqaarka iyo waxyaabaha dhogorta dhogorta ah ay ka helaan dadka deegaanka.

sourceString: They are widely distributed across the Middle East and Africa.
targetString: Waxaa si balaaran loogu qaybiyay daafaha Bariga dhexe iyo Afrika.
translated: Kuwaas oo si ballaaran loogu qaybiyo guud ahaan Bariga Dhexe iyo Afrika.

sourceString: It is therefore impossible to sacrifice all camels for the control of MERS, as what was done in wild animal markets in China to prevent the spreading of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Sidaas darteed waa suurtagal in la huro dhamaan geela si loo xakameeyo MERS, sida wixii lagu sameeyay xoolaha duur joogta ee Shiinaha si looga hor tago faafitaanka SARS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Sidaa darteed suurtagal maahan in la huro dhamaan geela si loo xakameeyo MERS, sida wixii lagu sameeyay xoolaha duur joogta ee Shiinaha si looga hortago faafitaanka SARS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: To stop the recurrent outbreaks of MERS, a comprehensive approach should be taken to develop effective vaccines against MERS-CoV for camels, in combination with other infection control measures.
targetString: Si loo joojiyo soo noqnoqoshada dilaacyada MERS, hab dhamaystiran waa in la qaado si loo sameeyo talaalo shaqaynaya ee ku aadan MERS-CoV ee geela, iyadoo ay la socoto talaabooyin kale oo xakamaynta caabuqa.
translated: Si loo joojiyo soo noqnoqda dilaacitaanka MERS, hab dhamaystiran waa in la qaadaa si loo sameeyo tallaalo waxtar leh oo ka dhan ah MERS-CoV ee geela, iyadoo ay weheliso tallaabooyin kale oo xakamaynta caabuqa.

sourceString: As we are not able to eliminate these viruses, new genotypes might emerge to cause outbreaks.
targetString: Maadaama aynaan awoodin inaan cirib tirno fayraasyadan, genotypes cusub ayaa soo ifbixi kara si ay u sababaan dilaacyo.
translated: Maadaama aynaan awoodin inaan cirib tirno fayruusyadan, genotypes cusub ayaa soo ifbixi kara si ay u sababaan dilaacyo.

sourceString: A variety of zoonotic CoVs are circulating in the wild.
targetString: CoV yada xanuunka xoolaha ee u gudba bini'aadanka oo kala duwan ayaa ku wareegaya hawdka.
translated: CoV yada cudurka xoolaha ee u gudba oo kala duwan oo cudurka xoolaha ka taga ayaa ku wareegaya duurjoogta.

sourceString: Particularly, bat CoVs with zoonotic potential are so diverse.
targetString: Gaar ahaan, CoV yada fiidmaarta ee leh suurtagalnimada xanuunka xoolaha ee u gudba bini'aadanka ayaa saaid ukala duwan.
translated: Khaas ahaan, CoV yada fiid-meerta ee leh awooda cudurka xoolaha ka qaadeen ayaa aad u kala duwan.

sourceString: There are plenty of opportunities that these zoonotic CoVs evolve and recombine, resulting in the emergence of new CoVs that are more transmissible and/or deadly in humans in future.
targetString: Waxaa jira fursado badan oo CoV yada xanuunka xooluhu uu bini'aadanka qaadsiiyo ay ku hormarayaan ayna dib isugu imaanayaan, iyagoo sababaya inay soo ifbaxaan CoV yo cusub kuwaas oo si badan loogu gudbin karo iyo/ama aad u laynaya bini'aadanka mustaqbalka.
translated: ["Waxaa jira fursado badan oo CoV yada cudurka qaadsiiyaha ah ay kobcayaan oo ay dib isu soo noolaadaan, iyagoo sababaya in ay soo ifbaxaan CoV yo cusub kuwaas oo si aad ah loogu gudbin karo iyo/ama aad u dilaan bini'aadanka mustaqbalka."]

sourceString: The culture of eating wild animals in some places of China should be abandoned to reduce unnecessary contact between humans and animals.
targetString: Dhaqanka cunista xoolaha duurjoogta ee meelaha qaar Shiinaha waa in layska daayaa si loo yareeyo xiriir aan loo baahnayn oo u dhaxeeya bini'aadanka iyo xoolaha.
translated: ["Dhaqanka cunista xoolaha duurjoogta ah ee meelaha qaar Shiinaha waa in laga tagaa si loo yareeyo xiriir aan loo baahnayn oo u dhaxeeya bini'aadanka iyo xoolaha."]

sourceString: With the ordeals of SARS, MERS and COVID-19, a better preparedness and response plan should be in place.
targetString: Dhibaatooyinka SARS, MERS iyo COVID-19, diyaar garaw wanaagsan iyo qorshe falcelin waa in meel la dhigaa.
translated: Dhibaatooyinka SARS, MERS iyo COVID-19, diyaar garaw wanaagsan iyo qorshe falcelin waa in la dajiyaa.

sourceString: In fact, many viruses have existed in the planet for a very long time.
targetString: Xaqiiq ahaan, fayruusyo badan ayaa ka jiray dhulka waqti aad u dheer.
translated: Xaqiiqdii, fayruusyo badan ayaa ka jiray aasiga muddo aad u dheer.

sourceString: They stay in their own natural reservoirs until there is a chance for spillover.
targetString: Waxay joogaan kaydkooda dabiiciga ah ilaa ka timaado fursad uu meel kale ku faafo.
translated: Waxay joogaan kaydkooda dabiiciga ah illaa iyo inta ay timaado fursad uu ku dhaafo.

sourceString: Although bats have many features that favours the spreading of viruses, the chance for humans to be in contact with bats and other wildlife species can be minimized if people are educated to stay away from them.
targetString: Inkastoo fiidmeeruhu ay leeyihiin astaamo badan oo ka caawinaya fidinta fayraasyada, fursada bini aadamku uu kula xiriiri karo fiidmeerta iyo noolayaasha duurjoogta ayaa la yarayn karaa hadii dadka wax la baro si ay uga dheeraadaan.
translated: Inkastoo fiidmeeruhu ay leeyihiin astaamo badan oo u babac dhigaya faafitaanka fayrasyada, fursada bina aadamku uu kula xiriiri karo fiidmeerta iyo noocyada kale ee duurjoogta ayaa la yarayn karaa hadii dadka wax la baro si ay uga fogaadaan.

sourceString: Continuous surveillance in mammals is necessary for better understanding of the ecology of CoVs and their natural hosts, which will prove useful in preventing animal-to-human transmission and future outbreaks.
targetString: Korjoogtayn socota ee naaslayda ayaa u haboon fahan fiican ee degaanka CoV yada iyo xanuun sidayaashooda dabiiciga ah, kuwaas oo cadaynaya waxtarkooda ka hortaga ka gudbitaanka xoolaha u gudbaya bini'aadanka iyo dilaacista mustaqbalka.
translated: ["Korjoogtaynta joogtada ah ee naasalayda ayaa lagama maarmaan u ah fahan fiican oo ku saabsan bay'ada CoV yada iyo xanuun sidayaashooda dabiiciga ah, kuwaas oo cadaynaya faa'iido u leh ka hortaga gudbinta xayawaanka ilaa bini'aadanka iyo dilaaca mustaqbalka."]

sourceString: To conclude, the most effective way to prevent viral zoonosis is for humans to stay away from the ecological niches of the natural reservoirs of the zoonotic viruses.
targetString: Si loo soo gabagabeeyo, habka ugu waxtarka leh ee lagaga hortagi karo fayruusyada xanuunada xoolaha  ee u gudba bini'aadanka ayaa loogu talagalay bini'aadanka inuu ka fogaado deegaaan nololeedka kaydka dabiiciga ee fayruusyada xanuunada xoolaha ee u gudba bini'aadanka.
translated: ["Si loo soo gabagabeeyo, habka ugu waxtarka badan ee looga hortagi karo fayruusyada xanuunada ka yimaada cudurada xannibeenka ee bina aadamka ayaa loogu tala galay bini'aadanka inuu ka fogaado deyrta nololeed ee kaydka dabiiciga ah ee fayruusyada xanuunada ka baxsan ee u gudba bini'aadanka."]

sourceString: Several pieces in the puzzle of the zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2 are still missing.
targetString: Qaybo dhawr ah ee xujada asalka xanuunka xoolaha ee u gudba bini'aadanka ee SARS-CoV-2 ayaa wali maqan.
translated: ["Dhawr xabo oo ku jira xujaabka asalka xanuunka bini'aadanka ee SARS-CoV-2 ayaa wali maqan."]

sourceString: First, if bats transmit an ancestral virus of SARS-CoV-2 to pangolins, it will be of interest to see under what circumstances bats and pangolins could share the same ecological niche.
targetString: Tan koobaad, hadii fiidmeeruhu ay gudbiyaan fayras hore ee SARS-CoV-2 ee ku aadan pangolin yada, waxay noqon doontaa mid danayn leh in la arko duruufaha keenay fiidmeeraha iyo qarindiyaasha inay wadaagaan deegaan nololeed isku mid ah.
translated: Ugu horeyn, hadii fiidmeeruhu ay gudbiyaan fayras hore ee SARS-CoV-2 ee pangolin yada, waxay noqon doontaa mid xiiso leh in la arko duruufaha ku xeeran fiidmeeraha iyo qarandida ay wadaagi karaan nafaqada nooleed ee isku midka ah.

sourceString: Second, if bats play a more direct role in human transmission, how humans get into contact with bats should be determined.
targetString: Tan labaad, hadii fiidmeeruhu ay door toos ah oo badan ka ciyaaraan u gudbinta bini aadamka, sida aadanuhu uu ku taabto fiidmeerta waa in la ogaadaa.
translated: ["Tan labaad, hadii fiidmeeruhu ay door toos ah oo badan ka ciyaaraan u gudbinta bini'aadanka, sida bini aadamku uu ku taabto fiidmeerta waa in la ogaadaa."]

sourceString: Third, if a third mammal acts as the true intermediate host, how it interacts with the different species including humans, bats and pangolins has to be clarified.
targetString: Tan saddexaad, hadii naasle saddexaad uu noqdo xanuun sidaha dhex dhexaad ee runta ah, sida ay u dhex gasho noolayaasha kala duwan ee ay kamid yihiin bin aadamka, fiidmeeraha iyo pangolin yada waa in la cadeeyo.
translated: ["Seddaxaad, hadii naasle saddexaad uu noqdo xanuun sida xanuun sidayaasha dhexdhexaadka ah ee runta ah, sida ay u dhex gasho noolayaasha kala duwan ee ay ka midka yihiin bini'aadanka, fiidmeerta iyo pangolin-yada waa in la cadeeyo."]

sourceString: Finally, since many mammals including domestic animals might be susceptible to SARS-CoV-2, both surveillance and experimental infection should be conducted.
targetString: Ugu dambayn, maadaama naaslay badan oo ay ku jiraan xoolaha la dhaqdo ay qaadi karaan SARS-CoV-2, labadaba waardiyayn iyo caabuq tijaabo ah waa in la sameeyo.
translated: Ugu dambeyntii, maadaama naaslay fara badan oo ay ku jiraan xoolaha la dhaqdo ayaa laga yaabaa inay u nugul yihiin SARS-CoV-2, labadaba korjoogtaynta iyo caabuqa tijaabada ah waa in la sameeyaa.

sourceString: Should it be a bat, a pangolin or another mammal, it is expected that SARS-CoV-2 or its parental viruses that are almost identical will be identified in its natural hosts in future.
targetString: Haday ahaato fiidmeer, pangolin mise naasle kale, waxaa la rajaynayaa in SARS-CoV-2 misane fayraasyada ay kasoo farcameen kuwaas oo inta badan isu eeg ayaa la ogaan doonaa iyadoo ku jirta xanuun sidaheeda dabiiciga ah mustqabalka.
translated: Haday ahaato fiidmeer, qarandid ama naasleey kale, waxaa la filayaa in SARS-CoV-2 ama fayruusyada ay kasoo farcameen kuwaas oo inta badan lamid ah lagu aqoonsan doono xanuun sidayaasheeda dabiiciga ah mustaqbalka.

sourceString: Continued investigations in this area will elucidate the evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in animals, with important implications in the prevention and control of COVID-19 in humans.
targetString: Baaritaano sii socda ee goobtan ayaa cadeyn doona jidka isbadelka ee SARS-CoV-2 ee xoolaha, iyadoo leh natiijooyin muhiim ah ee ka hortaga iyo xakamaynta COVID-19 ee bini'aadanka.
translated: ["Baaritaanada sii socda ee aagan ayaa cadeyn doona dariiqa isbadelka ee SARS-CoV-2 ee xoolaha, oo leh natiijado muhiim ah ee ka hortaga iyo xakamaynta COVID-19 ee bini'aadanka."]

sourceString: Updating the diagnostic criteria of COVID-19 “suspected case” and “confirmed case” is necessary
targetString: Qaabka cusboonaysiinta baadhitaanka COVID-19  ee "kiiska laga shakiyay" iyo "kiiska la xaqiijiyay" ayaa muhiim ah.
translated: Cusboonaysiinta hababka lagu ogaanayo COVID-19 "kiiska laga shakiyay" iyo "kiiska la xaqiijiyay" ayaa lagama maarmaan ah

sourceString: On 6 February 2020, our team had published a rapid advice guideline for diagnosis and treatment of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) infection, and this guideline provided our experience and make well reference for fighting against this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: 6dii Febraayo 2020, kooxdayada waxay daabaceen xeer waano oo dagdaga ah oo loogu tala galay baadhitaanada iyo daaweynta caabuqa  cornoavirus ka cusub ee 2019 (2019-nCoV) xeerkan wuxuu siyaadiyay khibradayada wuxuuna sameeyay tixraac wanaagsan oo lagula dagaalamayocudurkan aduunka ku faafay.
translated: 6dii Febraayo 2020, kooxdeenu waxay daabaceen xeerka talobixinta ee xawliga ah ee baadhitaanada iyo daawaynta caabuqa coronavirus-ka ee 2019 (2019-nCoV) ee cusub, xeerkani wuxuu siiyay khibradeena wuxuuna tixraac fiican ka dhigayaa la dagaalanka ka hortagga cudurkan faafa ee aduunka oo dhan.

sourceString: However, the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge are gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: Si kasta ha noqotee, cudurka coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) waa cudur cusub, wacyigalintayada iyo aqoontayada si tartiib ah ayay u kordhaysaa ayadoo ku salayn natiijooyinka cilmi baadhista socota iyo muujimaha baadhitaanka caafimaad; sidaas awgeed, istaraatiijiyadaha baadhitaan iyo kuwa daaweyneed ayaa sidoo la cusboonaysiiya si joogta ah.
translated: Si kasta ha noqotee, cudurka coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) waa cudur cusub, wacyigalintayada iyo aqoonteena si tartiib tartiib ah ayay u kordhaysaa ayadoo ku saleysan natiijooyinka cilmi baadhista ee socda iyo khibrada waxqabadka caafimaad; Sidaa daraadeed, istaraatiijiyadaha cudurada lagu ogaanayo iyo daaweynta ayaa sidoo kale si joogto ah loo cusbooneysiiyaa.

sourceString: In this letter, we answered one comment on our guideline and provided the newest diagnostic criteria of “suspected case” and “confirmed case” according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (seventh version) that issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China.
targetString: Warqadan, waxaan kaga jawaabnay hal faalo oo ku jirta xeerka waxaanu bixinayna qaabka baadhitaan ee u dambeeyay ee "kiiska laga shakiyay" iyo "kiiska la xaqiijiyay" ayadoo la tixraacayo Xeerarka baadhitaano iyo Daaweyneed  ee COVID-19 (nooca todobaad) kaas oo ay soo saareen Gudiga Qaran ee Caafimaadka Dadka Qaranka Shiinaha.
translated: Warqadan, waxaan kaga jawaabnay hal faallo oo ku jirta qawaaniinta waxaana soo bandhigay habka ugu cusub ee lagu baaro "kiiska laga shakiyay" iyo "kiiska la xaqiijiyay" iyadoo la tixraacayo Shuruucda ugu danbeeyay ee Baadhitaanada iyo Daaweynta COVID-19 (nooca toddobaad) kaas oo ay soo saareen Gudiga Qaran ee Caafimaadka Dadka Shiinaha.

sourceString: In December 2019, the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) has caused an outbreak, which is now officially named as the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the virus has been named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Diseembar 2019, coronavirus ka cusub ee 2019 (2019-nCoV) ayaa sababay dilaacitaan, kaas o hadda si rasmi ah loo yaqaano cudurka coronavirus ee2019 (COVID-19)  fayraskana waxaa lagu magaacabay fayraska ba'an ee neef-mareenka ee coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
translated: ["Diseembar 2019, coronaviruska cusub ee 2019 (2019-nCoV) ayaa sababay dilaaca, kaas oo hada si rasmi ah loogu magacaabay cudurka coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) fayraskana waxaa lagu magacaabay fayraska ba'an ee neefmareenka ba'an ee coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2)."]

sourceString: On 11 March 2020, WHO characterized COVID-19 as a pandemic.
targetString: 11kii Maarso 2020, Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ayaa ku astaamaysay COVID-19 in uu yahay cudur caalami ah.
translated: 11kii Maarso 2020, Who waxay ku tilmaantay COVID-19 in uu yahay cudur caalami ah.

sourceString: In order to fight against the SARS-CoV-2 infection, our team has developed a rapid advice guideline and that has been published online in Military Medical Research on 06 February 2020.
targetString: Si loola dagaalamo caabuqa SARS-CoV-2, kooxdayadu waxay soo saareen shuruuc waano oo dagdag ah waxaana lagu daabacay si online ah Cilmi baadhista Caafimaad ee Milatari 6 Febraayo 2020.
translated: Si loola dagaallamo caabuqa SARS-CoV-2, kooxdeena waxay soo saareen shuruud waano oo dagdag ah waxaana lagu daabacay si online ah cilmi baadhista caafimaadka militariga ee 6dii Febraayo 2020.

sourceString: It has attracted a great attention since published.
targetString: Waxay soo jiidatay dareen weyn ilaa maalintii la daabacay.
translated: Waxay soo jiidatay dareen weyn ilaa markii la daabacay.

sourceString: Note however that COVID-19 is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge is gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: Ogsoonaw si kasta oo COVID-19 u yahay cudur cusub, wacyigalinteena iyo aqoonteena sida tartiibta ah u kordhaysa ee kusalaysan natiijooyinka cilmi baadhista iyo khibrada baaritaanada caafimaad; sidaas awgeed, istaatiijiyadaha baadhitaan iyo kuwa daaweyneed ayaa sidoo kale si joogta ah loo cusboonaysiiyaa.
translated: Ogsoonow si kastaba ha ahaatee in COVID-19 yahay cudur cusub, wacyigalinteena iyo aqoonteena ayaa si tartiib tartiib ah u kordhaysa iyadoo ku saleysan natiijooyinka cilmi baarista ee socda iyo khibrada waxqabadka caafimaad; Sidaa daraadeed, istaraatiijiyadaha cudurada lagu ogaanayo iyo daaweynta ayaa sidoo kale si joogto ah loo cusbooneysiiyaa.

sourceString: For instance the Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), among 16 January 2020 to 3 March 2020, has issued a total of seven editions with some contexts being substantively changed.
targetString: Talaabooyin baadhitaano iyo kuwa daaweyneed ee COVID-19 ee ay soo saareen Gudiga Qaran ee Caafimaad ee Dad Qaranka  ee Shiinaha (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/),oo ka mid kuwa 16 Janaayo 2020 ilaa 3 Maarso 2020, ayaa soo saaray wadarta todobo dib loo tafatiray kuwaas oo nuxurkooda si wax ku ool ah loo badalay.
translated: Tusaale ahaan Xeerarka Baadhista iyo Daaweynta COVID-19 ee ay soo saareen Guddiga Qaran ee Caafimaadka Jamhuuriyadda Dadka Shiinaha (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), oo ka mid ah 16 Janaayo 2020 ilaa 3 Maarso 2020, ayaa soo saaray wadarta todobo qaybood oo leh waxyaalo macnaha ah oo si wax ku ool ah loo bedelay.

sourceString: Now our guideline received a comment by Zhou et al., they introduced a simple scoring proposal based on their clinical experience.
targetString: Hadda xeerarkanaga waxaa faala ka bixiyay Zhou etal., waxay soo saareen soo jeedin fudud ayagoo ku salaynaya khabrida caafimaad.
translated: Hadda shuruudadeena waxaa faalo ka bixisay Zhou et al., waxay soo saareen soo jeedin fudud oo gool dhalin ah ayadoo ku saleysan waaya aragnimadooda caafimaad.

sourceString: Their work added new evidence for our guideline and also make valuable reference for this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: Shaqadoodu waxay ku dartay cadayn shuruucdayaa sidoo kale waxay u samaysay tixraac qiimo leh ee cudurkan aduunka dhan gaaray.
translated: Shaqadooda waxay ku dartay cadaymo cusub oo ku saabsan tilmaamaheena sidoo kale waxay tixraac qiimo leh u sameeyeen cudurkan faafa ee aduunka oo dhan.

sourceString: We endorse their significant work and express our thanks.
targetString: Waxaanu ayidnay shaqadooda muhiimka ah waxaanu u muujinayna mahad celintanada.
translated: Waxaan ansaxineynaa shaqadooda muhiimka ah waxaana aan muujineynaa mahadcelinteena.

sourceString: However, their work also needs update according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (Trial seventh version) and recently studies.
targetString: Si kasta ha ahaatee, shaqadooda sidoo kale waxay u baahantahay  cusboonaysiin ayadoo la tixraacayo Shuruucaha ugu dambeeyay ee Baadhitaano iyo Daaweyneed ee COVID-19 (Nooca tijaabada Todobaad) iyo daraasadaha hadda ah.
translated: Si kasta ha ahaatee, shaqadooda sidoo kale waxay u baahantahay cusboonaysiin ayadoo la tixraacayo shuruuda ugu danbeeyay ee Baadhitaanada iyo Daawaynta COVID-19 (Nooca tijaabada toddobaad) iyo daraasadaha dhawaan.

sourceString: According to the seventh edition (3 March 2020), to confirm the suspected case needs to combine any one item of epidemiological history features with two items of clinical manifestations to make a comprehensive analysis, or needs to meet three items of clinical manifestations if without clear epidemiological history:
targetString: Marka la tixraaco tafatirida todobaad (3 Maarso 2020), si loo xaqiijiyo kiisaska laga shakiyay waxay ubaahantahay in lagu isku dhafo hal shay oo ah astaamaha taariikheed ee daraasada cudurada saf-mareenka ah iyo laba laba shay oo ah muujiimada caafimaad si loo sameeyo taxliilin dhamaystiran, ama baahida loo qabo helitaaanka seddex shay oo ah muujimaha caafimaad ahaaneed hadii aysan jirin taariikh cudurada saf-mareenka ah oo cad.
translated: Marka loo eego daabacaadda toddobaad (3 Maarso 2020), si loo xaqiijiyo kiisaska laga shakiyay wuxuu u baahan yahay in la isku dhafiyo hal shay oo ah astaamaha taariikheed ee cudurka saf-mareenka ah iyo laba shay oo ah muujimaha caafimaad si loo sameeyo taxliilin dhamaystiran, ama baahida loo qabo in la kulmo seddex shay oo muujimaha caafimaad ahaaneed haddii aan la lahayn taariikh cad oo cudurka saf-mareenka ah:

sourceString: Epidemiological history: (1) a history of travel or residence in Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 cases had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (2) a history of contact with SARS-CoV-2 infectious cases (with positive nucleic acid test); (3) a history of contacting with patients with fever or respiratory symptoms from Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (4) a history of contacting with cluster of confirmed cases (≥ 2 cases with fever and/or respiratory symptoms occurred within 2 weeks in small areas, such as home, office, class of school, etc).
targetString: Taariikhda daraasaadka cudurada saf-mareen ahaaneed: (1) taariikh socdaal mise deganaansho ee magaalada Wuhan iyo goobaha ka agdhaw, mise bulshooyinka kale ee kiisaska COVID-19 laga soo sheegay 14 kii maalin ee u dambeeyay ka hor bilaabashada calaamadaha; (2) taariikh la xirrir ee kiisaska caabuq ee SARS_CoV-2 (ee laga helay baaritaanka nucleic acid); (3) taariikh xiriir ee bukaanada qaba qandho mise astaamaha neefmareen ee ka yimid magaalada Wuhan mise goobaha ka agdhow, mise bulshooyinka kale ee COVID-19 laga soo sheegay 14 kii maalin ee u dambaysay ka hor bilaabashada calaamadaha; (4) taariikh la xiriir ee kooxo kiisas la xaqiijiyay (>= 2 kiisas oo leh qandho iyo/mise astaamaha neefmareenka ee dhacay laba todobaad gudahood goobaha yaryar, sida guriga, xafiiska, fasalka dugsiga, etc).
translated: Taariikhda cudurka saf-mareenka ah: (1) taariikh safar ama dagaan ku ah magaalada Wuhan iyo aaga ku xeeran, ama bulshooyin kale oo kiisaska COVID-19 laga soo sheegay 14-kii maalmood ee u dambeeyay ka hor inta aysan calaamaduhu bilaaban; (2) taariikhda la taabashada kiisaska caabuqa ee SARS-CoV-2 (oo leh tijaabo nucleic acid oo wanaagsan); (3) taariikh ah in lala xiriiro bukaanada qaba qandhada ama calaamadaha neefmareenka ee ka yimid magaalada Wuhan iyo meelaha ku xeeran, ama bulshooyinka kale ee COVID-19 laga soo sheegay 14-kii maalmood ee ugu dambeeyay ka hor intaanay calaamaduhu bilaaban; (4) taariikh ah in lala xiriiro koox ka mid ah kiisaska la xaqiijiyay (≥ 2 kiis oo leh qandho iyo/ama astaamaha neef-mareenka waxay ku dhaceen asbuucyo 2 gudahood meelo yaryar ah, sida guriga, xafiiska, fasalka dugsiga, iwm).

sourceString: Clinical manifestations: (1) fever and/ or respiratory symptoms; (2) with imaging features of COVID-19 infection; (3) total white blood cell counts showing normal, decreased, or reduced lymphocyte count in the early onset stage.
targetString: Muujimahacaafimaad: (1) qandho iyo/mise astaamaha neefmareenka; (2) ee leh astaamaha sawirka caabuqa COVID-19; (3) wadarta tirada unugu dhiiga cad ee tusaya inuu caadi yahay, hoos u dhacay, mise tirada dhiiga cad oo hoos u dhacay ee marxalada hore ee bilaabashada.
translated: Muujimaha caafimaad: (1) qandho iyo/ama astaamaha neef-mareenka; (2) oo leh astaamaha sawirka ee caabuqa COVID-19; (3) wadarta tirada unoqolka unugyada dhiigga cad ee muujinaya caadi, hoos u dhac, ama hoos u dhacay tirada dhiiga cad ee marxalada hore ee bilowga ah.

sourceString: Diagnosing the confirmed case should base on suspected case with any one item of pathogenic or serological evidence as following: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2; (2) viral whole genome sequencing showing high homogeneity to the known novel coronaviruses; (3) positive for the specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody to SARS-CoV-2 in serum test; or a change of the SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody from negative to positive, or titer rising ≥4 times in the recovery phase above that in the acute phase.
targetString: Baarista kiiska la xaqiijiyay waa in lagu dhiso kiiska laga shakiyay oo leh shay uun jeermis ah ama cadayn dheecaanka dhiiga sida soo socota: (1) waqtiga dhabta ah baarista laga helay PCR ee SARS-CoV-2; (2) fayruuska dhan ee isku xiga genome ee tusaya iskumid saraysa ee coronaviruse yada aan caadiga ahayn ee la yaqaano; (3) laga helay IgM antibody gaarka ah iyo IgG antibody ee SARS-CoV-2 ee baarista serum; mise badelka SARS-CoV-2 gaarka ee IgG antibody ee laga waayay noqdayna mid laga helay, mise cabirka kor u kacaya >=4 marar ee wajiga ka bogsashada ee ka koreeya taas ee wajiga ba'an.
translated: ["Baadhitaanka kiiska la xaqiijiyay waa in lagu saleeyo kiiska laga shakiyay oo leh hal shay oo ah cadaynta jeermiska ama cadaynta dheecaanka dhiiga sida soo socota: (1) waqtiga dhabta ah ee baadhitaanka PCR ee laga helay SARS-CoV-2; (2) fayruuska oo dhan ee isku xigxiga genome-ka oo muujinaya isku mid ahaansho saraysa ee coronaviruses-ka caadiga ah ee la yaqaan; (3) wanaagsan oo loogu talagalay igM antibody-ga iyo igG anti-boodhiga IgG ee sars-CoV-2 ee baaritaanka serumka; ama isbeddelka difaaca IgG ee gaarka ah ee SARS-CoV-2 ee ka yimaada negative ilaa positive, ama titer oo sare u kacaya ≥4 jeer marxaladda ka soo kabashada ee ka sareysa tan marxaladda ba'an."]

sourceString: We can see that the real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract or blood samples was added to the second (18 January 2020) and third (22 January 2020) editions.
targetString: Waxaan arki karnaa in waqtiga dhabta ah ee baarista PCR ee nucleic acid ee neefmareenka ama sambalada dhiiga ayaa lagu daray daabacaadaha labaad (18 Janaayo 2020) iyo midka saddexaad (22 Janaayo 2020).
translated: Waxaan arki karnaa in waqtiga dhabta ah ee baarista PCR ee nucleic acid ee neefmareenka ama sambalada dhiigga lagu daray daabacaadaha labaad (18 Janaayo 2020) iyo midka saddexaad (22 Janaayo 2020).

sourceString: The pathogenic detection of blood sample was added to the fourth (27 January 2020) and fifth (8 February 2020) editions; and then the serological evidence was added to the seventh edition.
targetString: Ogaanshaha jeermiska ee sambalka dhiiga aya lagu daray daabacaadaha afaraad (27 Janaayo 2020) iyo midka shanaad ( 8 Febraayo 2020), iyo kadib cadaynta dheecaanka dhiiga ayaa lagu daray daabacaada toddobaad.
translated: Ogaanshaha jeermiska ee sambalka dhiigga ayaa lagu daray daabacaadaha afaraad (27 Janaayo 2020) iyo midka shanaad (8 Febraayo 2020); kadibna cadaynta dheemanta dheemanta (todobaatanaad) ayaa lagu daray cadaynta xanuunka (todobaatanaad).

sourceString: These modifications based on the researchers continued work that to search for an optimal nucleic acid detection kit for rapid diagnosis, as well as the samples from respiratory tract including blood sampling, which increased the availability of different specimens, and supported bringing the specific antibody positive result into the confirmed criteria.
targetString: Wax ka badelistan lagu salaynayo shaqada sii socotay ee cilmi baarayaasha ee in la raadiyo qalab ogaanshaha nucleic acid oo fiican si xawli ah si loogu baaro, iyo sidoo kale sambalada ka yimid neefmareenka ee ay ku jiran baarista dhiiga, kaas oo kordhiyay helitaanka tijaabooyin badan, oo taageerayna keenista antibody ga gaarka ah ee natiijada laga helay ee noqonaysa habka la xaqiijiyay.
translated: Wax ka badelistan ku salaysan shaqada sii socotay ee cilmi-baarayaasha ayaa si loo raadiyo qalab lagu ogaado nucleic acid-ga oo si degdeg ah loogu ogaado, iyo sidoo kale sambalada ka yimid tuubooyinka neefmareenka oo ay ku jirto sambalka dhiigga, kaas oo kordhiyay helitaanka tijaabooyin kala duwan, waxayna taageertay in anti-boodhiga gaarka ah ee natiijada laga helay keeno unugyada la xaqiijiyay.

sourceString: Besides, there are more and more evidence that remind us to caution with the atypical symptomatic and asymptomatic patients.
targetString: Ka sokow, waxaa jira cadaymo fara badan oo na xasuusinaya inaan ka digtoonaano calaamadaha aan caadiga ahayn iyo kuwa calaamadaha leh ee bukaanada.
translated: Intaas waxaa dheer, waxaa soo kordhay cadaymaha na xasuusinaya in aan ka digtoonaano calaamadaha aan caadiga ahayn iyo kuwa aan calaamadaha lahayn bukaanada.

sourceString: Hence, the flow chart of Zhou et al. should be updated, as they classified the person without clinical symptoms as “low risk”.
targetString: Sidaa daraadeed, khariidada Zhou et al. waa in la cusboonaysiiyo, maadama lagu qaybeeyay qofka isagoon calaamado caafimad lahayn "khatar hoose"
translated: Sidaa daraadeed, shaxda qulqulka ee Zhou et al. waa in la cusboonaysiiyaa, maadaama ay ku kala saareen qofka iyada oo aan calaamado caafimaad lahayn "khatar hoose".

sourceString: The score system also needs to be verified in further clinical practice and studies.
targetString: Nidaamka dhibco siinta wuxuu sidoo kale u baahanyahay in lagu xaqiijiyo hawlgalo caafimaad oo dheeri ah iyo daraasado.
translated: Nidaamka dhibcaha wuxuu sidoo kale u baahan yahay in lagu xaqiijiyo howlo dheeraad ah oo caafimaad iyo daraasado.

sourceString: To conclude, we hope more direct evidence coming up and call for readers to provide their comments.
targetString: Si loo soo gabagabeeyo, waxaan rajaynaynaa cadaymo toos ah oo badan oo isa soo taraya iyo in loogu yeero akhristayaasha inay dhiibtaan faalooyinkooda.
translated: Si loo soo gabagabeeyo, waxaan rajeyneynaa in caddaymo toos ah oo badan ay soo socdaan oo loogu baaqayo akhristayaasha inay dhiibtaan faalooyinkooda.

sourceString: For the diagnosis of “suspected case” and “confirmed case”, we suggest to trace and obey the newest guidelines of their home countries.
targetString: Baaritaanka "kiiska laga shakiyay" iyo "kiiska la xaqiijiyay", waxaan soo jeedinaynaa in la dabagalo oo la adeeco tilmaamaha ugu cusub ee dalalkooda hooyo.
translated: Baaritaanka "kiiska laga shakiyay" iyo "kiiska la xaqiijiyay", waxaan soo jeedinaynaa in la dabagalo oo la adeeco tilmaamaha ugu cusub ee dalalkooda hooyo.

sourceString: Our team will also timely update our guideline to offer help.
targetString: Kooxdeena waxay si waqtiyaysan u cusboonaysiin doonaa tilmaanteena si ay caawimaad u bixiyaan.
translated: Kooxdeenu waxay sidoo kale waqtigayaga u cusboonaysiin doonaan tilmaamahayaga si ay caawimaad u bixiyaan.

sourceString: Bangladesh reports five new deaths due to COVID-19, a daily highest
targetString: Bangladesh waxay sheegtay shan dhimasho oo cusub oo uu sababay COVID-19, tii maalin ugu saraysay.
translated: Bangladesh waxay sheegtay shan dhimasho oo cusub oo uu sababay COVID-19, oo ah tii maalin ugu badneyd

sourceString: Yesterday, Bangladesh has confirmed five new deaths due to COVID-19 on the day.
targetString: Shalay, Bangladesh waxay xaqiijisay shan dhimasho oo cusub oo uu sababay COVID-19 maalinkaas.
translated: Shalay, Bangladesh waxay xaqiijisay shan dhimasho oo cusub oo uu sababay COVID-19 maalintii.

sourceString: This is the highest number of fatalities in a day due to the virus.
targetString: Tani waa tirada dhimasho ee ugu saraysa maalin gudaheed oo uu sababay fayruusku.
translated: Tani waa tirada ugu badan ee dhimashada maalin gudaheed oo uu sababay fayraska.

sourceString: As of yesterday, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) reported the number of recorded infected cases included 114 active cases and 33 recovered cases who were staying home.
targetString: Ilaa iyo shalay, machadka daraasaadka xanuunada Bangladesh, Cilmi baarista iyo Xakamaynta Xanuunka (IEDCR) ayaa sheegtay tirada kiisaska la diwaan geliyay ee uu ku dhacay oo ay ku jiraan 114 kiisas taagan iyo 33 kiisas bogsaday kuwaas oo guriga joogay.
translated: Ilaa shalay, Machadka Daraasaadka Faafa ee Bangladesh, Cilmi Baarista iyo Xakamaynta Cudurada (IEDCR) ayaa sheegtay tirada kiisaska la diwaan galiyay ee uu ku dhacay oo ay ku jiraan 114 kiisas oo firfircoon iyo 33 kiisas bogsaday kuwaas oo guriga joogay.

sourceString: A total of 17 deaths have been recorded.
targetString: Wadar ah 17 dhimasho ayaa lasoo sheegay.
translated: Wadar ahaan 17 dhimasho ayaa lasoo sheegayaa.

sourceString: In an online news briefing, the director of IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, said the fatalities included four males and one female.
targetString: Warbixin kooban oo khadka tooska ah, agaasimaha IEDCR, DR Meerjady Sabrina Flora, ayaa dhahay in dhimashadu ay isugu jirtay afar lab ah iyo hal dhedig ah.
translated: Warbixin kooban oo khadka tooska ah, agaasimaha IEDCR, DR Meerjady Sabrina Flora, ayaa sheegtay in dhimashada ay isugu jirtay afar lab ah iyo hal dhaddig.

sourceString: According to Dr Meerjady, two cases were aged above 60, two between 51 and 60, and one 41-50 years old.
targetString: Iyadoo laga soo xiganayo DR Meerjady, laba kiisas ayay  da'doodu ka waynayd 60, laba u dhaxeeya 51 iyo 60, iyo mid 41-50 sano jir ah.
translated: ["Sida laga soo xigtay Dr Meerjady, laba kiisas waxay da'doodu ka waynayd 60, laba u dhaxeeya 51 iyo 60, iyo mid 41-50 sano jir ah."]

sourceString: She also said two of the victims were from Dhaka.
targetString: Sidoo kale waxay sheegtay in laba dhibanayaasha kamid ah ay kasoo jeedaan Dhaka.
translated: Waxay sidoo kale sheegtay in laba ka mid ah dhibbanayaasha ay ka soo jeedaan Dhaka.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a pandemic on March 11.
targetString: Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka (WHO) ayaa ku dhawaaqday COVID-19 inuu yahay xanuun caalami ah taariikhdu markey eheed Maarso 11-keedi.
translated: ["Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka (WHO) ayaa ku dhawaaqday COVID-19 inuu yahay cudur caalami ah bishii Maarso 11-dii."]

sourceString: A hospital official told Anadolu Agency, a local news outlet, that one of the deceased was Jalal Saifur Rahman, a director of Bengali Anti-Corruption Commission, who was cared for at the Kuwait Maitree Hospital.
targetString: Masuul isbitaal ayaa Hay'ada Anadolu u sheegay, warqaade maxalli ah, in mid kamid ah dadka dhintay uu ahaa Jalal Saifur Rahman, agaasimaha gudiga musuqmaasuq ka hortaga Bengali, kaas oo lagu daryeelayay Isbitaalka Kuwait Maitree.
translated: Sarkaal isbitaal ayaa Wakaaladda Anadolu u sheegay, wargeys maxalli ah, in mid ka mid ah dadka dhintay uu ahaa Jalal Saifur Rahman, oo ahaa agaasime ka tirsan guddiga la-dagaalanka musuqmaasuqa ee Bengali, kaas oo lagu daryeelayay Isbitaalka Kuwait Maitree.

sourceString: On Saturday, in an online video announcement, Bangladeshi Road Transport and Bridges Minister Obaidul Quader said public transport would be shut down for longer than initially planned, until this coming Saturday.
targetString: Sabtidii, ogaysiis muuqaal oo khadka tooska ah, wasiirka Bangladesh ee Gaadiidka Wadada iyo Buundooyinka Obaidul Quader ayaa sheegay in gaadiidka dadwaynaha la joojin doono in ka dheer intii horay loo qorsheeyay, ilaa iyo Sabtida soo socota.
translated: Sabtidii, ogeysiis muuqaal oo khadka tooska ah, wasiirka Bangladhir ee Gaadiidka Waddooyinka iyo Buundooyinka Obaidul Quader ayaa sheegay in gaadiidka dadweynaha la joojin doono muddo ka dheer intii hore loo qorsheeyay, ilaa iyo sabtida soo socota.

sourceString: This public transport shutdown had initially started on March 26 and was planned to end on Saturday, April 4.
targetString: Joojinta gaadiidka dadwaynaha ayaa horaan bilawday Maarso 26 waxaana la qorshaynayay inuu dhamaado Sabtida, Abriil 4.
translated: Xiritaankan gaadiidka dadweyne ayaa bilowgii hore bilaabmay 26-kii bishan March, waxaana la qorsheeyay inuu ku egado sabtida 4-ta Bishan April.

sourceString: Transport of essential goods -- medical, fuel and food -- was still allowed.
targetString: Safrinta badeecada aasaasiga ah -- caafimaadka, shidaalka iyo cuntada-- ayaa wali la ogolaa.
translated: Gaadiidka badeecadaha muhiimka ah -- caafimaadka, shidaalka iyo cuntada -- ayaa wali la ogolaa.

sourceString: The first recorded incidents of COVID-19 infection in Bangladesh were on March 8, in two people who returned from Italy and also the wife of one of them.
targetString: Dhacdadii la diwaan geliyay ee ugu horaysay ee caabuqa COVID-19 Bangladesh wuxuu ahaa Maarso 8, laba qof oo kasoo laabtay Talyaaniga iyo sidoo kale xaaska mid iyaga kamid ah.
translated: Dhacdooyinkii ugu horeeyay ee la diwaan galiyay ee caabuqa COVID-19 Bangladesh waa 8 Maarso, laba qof oo kasoo laabtay Talyaaniga iyo sidoo kale xaaska mid ka mid ah.

sourceString: As of March 19, these three had already recovered.
targetString: Laga soo bilaabo bishii Maarso 19, sedexdan mar horeba ayay soo kabsadeen.
translated: Laga soo bilaabo 19kii Maarso, sedexdan waxay hore u soo kabsadeen.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 surpasses one million infections worldwide
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ayaa ka sara maray hal milyan oo uu ku dhacay caalamka oo dhan.
translated: SARS-CoV-2 ayaa ka saramaray hal milyan oo caalami ah caalamka oo dhan

sourceString: On Thursday, the total number of cases of the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus infections surpassed one million worldwide, Johns Hopkins University data indicated.
targetString: Khamiistii, tirada guud ee kiisaska SARS-CoV-2 caabuqyada coronavirus inay ka kor mareen hal milyan caalamka oo dhan, xogta Jaamacada Johns Hopkins ayaa muujisay.
translated: Khamiistii, tirada guud ee kiisaska SARS-CoV-2 caabuqyada coronavirus waxay dhaafeen hal milyan oo aduunka oo dhan, xogta jaamacada Johns Hopkins ayaa muujisay.

sourceString: At least 52 thousand deaths were linked to COVID-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus.
targetString: Ugu yaraan 52 kun oo dhimasho ayaa lala xiriiriyay COVID-19, xanuunka uu sababo coronavirus.
translated: Ugu yaraan 52 kun oo dhimasho ayaa lala xiriiriyay COVID-19, xanuunka uu sababay coronavirus.

sourceString: The milestone came the same day Malawi confirmed its first coronavirus infections and Zambia had its first coronavirus-related death.
targetString: Dhacadada waxay timid isla maalintii Malawi ay xaqiijisay caabuqeeda coronavirus ee ugu horeeyay ayay Zambia ay lahayd dhimashadii ugu horaysay ee la xiriirta coronavirus.
translated: Talaabada ayaa timid isla maalintii Malawi ay xaqiijisay caabuqeedii ugu horeeyay ee coronavirus iyo Zambia oo ahayd dhimashadii ugu horaysay ee la xiriirta coronavirus.

sourceString: North Korea claimed, as of Thursday, it was one of the few countries remaining free of coronavirus infections.
targetString: Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa sheegatay, laga soo bilaabo Khamiista, inay kamid tahay dalalka yar uu ka badbaaday caabuqyada koroonafayras.
translated: Kuuriyada Woqooyi ayaa sheegatay, laga soo bilaabo Khamiistii, inay kamid tahay dalalka yar ee ka xoroobeen caabuqa coronavirus.

sourceString: By yesterday, the World Health Organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases, including 79,332 cases in the twenty four hours preceding 10 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) on April 4.
targetString: Shalay, Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka waxay sheegtay 1,051,635 kiisas oo la xaqiijiyay, oo ay ku jiraan 79,332 kiisas ee labaatan iyo afartii saac ee ka horeeyay 10 a.m. Waqtiga Bartamaha Yurub (0800 UTC) ee Abriil 4.
translated: ["Shalay, Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ayaa sheegtay 1,051,635 kiisas oo la xaqiijiyay, oo ay ku jiraan 79,332 kiisas oo labaatankii saacadood ee ka horeeyay 10 a.m. Waqtiga Bartamaha Yurub (0800 UTC) ee Abriil 4."]

sourceString: In the United States, over 244 thousand coronavirus cases were recorded, linking to at least 5,900 deaths.
targetString: Maraykanka, in ka badan 244 oo kun kiisas oo koroonafaryras ah ayaa la diiwaan geliyay, iyadoo lala xiriirinayo ugu yaraan 5,900 oo dhimasho.
translated: Dalka Maraykanka, in ka badan 244 kun oo kays oo coronavirus ah ayaa la diiwaan galiyay, iyadoo lala xiriirinayo ugu yaraan 5,900 oo dhimasho.

sourceString: CBS News reported, citing Johns Hopkins University data, there were over 1,000 US deaths on Wednesday caused by coronavirus infections.
targetString: Wararka CBC ayaa soo tabiyay, iyagoo soo qaadanaya xogta Jaamacada Johns Hopkins, inay jiraan in ka badan 1,000 dhimasho Maraykan ah Arbacadii oo uu sababay caabuqa coronavirus.
translated: CBS News ayaa soo tabisay, iyagoo soo xiganaya xogta Jaamacada Johns Hopkins, inay jiraan in ka badan 1,000 dhimasho Maraykanka ah Arbacadii oo uu sababay caabuqa coronavirus.

sourceString: Around the world, countries announced stricter measures to inhibit the disease from spreading.
targetString: Daafaha caalamka, dalalka ayaa ogaysiiyay talaabooyin adag si ay u xanibaan cudurka inuu sii faafo.
translated: Adduunka oo dhan, dalalka ayaa ku dhawaaqay tallaabooyin adag oo lagu horjoogsanayo cudurka inuu sii faafo.

sourceString: On Thursday, Sergei Sobyanin, the mayor of Moscow, extended the city lockdown to May 1.
targetString: Khamiistii, Serei Sobyanin, maayarka Moscow, wuxuu sii dheereeyay bandawgii saarnaa caasimada ilaa iyo Maayo 1.
translated: Khamiistii, Sergei Sobyanin, oo ah duqa magaalada Moscow, ayaa sii kordhiyay xayiraadda saaran magaalada, ilaa iyo Maayo 1.

sourceString: Nationally, President Vladimir Putin declared Russians would continue to be paid without going to work until April 30.
targetString: Si qaran ahaan, madaxwayne Vladimir Putin wuxuu ku dhawaaqay in dadka Ruushka lasii wadi doono in lacag la siiyo iyagoon shaqon aadayn ilaa Abriil 30.
translated: Si qaran ahaan, madaxwayne Vladimir Putin wuxuu ku dhawaaqay in dadka Ruushka la sii wadi doono in mushaar la siiyo iyaga oo aan shaqo aadin ilaa Abriil 30.

sourceString: The parliament of Portugal voted to extend the national state of emergency by 15 days; the vote passed with 215 votes in favor, ten abstentions, and one vote against.
targetString: Baarlamaanka Burtaqiiska ayaa u codeeyay in lasii dheereeyo xaalada degdegga ee qaran 15 maalin, codka wuxuu ku meel maray 215 u codaysay, toban ka aamuseen, iyo hal cod oo kasoo hor jeeda.
translated: Barlamaanka Portugal waxay u codeeyeen in 15 maalmood la kordhiyo xaalada deg degga ah ee qaranku ku jiro; codadkaasi wuxuu ku meel maray 215 cod oo ay raalli ka yihiin, toban ka aamushey, iyo hal cod oo ka soo horjeeday.

sourceString: Saudi Arabia extended curfews in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina to last the entire day; previously, the curfew was only in effect between 3 p.m. and 6 a.m.
targetString: Sacuudi Carabiya waxay sii dheeraysay bandawyada saaran magaalooyinka barakaysan Maka iyo Madiino maalinta oo dhan; horaan, bandawga wuxuu dhaqangalayay kaliya laga bilaabo 3 p.m ilaa 6 a.m.
translated: Sacuudiga ayaa bandow ku soo kordhiyay magaalooyinka barakeysan ee Maka iyo Madiina si ay u socoto maalinta oo dhan; markii hore, waxaa ay ahayd in ay falanqeyntu dhaqan-gelisay oo kaliya inta u dhaxeysa 3-da duhfood ilaa 6-da subaxnimo.

sourceString: Thailand planned to implement a curfew between 10 p.m. and 4 a.m.
targetString: Thailand waxay qorshaysay inay dhaqa galiso bandaw u dhaxaysa 10 p.m. ilaa 4 a.m.
translated: Thailand waxay qorshaysay inay dhaqan geliso baand u dhaxaysa 10 galabnimo ilaa 4-ta a.m.

sourceString: The governor of Ohio, Mike DeWine, announced the state had extended its stay-at-home order until May 1.
targetString: Gofanatooraha Ohio, Mike DeWine, ayaa ogaysiiyay in gobolku uu dheereeyay amarkii guri joogista ilaa Maayo 1.
translated: Guddoomiyaha gobolka Ohio, Mike DeWine, ayaa ku dhawaaqay in gobolku uu dheereeyay amarkii guryaha lagu joogo illaa iyo maayo 1.

sourceString: Stores in Australia lower toilet paper limits per transaction
targetString: Bakhaarada ku yaala Australia waxay hoos u dhigayaan xadka warqada musqusha ee halkii iibsi.
translated: Bakhaarada ku yaala Australia waxay hoos u dhigaan xadka warqada musqusha ee halkii macaamil

sourceString: On Sunday and Saturday evening, Australian store chains Woolworths and Coles lowered their purchase restrictions on toilet paper to two and one package per transaction in all stores on national level, respectively.
targetString: Fiidninmadii Axada iyo Sabtida, taxanaha bakhaarada Australia ee Woolworths iyo Coles waxay hoos u dhigeen xanibaanado iibsiga waraaqda musqusha ilaa labo iyo hal xirmo halkii iibsi dhamaan bakhaarada heer qaran, siday isugu xigaan.
translated: Fiidnimadii Axadda iyo Sabtida, silsiladaha dukaamada Australia ee Woolworths iyo Coles waxay hoos u dhigeen xanibaadahooda iibka waraaqaha musqusha oo ay ka dhigeen laba iyo hal xirmo halkii iibsi ee dhammaan bakhaarrada heer qaran, siday isugu xigaan.

sourceString: ALDI also introduced a one-pack limit, on Monday.
targetString: ALDI waxay soo rogtay xadayn hal xirmo, Isniintii.
translated: ALDI waxay sidoo kale soo rogtay xadka hal xirmo, Isniintii.

sourceString: These limitations were posted as messages on the checkouts, and on the chains' Facebook pages.
targetString: Xayiraadahan waxaa lagusoo dhejiyay fariirn ahaan meelaha laga baxayo, iyo boga taxanaha ee Facebook.
translated: Xadidaadyadan ayaa lagu soo dhejiyay farriimo ahaan meelaha lagaga baxo, iyo boga silsiladaha ee Facebook.

sourceString: Buyers were reportedly stocking up due to fears of COVID-19 in case people need to self-isolate.
targetString: Iibsadayaasha ayaa lasoo sheegay inay sii iibsanayeen iyagoo ka cabsi qaba COVID-19 hadii ay dhacdo in dadku u baahdaan inay iskarantiilaan.
translated: Iibsadayaasha ayaa lagu soo waramayaa in ay suuq gaynayeen sababo la xiriira cabsida COVID-19 hadii ay dhacdo in dadku u baahdaan inay iska kaartiilaan.

sourceString: On Wednesday, Woolworths also limited toilet paper purchases for home delivery to one pack per order.
targetString: Arbacadii, Woolworths waxay sidoo kale xadiday iibsashada waraaqda musqusha ee guryaha la geeyo hal xirmo dalabkiiba.
translated: Arbacadii, Woolworths waxay sidoo kale xadiday iibsashada waraaqaha musqusha ee guryaha la geeyo hal xirmo dalabkiiba.

sourceString: These changes followed the previous four-pack per transaction restriction introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively.
targetString: Isbadeladan waxay daba socdeen xanibaadii hore ee afar xirmo halkii iibsi ee ay soo saartay Woolworths iyo Coles Maarso 4 iyo 5 siday isugu xigaan.
translated: Isbadaladan waxay daba socdeen xanibaadii hore ee afar xirmo halkii macaamil ee ay soo saareen Woolworths iyo Coles Maarso 4 iyo 5 siday isugu xigaan.

sourceString: Coles, in its March 8 media release, reported that with the four-pack restriction in place, "many stores are still selling out within an hour of delivery", and called the demand "unprecedented", while ALDI, in a Facebook post on Tuesday, called it "unexpected".
targetString: ,Coles, war shaacinteeda Maarso, ayaa ku warantay  in xayiraadaha afar xidhmo oo meel ah "bakhaaro badan ayaa gadaya saacadii gaynta", baahidana ugu yeedhay  "mid aan waligeed horay loo samaynin", halka ALDI, qoraal uu Facebook soo dhigay, ugu yeeray mid lama filaan ah.
translated: "Coles, war-saxaafadeedkeedii Maarso 8,, waxay ku sheegtay in xayiraadda afar xirmo ee meel, "bakhaaro badan ayaa wali gadaya saacadii dhalmada", waxayna baahida ugu yeereen "mid aan horay loo arag", halka ALDI, qoraal uu Facebook soo dhigay, ugu yeeray "lama filaan ah".

sourceString: Sales went up in a "sharp increase" last week, according to a Woolworths spokesperson.
targetString: Wax iibsigu kor ayuu ukacay "kordhitaan lama filaan ah" isbuuci lasoo dhaafay, sida laga soo xiganayo afhayeenka Woolworths.
translated: Wax iibsigu kor ayuu u kacay "koror aad u xoogan" asbuucii lasoo dhaafay, sida laga soo xigtay afhayeenka Woolworths.

sourceString: Costco's store in Canberra also limited the allowed amount to two packs last week.
targetString: BakhaarkaCosto ee Canberra ayaa sidoo kale xadiday qadarkii la ogolaa laba xidhmo isbuuci lasoo dhaafay.
translated: Bakaarka Costco ee Canberra ayaa sidoo kale xadiday qadarkii la ogolaa laba xirmo isbuucii lasoo dhaafay.

sourceString: To further alleviate the shortage, Coles ordered bigger packages from suppliers and increased delivery frequency, Woolworths ordered extra stock, while ALDI made stocks for a planned Wednesday special available early.
targetString: Si intaas in kabadan hoos loogu dhigo gabaabsiga, Coles ayaa ka dalbay xidyooming waaweyn saad keenayaasha isagoo dadajiyay keenista, Woolworths waxay dalbatay badeecad dheeri ah, halka ALDI ay samaysay in badeecadii u qorshaysneed arbacada ay kasoo horeysiisay.
translated: Si loo sii yareeyo gabaabsiga, Coles wuxuu ka dalbay baakadaha waaweyn alaab-qeybiyeyaasha iyo in la kordhiyo inta jeer ee dhalmada, Woolworths waxay dalbatay badeecado dheeraad ah, halka ALDI ay ka samaysay keydka Arbacada oo la qorsheeyay oo khaas ah oo la heli karo goor hore.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman, executive director of the Australian Retailers Association, said that retailers try to raise stock, but local council restrictions on the timing of truck-deliveries make it hard.
targetString: Russell Zimmerman, agaamisamaha fulinta ee Ururka Tafaariiqleyda Australia, ayaa yiri in ay tafaariiqleyda ay kordhiyaan badeecadooda, lakiin xayiraadaha golaha deegaanka ee waqti xamuul gaynta ayaa culeys ka dhigay.
translated: Russell Zimmerman, oo ah agaasimaha fulinta ee ururka tafaariiqleyda Australia, ayaa sheegay in dukaamada tafaariiqleyda ay isku dayaan in ay sare u qaadaan badeecada, laakiin xayiraadaha golaha deegaanka ee xilliga ay xamuulka keeni karaan ayaa adkeeyey.

sourceString: He expects rising production costs, as suppliers try to meet demand, and fewer specials.
targetString: Wuxuu filayaa in uu qarashka wax soo saarka kor u kaco, qaybinta wax soosarkana ay isku daydo in ay baahida dabooshp, iyo kuwa kale oo gaar ah o yar.
translated: Wuxuu filayaa inuu sare u kaca kharashyada wax soo saarka, iyadoo qeybiyeyaasha ay isku dayayaan in ay daboolaan baahida loo qabo, iyo xoogaa takhasusyo ah oo yar.

sourceString: On Tuesday, ALDI announced that following the early release of stock, some stores can't run the Wednesday special.
targetString: Talaadadii, Aldi ayaa ku dhawaaqday  in keenida badeecada ee hore ee soo socota, bakhaarada qaar in ay sii socon doonin Arbadaca gaar ahaan,
translated: Talaadadii, Aldi ayaa ku dhawaaqday in kadib soo daayay saamiyada hore ee dukaamada qaarkood aysan sii wadi karin Arbacada gaarka ah.

sourceString: In a News.com.au report, Dr Gary Mortimer, retail expert from Queensland University of Technology, said the stores fill the stock every night.
targetString: Warbixinta News.com.au, Dr Gary Mortimer, khubarada tafaariiqda ee Jamaacada Tiknoolajiyada ee Queensland, ayaa dhahay in bakhaarada laga soo buuxin doono badeecad habeen kasta.
translated: Warbixin News.com.au ah, Dr Gary Mortimer, oo khabiir tafaariiqda ah oo ka socda Jaamacadda Teknolojiyada ee Queensland, ayaa sheegay in bakhaarada ay buuxinayaan badeecadda habeen kasta.

sourceString: He remarked toilet paper is a bulky item, leading to low quantity of stocks in numbers, and, when sold out, leaves vast shelf spaces empty, hardening the feeling of a shortage.
targetString: Wuxuu sheegay in warqadaha musqusha ay yihiin shay culus, kaas oo u horseedaya tirada badeecada oo tira ahaan hooseeya, iyo, marka la iibiyana,  oo ayna ka tagaysido khaanadaha oo madhan, ayadoo adkaynaysa dareenka yaraanta.
translated: Wuxuu sheegay in warqadaha musqusha ay yihiin shay wayn, oo u horseedaya tirada badeecadaha ee tiradiisu yar tahay tirade, iyo, marka la iibiyo, ayna ka tagayso meelo shelf ah oo baaxad leh oo madhan, taas oo adkaynaysa dareenka yaraanta.

sourceString: Coles and Woolworths have a view [that] if there was plenty of stuff on the shelf, if product like toilet rolls and sanitiser could be [bought] and are there in quantities, you would probably minimise the panic said Russell Zimmerman per ABC News.
targetString: Colos iyo Woolworths ayaa qaba aragtida [ah] hadii ay alaabta khaanadaha ka buuxi lahaayeen, hadii alaabada sida xaashimaha musqusha iyo jeermis dillaha [la iibsan laha] wayna buuxaan, markaa waxaa hoos loo dhigi lahaa cabsida ayuu yiri Russell Zimmerman sida laga soo xigtay ABC News.
translated: Coles iyo Woolworths waxay qabaan aragti ah [in] hadii ay shelf-ga kujiri lahaayeen waxyaabo badan, hadii badeecada sida duubka musqusha iyo jeermis dilaha [la iibsan karo] oo ay jiraan tiro ahaan, waxaa dhici karta in aad yareyd argagaxa ayuu yiri Russell Zimmerman sida laga soo xigtay ABC News.

sourceString: Recycled toilet paper producer Who Gives a Crap said on last Wednesday they'd run out of stock.
targetString: Soo saarayaasha warqadaha musqusha ee dib loo warshadeeyo Kuwaas oo na soo Saaro warqadaha musqusha oo tayadooda aadka uhoseyso aya dhahay Arbacadii lasoo dhaafay in ay ka dhamaanayaan.
translated: Waxa soo saarayaasha warqadaha musqusha ee dib loo warshadeeyo kuwaas oo soo saara waraaqaha musqusha oo la yiraahdo "Who Gives a Crap" ayaa sheegay arbacadii lasoo dhaafay in ay ka dhamaanayaan saamigii.

sourceString: Kimberly-Clark, which makes Kleenex Toilet Tissue, and Solaris Paper which makes Sorbent, emphasized they were working 24/7 to maintain the supply, according to the News.com.au report.
targetString: Kimberly-Clark, kaas oo sameeya xaashimaha musqusha ee Kleenex, iyo Waraaqa Solaris kaas oo sameeya Sorbent, ayaa xooga saaray in ay shaqaynayeen 24/7 si  ay u joogteeyaan qaybinta alaab, sida laga soo xigtay warbixinta News.com.au.
translated: Kimberly-Clark, oo sameeya nuclearka musqusha ee Kleenex, iyo waraaqaha Solaris kaas oo sameeya Sorbent, ayaa xooga saaray inay ku shaqaynayeen 24/7 si ay u ilaaliyaan qaybinta, sida lagu sheegay warbixinta News.com.au.

sourceString: Domain.com, a real estate site, reported some property sellers offering free toilet paper to the first bidder on auctions in Melbourne, when fewer auctions were held because of buyers having time off on the long weekend of Labour Day.
targetString: Domain.com, goobaha hantida ma guuraanka ah, ayaa kusoo waramay in iibayayaasha guryaha qaar ay bixinayan waraaqaha musqusha oo bilaash ah qofka ugu horeeya ee xaraashaya xaraashyada Melbourne,  marka xaraashyaal yar la qabtay sababtoo ah iibsadayaasha aya ku maqnaa fasaxa dheer e dhamaadka isbuuca ee Maalinta Shaqaalaha Aduunka.
translated: ["Domain.com, oo ah goob hantidhawr ah, ayaa soo sheegtay in qaar ka mid ah iibiyayaasha guryaha iibiya ay bixiyaan waraaqaha musqusha oo lacag la'aan ah qofka ugu horreeya ee iibiya xaraashyada Melbourne, markii xaraashyo yar la qabtay sababtoo ah iibsadayaasha oo fasaxa ku jira dhammaadka usbuuca dheer ee Maalinta Shaqaalaha."]

sourceString: The Thursday edition of NT News, a daily printed in Darwin, included an eight-page insert meant to be cut up and used as toilet paper.
targetString: Thursday editionee NT News, ayaa si maalin la ah u daabacaday in Darwin, oo ay ku jirtay sideed bog oo qoraal ah oo loola jeeday in ay noqoto mid la gooyo oo loo isticmaalo sida xaashima musqusha.
translated: Thursday edition ee NT News, oo maalin walba lagu daabacay magaalada Darwin, ayaa lagu daray qoraal siddeed bog ah oo lagu tala galay in la gooyo oo loo isticmaalo sida xaashida musqusha.

sourceString: The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions, according to a report from ABC Australia on March 3 in which they said they had no plans to introduce restrictions on the purchases.
targetString: Bakhaarda ayaa asal ahan ka caga-jiidayay kusoo rogida xayiraadaha, sida laga soo xiganayo warbixinta ABC Australia ee 3 Maarso markaas oo ay dheheen in aysan wax qorsha ugu jirin in ay kusoo rogaan xayiraado iibsashada.
translated: Bakhaarada ayaa markii hore ka caga jiidayay in ay xayiraado ku soo rogaan, sida lagu sheegay warbixinta ABC Australia 3-dii Maarso oo ay sheegeen in aysan haysan wax qorshe ah oo ay ku soo rogaan xayiraado iibsashada.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitiser, dried goods, handwash and flour.
targetString: Rusell Zimmerman ayaa ku daray in alaabooyinka kale ay baahidooda sarayso, oo ay ku jiraan masarada afka lagu duubto, jeermis dile, badeecada qalalan, sabuunta gacmo dhaqista iyo burka.
translated: Russell Zimmerman ayaa intaa ku daray in alaabooyinka kale ay baahida loo qabo, oo ay ku jiraan maaskarada afka lagu xirto, sanitiser, badeecadaha qalalan, gacmo-dhaqashada iyo burka.

sourceString: Similarly, outside of Australia, on Sunday evening online British supermarket Ocado was observed limiting purchases of Andres toilet paper to two 12-roll packs.
targetString: Si lamid ah, dibada Australia,, fiidkii axada dukaanka weyn ee qadka internetka tooska ah ee British Ocado ayaa lagu in uu xadidayay iibinta waraaqaha musqusha ee Andress ilaa labo 12-xidhmo.
translated: Sidoo kale, dibadda Australia, fiidkii Axadda, dukaanka weyn ee internetka ee British-ka Ocado ayaa lagu arkay inuu xaddidaya iibinta waraaqaha musqusha ee Andres illaa labo 12-duub oo xirmooyin ah.

sourceString: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic
targetString: Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ayaa u ku dhawaaqday in COVID-19 yahay cudur caalami ah.
translated: ["Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ayaa ku dhawaaqday in COVID-19 yahay cudur caalami ah"]

sourceString: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 — the disease caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 — to be a pandemic.
targetString: Arbacadii, Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ayaa ku dhawaaqday in dilaacitaanka socda ee COVID-19- ee ay sababtay coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 in uu yahay cudur caalami ah
translated: ["Arbacadii, Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka (WHO) ayaa ku dhawaaqday in dilaacitaanka socda ee COVID-19 - oo ah cudurka uu sababay coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 - uu yahay cudur caalami ah."]

sourceString: Although the word "pandemic" only refers to how widely a disease has spread, not how dangerous specific cases are, the WHO noted the need to drive governments to action:
targetString: In kastoo erayga "cudur caalami ah" loo la jeedo cudur caalamka oo dhan ku faafa, lakiin aan ahayn mid halis ah sida ay kiisaska qaar yihiin, Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka waxay xustay baahida loo qabo in ay dawladuhu ficil sameeyaan.
translated: Inkastoo ereyga "cudur caalami ah" loola jeedo oo keliya inta uu xanuunku ku faafay, ee aan ahayn sida ay khatarta kiisaska gaarka ah u yihiin, hay\'adda WHO waxay xustay baahida loo qabo in dawladuhu ay ficil ka sameeyaan:

sourceString: All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.
targetString: All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.   Wikinews_6:1159 https://en.wikinews.org/wiki/World_Health_Organization_declares_COVID-19_pandemic CC_BY-SA_2.5 en   hadii dalalka ay ogaadaan, baadhaan, daweyaan, daba galaan oo ayna u abaabulaan dadkooda ka jawaab celinta, said Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, gaasimaha guud ee Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka.
translated: Dhammaan dalalku waxay weli wax ka badeli karaan xaaladda cudurkan faafa ah.

sourceString: If countries detect, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their people in the response, said Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the Director-General of the WHO.
targetString: Si qoto deer ayaan ugu walaacsanahay heerarka faaiftaan ee naxdinta leh iyo halista iyo heerka wax qabasho la'aan ee naxdinta leh labadaba.
translated: ["Haddii waddamada ay ogaadaan, tijaabiyaan, daweeyaan, ayna go'doomiyaan, daba-galaan oo ay abaabulaan dadkooda sida ay jawaabta u bixinayaan, ayuu yidhi Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, Agaasimaha Guud ee Who.Who."]

sourceString: We are deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity and by the alarming levels of inaction.
targetString: Sida laga soo xigtay Dr. Tom Frieden, oo horaan ahaa agaasimaha Xarumaha Xakamaynta iyo Ka Hortaga Cudurka ee Maraykanka, cudurka caalamiga ah waa mid "aan horey loo arag."
translated: ["Waxaan si qoto dheer uga walaacsannahay labadaba heerarka argagax leh ee faafitaanka iyo ba'aanta iyo heerarka ba'an ee waxqabad la'aanta."]

sourceString: According to Dr. Tom Frieden, formerly the director of the United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."
targetString: Wuxuu yiri, faalooyin ay daabaceen CNN Febraayo dhexdeedi, "ka sokow influenza, ma jiro fayras kale ee neef-mareenka kaas oo la daba galay ka bilaabato xalaada soo if-bixida ilaa faafitaanka joogtada ah ee caalamka oo dhan.
translated: Sida uu sheegay Dr. Tom Frieden, oo horey u ahaa agaasimaha xarunta xakameynta iyo ka hortagga cudurada ee Maraykanka, cudurkan faafa waa mid aan horay loo arag."

sourceString: He said, in remarks published by CNN in February, "other than influenza, no other respiratory virus has been tracked from emergence to continuous global spread."
targetString: Ghebreyesu ayaa sidoo qeexay aragti la mid ah, asagoo dhahaya "waligano horaan maanaan arag cudur caalami ah oo ku faafinaya coronavirus."
translated: Wuxuu yiri, hadallo ay daabacday CNN bishii Febraayo, "aan ka ahayn influenza, majiraan fayruus kale oo neefmareenka ah oo aan lala socon tan iyo markii uu soo baxay ilaa faafitaanka caalamiga ah ee joogtada ah."

sourceString: Ghebreyesus expressed a similar view, saying "we have never before seen a pandemic sparked by a coronavirus."
targetString: Wuu sii waday, "waligana horaan maanaan u arkin cudur caalami ah oo isla waqtigaas la xakamayn karay."
translated: ["Ghebreyesus wuxuu muujiyay aragti taas la mid ah, wuxuuna yiri 'waligay horay uma aanan arkin cudur caalami ah oo ka dhashay fayruuska coronavirus'."]

sourceString: He continued, "and we have never before seen a pandemic that can be controlled at the same time."
targetString: Xaalada cusub asagoo cudurka caalamiga ah sii socodo goaanada Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ee Janaayo ku dhawaaqista dilaacista xaalada caafimaad oo dagdaga dadweynaha oo leh walaac caalami ah.
translated: Isagoo hadalkiis sii wadayna"waligeen horay uma aanan arkin cudur caalami ah oo isla mar ahaantaana la xakamayn karo."

sourceString: The new status as a pandemic follows the WHO's decision in January to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern.
targetString: Agaasimaha Machadka Qaran ee Alarjiga iyo cudurada Faafa ee Maraykanka, Dr. Anthony Fauci, ayaa yidhi dilaaca, "aasaaska hoose, ayaa noqon doona mid kasii dara."
translated: ["Xaaladda cusub ee cudurka saf-mareenka ah ayaa daba socda go'aankii ay who qaadatay bishii Janaayo, kaas oo ku dhawaaqay dilaacitaanka xaalad degdeg ah oo caafimaad dadweyne oo walaac caalami ah leh."]

sourceString: The United States' National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease's director, Dr. Anthony Fauci, said of the outbreak, "bottom line, it's going to get worse."
targetString: Ilaa Khamiisti Associated Press ayaa kuso warantay in ay jiran ugu yaraan 126,000 oo kiisas COVID-19 ah aduunka oo dhan, taas oo ay ka dhalatay dhimasho ka badan 4,600.
translated: Agaasimaha Machadka Qaran ee Xasaasiyada iyo Cudurada Faafa ee Maraykanka, Dr. Anthony Fauci, ayaa sheegay in cudurka dilaacay, "hoosta hoos u dhaca, way sii xumaaneysaa."

sourceString: As of Thursday, Associated Press reported there were at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in over 4,600 deaths.
targetString: Cudurka caalamiga ah ee coronavirus 2019-20 ayaa ah cudur caalamiga ah coronavirus 2019 socda (COVID-19), oo ay sababatay calaamadaha ba'an ee neef-mareenka ee coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
translated: Ilaa Khamiistii, wakaaladda wararka ee Associated Press waxay sheegtay in ugu yaraan ay jiraan 126,000 oo kiisas COVID-19 aduunka oo dhan ah, taas oo dhalisay in ka badan 4,600 oo dhimasho.

sourceString: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Dilaacitaanka waxaa lagu arkay gudaha Wuhan, Shiinaha, Diseembar 2019, oo lagu dhawaaqay in ay tahay Xaalado Caafimaa dagdag ah oo leh Walaac Caalami ah 30 kii Janaayo 2020, loona aqoonsaday cudur caalami ah 11 kii Maarso 2020.
translated: ["Coronavirus 2019 ilaa 2019 ayaa ah cudur caalami ah oo socda ee cudurka coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19), oo uu sababay ba'an ee neefmareenka ba'an ee astaanta neefmareenka ee coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2)."]

sourceString: The outbreak was identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019, declared to be a Public Health Emergency of International Concern on 30 January 2020, and recognized as a pandemic on 11 March 2020.
targetString: Ilaa 10 ka Abriil 2020, qiyaas ahaan 1.6 milyan oo kiisas COVID-9 ayaa laga soo sheegay gudaha 210 dal iyo xuduudo, midaas oo ay ka dhalatay qiyaas ahaan 97,000 oo dhimasho.
translated: Cudurka dilaacay ayaa lagu aqoonsaday Wuhan, Shiinaha, bishii Diseembar 2019, waxaa lagu dhawaaqay inuu yahay Xaalad Degdeg ah oo Caafimaad Dadban ah oo Walaac Caalami ah 30kii Janaayo 2020, waxaana loo aqoonsaday cudur caalami ah 11 Maarso 2020.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in approximately 97,000 deaths.
targetString: Ku dhawaad 364,000 oo dad ayaa bogsaday.
translated: Ilaa iyo 10 abriil 2020, ku dhawaad 1.61 milyan oo kiisas oo COVID-19 ah ayaa laga soo sheegay 210 dal iyo dhulal, taas oo dhalisay qiyaastii 97,000 oo dhimasho.
