targetString: Baahidan waxay sababtay ko u kaca qiimaaha ee labaatan jibaar marka loo eego qiimaha caadiga ah taas oo sidoo kale sababtay daahinta sahayda caafimaad afar ilaa lix isbuuc.
translated: Sida uu sheegay agaasimaha guud ee WHO Tedros Adhanom, dalabka qalabka ilaalinta shakhsiyadeed ayaa kor u kacay 100-laab.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: Waxay sababtay sidoo kale sababtay gabaabsiga agabka isku ilaalinta shaksi ahaaneed aduunka oo dhan, iyadoo Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ay soo saartay digniin ah in midan ay khatar galin doonto shaqaalaha caafimaadka.
translated: Baahidan waxay horseedday kororka qiimaha caadiga ah oo gaadhaya labaatan jeer qiimaha caadiga ah iyo sidoo kale dib-u-dhac ku keenay keenista alaabta caafimaadka afar illaa lix bilood.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: Gudaha  Australia, cudurka caalimaga wuxuu siiyay fursad cusub halka dukaanada iibinta wakiileed ay ka iibiyaan Shiinaha alaabta Australia.
translated: Waxay kaloo sababtay in la yaraado qalabka difaaca ee shaqsiyadeed ee aduunka oo dhan, iyadoo WHO ay ka digtay in tani ay halis galin doonto shaqaalaha caafimaadka.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: Hawsha sababtay gabaabsiga caanaha caruurta ee dukaamada waaweyn qaarkood taas oo mar danbe dawlada Australia mamnuucday. Kasokow ku baahsanaanta kiiska COVID-19 Waqooyiga Talyaaniga iyo gobolka Wuhan, iyo baahida sare ee wax agabka cuntada, labadaba goobaha ka badbaadaday gabaabsiga cunte ee ba'an.
translated: Australia gudahiis, cudurka saf-mareenka ah ayaa siiyay fursad cusub oo ay dukaameysatada daigou ku iibiyaan badeecooyinka Australia gudaha Shiinaha.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: Talaabooyinka ay Shiinaha iyo Talyaaniga qaadeen ee la dagaalanka xayaysiinta iyo ganacsiga sharci darada ah ee alaabada halista aha ayaa ah mid guulaysatay, ayagoo ka fogaanaya gabaabsiga cuntada ee ba'an taas oo laga filay Yurub iyo sidoo kale Maraykanka Waqooyi.
translated: ["Dhaqdhaqaaqan ayaa ku abuuray qaar ka mid ah suuqyada waaweyn ee dukaamada waaweyn ee caanaha lagu sameeyo, waxaana markii dambe mamnuucday dawlada Australia. Inkastoo ay aad ugu badan yihiin baahsanaan kiisaska COVID-19 ee Waqooyiga Talyaaniga iyo gobolka Wuhan, iyo baahida balaaran ee ku aadan wax soo saarka cuntada laga soo saaro, labada meeloodba way ka badbaadeen cunto yaraanta ba'an."]

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: Waqooyiga Talyaaniga oo leh wax soo saarka beeraha oo weyn ayaan lagu arkin wax isdhimitaan ah oo weyn, balse qiimaha ayaa kordhi kara marka loo eego wakiilada warshadaha.
translated: ["Tallaabooyin shiinaha iyo Talyaaniga ay kaga soo horjeedaan ganacsiyada xanuuqa iyo ganacsiyada sharci darrada ah ee badeecooyinka muhiimka ah ayaa lagu guuleystay, ayada oo laga fogaanayay cunto yari ba'an oo laga filayay Yurub iyo sidoo kale waqooyiga Ameerika."]

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: Khaanadaha cuntada oo madhan ayaa lala kulmay si ku meelgaar ah, xataa gudaha magaalada Wuhan, halka dawlada Shiinaha ay si rasmi ah u siidaysay kaydadka doofaarka si loo hubiyo nafaqa siinta bulshada.
translated: Northern Italy oo leh wax soo saarka wax soo saarka beeraha ee muhiimka ah ma arag hoos u dhac ballaaran, laakiin qiimaha ayaa laga yaabaa inuu kordhay sida ay sheegeen wakiilada warshadaha.

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: Shuruuc la mid ayaa ka jira Talyaaniga oo ah u baahnaansha wax soo saar cunto ah si loo kaydiyo  oo loogu dabaro xaaladah dagdaga ah oo kale.
translated: Kaydka cuntada madhan ayaa si ku meel gaar ah loola kulmay, xitaa magaalada Wuhan, halka saraakiisha dowladda Shiinaha ay sii daayeen keydka doofaarka si ay u xaqiijiyaan nafaqo ku filan oo ay ku noolaadaan dadweynaha.

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: Dhaawaca dhaqaale ee aduun weynaha ayaa laga dareemay Shiinaha: sida laga soo xigtay warbixinta warbaahinta16 Maarso, dhaqaalaha Shiinaha ayaa ah mid si weyn loo saameeyay labadii bilood ee ugu horeysay 2020 sababtoo ah talaabooyinka ay qaaday dawladu si ay u joojiso faafitaanka fayraska, wax iibsiga tafaariiqeed ayaa hoos u dhacay 20.5%.
translated: Sharciyo la mid ah ayaa ka jira Talyaaniga oo u baahan soo saarayaasha cuntada inay kayd u sii helaan xaaladaha noocaas ah.

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: Maadaama mainland Shiinaha ay tahay xariun weyn oo dhaqaale iyo wax soo saar, dilaacida fayraska ayaa la arkay in uu keenay cabsi weyn oo khalkhal galinaysa dhaqaalaha aduunka.
translated: Waxyeellada ku dhacda dhaqaalaha aduunka ayaa laga dareemay Shiinaha: sida laga soo xigtay war saxaafadeed soo baxay 16kii Maarso, dhaqaalaha Shiinaha si aad ah ayuu u burburay labadii bilood ee ugu horreeyay sannadka 2020 sababo la xiriira tallaabooyinka ay dawladdu qaaday si loo yareeyo faafitaanka fayruska, iibka tafaariiqdana hoos u dhacay 20.5%.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: Agathe Demaris oo ka tirsan Taxliiliyayaasha Dhaqaale ayaa saadaaliyay in ay suuqyada kacsanaan doonaan ilaa muuqaal cad uu soo baxo ee natiijoyin waxtar ah.
translated: Maadaama dhul weynaha Shiinaha uu yahay xarun weyn oo dhaqaalaha iyo wax soo saarta ah, dilaacitaanka fayruuska ayaa loo arkay inuu khatar weyn oo xasillooni darro ku yahay dhaqaalaha dunida.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: Bartamihii Janaayo 2020, taxliiliyayaasha qaar ayaa ku qiyaasay dib usoo kabsashada dhaqaale ee cudurka saf-mareenka ah in koriinta aduunka oo dhan uu dhaafi dooni midii 2002-2004 ee dilaacii SARS.
translated: Agathe Demarais oo ka tirsan unugga sirdoonka ee Economist ayaa saadaaliyay in suuqyadu ay sii ahaan doonaan kuwo kacsanaan ah ilaa iyo inta ay ka soo baxayaan muuqaal cad oo ku saabsan natiijooyinka iman kara.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: Hal qiyaas oo u bixiyay khabiir ka tirsan Jaamacada Washingto ee St. Louis ayaa  bixiyay $300+ bilyan oo saamayn ah silsilada sahayda ee addunka oo dhan taas oo ssi socon karta ilaa labo sano.
translated: Janaayo 2020, qaar ka mid ah falanqeeyayaasha ayaa qiyaasay in hoos u dhaca dhaqaale ee safmareenka ee ku saabsan kobaca aduunka uu dhaafi karo kii 2002 ilaa 2004 dilaacitaanka SARS.

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: Ururka Wadamada Dhoofiya Batroolka(OPEC) ayaa sida lasoo sheegayo "wareeray" kadib hoos u dhac wayn oo ku yimid qiimayaasha saliida oo ay sababtay baahi yari ka timid Shiinaha.
translated: Hal qiyaas oo ka soo baxay khabiir ka tirsan jaamacadda Washington ee Magaalada St. Louis ayaa 300+ bilyan oo doolar ku yeeshay silsiladda sahayda aduunka oo socon karta ilaa iyo labo sano.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: Suuqayada badeecada ee calaamka ayaa hoos u dhacay 24 Febraayo sababtoo ah kor u kaca sare ee tirada kiisaska COVID-19 ee dibada mainland Shiinaha.
translated: Ururka dalalka dhoofiya shidaalka ee LOO soo gaabiyo (OPEC) ayaa lagu soo waramayaa in uu "dhaqaaqay" kaddib hoos u dhac weyn oo ku yimid qiimaha saliidda, sababo la xiriira hoos u dhaca baahida looga qabo Shiinaha.

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: 27dii Febraayo, walaaca soo kordhayaa ee laga qabo dilaacitaanka fayraska  corona, tusmooyinka saamiyada badeecada oo ay ka mid yihiin NASDAQ-100, S&P 500 index, iyo the Dow Jones Industrial Average ayaa qoraal ay qoreen ku sheegay hoos u dhacoodi ugu hooseeyay ilaa 2008, halka the Dow ay hoos ugu dhacday 1,191 dhibcood, kaas oo ah hoos u dhacii ugu weyn ee hal maalin ah ilaa qalalaasihii dhaqaale ee 2007-08.
translated: Suuqyada saamiyada adduunka ayaa hoos u dhacay 24kii Febraayo sababo la xiriira koror aad u weyn oo ku yimid tirada kiisaska COVID-19 ee ka baxsan dhulweynaha Shiinaha.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: Dhamaan saddexda tusmooyin saamiyaga badeecada ayaa isbuucan ku dhamaaday hoos u dhac ka weyn 10%.
translated: 27kii Febraayo, walaaca sii kordhaya ee ku saabsan dilaacitaanka coronavirus, calaamado kala duwan oo saamiyo ah oo Maraykan ah oo ay ku jiraan NASDAQ-100, Walaaca S & P 500, iyo Dow Jones Industrial Celceliska ayaa soo saaray hoos u dhacoodii ugu fiicnaa tan iyo 2008, iyadoo Dow ay hoos u dhacday 1,191 dhibcood, hoos u dhacii ugu weynaa hal maalin kadib dhibaatadii dhaqaale ee sanadkii 2007 ilaa 08.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: Ilaa 28 Febraayo, shirkada qiimaynta ee SCope Ratings GmbH ayaa xaqiijisay in qiimaynta madaxa banaan ee khatarta maalgashiga Shiinaha, balse waxay joogtay aragti aan fiicnayn.
translated: Dhamaan sadexda cilaamood waxay dhammaadeen toddobaadkii in ka badan 10%.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: Dhicitaanka badeecooyinka ee markale ee ku salaysan cabsida fayraska corona, hoos u dhaca ugu weyn wuxuu ahaa 16kii Maarso.
translated: 28kii Febraayo, Baaxadda Ratings GmbH waxay xaqiijisay qiimeynta amaahda ee madaxbanaanida Shiinaha, laakiin waxay sii wadeen aragti diidmo ah.

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: Dad badan ayaa u arka suurta galnimada hoos u dhac dhaqaale.
translated: Kaydka ayaa mar kale hoos u dhacay iyadoo lagu salaynayo cabsida coronavirus, hoos u dhaca ugu weynna waa 16 maarso.

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: Daqaalyahan Mohamed El-Erian ayaa mahadiyay talaabooyinka dagdag ah ee bankiga dhexe iyo kan gobolka.
translated: Qaar badan ayaa u arka dib-u-dhac dhaqan dhaqaale inuu yahay siyaado.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: Bankiyada dhexe ayaa si dhaqsa ah uga falcelinaya marka loo eego dhibaatada dhaqaale ee dhacday 2008.
translated: Dhaqaaleyahan Mohamed El-Erian ayaa amaanay tallaabooyinka deg degga ah ee bangiyada dhexe iyo kuwa ku tallaabsada xaaladda degdegga ah ee waqtiga ku habboon.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: Dalxiiska ayaa ah midka sida ugu xun loo saameeyay sababtoo ah xayiraadaha socodaaleed, xiritaanada goobaha dad weynaha oo ay kamid tahay soo jiidashooyinka socotada, iyo digniinta dawlada ee ka dhanka u safrida meel kasta oo aduunka ah.
translated: Bangiyada dhexe ayaa fal celin ka badan kii ay ku sameeyeen burburkii maaliyadeed ee 2008.dii.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: Natiijo ahaan, tiro badan oo ah shirkada diyaaradaha ayaa baajiyay duulimaadyadoodi sababtoo ah hoos u dhaca dalabka oo kamid yihiin shirkada duulimaadka ee British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, iyo Qantas, halka shirkada diyaarada goboleed ee Ingirisska ee Flybe ay buburtay.
translated: Dalxiiska ayaa ka mid ah qaybaha ugu xun ee ay saameysay oo ay sabab u tahay mamnuucidda safarada, xiritaanka goobaha dadweynaha oo ay ka mid yihiin meelaha ay dadku ku safraan, iyo talooyin ay dowladuhu ka soo jeediyaan safar kasta oo aduunka ku yaalla.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: Saamaynta ay ku leedahay shirkada safareed ee doonta ayaa ah heer aan horey waligeed loo arag.
translated: Sidaa darteed, diyaarado badan ayaa joojiyay duulimaadyadii sababo la xiriira baahida yar ee loo qabo, sida British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, iyo Qantas, halka diyaaraddaha gobolka ee Flybe ee Ingiriiska ay burburtay.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: Boostaajooyinka tareeno dhawr ah iyo doomaha  dakadda ayaa sidoo kale la xiray.
translated: Saamaynta ay ku yeelanayaan warshadaha safarada safarada ayaa ahaa mid aan horay loo arag.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: Cudurka saf-mareenka ayaa kusoo hagaagay Chunyun, xilli socodaal oo weyn oo la xiriira Fasaxyada Sanadka Cusub ee Shiinaha.
translated: Dhowr xarumood oo tareenada laga sii daayay iyo dekedaha doonta ayaa sidoo kale la xiray.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: Tiro dhacdooyin ah oo ku lug leh isu imaansho in dad badan ayaa waxaa baajiyay dawlad deegaan iyo  dawlada qaran , oo kamid yihiin xafladaha sanadlaha ah ee Sandka Cusub, iyagoo shirkadaha gaarka loo leeyahay ay xiriyaan  dukaamadooda iyo soo jiidashooyinka dalxiiska sida Hong Kong Disneyland iyo Shanghai Disneyland.
translated: Cudurka saf-mareenka ah ayaa ku soo beegamay Chunyun, oo ah xilli safar oo wayn oo la xiriira fasaxa sanadka cusub ee Shiinaha.

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: Inta badan dhacdooyinka Sanadka Cusub ee Lunar iyo soo jiidashada dalxiiska ayaa la xiray si looga hortago isu imaatinka dad badan, oo kamid yihin Forbbiden City ee Beijing iyo macbadyada dhaqanka ee macbadyada.
translated: Dhowr xafladood oo ay ka qeybgalayaan dad fara badan ayaa waxaa baajiyay maamullo qaran iyo kuwa goboleedba, oo ay ka mid yihiin xafladaha sanadka cusub ee sanadka cusub, iyada oo shirkadaha gaarka loo leeyahay ay sidoo kale si madaxbannaan u xirayaan dukaamadooda iyo goobaha dalxiiska sida Hong Kong Disneyland iyo Shanghai Disneyland.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: Gudaha 24 kamid ah 31 gobol ee Shiinaha, dawladaha hoose iyo gobplada, madaxda ayaa kordhiyay Fasaxa Sanadka Cusub ilaa 10 Febraayo, ayagoo ku amray inta badan goobaha shaqada in aan dib loo furin ilaa taariikdaas.
translated: Inta badan xafladaha sannadka cusub ee Lunaar iyo goobaha dalxiiska ayaa la xiray si looga hortago kulamada ballaaran, oo ay ku jiraan magaalada mamnuucay ee Beijing iyo carwooyinka macbudyada dhaqanka.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: Goboladan ayaa ahaa kuwa matala 80% wax soo saarka gudaha ee wadanka iyo 90% wax soo dhoofinada.
translated: 24 ka mid ah 31-ka gobol ee Shiinaha, degmooyinka iyo gobollada, maamulada ayaa fasaxa sanadka cusub u kordhiyay 10ka Febraayo, iyagoo faray inta badan goobaha shaqada in aan dib loo furin ilaa iyo taariikhdaas.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: Hong Kong aya kor ugu qaaday heerkeeda ka jawaab celineed eecudurka faafa midkii ugu sareeyay iyadoo ku dhawaaqday xaalad dagdag ah, xiritaanka dugsiyada ilaa Maarso iyo baajitaanka dabaal dagyada Sanadka Cusub. Waaxda tafaariiqlayda ayaa la saameeyay aduunka oo dhan,  iyadoo leh hoos u dhaca saacadaha shaqada bakhaarada iyo xiritaano ku meel-gaar ah
translated: Goboladan waxay ka dhigan yihiin 80% GDP-da dalka iyo 90% dhoofka.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: Booqashooyinka tafaariiqlayda ee Yurub iyo Latin America ayaa hoos u dhacay ilaa 40%.
translated: Hong Kong ayaa kor u qaaday heerkii ay ka falcelinaysay cudurada faafa ilaa heerkii ugu sareeyay waxayna ku dhawaaqday inay tahay xaalad deg deg ah, iyadoo xirtay iskuulada illaa iyo Maarso, iyadoo la kansalaamisay dabaaldegyada sanadka cusub. Qaybta tafaariiqda ayaa saamayn ku yeeshay dunida oo dhan, iyadoo dukaanka laga yareeyay saacadaha ama xiritaanka ku meel gaarka ah.

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: Tafaariiqlayda Waqooyiga Maraykanka iyo Bariga Dhexe ayaa arkay hoos u dhac ah 50-60%.
translated: Tafaariiqleyda tafaariiqda ee Yurub iyo Laatiin America ayaa hoos u dhacay 40%.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: Tan sidoo kale waxaa ka dhashay 33-43% oo ah hoos  dhaca saxmada goobaha dukaamaysiga  ee Maarso marka loo eego Febraayo.
translated: Tafaariiqleyaasha waqooyiga Ameerika iyo Bariga Dhexe ayaa arkay hoos u dhaca 50-60%.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: Dadka ka hawl gala goobaha dukaamaysiga ee aduunka oo dhan ayaa lagu soo rogay talaabooyin dheeraad ah, sida nadaafada oo kor loo qaado, soo rakibashada cabiraha heer kulka si  loo hubiyo heer kulka dukaamaytayaasha, iyo baajinta madasha dhacdooyinka. Sida laga soo xigtay qiyaasta Gudiga Dhaqaalaha ee Qaramada Midoowday ee Latin America, in cudurka caalamiga ah uu sababay hoos u dhac dhaqaale kaas oo kagatay in u dhaxaysa 14 iyo 22 milyan oo qof in ay ku jiran saboolnimo aad u hooseysa gudaha Latin America marka loo eego xaaladaha ay ku sugnaan lahaayeen la'aanta cudurka caalamiga ah.
translated: Tani waxay sidoo kale keentay in 33 ilaa 43% ay hoos u dhacdo gaadiidka lugaha ee xarumaha dukaamada bishii Maarso marka la barbar dhigo Febraayo.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: Bartamihii Janaayo iyo Febraayo, inta lagu jiray kor kaca cudurka saf-mareenka ah ee gudaha Wuhan, ku dhawaad 5 milyan oo qod oo Shiina jooga ayaa waayay shaqooyinkoodi.
translated: ["Ganacsadeyaasha ganacsiga ee adduunka ku yaalla ayaa ku soo rogay tallaabooyin dheeraad ah, nadafi-takoorka kor u kacay, rakibaadda qalabka isku shaandhaynta kulul si loo hubiyo heerkulka dukaamada, iyo in la baabi'iyo dhacdooyinka. Sida laga soo xigtay qiyaasta Guddiga Dhaqaalaha ee Qaramada Midoobay u qaabilsan Latin America, dib-u-dhaca uu sababay cudurka safmareenka ah ayaa sababi kara inta u dhaxaysa 14 ilaa 22 milyan oo qof oo ku jira faqri aad u daran gudaha Laatiin Ameerika intii uu ku dhici lahaa xaaladdaas iyada oo aan la haysan cudurka safmareenka ah."]

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: Inta badan ku dhawaad 300 oo ah shaqaalaha Shiinaha ee baadiyaha kasoo haajiray ayaa lagu xayiray gurhaya gobolada inland ama ku xayiran gobolka Hubei. Bartamihii Maarso 2020, in ka badan 10 milyan oo Maraykan ah ayaa waayay shaqooyinkoodi codsadayna kaalmo dawladeed.
translated: Janaayo iyo Febraayo 2020, xilligii uu sii kordhayay cudurka safmarka ah ee Wuhan, ilaa 5 milyan oo qof oo Shiinaha ah ayaa waayay shaqadoodii.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: Dilaacida fayraska corona ayaa galaafan kara 47 milyan oo shaqa gudaha Maraykan iyo heerka shaqaalaysiin la'aanta oo gaari kara 32%, sida laga soo xigtay qiyastiiBankiga Federal Reserve Bank ee St. Louis. Xayiraadaha Hindiya ayaa ka dhigay tobanaan milyan oo ah shaqaalaha soo haajiray (kuwaas oo la siiyo mushahar maalinla ah)kuwa shaqa la'aan ah. Baadhitaanka guud ee Machadka Angus Reid ayaa heshay in 44% qoysaska Kanada u dhashay  ayaa la kulmay noocyo shaqo la'aan ah.Ku dhawaad 900,000 oo shaqaale ayaa waayay shaqadoodi gudaha Spain ilaa intii ay xayiraada gashay bartamihii Maarso 2020.
translated: Qaar badan oo ka mid ah ku dhawaad 300 milyan oo shaqaalaha muhaajiriinta miyiga ah ee Shiinaha ayaa ku xayirmay guryahooda oo ku sugan gobollada gudaha ama ku xayirmay gobolka Hubei. Bishii Maarso 2020, in ka badan 10 milyan oo Maraykan ah ayaa shaqadoodii waayay, waxayna codsadeen in dowladda gargaar loo geeyo.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: Inta lagu jiray nuskii labaad ee Maarso, 4 milyan oo ah shaqaala faransiis ah ayaa codsaday si ku meel gaar ah kaalmada shaqa la'aan iyo 1 oo ah shaqaala  British ah ayaa codsaday mashruuca kaalmo da caanka ah. Ku dhawaad nus milyan shikradood oo ku yaala Jarmalka ayaa u diray shaqaalohooda qorshaha shaqaynta ee ay dawlada kabto ee mudada gaaban ee loo yaqaan Kurzarbeit.
translated: ["Dilaacitaanka coronavirus waxaa ku kici kara 47 milyan oo shaqo oo Maraykanka ah, heerka shaqo la'aantuna waxay ku dhufan kartaa 32 boqolkiiba, marka loo eego qiyaasaha uu sameeyay Bangiga Kaydka Federaalka ee St. Louis.Xayiraadda Hindiya ayaa shaqo la'aan ku reebtay tobanaan milyan oo shaqaale muhaajiriin ah oo Hindiya u shaqeeya (oo mushaar maalin walba lagu siiyaa). Daraasaddan oo laga sameeyay machadka Angus Reid Institute ayaa lagu ogaaday in 44% qoysaska reer Kanada ay la kulmeen noocoo shaqo la'aan ah. Ku dhawaad 900,000 oo shaqaale ah ayaa waayay shaqadoodii Isbaaniga tan iyo markii xanibaad la soo rogay bartamihii bishii Maarso 2020."]

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: Qorshaha magdhaw ee shaqaynta mudada-kooban ee jarmalka ayaa waxaa qaatay Faransiiska iyo Ingiriiska.
translated: ["Intii lagu guda jiray qeybtii labaad ee Maarso, 4 milyan oo shaqaale Faransiis ah ayaa dalbaday kaalmooyinka shaqo la'aanta ku meel gaarka ah iyo 1 milyan oo shaqaale Ingriis ah oo dalbaday qorshe guud oo ah daynta. Ku dhawaad nus milyan shirkadood oo Jarmalka ku yaalla ayaa shaqaalahooda u diray nidaam ay dawladdu taakulaysay oo muddo gaaban shaqaysay oo loo yaqaano Kurzarbeit."]

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: BQaybta bandhigyada Faneedka iyo dhaxalka dhaqan ahaaneed ayaa si weyn waxaa u saameeyay cudurka caalamiga ah, iyadoo saamaynaysa hawlaha ururada iyo sidoo kale kuwa shaqsi ahaaneed-kuwa shaqaalaha ah iyo kuwa iskood ushaqaysta labadada-aduunka oo dhan.
translated: Qorshaha xilliga gaaban ee magdhowga shaqo ee Jarmalka waxaa qaatay Faransiiska iyo Britain.

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: Ururada qaybta farshaxanka gacan ahaaneed iyo dhaqanka ayaa isku dayay in ay taageeraan himiladooda (badanaa bulshadu maalgaliso) si ay u bixiyaan helitaanka dhaxal dhaqaan ahaaneed ee bushada, joogtaynta badqabka shaqaaleheeda iyo bulshada, oo ay taageeraan farshaxaniistayaasha meesha macquul ah.
translated: ["Waxqabadka farshaxanka iyo qaybaha dhaqanka ee dhaxalka ayaa waxaa si qoto dheer u saameeyay cudurka caalamiga ah, taas oo saameyn ku yeelatay hawlaha hay'adaha iyo sidoo kale shakhsiyaad-shaqaalaysiiyey iyo kuwo madax-bannaan oo caalami ah."]

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: Dhamaadkii Maarso 2020, dhamaan aduunka oo u kala duwan heerarka, matxafyada, maktabadaha, goobaha xafladaha lagu qabto, iyo macaahid dhaqanta ayaa si aan xadidnaynu xiray bandhigyadoodi, dhacdooyinkoodi iyo xafladahoodii baajiyay ama dib u dhigay.
translated: Ururada qaybta farshaxanka iyo dhaqanka waxay isku dayeen inay ilaaliyaan hawlgalkooda (inta badan maalgelinta guud) si ay u siiyaan helitaanka dhaxalka dhaqanka bulshada, ilaalinta ammaanka shaqaalahooda iyo dadweynahaba, iyo inay taageeraan farshaxanka haddii ay suurtagal tahay.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: Si jawaab celin ahaan ah waxaa jiray dadaal weyn oo lagu bixinayay adeeg badal ah ayadoo loo marayo madalo dijitaal ah. Waxyaabo kale oo hada si xawli ah ko ugu qaadaya  dhibaatada cudurka waa baajinta adeegyo diimeedka, dhacdooyinka waaweyn ee isboortiga , iyo kuwa kale oo ah dhacdooyin dhaqan ahaaneed, sida xafladaha muusiga iyo riwaayadaha, shirarka tiknoolajiyada, iyo bandhigyada faashoon ka.
translated: ["Maarso 2020, guud ahaan dunida oo dhan iyo heerarar kala duwan, matxafyo, maktabado, goobo waxqabad, iyo hay'ado dhaqameedyo kale ayaa lasoo xiray waqti aan la cayimin iyadoo bandhigyadooda, dhacdooyinkooda iyo bandhigyadoodii dib loo dhigay."]

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: Shirkada filim duubista ayaa sidoo kale la kulantay dhibaato, Vatican ka ayaa ku dhawaaqay xafladaha Isbuuca Barakaysan ee gudaha Roma, kaas oo dhacayay isbuucii lasoo dhaafay ee xilliga tawbad keenka Kiristaanka ee Lent, ayaa la baajiyay.
translated: Iyada oo laga jawaabayay waxaa jiray dadaallo xooggan oo lagu bixinayey adeegyo kale iyada oo loo marayo dhufto dijital ah. Waxaa kale oo ugu dambeeyey oo si xawli ah u soo dedejiyay dib-u-dhaca cudurka waa joojinta adeegyadii diinta, dhacdooyinkii waawayn ee ciyaaraha, iyo dhacdooyinkii kale ee bulshada, sida xafladaha muusikada iyo riwaayadaha, shirarka tiknoolajiyada, iyo bandhigyada dharka.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: Hoogamiyaal kinasaadeed oo badan ayaa soo jeediyay in dadka Kiristaanka ah  ee da'da ah ay guryahooda joogaan inta ay soo xaadiri lahaayeenDabaal daga Axada; kiniisadaha qaaar ayaa adeegoda laga heli karaa raadyaha, qadka tooska ah ee online ka ama telefeeshin halka kuwa kale ay bixinayaan cibaadada iyagoo gaariga ku dhex jira.
translated: Wershada filimada ayaa sidoo kale la kulantay carqaladeynta. Vatican-ka ayaa ku dhawaaqay in la baajiyay xafladaha toddobaadka quduuska ah ee Rome, oo dhaca toddobaadkii ugu dambeeyay ee xilliga gurmadka kirishtaanka ee deyman.

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: Iyadoo Hogaamiyaha Kiinasada Catholica Roma ee reer Rome ay xirayaan kinasadaheeda iyo macbadyada oo ay xujayda Kiristaanku faaruqiyeen St.Peter's Square,  dadyawga diimaha kale ayaa sidoo kale baajiyay adeegyada oo xadiday  isu imaatanka dadweyne ee kiniisadaha, masaajida, macbadyada dadka yahuuda, macbadyada kiniisadaha iyo goobaha cibaadada ee gurdwara.
translated: Wadaadada in badan ayaa ku taliyay Masiixiyiinta waayeelka ah in ay guriga joogaan halkii ay ka qayb gali lahaayeen Masaajidka Axadaha; Qaar ka mid ah kaniisadaha ayaa kaniisadaha ka dhigay adeegyada la heli karo iyada oo loo marayo raadiyaha, tooska tooska ah ama telefishinka internetka halka kuwa kalena ay bixiyaan cibaadada baabuur-ku-xiridda.

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: Wasaarada Caafimaadka ee Iran ayaa ku dhawaqday baajinta salaada jimcaha ee goobaha uu saameeyay dilaacitaanka iyo goobaha barakaysan ayaa mar danbe la xiray, halka  Sacuudi Caribiya ay mamnuucday soo galitaanka xujayda shisheeyaha ah sido kale kuwa dalkeeda ee goobaha barakaysan ee Maka iyo Madina.
translated: ["Iyada oo wadaadada Kuliyada Catholic ee Rome ay xirmeen kaniisadaha iyo kaniisadaha st. Peter's Square oo ka madhan xajka Kiristaanka, hay'adaha kale ee diinta ayaa sidoo kale joojiyay adeegyada iyo kulamada dadweynaha ee kulmay kaniisadaha, masaajidda, masaajiddada, macbadyada iyo gurdwaras."]

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: Xanuunkan safmarka waxa uu keenay khalkhalkii ugu badnaa ee soo gala abid ciyaaraha ilaa Dagaalkii Labaad ee Adduunka.
translated: Wasaaradda caafimaadka ee Iran ayaa ku dhawaaqday in la baajiyay salaadii Jimcaha ee goobaha uu saameeyay dilaacitaanka iyo kabaha cibaadada oo markii dambe la xiray, iyadoo sucuudiga uu mamnuucay in xujaajta ajnabiga ah iyo sidoo kale dadka ku dhaqan ay galaan goobaha barakeysan ee magaaladda Makka iyo Madiina.

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: Munaasabada isboortiga ugu waawayn ayaa la baajiyay ama dib loo dhigay, oo ay   Euro 2020, xiliyeedka 2019-20 NBA, iyo xiliyeedka 2019-20 NHL. ku jiraan 2019-20 EUFA Champions League, 2019-20 Premier Leage, UEFA Euro
translated: Cudurka safmarka ah ayaa sababay carqaladeynta ugu weyn ee cayaaraha adduunka oo dhan ah tan iyo dagaalkii labaad ee adduunka.

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: Xanuunka safmarka ahi waxa uu khalkhaliyay qorshihii Olombiga Xagaaga 2020, kaas oo marka hore qorshaysnaa in uu bilaabmo dhamaadka Juulay; Gudida Olobiga Caalamiga ah waxa ay bayaamiyeen in 24 Maarso in munaasabda la qaban doono "wixii ka danbeeya 2020 laakiin aan ka danbaynin xagaaga 2021". Khamaarka iyo wixii kale ee madal caalami ah ayaa la xidhay calaamka oo dhan sidoo kale tartamadii turubka caalamiga ahaa ayaa dib loo dhigay ama la xidhay.
translated: Inta badan dhacdooyinka waaweyn ee cayaaraha ayaa la joojiyay ama dib loo dhigay, waxaana ka mid ah 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, Premier League 2019–20, UEFA Euro 2020, xilli ciyaareedka 2019–20 NBA, iyo xilli ciyaareedka 2019 ilaa 20 NHL.

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: Tani waxa ay horseeday in dad badan oo khamaari jiay ay online u wareegaan, taas oo websaytyo badan oo khamaar ay sheegeen in si wayn uu dakhligoodu kor ugu kacay ee dadka cusub ee isduwaan gelinaya. Waaxda madadaalada ayaa sidoo kale ay saamaysay, taas oo kooxo kala duwan ay joojiyeen ama ay hakiyeen bandhig faneedyadadoodii.
translated: Dilaacista ayaa carqaladeeyay qorshayaasha ciyaaraha olimbikada ee 2020ka, kuwaas oo markii hore la qorsheeyay in la bilaabo dhammaadka July; Guddiga Ciyaaraha Olombikada Adduunka ayaa ku dhawaaqay 24kii Maarso in dhacdada "dib loo dhigi doono taariikh ka baxsan 2020 balse aan ka dambayn xagaaga 2021". Casinos iyo goobaha kale ee ciyaaraha adduunka oo dhan ayaa xirmay iyo tartamada duufaan live duuban ayaa la dib u dhigay ama la joojiyay.

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: Tiyaataro waawayn sida Broadway ayaa sidoo kale hakiyay dhamaan bandhigyadii.
translated: Tani waxay keentay in khamaarayaasha badani ay u guuraan khamaarayaasha online, iyada oo dad badan oo internetka ah oo ku yaalla khamaarka ay soo sheegeen koror weyn oo heerarkooda cusub ee calaamadaha cusub. Madadaalada ayaa sidoo kale saameysay, iyada oo kooxaha kala duwan ee muusikada ay hakiyeen ama joojiyeen booqashada riwaayadaha.

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: Farshaxanada qaar ayaa eegaya qaab loosii wado karo soo saarka iyo sidii ay waxa ay soo saaraan usoo gelin lahaayeen internetka taas oo ah markaa qaab kale oo wax loogusoo bandhigo si toos ah, sida baahinta tooska ah ee bandhigyada ama in la sameeyo "badaal dagyo" farshaxan oo online ah, lagu qaybiyo oo markaa ay ku daabacaan waxa ay soo saareen.
translated: Sidoo kale dhammaanba tiyaatarada waaweyn sida kuwa broadway ka dhaca ayaa joojiyey dhammaanba tiyaatarada waaweyn.

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: Online ahaan, barnaamijyo badan oo coronavirus ah ayaa Internetka lagu baahiyay kuwaas oo kaftan ah oo sheegaya waxa aan la hubin.
translated: Qaar ka mid ah farshaxannada ayaa sahamiyay habab ay u sii wadaan in ay soo saaraan oo ay wadaagaan shaqada internetka oo ah mid kale oo ah waxqabadka nool ee dhaqameed dhaqameedka, sida riwaayadaha streaming live ama abuurista "iidaha internetka ku salaysan" si farshaxan-yadu u qabtaan, u qaybiyaan, iyo shaaciyaan shaqadooda.

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: Ilaa intii uu bilaabmay safmarka COVID-19, nacayb, faquuq iyo midab takoor badan ayaa lagula kacay dadka Jayniiska ah iyo kuwa kasoo jeeda Bariga Aasiya, iyo dadka ka imanaya Yurub, Maraykanka iyo dalalka kale.
translated: Khadka tooska ah, maaddooyinka internetka ee ku saabsan coronavirus badan ayaa ku faafay qosol iyo kala fogaansho iyadoo aan la hubin.

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: Dhacdooyinka baqida, shakiga, iyo dagaalka ayaa lagu arkay dalal badan, oo ay ku jiraan Yurub, Galbeedka Aasiya, Waqooyiga Maraykanka iyo deegaanka Aasiya Basifig.
translated: ["Tan iyo markii uu dillaacay COVID-19, waxaa sii kordhaya eexasho la'aanta, nacaybka ajnabiga, iyo midab takoorka ayaa la xusay in loola jeedo dadka ka soo jeeda shiinaha iyo bariga Aasiya, iyo dadka ka soo jeeda goobaha kulkulanka ee Yurub, Mareykanka iyo wadamo kale."]

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: Warbixinaha soo baxayay Febraayo (markaas oo badanaa kiisaska la xaqiijinayay Jayna) waxa lagu sheegey waxyaabayo haybsooc ah oo markaa kooxo kala duwan ay kula kacayeen caalamka oo dhan Jayniiska kuwaas oo samaynayay wax ay ku sheegeen inay u qalmaan.
translated: Dhacdooyinka cabsida, shakiga, iyo colaadda ayaa laga arkay dalal badan, gaar ahaan Yurub, Bariga Aasiya, Waqooyiga Ameerika, iyo gobolka Asia-Pacific.

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: Dalalka qaar ku yaala Afrika ayaa lagu arkay nacaybka Jayniiska.
translated: Warbixinada laga soo bilaabo bishii Febraayo (markii kiisaska intooda badan wali ku kooban yihiin Shiinaha) ayaa diiwaan galiyay caaddil cunsuriyad ah oo lagu muujiyay kooxo kala duwan oo caalamka ah oo ay ka mid yihiin dadka Shiinaha ah ee mudan fayraska ama la helo wixii la sheegay in ay yihiin aargudasho sax ah.

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: Dad badan oo degan Wuhan iyo Hubei waxa ay sheekeen in lagu takooray meesha ay ka yimaadeen.
translated: Qaar ka mid ah dalalka Qaaradda Afrika ayaa sidoo kale waxaa kor u kacay dareenka ka dhanka ah Shiinaha.

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: Waxaa jira taageero loo muujiyay Jayniiska, onlineahaan iyo offlineahaan, iyo meelaha uu ku habsaday fayrusku.
translated: Dad badan oo deggan Wuhan iyo Hubei ayaa soo sheegay takoor ku saleysan asal ahaan gobolka.

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: Kadib markii uu dalal cusub gaadhay safmarku, dadka Talyaaniga, dalkii ugu horeeyay Yurub ee lagu arko safmar aad u daran oo COVID-19 ah waxaa sidoo kale laga shakisan yahay in lagu eego il shakiyo iyo fogayn ah. Dadka u dhashay dalalka Maleeshiya, Niyuusilan, Singaaboor, iyo Koonfurka Kuuriya ayaa saxeexay olole ay ku doonayaan inay ku mamnuucaan Jayniiska inayna soo gelin dalkooda si markaa loo joojiyo faafitaanka xanuunka.
translated: ["Waxaa jirtay taageero shiinaysku, gudaha iyo kuwa ka baxsanba, iyo kuwa ku nool meelaha uu fayruusku ka ba'ay."]

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: Jabaan, hashtaaga #ChineseDontComeToJapan ayaa ka socda Twitter-ka.
translated: Ka dib markii uu ku sii faafay dalalka cusub ee kulkulku kulmay, dadka ka yimid Talyaaniga oo ah wadankii ugu horreeyay ee Yurub oo la kulma dilaac halis ah oo COVID-19, ayaa sidoo kale laga shakiyi karaa iyo nacaybka ajaanibta. Muwaadiniin ku sugan dalal ay ka mid yihiin Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore iyo South Korea ayaa horey u saxiixay codsiyo ay u ololeynayaan in laga mamnuuco in dadka Shiinaha ah ay dalalkooda soo galaan iyagoo doonaya inay ka hor tagaan cudurka.

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: Dadka Jayniiska ah iyo sidoo kale Aasiyaanka kale ee Ingiriiska iyo Maraykanka jooga ayaa sidoo kael sheegey inay korodhay tacadiga midab takoorka, iyo sidoo kale cayda lagula kacayaayi.
translated: Dalka Japan, hashtag-ku #ChineseDontComeToJapan ayaa isbeddeshay barta Twitter-ka.

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: Madaxwaynaha Maraykanka Donald Trump ayaa lagu dhaleeceeyay inuu coronavirus-ka ugu yeedhey "Fayrus Jayniis ah", kalmad ay dadka qaar u arkaan inuu yahay midab takoor iyo inay lidi ku tahay Jayniiska.
translated: Dadka Shiinaha iyo waliba dadka kale ee Asia ee ku nool Boqortooyada Ingiriiska iyo Maraykanka ayaa soo waramay in ay sii kordhayaan heerarka xad-gudubka cunsuriyadda, iyo sidoo kale weerarro lala belaayo.

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: Dadka mudaharaayaya oo ku sugnaa Yukrayn ayaa weeraray basas sida dadka reer Yukrayn ah iyo ajaanib markaa laga keeney Wuhan oo la keeney Novi Sanzhary.
translated: Madaxweynaha Maraykanka Donald Trump ayaa wajahay eedaymo ah inuu ku tilmaamay coronavirus-ka "Fayras-ka Shiinaha", oo ah erey ay dadka naqdiya u arkeen inuu yahay cunsurinimo iyo kuwa ka soo horjeedo Shiinaha.

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: Arday ka timid Waqooyibadi Hindiya, kaas oo ku yaala tuduuda Jayna, iyo dadka wax ka barta magaalooyinka waawayn ee Hindiya ee ayaa la sheegey in lagula kacay tacadiyo la xidhiidha safmarka coronavirus.
translated: Dibadbaxayaasha dalka Ukraine ayaa weeraray basas ay saarnaayeen ukraine iyo dad shisheeye ah oo laga soo daad gureeyay Wuhan loona kaxeeyay Novi Sanzhary.

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Bharatiya Janata Xisbiga Madaxwnihiisa Gobolka Galbeedka Bengal Dilip Ghosh waxa uu sheegey in Jayniisku ay burburiyeen noloshii dabiiciga ahayn oo "ay tahay sababta Illaahay uu uga aargoosanayo."
translated: Ardayda ka timaada Waqooyi Bari Hindiya, ee xuduudda la wadaagta Shiinaha, waxna ka barta magaalooyinka waaweyn ee Hindiya ayaa lagu soo waramayaa in ay la kulmeen dhibaatooyin la xiriira dilaacitaanka coronavirus.

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: Weedhaas waxaa markii danbe dhaleeceeyay qunsuliyada Jayniiska ee Kolkata, taas oo ugu yeedhey "khalad". Jayna, waxaa nacayb iyo takoor lagula kacay dadka aan u dhalan Jayna taas oo markaa uu safmarku uu keeney, waxaana lagu sheegey dadka ajaanibka ah "baco qashin" oo waxaa ay tahay in lagu bartilmeedsado "in la daadiyo".
translated: Madaxweynaha u qaybsan dowladda ee Xisbiga Bharatiya Janata ee Galbeedka Bengal Dilip Ghosh ayaa sheegay in Shiinaha uu burburiyey dabeecadda, "taasina waa sababta uu Ilaah ugu aargudey iyaga."

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: Wargaysyada qaybaha la iibsado ayaa ka saaray qaar kamid ah ama dhamaan wararka coronavirus.
translated: Hadalkaas ayaa markii dambe waxaa cambaareeyay qunsuliyadda Shiinaha ee Kolkata, oo ay ugu yeertay "khalad". Shiinaha, nacaybka ajaanibka iyo cunsuriyada mar labaad dadka aan Shiinaha degganayn ayaa faafay cudurka safmarka ah, iyadoo dadka ajaanibta ah lagu tilmaamay "qashin shisheeye" oo lala beegsanayo "in la tuuro".

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: Saynisyahanada qaar ayaa baahiyay warbixin saynis ah oo markaa la xidhiidha helitaanka oo furan.
translated: Wargeysyo badan oo leh alaabo lacag bixin ah ayaa ka soo saaray qaar ka mid ah ama dhammaan baahiyaashooda coronavirus.

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: Saynisyahanada qaar ayaa doortay inay wadaagaan natiijadooda degdeg ah oo sarfarada marka hore la daabacay kuwaas oo ah bioRxiv.
translated: Qaar badan oo saynisyahano ah ayaa sameeyay waraaqo cilmiyeed la xiriira cudurka dillaacay oo la heli karo iyada oo ay furan tahay.

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: Xanuunada soo baxaya - Xanuunada caabuqa ee safmarka soo baxyaa, badanaa novelka ee sarmarku inta uu ka kooban yahay ama qaabka gudbinta.
translated: Qaar ka mid ah saynisyahannada ayaa doortay in ay natiijadooda si dhakhso ah u wadaagaan server-yada ka hor-tagga qalabka daabacaadda sida bioRxiv.

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: Golobaalisashinka iyo xanuunka - Guudmarka golobaalisashinka iyo isku gudbinta xanuunka
translated: Cudurka faafa oo soo baxaya - cudurada faafa ee jeermiska oo soo ifbaxaya, badanaaba aan caadi ahayn marka uu dilaaco ama qaabka gudbinta

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: Liiska safmarka iyo xanuunada - Liiska tirada dadka ku dhimatay caabuqa xanuunka dartiis
translated: Caalamiyaynta iyo cudurka - Liiska caalamiyaynta iyo gudbinta cudurka

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: Kontorobaaninka duurjoogta iyo xanuunka suunoosis - Khatar caafimaad oo la xidhiidha ka ganacsiga duur joogta aan carbisnayn
translated: Liiska safmareenada iyo cudurka safmareenka ah – Liiska tirada dhimashada ee ka dhalatay cudurada faafa

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: Shaybaadhka xanuunka coronavirus ee neefsiga 2019 (COVID-19) iyo xidhiidhka uu la leeyahay faryuska SARS-CoV-2 oo ay ku jiraan qaabka loo ogaan jiro inuu qofku qabo iyo kuwa lagu ogaado jiritaanka antiboodhiga kaas oo markaa jawaab u ah caabuqa.
translated: Tahriibinta duurjoogta iyo cudurada duur joogta ah – Khataraha caafimaad ee la xiriira ka ganacsiga duur joogta qalaad

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: Ka helitaanka fayruska muunadu ee uu xaqiijiyay RT-PCR, kaas oo markaa la socda RNA-ga coronavirus.
translated: Baarista shaybaarka ee cudurka coronavirus ee neef-mareenka ee 2019 (COVID-19) iyo fayraska SARS-CoV-2 ee la xiriira waxaa ka mid ah qaabab lagu ogaanayo jiritaanka fayraska iyo kuwa ogaada anti-boodhiyada la sameeyay ee ka jawaaba caabuqa.

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: Shaybaadhku waa gaar oo waxaa loogu talo geley in lagu ogaado RNA-ga SARS-CoV-2 fayruska ah.
translated: Jiritaanka fayruusyada sambalada waxaa xaqiijiyay RT-PCR, kaas oo laga ogaado RNA-da coronavirus.

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Waxaa loo isticmaalaa in lagu xaqiijiyo caabuqa dhawaa ama jira.
translated: Baaritaankaani waa mid khaas ah oo loogu talagalay in lagu ogaado kaliya RNA-da fayraska SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: Ogaanshaha antiboodhiga (serogly) waxaa loo isticmaali karaa shaybaadhka iyo la socodka shacabka.
translated: Waxaa loo isticmaalaa in lagu xaqiijiyo caabuqyada dhawaanahan ama firfircoon.

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: Shaybaadhka antiboodhigu waxa uu muujinayaa tirada dadka ee qaba xanuunka, oo ay ku jiraan dadka calaamadahoodu aad u yar yihiin oo aan la sheegin ama kuwa qaba calaamadaha.
translated: Ogaanshaha anti-boodhiyada (serology) ayaa loo isticmaali karaa baaritaanka iyo ilaalinta dadweynaha labadaba.

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: Xadiga uu xanuunku wax ku dilo oo sax ah iyo heerka la falgalka difaaca ee shacabka waxaa lagu ogaan karaa shaybaadhkan.
translated: Baaritaanada anti-boodhiga (anti-body tests) waxay muujineysaa tirada dadka uu ku dhacey cudurka, oo ay ku jiraan kuwa ay calaamadihiisu aad u yaraayeen oo laga soo sheegi karo ama aan calaamadaha lagu muujin karo.

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: Maadaama oo uu xadidan yahay shaybaadhku, laga bilaabo Maaro 2020 ma jirin dal hayay macluumaad lagu kalsoonaan karo oo lagaga hortago fayruska shacabkooda.
translated: ["Qiyaasta dhimashada ee saxda ah ee cudurka iyo heerka difaaca xoolaha ee dadweynaha ayaa lagu go'aamin karaa natiijooyinka baaritaankan."]

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: Maarso 23, ma jirin wax dal ah oo markaa shaybaadhay 3% shacabkiida, oo waxaa jira farqi wayn oo u dhaxeeya tirada shaybaadhka ee ay dalalku sameeyeen.
translated: Sababo la xiriira baaritaanka oo kooban, laga soo bilaabo Maarso 2020 majirin dalalku aysan haysan xog lagu kalsoonaan karo oo ku saabsan baahsanaanta fayraska ee dadkooda.

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: Kala duwanaanshahan waxay u badan tahay inay ka muuqato kiisaska sii badanaya ee xadiga dhimashada, taas oo ay u badan tahay in tirada saadaasha ah aad u badan doonto dalalka qaar.
translated: 23kii Maarso, ma jirin waddan laga baaray in ka badan 3% dadkooda, kala duwanaansho ballaaran ayaa jira inta baaris ee laga sameeyay dalalka oo dhan.

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: Iyada oo la isticmaalayo jawaabta silsilida ee polymerase qoraalka ah (rRT-PCR) shaybaadhka oo lagu samaynayo muunada neefsiga ee laga heley qaababka kala duwan, oo ay ku jiraan muunada duufka ama muunada dheecaanka.
translated: Isbeddelkan ayaa sidoo kale laga yaabaa inuu si weyn u saameeyo heerarka dhimashada kiisaska la soo sheegay, kuwaas oo ay u badan tahay in si weyn loo qiyaasay dalalka qaar.

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: Natiijada caadiyan waxa alagu helaa dhawr saacadood ilaa 2 maalmood.
translated: Isticmaalka reverse-waqtiga dhabta ah ee reverse reaction silsilad polymerase reverse (rRT-PCR) baaritaanka waxaa lagu samayn karaa tijaabooyinka neef-mareenka ee lagu helo habab kala duwan, oo ay ku jiraan dheecaanka sanka ama muunad sputum.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: Shaybaadhka RT-PCR waxaa lagu sameeyo muunada cunada laga qaaday taas oo kaliya lagu kasoonaan karo todobaadka kowaad ee xanuunka.
translated: Natiijooyinka waxaa badanaa la heli karaa dhawr saacadood ilaa maalmaha 2.

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: Marka uu fayrusku uu baaho waxa uu kasoo bixiya cunaha inta uu kusii tarmayo sanbabka.
translated: Baadhitaanka RT-PCR ee lagu sameeyo dhuunta dhuunta waa mid lagu kalsoonaan karo kaliya todobaadka ugu horreeya cudurka.

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: Shaybaadhka lagu sameeyay dadka qaba todobaadka labaad, agabka muunada kale ee markaa laga qaaday hawo mareenka gudihiisa iyada oo markaa nuugaya katiitarka ama waxa ay soo qufacaan (dheecaanka) ayaa loo isticmaali karaa.
translated: ["Xaga dambe ee feyruusku wuu baaba'i karaa dhuunta, inta uu ku sii tarmayo wadnaha."]

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: Mid kamid ah shaybaadhadii ugu horeeyay ee PCR ay samaysay ee Charite ee Barlin Janaayo 2020 iyada oo isticmaalaysa jawaab celinta silsiliyada polymerase qoraalka ah oo markaa dib loo celiyay (rRT-PCP), oo looga duulay 250,000 bushqadood oo markaa loo qaybiyay Hay'ad Caafimaadka Adduunka (WHO).
translated: Waayo, dadka qaba cudurka laga baaray toddobaadka labaad, waxyaabo kale oo tijaabada ah ayaa markaa laga soo saari karaa ansixinta neef-mareenka qoto dheer iyadoo la adeegsanayo kateetarka nuugista ama qufacidda maadada (sputum) ayaa la isticmaali karaa.

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: Ingiriisku waxa uu sameeyay sidoo kale shaybaadh 23 Janaayo 2020. Shirkada Koofurta Kuuriya ee Kogenebiotech waxa ay samaysay heer caafimaad, bushqad lagula soconayo SARS-CoV-2 oo markaa ku salaysan PCR (PowerCheck Coronavirus) 28 Janaayo 2020.
translated: ["Mid ka mid ah baaritaannadii hore ee PCR-ga ayaa laga sameeyay Charité ee berlin Janaayo 2020 iyadoo la adeegsanayo waqtiga dhabta ah ee dib-u-dhaca ee dib-u-dhaca silsiladda polymerase (rRT-PCR), waxaana la sameeyay aasaaskii 250,000 oo xirmo si ay u qaybiso Hay'adda Caafimaadka Adduunka (WHO)."]

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: Waxa lagu eegey hide sidaha "E" ee markaa ay wadaagaan coronavirusyadu, iyo hide sidaha RdRp oo u gaar ah SARS-CoV-2. Jayna, Kooxda BGI ayaa kamid ah shirkadaha ugu horeeyay ee heley ansixinta jawaab celinta xaalada degdeg ah ee Maamulka Laabaadka Caafimaadka Qaran ee Jayna bushqada lagula soconayo SARS-CoV-2 ee ku salaysan PCR. Maraykanka, Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo Kahortaga Xanuunada (CDC) ayaa u qaybisay shaybaadhada caafimaadka Baanada Shaybaadhak RT-PCR Isla Markaas 2019 ee Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) oo marka Khayraadkeeda Jawaabta Caalami.
translated: Boqortooyada Ingiriiska waxay sidoo kale samaysay tijaabo 23 Janaayo 2020. Shirkadda Kogenebiotech ee Kogenebiotech ayaa samaysay darajo caafimaad, qalabka baadhitaanka SARS-CoV-2 ee PCR (PowerChek Coronavirus) 28 Janaayo 2020.

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: Mid kamid ah shaybaadhada hide sadaha ee nuqulada hore ee bushqadaha shaybaadhak waxa uu soo saaray natiijo aan dhamaystirnayn oo markaa khalad ah, iyo shaybaadhak afka quruurada ah ee CDC Atlanta lagu sameeyay ; waxa uu keeney celcelis ahaan wax ka yar 100 muunadoo maalintii in si wanaagsan loo baadho Febraayo oo dhan 2020.;
translated: Waxay eegeysaa hida sidaha "E" oo ay wadaagaan dhamaan coronavirus-yada beta, iyo hida sidaha RdRp ee u gaarka ah SARS-CoV-2.In Shiinaha, BGI Group wuxuu ka mid ahaa shirkadihii ugu horeeyay ee ogolaansho degdeg ah ka helay Maamulka Qaran ee Shiinaha ee Alaabta Caafimaadka ee loogu talagalay qalabka la ogaado SARS-CoV-2 ee PCR. Dalka Maraykanka, Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo Ka Hortagga Cudurada (CDC) waxay u qaybinaysaa Coronavirus-kiisa 2019-Aan Caabuq ahayn (2019-nCoV) Gudiga Baadhitaanka ee RT-PCR ee Waqtiga Dhabta ah ee SHAYBAARADA Caafimaadka Dadweynaha iyadoo loo marayo Kheyraadka Reagent ee Caalamiga ah.

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: Shaybaadhka iyada oo la isticmaalayo laba qaybood waxaa la ogaaday in aan lagu kalsoonaan karli ilaa 28 Febraayo 2020, ilaa loo ogolaadayna shaybaadhada gobolka iyo deegaan inay bilaabaan shaybaadhka.
translated: Mid ka mid ah saddex tijaabo hidde ee qaybaha ka weyn ee xirmooyinka imtixaanka keenay natiijooyin aan la dhamayn karo sababo la xiriira reagents cilladaysan, iyo dib u dhac ah ee baaritaanka ee CDC ee Atlanta; tani waxay keentay celcelis wax ka yar 100 tijaabo ah maalintii oo si guul ah loo baaraandego dhammaan Febraayo 2020 oo dhan.

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: Shaybaadhka waxa aansixiyay Maamulka Cuntada iyo Dawooyinka kuwaas oo adeegsanaya Awooda Xaalada Degdeg. Maraykanka shaybaadhada ganacsigu waxa ay bilaabeen shaybaadhka horaantii Maarso 2020.
translated: ["Tijaabooyinka la adeegsanayo laba shay lama go'aamiyo in la isku halayn karo ilaa 28 Febraayo 2020, mana ahan ilaa waqtigaas oo sheybaarada gobolka iyo kuwa maxalliga ah loo ogolaaday inay bilaabaan baaritaanka."]

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: Laga bilaabo 5 Maarso 2020 LabCorp waxa uu ku dhawaaqay in dalka oo dhan laga samayn doono shaybaadh COVID-19 ah oo ku salaysan RT-PCR.
translated: Baaritaanka waxaa ansixiyay Maamulka Cuntada iyo Dawooyinka oo hoos imaanaya Isticmaalka Xaaladaha Degdegga ah Authorization.US ganacsiga shaybaarada ayaa bilaabay inay tijaabiyaan horraantii Maarso 2020.

sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: Rabitaanka Shaybaadh lamid ah oo dalka oo dhan ah oo COVID-19 ah ayaa la bilaabay 9 Maarso 2020.
translated: Sida laga soo bilaabo 5tii Maarso 2020 LabCorp ayaa ku dhawaaqday wadanka oo dhan laga baadhay baadhitaanada COVID-19 iyadoo la tixgelinayo RT-PCR.

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: Wax tiro ah lama cayimin; muunada ayaa la qaaday oo markaa waa in looga shaqeeyo si waafaqsan shuruudaha CDC.
translated: Waxyiga Tijaabooyinka ayaa sidoo kale dalka oo dhan ka dhigay baadhitaanka COVID-19 oo dalka oo dhan ah oo la heli karo laga bilaabo 9 Maarso 2020.

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: Ruushka, shaybaadhka COVID-19 ayaa la sameeyay waxaana sameeyay Xarunta Daraasada Gobolka Virology iyo Biotechnologu VECTOR.
translated: Ma jirin xadidaad tiro ahaan ah; Uruurinta tijaabada iyo baaraandegista waa in loo sameeyaa si waafaqsan shuruudaha CDC.

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: Febraayo 11 2020 shaybaadhka waxaa lagu duwaan geliyay Adeega Federaka ee Kormeerka Daryeelka Caafimaad. 12 Maarso 2020, Mayo Clinic waxay sheegeen inay sameeyeen shaybaadh lagu ogaanayo caabuqa COVID-19. 13 Maarso 2020, Roche Diagnostic waxa ay FDA u ansixteen shaybaadh lgau sameeyo 3.5 saacadood tiro badan, markaa hal mishiin ayaa celcelis ahaan samaynaya 4,128 shaybaadh mudo 24 saacadood ah.
translated: Ruushka gudaheed, tijaabada COVID-19 ayaa waxaa soo saaray oo soo saartay xarunta cilmi baarista ee gobolka ee fayruuska iyo bayoteknoolojiga VECTOR.

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: Maarso 19 2020, FDA waxa ay soo saartaay ogolaasho xaalada degdeg ah (EUA) oo ay siisay Abbott Laboratories si ay u sameeyaan u tijaabiyaan nidaamka m2000 ee Abbott; FDA waxay hore u siisay ogolaanshe lamid ah Halogic, LabCorp, iyo Thermo Fisher Scientific.
translated: ["11kii Febraayo 2020 baadhitaanada waxaa diwaan galiyay Hay'ada La socodka Caafimaadka Caafimaadka.12kii Maarso 2020, Mayo Clinic ayaa la sheegay inay samaysay baaritaan lagu ogaanayo caabuqa COVID-19. 13kii Maarso 2020, Roche Diagnostics waxay heshay oggolaanshaha FDA ee baaritaan kaas oo lagu sameyn karo saacadaha 3.5 ee mugga sare, sidaas awgeed waxay u oggolaaneysaa hal mashiinka inuu sameeyo qiyaastii 4,128 baaritaan muddo 24-saac ah."]

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: Maarso 21 2020, Cepheid waxa uu sidoo kale EUA ka heley FDA si uu markaa u sameeyo shaybaadh qaadanaya 45 daqiiqo.
translated: Bishii Maarso 19, 2020, FDA waxay soo saartay oggolaansho isticmaalka degdegga ah (EUA) si abbott Laboratories loogu sameeyo baaritaan ku saabsan nidaamka Abbott ee m2000; FDA ayaa hore u soo saartay oggolaansho la mid ah hologic, LabCorp, iyo Thermo Fisher Sayniska.

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: FDA waxa ay ansixisay shaybaadhka loo isticmaalo aysiidha isothermal nucleic ee markaa teknooloojiya lagu waynaynayo halkii laga isticmaali lahaa PCR.
translated: 21kii Maarso 2020, Cepheid ayaa sidoo kale heshay EUA ka FDA baaritaan ay ku qaadato qiyaastii 45 daqiiqo.

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: Maadaama oo ayna taasi u baahnayn wareeg wax ka badan heerkulka ah oo wayn qaabkan waxa lagu sheegi karaa natiijada qofka laga helo qadar dhawr daqiiqo ah cida laga waayanah 13 daqooqo.
translated: FDA ayaa ansixisay baaritaan isticmaala tikniyoolajiyada amniga nucleic acid acid isothermal halkii PCR.

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: Waxaa wakhti xaadirkan jira ilaa 18,000 oo mishiinadan ah oo Maraykanka yaala oo Abbott waxa looga fadhiyaa in ay soo saarto ilaa 50,000 oo shaybaadh maalintii. Shaybaadhadaas oo la isticmaali dooo antiboodhi kaliya kaas oo markaa u gaar ah borootiinta nucleocapsid (botootiinta N) ee novel coronavirus taas oo markaa lagu sameenayo Taywaan, iyada oo la rajanaynayo in laga heli karo natiijada 15 ilaa 20 daqiiqo gudaheed sida shaybaadhka badan ee hargabka oo kale.
translated: Maadaama tani aysan u baahnayn wareegyo heer-kul oo isbedel ah habkani wuxuu keeni karaa natiijooyin wanaagsan inta ugu yar ee shan daqiiqo iyo natiijooyin xun 13 daqiiqo gudaheed.

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: Maarso 2020 waxaa la eegey macluumaadkii hore ee la hayay ee markaa "sawirka shucaada laabta ee markaa shaybaadhka qiimaha yar ah wakhtiga hore, halkaas oo CT [sawirka kombuyuuyarka] natiijadiisa ay ka muuqan karto calaamado aad u badan."
translated: Hadda waxaa dalka Maraykanku ka jira ilaa 18,000 oo ka mid ah mashiinadaas, Abbott-na waxay filaysaa inay sare u qaaddo wax soo saarka si loo soo saaro 50,000 oo tijaabo ah maalin kasta. Baaritaan la isticmaalayo monoclonal antibody kaas oo si gaar ah ugu dhaga borotiinka nucleocapsid (N protein) ee coronavirus-ka cusub ayaa laga sameynayaa Taiwan, iyadoo la rajeynayo inuu natiijo ku keeni karo 15 ilaa 20 daqiiqo sida baaritaanka influenza ee degdegga ah.

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: Qaab caadi ah oo uu leeyahay CT waxaa kamid ah muraayada dhawrka lobar ah ee dhinacyada oo leh xidhiidh, nidaam iyo qaab ay u baahaan.
translated: Maarso 2020-kii dib u eegista suugaanta ayaa lagu soo gabagabeeyay in "raajada xabadka ay yihiin qiimo yar oo lagu ogaanayo marxaladaha hore, halka NATIIJOOYINKA CT [computed tomography] ay joogi karaan xitaa ka hor inta aan calaamaduhu bilaaban."

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: Muquuninta taranka, qaabka waalan iyo isku dhaca marka uu xanuunku bato.
translated: Noocyada caadiga ah ee CT waxaa ka mid ah opacificities-ga dhulka-galaasaha laba geesoodka ah ee leh qaybinta dhinacyada, sinnaanta iyo gadaasha dambe.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: Daraasad la isku barbar dhigayo PCR iyo CT oo lagu sameeyay Wuhan meesha uu ka yimid safmarka wakhtigani waxa uu muujiyay in CT u aad uga arkoon ogyahay PCR, inkasta oo uu ka yar yahay cayimaadiisu, iyada oo qaar badan oo kamid ah qaababka sawiradu ay is dul fuulayaan sida caabuqa sanbabka iyo socodka xanuunka.
translated: Awood-hoosaadka hoosaadka ah, gogol waalan iyo tababbarinta waxay kobcaan marka cudurku sii badbado.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: Laga bilaabo Maarso 2020, Kuuliyada Maraykanka ee Shucaadu waxa ay ku talisasay in "CT aanu loo isticmaalin shaybaadhka ama shaybaadhka kowaad ee COVID-19". Maarso 2020, CDC waxa ay ku talisay in shaybaadhka kowaad uu noqdo PCR.
translated: Daraasad isbarbardhigaysa PCR iyo CT ee Wuhan oo ah asal ahaan asalka cudurka faafa ee hadda ayaa soo jeedisay in CT ay si wayn uga dareen badan tahay PCR, inkastoo ay ka yar tahay mid gaar ah, iyadoo qaar badan oo ka mid ah astaamaha sawirkeeda ay la kulmayaan xanuunada kale ee sanbabka iyo hababka xanuunka.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: Qayb kaid ah jawaab celinta difaaca jidhka ee caabuqa waxaa weeye samaysanka antiboodhiga ay ku jiraan IgM iyo IgG.
translated: Ilaa Maarso 2020, Kulliyada Shucaaca ee Maraykanka waxay ku talinaysaa in "CT aan loo isticmaalin in lagu baaro ama shaybaadh safka koowaad ah si lagu ogaado COVID-19". Laga bilaabo Maarso 2020, CDC waxay ku talineysaa PCR baaritaanka hore.

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: Waxaa loo isticmaali karaa in lagu ogaado caabuqa shakhsiga laga bilaabo 7 maalmood ama marka uu soo baxo xanuunku, si markaa loo eego difaaca, oo markaa loola socda shacabka. Shaybaadhka waxaa lagu samayn karaa shaybaadhka dhexe (CLT) ama iyada oo lagu ogaanayo shaybaadhka daryeelka (PoCT).
translated: Qayb ka mid ah ka falcelinta difaaca jirka ee caabuqa waa soo saarista anti-boodhiyo ay ku jiraan IgM iyo IgG.

sourceString: These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
targetString: Nidaamka wax badan gelinta ee sare ee shaybaadho badan oo caafimaad ayaa markaa meel la iskugu keeni karaa laakiin waxa helitaankeedu waxa ay ku xidhan tahay xadiga soo saarka nidaam kaste.
translated: ["Kuwaan waxaa loo isticmaali karaa in lagu ogaado caabuqa shakhsiyaadka laga bilaabo 7 maalmood ama wax la mid ah ka dib bilawga calaamadaha, si loo go'aamiyo difaaca jirka, iyo ilaalinta dadka. Isku dayidda waxaa lagu samayn karaa shaybaarada dhexe (CLT) ama baaritaanka daryeelka dhibic-ka-socda (PoCT)."]

sourceString: The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.
targetString: Wixii CLT ah ee muunada kaliya ah ee caabuqa dhiiga waxaa sida caadiga ah loogu isticmaalaa, in kasta o muunada adag loo adeegsan karo jawaabta dicaafa si loo raaco.
translated: Habka iswada u sareeya ee shaybaarro badan oo caafimaad ayaa awoodi doona inuu sameeyo tijaabooyinkan laakiin helitaanka ay ku xiran tahay heerka wax soo saarka nidaam walba.

sourceString: For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response.
targetString: PoCT waxaa lagu helaa dhibic dhiig ah iyada oo maqaarka la daloolinayo.
translated: CLT hal muunad oo dhiigga ka baxsan ayaa caadi ahaan loo isticmaalaa, inkastoo tijaabooyinka taxanaha loo isticmaali karo in lagula socdo jawaabta difaaca jirka.

sourceString: For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture.
targetString: Si ka duwan PCR qaabka ah talaabada qaadida looma baahna in meel la iskugu keeno. Maarso 26, 2020, FDA waxa ay magacawday 29 shirkadood oo markaa wargelinaya hay'ada sida loogu baahno oo markaa waxa ay qaybin karaan shaybaadhka antiboodhiga.
translated: Waayo, PoCT hal muunad oo dhiig ah ayaa caadiyan laga helaa maqaar dillaac.

sourceString: Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests.
targetString: Laga bilaabo Abriil 7, 2020, kaliya shaybaadh kaliya ayay ansixisay FDA ee  xeerka awooda isticmaalka xaalada degdega ah. Dhamaadkii Maarso 2020 Shaybaadhka Caafimaadka Euroimmum iyo Shaybaadhka Epitope waxa ay u ansixisay Yurub bushqadooda shaybaadhka, taas oo lagula socon karo IgG iyo IgA antiboodhiga ah ee fayruska ee muunada dhiiga.
translated: ["Si ka duwan hababka PCR looma baahna talaabo ka soo saarista looma baahna intaan la isku baadhin ka hor. Maarso 26, 2020, FDA waxay magacowday 29 waxyaabood oo bixisay ogeysiiska hay'adda sida looga baahan yahay, haatana waxay awood u leeyihiin inay qaybiyaan baaritaannadooda antibody-yada."]

sourceString: As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.
targetString: Awooda shaybaadhka waxa weeye dhawr boqol oo muunadood oo saacado gudahood ah oo markaa aad uga dhakhso badan qaabka la socodka caadiga ah ee PCR ee fayruska ee RNA.
translated: Laga bilaabo Abriil 7, 2020, hal tijaabo oo keliya ayaa ay ansixisay FDA iyadoo loo marayo ogolaansho degdeg ah oo loo adeegsanayo. Dabayaaqadii Maarso 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics iyo Epitope Diagnostics waxay heleen ogolaansho Yurub ah xirmooyinkooda baaritaanka, kaas oo lagu ogaan karo difaacyada IgG iyo IgA ee ka hortaga fayraska ee sambalada dhiigga.

sourceString: The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA.
targetString: Antiboodhiga waxaa caadiyan lagula socdaa 14 maalmood kadib marka uu caabuqa ugu horeeya ee uu qofka ku dhaco. Horaantii Abriil, Ingiriisku waxa uu soo saaray bushqad aan antiboodhi ahayn oo la iibinayay oo si wanaagsan loo isticmaalayo.
translated: Awoodda baaritaanka waa dhawr boqol oo tijaabo saacadood gudahood sidaas awgeed si aad uga dhaqso badan isku dayga caadiga ah ee PCR-ta ee RNA fayraska.

sourceString: The antibodies are usually detectable 14 days after the onset of the infection.In early April, the UK found none of the antibody test kits it purchased were sufficiently good to use.
targetString: Hong Kong waxa ay samaysay barnaamij dadka looga shakiyo ah inay joogi karaan guriga, "waaxda xaalada degdeg ah waxa ay siin doontaa tuunbada muunada bukaanka", candhuuf ayay ku tufayaan, oo way soo dirayaan oo waxa natiijada loo sheegayaa waxoogaa kadib. NHS-ta Ingiriisku waxa ay dhawaaqday tijaabo baraamij shaybaadh o ah oo dadka looga shakiyo ee guriga jooga ah oo markaa meesha ka saaraysa khatarta inay bukaan kale qaadsiiyaan ah hadii ay ymaadaan isbitaalka ama in ambulaaska jeermiska laga dilo ahhadii aan la isticmaalin. Shaybaad iyada oo gaadhiga la wado lasoo maro oo ah COVID-19 dadka looga shakiyo, xirfadlayaal daryeelka caafimaadka ah ayaa qaadaya muunada oo markaa adeegsanaya taxadirka munaasabka ah. ,
translated: Anti-boodhiyada inta badan waa la ogaan karaa 14 maalmood ka dib bilawga caabuqa. Bilawgii Abriil, UK waxay heshay in midnaba oo ah qalabka baaritaanka unugyada laga qaado ay ahayd mid ku filan oo ay ku fiican tahay in la isticmaalo.

sourceString: Hong Kong has set up a scheme where suspected patients can stay home, "emergency department will give a specimen tube to the patient", they spit into it, send it back and get a test result a while after.The British NHS has announced that it is piloting a scheme to test suspected cases at home, which removes the risk of a patient infecting others if they come to a hospital or having to disinfect an ambulance if one is used.In drive-through testing for COVID-19 for suspected cases, a healthcare professional takes sample using appropriate precautions.
targetString: Xarumo iyada oo gaadiidka la wado ah ayaa ka caawiya dadka reer Kuuriyada Koonfureed inay maraan shaybaadh degdeg ah, oo aan aad uga sareeya dalalka kale oo dhan. Jarmalka, Ururka Qaran ee Xaalada Caymiska Caafimaakda Dhakhtarka waxa ay sheegeen 2 Maarso, inay awood u leeyihin inay sameeyaan ilaa 12,000 oo shaybaadh maalintii oo lagu sameeyo ambalaaska oo 10.700 ayaa la baadhay todobaad kahor.
translated: Hong Kong ayaa hirgalisay qorshe la tuhmayo in bukaanada laga shakisanyahay ay guriga kusoo laaban karaan, "Qaybta gurmadka dagdagga ah ayaa bukaanka u keeni doonta tuubo muunada ah", way ku candhuufaan, kuna soo celiyaan dibna u diraan kadibna ay natiijo baaritaan ah ka helaan in mudo ah kadib. NHS-ta Britishka ayaa ku dhawaaqday in ay tijaabinayso qorshe lagu baari doono xaaladaha looga shakisan yahay in ay gurigooda joogaan, taas oo meesha ka saaraysa khatarta ah in bukaan uu xanuunka ku dhaco dad kale haddii uu isbitaal u imaado ama uu ku qasbanaado in uu ambalaaska ku dilo haddii la isticmaalo. Marka la sii wado talaabooyinka lagu samaynayo COVID-19 ee kiisaska laga shakisan yahay, xirfadlayaasha caafimaadku waxay qaadataa sambal iyadoo la adeegsanayo taxaddar ku haboon.

sourceString: Drive-through centers have helped South Korea do some of the fastest, most-extensive testing of any country.In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on 2 March, that it had a capacity for about 12,000 tests per day in the ambulatory setting and 10.700 had been tested in the prior week.
targetString: Kharashka waxaa bixiya caymiska caafimaadka marka shaybaadhka uu amray dhakhtarku.
