translated: Xarumaha loo adeegsanayo ayaa ka caawiyay Koofurta Kuuriya inay sameeyaan qaar ka mid ah tijaabooyinka ugu dhaqsiyaha badan, uguna ballaaran ee dal kasta. Dalka Jarmalka, Ururka Qaran ee Dhakhaatiirta Caymiska Ee Sharciyeysan ayaa sheegay in 2dii Maarso, in 12,000 oo baaritaan ay awood u lahayd maalin kasta oo ah goobtii ambalaatory-yada iyo 10.700 oo la baaray usbuucii ka horeeyay.

sourceString: Costs are borne by the health insurance when the test is ordered by a physician.
targetString: Sida uu sheegey madaxwaynaha Hay'ada Robert Koch, Jarmalka waxa uu guud ahaan awood u leeyahay inuu sameeyo 160,000 oo shaybaadh todobaadkii.
translated: Kharashaadka waxaa qaadaya caymiska caafimaadka marka baaritaanka dhakhtarku amro.

sourceString: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has an overall capacity for 160,000 tests per week.
targetString: Laga bilaabo 19 Maarso shaybaadhka iyada oo gaadhiga la wato ah ayaa lagu bixiyaa dhawr magaalo oo waawayn.
translated: Sida laga soo xigtay madaxweynaha Machadka Robert Koch, Jarmalka ayaa awood guud u leh 160,000 oo baaritaan toddobaadkii.

sourceString: As of 19 March drive in tests were offered in several large cities.
targetString: Laga bilaabo 26 Maarso 2020 wadarta tirada shaybaadhad ee lagu sameeyay Jarmalka lama garanayo,, maadaama oo kaliya cida laga helo la sheego.
translated: Laga bilaabo 19 Maarso markii imtixaanada lagu bixiyay magaalooyin badan oo waaweyn.

sourceString: As of 26 March 2020 the total number of tests performed in Germany was unknown, because only positive results are reported.
targetString: Xog uruurinta shaybaadhka ugu horeeyay ee markaa dhacday todobaadka 12/2020 wadarta 483,295 oo muunadood ayaa la baadhay oo waxaa ku jira todobaadka 12/2020 iyo 33,491 oo muunadood (6.9%) shaybaadh oo laga heley SARS-CoV-2. Israa'iil, cilmi baadhayaasha Technion iyo Isbitaalka Rambam waxa ay sameeyeen oo ay tijaabiyeen qaab lagu baadhayo muunadaha 64 bukaan oo isbarbar socda, iyada oo markaa isku daray muunadaha oo kaliya baadhitaan dheeraad ah ku samaynaya hadii natiijada laga helo. Wuhan meel 2000 oo mitir iskuwareeg ah oo shaybaadh lagula socdo xaalada degdeg ah oo loo yaqaan "Huo-Yan" (Jauniiska: XXXX, ama "Isha Dabka" Ingiriisi ahaan) ayay la furay 5 Febraayo 2020 BGI, kaas oo ka shaqayn kara wax ka badan 10,000 oo muunadood maalintii.
translated: Laga soo bilaabo 26kii Maarso 2020 tirada guud ee tijaabooyinka laga sameeyay Jarmalka lama oga, sababtoo ah natiijo wanaagsan oo kaliya ayaa la soo sheegayaa.

sourceString: A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day.
targetString: Dhismaha oo uu kormeerayay Aasaasaha BGI Wang Jian iyo qaadashada qaabka ee 5-maalmood, waxaa lagu arkay inay ka badan 47% kharashka u dhigma ee meesha ka saarida karantiimada inuu libi laabayo hadii shaybaadhkani aanu waafaqin.
translated: Baadhitaan shaybaarka koowaad ayaa shaaca ka qaaday in laga bilaabo usbuuca kalandarka ee 12/2020 wadarta guud ee ugu yaraan 483,295 tijaabo ah ayaa la baadhay illaa iyo oo ay ku jiraan asbuucii 12/2020 iyo 33,491 tijaabooyin (6.9%) laga helay SARS-CoV-2.In Israa\'iil, cilmi baarayaal ka tirsan Isbitaalka Technion iyo Rambam ayaa sameeyay oo ay ku baareen hab lagu baaro sambalo laga soo qaaday 64 bukaan oo isku mar ah, iyagoo isku daray sambalada la isku daray, iyada oo la isku daray sambalada lagu sameeyay oo sii baadhi lahaa haddii sambalada la isku daray lagu arko inuu helay wax fiican. In Wuhan ku meelgaarka ah 2000-sq-meter ogaanshaha degdegga ah shaybaarka loo magacaabay "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, ama "Eye Dabka" in English) ayaa la furay on 5 February 2020 by BGI, taas oo ka baaraandegi karta in ka badan 10,000 tijaabada maalin kasta.

sourceString: With the construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and taking 5-days, modelling has show cases in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the corresponding cost of the tackling the quarantine would have doubled if this testing capacity hadn't come on line.
targetString: Shaybaadhka Wuhan waxa markiiba laga daba keenay shaybaadhka Huo-Yan ee Shenzhen, Tainjin ee Beijing, iyo Shanghai, iyo isugayn 12 magaalo oo Jayna ah.
translated: Iyada oo dhismaha uu dusha ka ilaalinayo aasaasaha BGI Wang Jian oo qaadanaya 5-maalmood, qaabaynta ayaa muujinaysa in kiisaska Hubei ay noqon lahaayeen 47% sare oo qarashka u dhigma ee karantiilka ayaa laba jibaarmi lahaa haddii awooddan baaritaanka aysan khadka ku iman.

sourceString: The Wuhan Laboratory has been promptly followed by Huo-Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 cities across China.
targetString: Maarso 4 2020 isugayn awooda maalintii ee waxay ahayd 50,000 oo shaybaadh maalintii. Ilo Furan, nashqado muruqsan oo markaa lagu sameeyay Origami Assays ayaa lasii daayay oo markaa lagu baadhi karo ilaa 1122 oo muunadaha bukaanka ee COVID19 iyada oo la isticmaalayo kaliya wadaaa 93. Nashqadahan dheelitirka waxaa lagu maamuli karaa shaybaadho yaryar iyada oo aan loo baahan in gacmo roobot ka shaqeeyaan.
translated: Laboratory Wuhan ayaa si dhakhso ah u raacay by shaybaarka Huo-Yan ee Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, iyo Shanghai, wadar ahaan 12 magaalo oo ku yaalla Shiinaha oo dhan.

sourceString: By 4 March 2020 the daily throughput totals were 50,000 tests per day.Open source, multiplexed designs released by Origami Assays have been released that can test as many as 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays .  These balanced designs can be run in small laboratories without the need for robotic liquid handlers.
targetString: Maarso, yaraanka iyo xadiga aan ku filnayn ee isku darka kiimikada ayaa noqday qoorta quruurada ee shaybaadhka badan ee EU iyo Ingiriiska iyo Maraykanka.
translated: Laga soo bilaabo 4tii Maarso 2020 wadarta guud ee dhex marinta maalin kasta waxay ahayd 50,000 oo baaritaan maalin kasta. Il furan, naqshado isku dhafan oo ay soo saartay Origami Assays ayaa la sii daayay kuwaas oo laga baari karo 1122 bukaan oo laga qaaday COVID19 iyagoo isticmaalaya kaliya 93 isku dayo.  Naqshaddan isku dheelitiran waxaa lagu ordi karaa laboratories yar oo aan lahayn baahida loo qabo maareeyayaasha dareeraha ah ee robotka ah.

sourceString: By March, shortages and insufficient amounts of reagent has become a bottleneck for mass testing in the EU and UK and the US.
targetString: Taasi waxa ay horseedey in qoraayada qaar ay kormeeraan nidaamka diyaarinta muunada oo markaa ay ku jirto diirinta muunada 98 C (208 C) mudo 5 daqooq ah si markaa looga saaro RNA genomes shaybaadhka dheeraadka ah. 31 Maarso waxaa uu Imaataadka ku dhawaaqay inuu shaybaadh dheeraad ah ku samanayo shacabkiida oo Coronavirus ah oo dadka ah taas oo ka badan dal kasta oo kale, oo uu markaa la socdo miisaanka heerka shaybaadhka si uu u gaadho tiro badan oo shacabka ah.
translated: Laga soo bilaabo Maarso, yaraanta iyo xaddiga aan ku filneyn ee reagent-ka ayaa noqday mid kacsan oo loogu talagalay baaritaanka baaxadda badan ee EU iyo UK iyo Mareykanka.

sourceString: This has led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to release RNA genomes for further testing.On 31 March it was announced United Arab Emirates was now testing more of its population for Coronavirus per head than any other country, and was on track to scale up the level of testing to reach the bulk of the population.
targetString: Tani waxay ahayd isku darka awooda gaadhiga iyada oo la wato lagu soo dhaxmayo, iibsiga shaybaadhada yaryar ee Group 42 iyo BGI (taas oo ku sugan shaybaadhkooda la socodka xaalada degdeg ah ee "Huo-Yan" ee China).
translated: Tani waxay u horseeday in qorayaasha qaarkood ay baaraan habraaca habraaca tijaabada ah ee ku lug leh tijaabooyinka kuleylka ee 98 °C (208 °F) muddo 5 daqiiqo ah si loo sii daayo hiddo-sidaha RNA si loo sii daayo baaritaano dheeri ah. 31kii Maarso waxaa lagu dhawaaqay in Imaaraadka Carabta ay hadda tijaabineyso dadkeeda in halkii dal ee Coronavirus in ka badan wadanka kale, waxayna ku socoto waddada ay kor ugu qaadi karto heerka tijaabada si ay u gaarto inta badan dadka shacabka ah.

sourceString: This was through a combination of drive-through capability, and purchasing a population-scale mass-throughput laboratory from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency detection laboratories in China).
targetString: Waxaa la dhisay 14 maalmood, shaybaadhku waxa uu awood u leeyahay in lagu sameeyo toban kun shaybaadhka RT-PCR maalintii oo waxaana weeye kii kowaad ee caalamka ee heerkan ah ee ka shaqeeya meel ka baxsan Jayna.
translated: Tani waxa ay ahayd iyada oo loo marayo isku-darka awood-dhex-mar ah, iyo iibsiga shaybaar cabirka dadweynaha-dhex-mara ee ka yimid Group 42 iyo BGI (oo ku salaysan shaybaadhka lagu ogaado xaaladaha degdegga ah ee Shiinaha).

sourceString: Constructed in 14 days, the lab is capable of conducting tens of thousands RT-PCR tests per day and is the first in the world of this scale to be operational outside of China.
targetString: Isku darka shaybaadhka ee kala duwan ee markaa lagu bartilmaameedsanayo qaybaha kala duwan ee hide sidaga coronavirus macluumaadkiisa ayaa lagu sameeyay Jayna, Faransiiska, Jarmalka, Hong Kong, Jabaan iyo Maraykanka.
translated: Waxaa lagu dhisay 14 maalmood, shaybaarkan ayaa awood u leh in uu sameeyo tobanaan kun oo tijaabo ah oo RT-PCR ah maalin kasta waana tii ugu horaysay adduunka ee miisaankan oo ka shaqeysa meel ka baxsan Shiinaha.

sourceString: Different testing recipes targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.
targetString: Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka waxa ay qaadatay isku darka Jermal ee soo samaynta bushqada loo dirayo dalalka dakhligoodu hooseeyo ee markaa aan lahayn khayraad ay leeyihiin oo ay isticmaalaan.
translated: Cuntooyinka kala duwan ee baaritaanka ee lagu bartilmaameedsanayo qaybaha kala duwan ee hida sidaha coronavirus ayaa lagu sameeyay Shiinaha, Faransiiska, Jarmalka, Hong Kong, Japan, iyo Maraykanka.

sourceString: The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for manufacturing kits sent to low-income countries without the resources to develop their own.
targetString: Waxyaabaha uu ka kooban yahay ee Jarmalka waxaa la baahiyay 17 Janaayo 2020; nidaamka ay sameeyeen Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo Kahortaga Xanuunada Maraykanka muu soo bixin ilaa 28 Janaayo, taas oo markaa dib u dhigay shaybaadhka la heli karayay Maraykanka. Jayna iyo Maraykanka waxay mushkilad kala kulmeen kalsooniga bushqada shaybaadhka ee intii hore ee safmarka, oo dalalkan iyo Awstaraaliya waxa ay waayeen bushqado ku filan dalabka iyo shaybaadhka ay ku taliyeen khabiirada caafimaadku.
translated: ["Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka waxay qaadatay cuntada Jarmalku u qaatay samaynta xirmooyinka soo saarista ee loo diray wadamada dakhligoodu hooseeyo ayadoo aan laheyn kheyraad ay ku horumariyaan kooda."]

sourceString: The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; the protocol developed by the United States Centers for Disease Control was not available until 28 January, delaying available tests in the U.S.China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to satisfy demand and recommendations for testing by health experts.
targetString: Sidaas cakiskeed, khabiiradu waxay sheegeen in helitaanka balaadhan Koonfurta  Kuuriya ee shaybaadhku inay ka caawisay yaraynta faafitaanka novel coronavirus.
translated: Cuntada Jarmalka waxaa la daabacay 17 Janaayo 2020; habka ay soo saareen xarunta xakamaynta cudurada ee Maraykanka ayaan la heli karin ilaa 28kii Janaayo, taas oo dib u dhigtay tijaabooyinkii laga heli kari lahaa maraykanka ee Shiinaha iyo Maraykanka ay dhibaato ku qabeen isku halaynta xirmooyinka lagaga baari lahaa horraantii dilaacitaanka, iyadoo wadamadan iyo Australiya ay awoodi waayeen inay keenaan xirmooyin ku filan si ay uga dhergaan baahida iyo talooyinka baadhitaanka khubarada caafimaadka.

sourceString: In contrast, experts say South Korea's broad availability of testing helped reduce the spread of the novel coronavirus.
targetString: Awooda shaybaadhka, oo inta badan ah shaybaadhada gaarka loo leeyahay, waxaa ay dhistay sanaado badan dawlada Koonfurta Kuuriyii.
translated: Taas badalkeeda, khubarada ayaa sheegay in helitaanka ballaaran ee tijaabada ee Kuuriyada Koonfureed ay caawisay yaraynta faafitaanka coronavirus cusub.

sourceString: Testing capacity, largely in private sector labs, was built up over several years by the South Korean government.
targetString: Maarso 16, Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunku waxa ay ugu baaqday in la isku keeno barnaamijyada shaybaadhka taas oo ay qaabka ugu wanaagsan ee lagu yarayn karo faafitaanka safmarka COVID-19. Dalabka sare ee shaybaadhka ee markaa faafitaanka sareeya ee xanuunku uu keeney waxa uu keenayaa in ay boqolaal kun oo shaybaadh ay ku xanibmaan shaybaadhada gaarka loo leeyahay ee Maraykanka, iyo agabka muunada lagu qaado iyo kiimikadaga ayaa yaraatay.
translated: Awoodda baaritaanka, oo badanaa ku jirta shaybaarada meelaha gaarka loo leeyahay, waxaa dhistay dowladda Kuuriyada Koonfureed muddo dhowr ah.

sourceString: On 16 March, the World Health Organization called for ramping up the testing programmes as the best way to slow the advance of COVID-19 pandemic.High demand for testing due to wide spread of the virus caused backlogs of hundreds of thousands of tests at private U.S. labs, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents became strained.
targetString: Maarso 2020 Jayna waxa ay mushkilad ka sheegtey kalsoonida lagu qabi karo bushqada shaybaadhkooda.
translated: ["16kii Maarso, Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ayaa ku baaqday in sare loo qaado barnaamijyada baaritaanka oo ah habka ugu wanaagsan oo hoos loogu dhigi karo hor u marinta cudurka safmarka ah ee COVID-19. Baahida saraysa ee baadhitaano ay sababtay faafitaanka balaaran ee fayraska ayaa sababay dib u dhaca boqolaal kun oo baaritaano ah oo laga sameeyay shaybaarrada gaarka loo leeyahay ee Maraykanka, iyo sahayda dheemanka iyo kuwa kiimikada ee kiimikada ayaa sii cidhiidhyamay."]

sourceString: In March 2020 China reported problems with accuracy in their test kits.
targetString: Maraykanka, bushqada shaybaadhka ee ay samaysay CDC waxbaa ka "khaldanaa;" dawladu kadibna waxa ay meesha ka saartay wixii kahorjoogay shaybaadhada gaarka ah. Isbayn waxa ay ka iibsatay bushqado shaybaadh ah shirkada Jayniiska ah ee Shenzhen Bioesy Biotecnology Co Ltd. kuwaas oo la ogaaday inay natiijadoodu khaldan yihiin.
translated: Bishii Maarso 2020 Shiinaha ayaa sheegay in dhibaatooyin sax ah ee xirmooyinka tijaabada ay.

sourceString: In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws;" the government then removed the bureaucratic barriers that had prevented private testing.Spain purchased test kits from Chinese firm  Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that results were inaccurate.
targetString: Shirkadu waxa ay sharaxday in natiijada khaldan ay ka timid muunada aan la qaaday ama isticmaal khaldan oo bushqada ah.
translated: Dalka Maraykanka, xirmooyinka tijaabada ee ay soo saartay hay\'adda CDC waxay lahayd "cillado;" dawladduna waxay markaa meesha ka saartay caqabadihii xabaalada ee ka hortagi jiray tijaabada gaarka loo leeyahay. Spain waxay ka iibsatay xirmooyin tijaabo ah shirkada Shiinaha ee Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, laakiin waxay ogaatay in natiijooyinkaasi aysan sax ahayn.

sourceString: The firm explained that the incorrect results may be a result of a failure to collect samples or use the kits correctly.
targetString: Wasiiska Isbwayn ayaa sheegey inay ka noqonayaan bushqada natiijooyinka khaladka sheegey, oo waxa ay badali doonaa bushqada kala duwan ee  shaybaadhka ee laga ay sameeyeen Shenzhen Bioeasy. 80% bushqada shaybaadhak ee Jamhuuriyada Jeegu ka iibsatay Jayna waxa ay soo saareen natiijo been ah. Isloofaakiya waxay ka iibsatay 1.2 milyan oo bushqada shaybaadhka ah Jayna kuwaas oo natiijo khaldan soo saarayay.
translated: Shirkaddu waxay sharaxday in natiijooyinka aan saxda ahayn ay ka dhalan karto guuldarro in la aruuriyo sambalo ama si sax ah loo isticmaali waayay xirmooyinka.

sourceString: The Spanish ministry said it will withdraw the kits that returned incorrect results, and would replace them with a different testing kit provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of test kits the Czech Republic purchased from China gave wrong results.Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China which were found to be inaccurate.
targetString: Raysal Wasaare Matovic waxa uu sheegey in kuwan lagu daadiyo Danube. Kara Wasiirka Caafimaadka Turkey waxa uu sheegey in bushqada shaybaadhka ee ay ka iibsadeen Jayna uu "khaladkoodu badnaa" oo markaa "ayna isticmaalin." Ingiriisku waxa uu ka iibsaday Jayna 3.5 milyan oo bushqadaha shaybaadhka ah  laakiin horaantii Abriil 2020 waxa uu ku dhawaaqay in aan la isticmaali karin.
translated: Wasaarada dalka Spain ayaa sheegtay in ay la laaban doonto xirmooyinka soo laabtay natiijooyinka aan saxda ahayn, ayna ku badeli doonaan xirmo kale oo tijaabo ah oo ay bixiso shirkadda Shenzhen Bioeasy.Boqolkiiba 80% xirmooyinka baaritaanka ah ee Czech Republic ay ka iibsatay Shiinaha ayaa natiijo khaldan ka soo saartay. Slovakia waxay ka iibsatay 1.2 milyan oo xirmooyin tijaabo ah oo laga keenay Shiinaha kuwaas oo lagu ogaaday in aysan sax ahayn.

sourceString: Prime Minister Matovič suggested these be dumped into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said the test kits Turkey purchased from China had a "high error rate" and did not "put them into use."The UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but in early April 2020 announced these were not usable.
targetString: Shaybaadhka, oo ay daba socoto karantiimada dadka laga heley iyo kuwa lagu arkay raadka dadka qaban SARS-CoV-2 inay u dhawaadeen, taas oo keentay in markaa laga helo.
translated: Ra\'iisul Wasaare Matovič ayaa soo jeediyay in arrimahan lagu tuuro danube.Ateş Kara oo ka tirsan wasaaradda caafimaadka ee Turkiga ayaa sheegtay in xirmooyinka baaritaanka ee Turkiga uu ka iibsaday Shiinaha uu lahaa xaddi qalad oo sareeya oo aanan "la isticmaalin" UK waxay Shiinaha ka iibsatay 3.5 milyan oo xirmooyin tijaabo ah laakiin horaantii Abriil 2020 ayaa ku dhawaaqday in kuwan aan la isticmaali karin.

sourceString: Testing, followed with quarantine of those who tested positive and tracing of those with whom the SARS-CoV-2 positive people had had contact, resulted in positive outcomes.
targetString: Cilmi baadhayaasha ka shaqaynaya magaalada Talyaaniga ee Vo, meeshii ugu horeeyay ee qof COVID-19 u dhinta lagu arkay Talyaaniga, waxa ay sameeyeen wareeg labaad oo shaybaadhka ah oo shacabka dhan ah oo ah ilaa 3.400 ruux, oo markaa isku jiray toban maalmood.
translated: Baaritaanka, oo lagu xigay karantiilka kuwa laga helay kuwa laga helay iyo raad raacidda kuwa uu SARS-CoV-2 dadka laga helay ay la kulmay, ayaa keenay natiijooyin wanaagsan.

sourceString: Researchers working in the Italian town of Vò, the site of the first COVID-19 death in Italy, conducted two rounds of testing on the entire population of about 3,400 people, about ten days apart.
targetString: Ilaa kalbadh dadka laga heley wax calaamado ah may lahayn, oo dhamaana dadka laga heley waa la karantimeeyay.
translated: Cilmi-baareyaasha ka shaqeeya magaalada Talyaaniga ee Vò, oo ah goobtii ugu dhimashadii ugu horreysay ee COVID-19 ee Talyaaniga laga sameeyo Talyaaniga, ayaa laba xabbadood oo baadhitaan ah ku sameeyay dhammaan dadka ku nool ilaa 3,400 oo qof, oo ku dhowaad toban maalmood oo kala duwan.

sourceString: About half the people testing positive had no symptoms, and all discovered cases were quarantined.
targetString: Iyada oo xadidaad la saari doono saxdaalka, tani waxay gebi ahaanba meesha ka saaraysaa xanuunka.
translated: Qiyaastii kala bar dadkii laga helay xanuunka aysan lahayn wax calaamado ah, dhamaanba kiisaska la ogaaday waa la karantiilay.

sourceString: With travel to the commune restricted, this eliminated new infections completely.
targetString: Markii si wayn loogu soo jeedasay kadaba taga meesha laga qaaday, xadidaada meelaha laga socdaalo, shaybaadhka iyo karantiimada, safmarka coronavirus 2020 ee Singaaboor waxa lagu arkay in faafitaankiisu aad uga yaraan dalalka kale ee horumaray, laakiin iyada oo aan si wayn loo adkaynin xidhitaanka maqaaxiyaha iyo tukaamada.
translated: Iyadoo safarada ku aaddan xayiraadda ay xayiran tahay, tani waxay ciribtirtay caabuqyada cusub gebi ahaanba.

sourceString: With aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore has proceeded much more slowly than in other developed countries, but without extreme restrictions like forced closure of restaurants and retail establishments.
targetString: Munaadabado badan ayaa la joojiyya, oo Singaaboor waxa ay markii ugu horeysay dadka u sheegtey inay joogaan guryahooda 28 Maarso, laakiin dugsiyada waxaa dib loo furay fasaxii kadib 23 Maarso.
translated: Iyadoo ay jirto raad-raacyo xiriir oo xooggan, xanibaadaha safarka gudaha, baaritaanka, iyo karantiilidda, cudurka safmareenka ah ee 2020-kii ka socday Singapore wuxuu ku socdey si ka badan si ka badan sida wadamada kale ee horumaray, laakiin iyadoo aysan jirin xanibaado xad-dhaaf ah sida xiritaanka maqaayadaha iyo goobaha tafaariiqda ee lagu qasbay in la xiro.

sourceString: Many events have been cancelled, and Singapore did start advising residents to stay at home on 28 March, but schools reopened on time after holiday break on 23 March.
targetString: Dhawr dal oo kale ayaa ku xakameeyaya safmarka dadaal adag oo ay ku galeen meesha ay dadku ka qaadeen, xadidaada safarka meelaga uu ka bilaabmo, shaybaadh iyo karantiimo laakiin amarka joogitaanka guriga ee markaa aan sidaa u adkayn sida Ayslan iyo Koonfurta Kuuriya.
translated: Dhowr dhacdooyin ah ayaa la baajiyay, Singapore-na waxay bilowday inay ku taliso dadka degan inay guryahooda joogaan 28Ka Maarso, laakiin dugsiyada ayaa dib loo furay waqtigii loogu talagalay ka dib fasaxa fasaxa 23-ka Maarso.

sourceString: Several other countries have also managed the pandemic with aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, but with less aggressive lock-downs, such as Iceland and South Korea.
targetString: Tirakoobka daraasada waxa lagu odaaday in dalalkaas ay sameen shaybaadho aad u badan, ee markaa tirada dadka waawayn ee dhintay, ay markaa yarayd tirada ka dhimatay, taas oo ay dhici karto inay keentay ay si wanaagsan u ogaan kareen marka uu calaamado yar ama wax calaamad ahi ayna jirin xataa.
translated: Dhowr dal oo kale ayaa sidoo kale maareeyey cudurka safmareenka ah iyagoo raad raacaya xiriir adag, xanibaadaha safarka inbound-ka, baaritaanka, iyo karantiilidda, laakiin ay yaraadeen qufulka, sida Iceland iyo Kuuriyada Koonfureed.

sourceString: A statistical study has found that countries that have tested more, relative to the number of deaths, have much lower case fatality rates, probably because these countries are better able to detect those with only mild or no symptoms.
targetString: WHO waxay ku talinyaa in dalalka aan lahayn awooda shaybaadh iyo shaybaadho qaran oo markaa khibradoodu xadidan yahay COVID-19 inay u diraan inta ugu horeysa ee laga helo uyo tobanka ugu horeey ee laga waayo COVID-19 muunadaha mid kamid ah 16 shaybaadh ee WHO si ay u xaqiijiyaan shaybaadhada.
translated: Daraasad tirakoobyo ah ayaa lagu ogaaday in dalalka inbadan la baaray, marka loo eegaayo tirada dhimashada, ay leeyihiin xaddiga dhimashadu ay aad u hooseeyaan, malaha sababtoo ah wadamadan ayaa si fiican u awooda in ay ogaadaan kuwa leh calaamado fudud oo kaliya ama aan lahayn calaamado.

sourceString: WHO recommends that countries that do not have testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience on COVID-19 send their first five positives and the first ten negative COVID-19 samples to one of the 16 WHO reference laboratories for confirmatory testing.
targetString: Shaybaadh 16ka ah, 7 kamid ah ayaa ku yaala Aasiya, 5 waa Yurub, 2 Afrika, 1 Waqooyiga Maraykanak iyo 1 Austaraaliya ah.
translated: Who waxay ku talinaysaa in dalalka aan lahayn awooda baadhitaanada iyo shaybaarada qaran ee khibraddooda kooban u leh covid-19 ay shantoodii qof ee ugu horaysay ee laga qaaday u diraan iyo tobankii sambal ee ugu horeeyay ee laga qaaday COVID-19 laga qaaday mid ka mid ah 16-ka shaybaadh ee tixraaca WHO si loo xaqiijiyo baadhitaan.

sourceString: Out of the 16 reference laboratories, 7 are in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.
targetString: Shaxda soo socotaa, qaybta "Laga heley ee % ee shaybaadada" waxaa markaa muquuniyay xeerka shaybaadhka dalka.
translated: Waxaa ka mid ah 16 sheybaar oo tixraac ah, 7 waxay ku yaalaan Aasiya, 5 Yurub, 2 Afrika, 1 Waqooyiga Ameerika iyo 1 gudaha Australia.

sourceString: In the following chart, the column “Positive as % of tests” is influenced by the country's testing policy.
targetString: Dalka kaliya baadha dadka la dhigaqy isbitaalka waxa laga heleyaa % badan oo shaybaadhka dalka baadhay dhamaan dadkiisa, hadii ay leeyihiin calaamado iyo hadii kaleba, marka laga tago inay waxa iskaga mid noqonayaan.
translated: Shaxda soo socota, qodobka "Positive as % of tests" waxaa saameyn ku leh siyaasadda baaritaanka ee dalkaas.

sourceString: A country that only tests people admitted to hospitals will have a higher positive as % of tests than a country that tests all citizens, whether or not they are showing symptoms, other things being equal.
targetString: Gacmo maydhiga (ama gacmomaydhiga), oo sidoo kale loo yaqaano nadiifinta gacmaha, waxaa weeye sharci uu qofku ku nadiifinayo gacmiisa si uu markaa uga nadiifiyo ciida, saliid ijiinta, cayayaanka, iyo wixii kale ee wasakh ah.
translated: Wadan kaliya lagu baaro dadka cisbitaallada la geeyo ayaa heli doona mid ay ka badan tahay tirada dadka la dhigo isbitaalada oo ay ka badan tahay wadanka laga baaro dadka muwaadinka oo dhan, inay calaamado muujinayaan iyo in kaleba waxyaabo kale ayaa la siman yahay.

sourceString: Hand washing (or handwashing), also known as hand hygiene, is the act of cleaning one's hands for the purpose of removing soil, grease, microorganisms, or other unwanted substances.
targetString: Gacmo dhaqista (ama gacmomayrka), oo sidoo kale loo yaqaano nadiifinta gacmaha, waxaa weeye sharci uu qofku ku nadiifinayo gacmiisa si uu markaa uga nadiifiyo ciida, dufanka, cayayaanka, ama walxaha kale ee aan loo baahnayn.
translated: Gacmo maydhiga (ama gacmo-dhaqashada), oo sidoo kale loo yaqaano nadaafadda gacmaha, waa sharciga uu qofku ku nadiifinayo gacmihiisa si uu uga saaro ciidda, dufanka, cayayaanka, ama walxaha kale ee aan loo tallo galin.

sourceString: Hand washing with soap consistently at certain "critical moments" during the day prevents the spread of many diseases, for example diarrhoea and cholera, which are transmitted through fecal–oral route.
targetString: In gacmaha lagu maydho sabuun si joogto ahi runtii "wakhtiyadan adag" maalintii waxa ay kahortagtaa faafitaanka xanuuno badan, tusaale ahaan shubanka iyo kolooraha, kaas oo markaa lagu kala qaado candhuufta.
translated: Gacmo maydhiga saabuunta lagu maydho si joogto ah qaarkood "wakhtiyada adag" maalintii waxay ka hortagtaa faafitaanka cudurro badan, tusaale ahaan shubanka iyo daacuunka, kuwaas oo lagu kala qaado marinka saxarada ee afka laga galo.

sourceString: People can also become infected with respiratory diseases such as influenza or the common cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose, or mouth (i.e., mucous membranes).
targetString: Dadku waxa ay sido kale qaadi karaan cudurada neefsashada sida hargabka ama durayga, tusaale ahaan, hadii ayna mayrin gacmahooda oo ay kadibna taabtaan indhahooda, sanka ama afka (sida, dheecaanka).
translated: Dadka waxay kaloo noqon karaan cudurro ku dhaca neef-mareenka sida influenza ama hargabka caadi ah, tusaale ahaan haddii aysan dhaqin gacmahooda inta aysan taabanin indhahooda, sanka ama afkooda (yacle xuubka dheecaanka).

sourceString: The five critical moments during the day where washing hands with soap is important include: before and after defecation, after cleaning a child's bottom or changing nappies, before feeding a child, before eating and before and after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: Shan mar oo xasaasi ah maalintii oo ay markaa in gacmaha lagu mayrto saabuuntu ay muhiim tahay: kahor iyo kadib marka wax la nadiifiyo, kadib marka ilmaha dabada laga mayro ama laga badalo xafaayada, ka hor inta aadan quudin cunnuga, kahor cunnada iyo ka hor diyaarinta cuntada ama qabashada hilibka ceyriinka ah, kalluunka, ama digaagga.
translated: Shanta marxaladood ee muhiimka ah maalintii oo aad gacmaha saabuun ku maydhiddid ay muhiim tahay: kahor iyo ka dib marka la nadiifiyo, kadib marka ilmaha hoostiisa la nadiifiyo ama la badalo xafaayada, ka hor inta aanu quudin cunugga, kahor inta aanu cunin iyo ka hor diyaarinta cuntada ama ka maaraynta hilibka ceyriin, kalluunka, ama digaagga.

sourceString: If water and soap are not available, hands can be cleaned with ash.The World Health Organization recommends washing hands:
targetString: Hadii aanad haysan sabuun iyo biyo, gacmaha waa lagu nadiifin karaa dambas.Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka waxay nagula talinaysaa gacmo dhaqidda:
translated: ["Haddii aan la helin biyo iyo saabuun, gacmaha waxaa lagu nadiifin karaa dambas. Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka waxay ku talineysaa in aad gacmo-dhaqato:"]

sourceString: Before, during, and after preparing food.
targetString: Kahor, inta lagu jiro, iyo kadib diyaarinta cuntada.
translated: Kahor, inta lagu jiro, iyo kadib diyaarinta cuntada.

sourceString: Before and after caring for a sick person.
targetString: Kahor iyo kadib marka loo adeego qof xanuunsanaya.
translated: Kahor iyo kadib marka loo daryeelo qof xanuunsanaya.

sourceString: After changing the diapers or cleaning up a child who has used the toilet.
targetString: Kadib marka laga badalo xafaada ama loo maydho ilmo suuliga isticmaalay.
translated: Ka dib marka xamaasadaha la beddelo ama la nadiifiyo canuggii musqusha isticmaalay.

sourceString: After blowing your nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Ka dib markaad buufiso sankaaga, qufacdo ama hindhisto.
translated: Ka dib markaad sankaaga buunbuuniso, qufacdo ama hindhisid.

sourceString: After touching animal, animal feed, or animal waste.
targetString: Ka dib taabashada xayawaanka, quudinta xayawaanka, ama qashinka xoolaha.
translated: Ka dib taabashada xayawaanka, quudinta xayawaanka, ama qashinka xoolaha.

sourceString: Medical hand hygiene refers to hygiene practices related to medical procedures.
targetString: Nadaafadda gacanta ee caafimaadka waxaa loola jeedaa dhaqamada nadaafadda ee la xiriira nidaamyada caafimaadka.
translated: Nadaafadda gacanta ee caafimaadka waxaa loola jeedaa dhaqamada nadaafadda ee la xiriira nidaamyada caafimaadka.

sourceString: Hand washing before administering medicine or medical care can prevent or minimize the spread of disease.
targetString: Gacmo maydhista kahor inta aan la bixin dawo ama daryeelka caafimaadku waxa uu kahortagaa ama yareeyaa faafitaanka xanuunada.
translated: Gacma maydhiga kahor inta aan la bixin dawo ama daryeel caafimaad wuxuu ka hortagi karaa ama yarayn karaa faafitaanka xanuunka.

sourceString: The main medical purpose of washing hands is to cleanse the hands of pathogens (bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms that can cause disease) and chemicals which can cause harm or diseases.
targetString: Ujeedada caafimaad ee ugu weyn ee dhaqitaanka gacmaha waa in laga nadiifiyo gacmaha caabuqyada (bakteeriyada, fayraska, ama cayayaan kale ee keeni kara xanuun) iyo kiimikooyin sababi kara waxyeelo ama cuduro.
translated: Ujeeddada caafimaad ee ugu weyn ee dhaqidda gacmaha waa in laga nadiifiyo gacmaha jeermiska (bakteeriyada, fayraska, ama cayayaan kale oo keeni kara cudur) iyo kiimikooyin sababi kara waxyeelo ama cuduro.

sourceString: This is especially important for people who handle food or work in the medical field, but also an important practice for the general public.
targetString: Tani waxa ay si gaar ah muhiim u tahay dadka cuntada ka shaqeeya ama dadka caafimaadka ka shaqeeya, laakiin waxa sidoo kale ay muhiim u tahay shacabka guud ahaan.
translated: Tani waxay si gaar ah muhiim ugu tahay dadka cuntada ka shaqeeya ama ka shaqeeya caafimaadka, laakiin sidoo kale waa dhaqan muhiim u ah dadweynaha guud ahaan.

sourceString: Hand washing has many health benefits, including minimizing the spread of influenza, coronavirus, and other infectious diseases; preventing infectious causes of diarrhea; decreasing respiratory infections;
targetString: Gacmo maydhigu waxa uu leeyahay faa'idooyin badan oo caafimaad, oo ay ku jiraan yaraynta faafitaanka hargabka, coronavirus, iyo xanuuna kale; waxa uu baajiyaa caabuqa keena shubanka; caabuqa xanuunada neefsiga;
translated: ["Gacmo maydhigu waxa uu leeyahay faa'idooyin badan oo caafimaad oo ay ka mid yihiin yaraynta faafitaanka influenza, coronavirus, iyo cudurro kale oo faafa; ka hortagista faafitaanka keeno shuban; yaraynta caabuqa neef-mareenka;"]

sourceString: and reducing infant mortality rate at home birth deliveries.
targetString: oo waxa uu yareetaa xadiga dhimashada ee caruurta guriga lagu dhalo.
translated: iyo yaraynta heerka dhimashada ee dhallaanka ee dhalmada guriga lagu dhalo.

sourceString: A 2013 study showed that improved hand washing practices may lead to small improvements in the length growth in children under five years of age.
targetString: Daraasad la sameeyay 2013 ayaa muujinaysa in hormarka lagu sameeyo nidaamka gacmo maydhigu uu horseedi karo in hormar lagu sameeyo mudada koriinka ilmaha ee markaa ka yar shan jirka.
translated: Daraasad la sameeyay 2013 ayaa muujisay in hagaagidda hababka gacmo maydhiga laga yaabo inay horseedo horumarro yar oo ku yimaada koritaanka dhererka ee caruurta ka yar shanta sano.

sourceString: In developing countries, childhood mortality rates related to respiratory and diarrheal diseases can be reduced by introducing simple behavioral changes, such as hand washing with soap.
targetString: Dalalka soo koraya, xadiga dhimashada caruurta ee markaa la xidhiidha mushkiladaha neefsiga iyo xanuunada shubanka waxaa lagu yarayn karaa isaga oo kaliya la badalo habdhaqanka, sida gacmaha oo sabuun lagu maydho.
translated: Dalalka soo koraya, xadiga dhimashada caruurta ee la xidhiidha xanuunada neefmareenka iyo shubanka waxaa lagu yarayn karaa iyadoo la keeno isbedel habdhaqan ah oo sahlan, sida gacmo maydhiga saabuun.

sourceString: This simple action can reduce the rate of mortality from these diseases by almost 50%.
targetString: Talaabadan fudud waxa ay yarayn kartaa xadiga dhimashada ee xanuunadan ilaa 50%.
translated: Talaabadan sahlan waxay hoos u dhigi kartaa heerka dhimashada cuduradan ku dhawaad 50%.

sourceString: Interventions that promote hand washing can reduce diarrhoea episodes by about a third, and this is comparable to providing clean water in low income areas.
targetString: Ololaha samaynaya wacyi gelinta gacmo maydhigu waxa uu yarayn karaa inuu yimaado shuban ilaa sadex meelood oo meel, oo taas waxa u dhigma biyaha nadiifta ah ee lasiiyo aaga dadka dakhligoodu hooseeyo.
translated: Wax-ka-qabashada kor u qaadista gacmo maydhiga waxay yarayn kartaa duruufaha shubanka ilaa sadex meelood meel, taas oo u dhiganta sida biyaha nadiifka ah looga helo meelaha dakhligoodu hooseeyo.

sourceString: 48% of reductions in diarrhoea episodes can be associated with hand washing with soap.Hand washing with soap is the single most effective and inexpensive way to prevent diarrhea and acute respiratory infections (ARI), as automatic behavior performed in homes, schools, and communities worldwide.
targetString: Yaraynta 48% shubanku waxa uu la xidhiidhaa gacmaha oo lagu maydho saabuun. Gacmaha oo lagu maydho saabuun waxa uu noqon karaa shayga ugu muhiimsan ee uguna jaban ee looga hotagi karo shubanka iyo caabuqa aadka u aran ee neefsiga (ARI), taas oo markaa ah shay si toos ah loogu samayn karo guriga, dugsiyada, iyo bulshada oo dhan.
translated: ["Boqolkiiba 48% hoos u dhaca dhacdooyinka shubanka waxaa lala xiriirin karaa gacmo maydhiga saabuun. Gacmo maydhiga saabuunta ayaa ah habka ugu waxtarka badan uguna qaalisan ee looga hortagi karo shubanka iyo caabuqa neefmareenka ba'aanka (ARI), iyadoo ay tahay habdhaqan toos ah oo lagu sameeyo guryaha, dugsiyada, iyo bulshooyinka adduunka oo dhan."]

sourceString: Pneumonia, a major ARI, is the number one cause of mortality among children under five years old, taking the lives of an estimated 1.8 million children per year.
targetString: Xanuunka sanbabka, ARI aad u wayn, waxaa weeye waxa ugu horreya ee keena dhimashada caruurta ka yar shan sano jirka, kaas oo markaa dila qiyaastii 1.8 milyan oo caruur ah sanadkii.
translated: Sanboorka, ARI wayn, waa waxa ugu horeeya ee keena dhimashada ee caruurta ka yar shan sano jirka, taas oo ka dhigaysa nolosha qiyaastii 1.8 milyan oo caruur ah sanadkii.

sourceString: Diarrhea and pneumonia together account for almost 3.5 million child deaths annually.
targetString: Shubanka iyo xanuunka sanbabka marka la isku daro waxa ay sababaan ilaa 3.5 milyan oo caruur ah dhimashadood sanadkii.
translated: Shubanka iyo xanuunka sanbabka marka la isku daro waxaa lagu tiriyaa ku dhawaad 3.5 milyan oo caruur ah oo sanadkiiba u dhinta.

sourceString: According to UNICEF, turning hand washing with soap before eating and after using the toilet into an ingrained habit can save more lives than any single vaccine or medical intervention, cutting deaths from diarrhea by almost half and deaths from acute respiratory infections by one-quarter.
targetString: Sida ay sheegtey UNICEF, in gacmaha lagu maydho saabuun kahor inta aan cunta da la cunin iyo marka suuliga laga soo baxo oo laga dhigto dhaqan waxa ay badbaadin kartaa nolosha wax ka badan talaal kasta ama daawayn, oo waxa ay baajisaa shubanka kala badh iyo kala badh dhimashada xanuunada neefsiga sadexdii biloodba.
translated: ["Sida ay sheegtay UNICEF, in gacmaha lagu maydho saabuun ka hor inta aan la cunin iyo ka dib marka aad musqusha u adeegsato waxay u noqon kartaa caado ingrained waxay badbaadin kartaa nolosha wax ka badan talaal kasta ama dawo kasta oo la sameeyo, iyadoo meesha ka saarta shubanka ku dhawaad kala bar tan iyo dhimashada caabuqa neefmareenka ba'an saddexdii biloodba."]

sourceString: Hand washing is usually integrated together with other sanitation interventions as part of water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) programmes.
targetString: Gacmo maydhiga waxaa caadiyan la dhax galiyaa wacyi gelinta nadaafada ee kale taas oo kamid ah biyaha, nadaafada, iyo nadiifinta barnaamijyada ah (WASH).
translated: Gacmo maydhiga waxaa caadiyan la dhex galiyaa waxqabadyo kale oo nadaafadoon ah taas oo qayb ka ah barnaamijyada biyaha, fayadhowrka iyo fayadhowrka (WASH).

sourceString: Hand washing also protects against impetigo which is transmitted through direct physical contact.
targetString: Gacmo maydhigu waxa ay sidoo kale dadka ka ilaaliyaa caabuqa maqaarka ee markaa taabashada ku gudba.
translated: Gacmo maydhigu waxa ay sidoo kale ka difaacaysaa caaro jilicsanaan kaas oo mara taabashada tooska ah ee jireed.

sourceString: A small detrimental effect of hand washing is that frequent hand washing can lead to skin damage due to drying of the skin.
targetString: Saamayn yar oo xun oo gacmaha maydhiga joogtada ahi waxaa weeye in gacmo maydhiga joogtada ahi ay keeni karaan in maqaarku uu qalalo.
translated: Saamayn yar oo xun oo gacmaha maydhiga ahi waa in gacmo maydhiga joogtada ahi ay keeni karaan in maqaarku uu dhaawac maqaarka ka soo gaadho qalaylka.

sourceString: A 2012 Danish study found that excessive hand washing can lead to an itchy, flaky skin condition known as hand eczema or hand dermatitis, which is especially common among health-care workers.
targetString: Daraasad Denmark lagu sameeyay 2012 ayaa lagu ogaaday in gacmo maydhiga badan uu keeni karo cuncun, inay maqaarku uu yeesho xanuun sida eczema ama cuncun iyo finan, taas oo badanaa lagu yaqaan shaqaalaha daryeelka caafimaadka.
translated: Daraasad Denmark la sameeyay sannadkii 2012 ayaa lagu ogaaday in gacmo maydhiga xad-dhaafka ahi ay keeni karaan cuncun, oo ah maqaar xanuun oo maqaarku ku dhaco oo loo yaqaanno "hand eczema" ama rematitis (hand dermatitis), taasoo si gaar ah ugu badan shaqaalaha daryeelka caafimaadka.

sourceString: Too frequent hand washing is also seen as one of the symptoms of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).
targetString: In gacmaha in badan la maydhaa waxaa loo yaqaan calaamadaha lagu yaqaan khalkhalka kaga dhaga qofka wax (OCD).
translated: Gacmo maydhiga badanaaba waxaa loo arkaa mid ka mid ah calaamadaha lagu garto khalkhalka daran ee obsessive Obsessive Disorder (OCD).

sourceString: There are five critical times during the day where washing hands with soap is important to reduce fecal-oral transmission of disease: after using the bathroom (urination, defecation), after cleaning a child's bottom (changing nappies), before feeding a child, before eating and before/after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: Waxa jira shan mar oo muhiim ay tahay maalintii in gacmaha lagu maydho saabuuni ay muhiim tahay si markaa loo yareeto in xanuunku qofka afka ka galo:   kadib marka aad suuliga isticmaasho (kaadida, saxarada), kadib marka aad ilmo dabada ka maydho (ka badalka xafaayada), kahor inta aanad quudin ilmaha, kahor inta aanad wax cunin iyo kahor/kadib diyaarinta cuntada ama  ka shaqaynta hilibka, kaluunka, ama digaaga qaydhiin.
translated: Waxaa jira shan mar oo xasaasi ah maalintii oo ay muhiim tahay in gacmaha lagu maydho saabuun ay muhiim tahay si loo yareeyo in cudurka afka laga galo: kadib marka aad musqusha isticmaasho (kaadido, saxaro), kadib marka aad ilmaha hoostiisa iska maydho (bedesho xafaayada), kahor inta aanad quudin ilmaha, kahor inta aanad wax cunin iyo kahor/kadib markaad diyaarinayso cunto ama qabta hilibka cayriin, kalluunka, ama digaaga.

sourceString: Other occasions when correct handwashing technique should be practiced in order to prevent the transmission of disease include before and after treating a cut or wound; after sneezing, coughing, or blowing your nose; after touching animal waste or handling animals; and after touching garbage.
targetString: Marar kale oo marka gacmo maydhiga saxda ah ay tahay in la isticmaalaa waa marka laga hortago faafitaanka xanuunka oo ay ku jirto kahor iyo kadib u daawaynta naburka ama dhaawaca; kadib marka ka hindhiso, qufaco, ama duufka la iska bi'iyo: kadib marka saxarada xayawaan la taabto ama xayawaan laga shaqeeyo; iyo kadib marka qashinka la taabto.
translated: Marar kale oo ay ka mid tahay marka farsamada gacmo-dhaqashada saxda ah ay tahay in la isticmaalo si looga hortago in cudurku gudbiyo oo ay ka mid tahay kahor iyo kadib marka la daaweeyo goynta ama dhaawaca; Ka dib markaad hindhisid, qufacdo, ama sankaaga la afuufo; ka dib taabashada qashinka xoolaha ama qabashada xayawaanka; Iyo Qashinka Taabato kadib.

sourceString: In many countries, there is a low rate of hand washing with soap.
targetString: Dalal badan, waxaa gacaha ku maydha saabuun dad yar.
translated: Dalal badan, waxaa ku yar heerka farxalka saabuun lagu mayd-gareeyo.

sourceString: A study of hand washing in 54 countries in 2015 found that on average, 38.7% of households practiced hand washing with soap.A 2014 study showed that Saudi Arabia had the highest rate of 97 percent; the United States near the middle with 77 percent; and China with the lowest rate of 23 percent.Several behaviour change methodologies now exist to increase uptake of the behaviour of hand washing with soap at the critical times.Group hand washing for school children at set times of the day is one option in developing countries to engrain hand washing in children's behaviors.
targetString: Daraasad ayaa muujinaysaa in 54 dal 2015 la ogaaday in celcelis ahaan, 38.7% qoysaska ku dhaqma gacmo-dhaqashada saabuunta lagu dhaqo. Daraasad la sameeyay 2014 ayaa muujisay in Sacuudi Carabiya ay heysato saamiga ugu sareeya boqolkiiba 97; Mareykanka oo u dhow dhexe oo leh boqolkiiba 77; iyo Shiinaha oo leh heerka ugu hooseeya ee 23 boqolkiiba. Habab dhowr ah oo dabeecadda ah oo isbeddelka ah ayaa hadda jira si loo kordhiyo qaadashada dhaqanka gacmo-dhaqashada waqtiyada xasaasiga ah. Gacmo-dhaqashada kooxeed ee carruurta dugsiga waqtiyada go'an ee maalinta ayaa ah ikhtiyaar u ah waddamada soo koraya inay gacan ka geystaan dhaqitaanka gacmaha dhaqamada carruurta.
translated: Daraasad lagu sameeyay farxal dhaqashada oo ka dhacday 54 dal sanadkii 2015kii ayaa lagu ogaaday in celcelis ahaan 38.7% qoysaska ay ku dhaqmaan gacmo-dhaqashada saabuun. Daraasad la sameeyay 2014 ayaa muujisay in Saudi Arabia uu lahaa heerka ugu sarreeya ee boqolkiiba 97; Mareykanka oo ku dhow bartamaha, isagoo helay 77 boqolkiiba; iyo Shiinaha oo leh qiimihii ugu hooseeyay boqolkiiba 23. Habab dhawr ah oo isbedelaya hababka dabeecada ayaa hada jira si loo kordhiyo qaadashada habdhaqanka gacmo maydhiga saabuun lagu maydhay waqtiyada xasaasiga ah. In caruurta iskuulada lagu dhaqo kooxo xilliyo la cayimay oo maalinti la joogo ayaa ah hal doorasho oo ka mid ah dalalka soo koraya inay faragelinta ku maydhaan habdhaqanka caruurta.

sourceString: The "Essential Health Care Program" implemented by the Department of Education in the Philippines is an example of at scale action to promote children's health and education.
targetString: Barnaamijka Daryeelka Caafimaadka Daruuriga ah oo ay dhaqan gelinayso Waaxda Waxbarashada ee Filibiin waa tusaale misaanka ficilka si markaa loogu horumariyo caafimaadka caruurta iyo waxbarashada.
translated: "Barnaamijka Daryeelka Caafimaadka Daruuriga ah" oo ay hirgelisay Waaxda Waxbarashada ee Filibiin waa tusaale ku filan ficilka qiyaasta si sare loogu qaado caafimaadka iyo waxbarashada caruurta.

sourceString: Deworming twice a year, supplemented with washing hands daily with soap, brushing teeth daily with fluoride, is at the core of this national program.
targetString: Iyada oo la bixinayo laba jeer sanadkii, in lagu daro ku farxalashada saabuunta, ilkaha oo la cadayo oo la findhicisho, ayaa asal u ah barnaamijkamn qaran.
translated: Laba jeer sanadkiiba, oo lagu daro gacmo dhaqidda maalin walba saabuun, ilkaha oo la cadaysto oo lagu cadaydo fluoride, ayaa udub-dhexaadka u ah barnaamijkan qaran.

sourceString: It has also been successfully implemented in Indonesia.
targetString: Waxaa sidoo kale si wanaagsan looga dhaqan geliyay Indooniisiya.
translated: Waxaa sidoo kale si guul ah looga hirgeliyay in Indooniisiya.

sourceString: Removal of microorganisms from skin is enhanced by the addition of soaps or detergents to water.
targetString: In maqaarka laga baabi'yo cayayaanka waxaa kor u qaada sabuun ama wasakhtire biyo leh.
translated: ["In maqaarka laga baabi'iyo cayayaanada cayayaanka waxaa kor u qaada saabuun ama walxaha biyaha lagu daro."]

sourceString: The main action of soaps and detergents is to reduce barriers to solution, and increase solubility.
targetString: Talaabada ugu wayn ee sabuunta iyo taydhahu waa in lagu yareeyo caqabadaha xalka, oo kor loogu qaado milankooda.
translated: Talaabada ugu wayn ee saabuunta iyo tamar-siiyayaasha waa in la yareeyo caqabadaha xalka, iyo in la kordhiyo xajinta.

sourceString: Water alone is an inefficient skin cleanser because fats and proteins, which are components of organic soil, are not readily dissolved in water.
targetString: Biyaha kaliya kuma filna maqaarka in lagu nadiifiyo maadaama oo duxda iyo borootiintu, kuwaas oo qayb ka ah ciida dabiiciga ah, biyaha kuma milmaan.
translated: Biyaha oo keliya ayaa ah maqaar nadiifiye aan ku filnayn sababtoo ah dufanka iyo borotiinada, kuwaas oo qayb ka ah ciidda dabiiciga ah, biyaha kuma biiraan.

sourceString: Cleansing is, however, aided by a reasonable flow of water..
targetString: Nadiifinta ayaa, si kastaba ha ahaatee, waxaa caawiya qulqulka biyaha ee macquulka ah.
translated: Nadiifinta ayaa, si kastaba ha ahaatee, waxaa caaiya qulqulka biyaha ee macquulka ah.

sourceString: Solid soap, because of its reusable nature, may hold bacteria acquired from previous uses.
targetString: Saabuunta adag, maadaama oo dib loo isticmaali karo, waxa saarnaan kara baakteeriyadii kasoo hadhay isticmaalkii hore.
translated: Saabuunta adag, sababtoo ah dabeecada dib loo isticmaali karo, waxaa laga yaabaa inay haysato bakteeriyada laga helay isticmaalkii hore.

sourceString: A small number of studies which have looked at the bacterial transfer from contaminated solid soap have concluded transfer is unlikely as the bacteria are rinsed off with the foam.
targetString: Daraasado yar oo lagu eego kasoo gudubka baakteeriyada sabuunta wasakhaysan ayaa oo la sameeyay ayaa muujiyay inay adag tahay in baakteeriyadu ay biyaha ka raacdo.
translated: Tiro yar oo daraasaddo ah oo lagu eegay kala iibsiga bakteeriyada ka timid saabuunta adag ee niyad jabsan ayaa lagu soo gabagabeeyay wareejinta maadaama bakteeriyada ay ku dhammaatay xumbada.

sourceString: The CDC still states "liquid soap with hands-free controls for dispensing is preferable".
targetString: CDC waxay ku talisaa "in saabuunta dareeraha ah ee gacantu ayna soo gaadhaynin ee markaa weelka kasoo baxdaa ay ka wanaagsan tahay".
translated: CDC waxay wali sheegaysaa "saabuunta dareeraha ah ee gacmo-la\'aanta ah ee gacmo-la\'aanta ah si loogu qaybiyo ay tahay mid aad u fiican".

sourceString: Antibacterial soaps have been heavily promoted to a health-conscious public.
targetString: Saabuunta baakhteeriyada disha waaa si wayn loogu xayaysiiyaa si markaa shacabka caafimaadka waxay u tarayso ay u ogaadaan.
translated: Saabuunta bakteeriyada disha ayaa si weyn loogu dallacsiiyay si ay uga mid noqdaan dad caafimaad dareensan.

sourceString: To date, there is no evidence that using recommended antiseptics or disinfectants selects for antibiotic-resistant organisms in nature.
targetString: Ilaa maanta, ma jiraan wax caddeyn ah oo sheegaya in la adeegsado cayayaan dileyaasha ama jeermis dileyaasha lagu taliyaa ee loo doortay cayayaanka antiboodigu aanu waxba ka qaadan inuu dabiici yahay.
translated: Ilaa maanta, ma jiraan wax caddeyn ah oo muujinaya in la adeegsado dawooyinka lagu taliyay ama jeermis dileyaasha loo xusho cayayaanka antibiyootiga u adkaysta dabiici ahaan.

sourceString: However, antibacterial soaps contain common antibacterial agents such as triclosan, which has an extensive list of resistant strains of organisms.
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, saabuunta bakteeriyada disha waxa ku jira wax bakteeriyada dila caadiyan sida triclosan, kaas oo markaa uu ku jiro wax cayayaanta iska caabiya oo laaya.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, saabuunta bakteeriyada disha waxa ku jira wax bakteeriyada disha bakteeriyada sida triclosan oo leh liis balaaran oo ah noocyada adkaysiga u adkeysta ee cayayaanka.

sourceString: So, even if antibiotic resistant strains aren't selected for by antibacterial soaps, they might not be as effective as they are marketed to be.
targetString: Marka, xitaa haddii noocyada dawooyinka u adkaysiga antibiyootiga aan loo xushay saabuunta bakteeriyada dila, waxaa laga yaabaa inaysan u noqon wax waxtar ah sidii loo suuqgeeyay.
translated: Marka, xitaa haddii noocyada u adkaysiga antibiyootikada aan loo xushay saabuunta bakteeriyada disha, waxaa laga yaabaa inaysan waxtar u yeelan sida loo suuq geeyo.

sourceString: Besides the surfactant and skin-protecting agent, the sophisticated formulations may contain acids (acetic acid, ascorbic acid, lactic acid) as pH regulator, antimicrobially active benzoic acid and further skin conditioners (aloe vera, vitamins, menthol, plant extracts).A comprehensive analysis from the University of Oregon School of Public Health indicated that plain soaps are as effective as consumer-grade anti-bacterial soaps containing triclosan in preventing illness and removing bacteria from the hands.
targetString: Ka sokow iyada oo laga duulayo dusha iyo ilaaliyaha maqaarka, qaababka casriyeysan waxaa ku jiri kara aashito (acetic acid, ascorbic acid, lactic acid) sida aaladda xakamaynta pH, acid benzoic acid firfircoon iyo qaboojiyeyaasha maqaarka ee dheeraad ah (aloe vera, fiitamiinnada, menthol, soosaarka dhirta). Qiimayn is barbar dhig oo ay samaysay Jaamacada Oregon Waaxda Caafimaadka Shacabka ayaa muujinaysa in saabuunta saafiga ah ay wax utarto sida saabuunta macaamiisha loogu talo geley ee saabuunta bakteeriyada disha ee uu ku jiro triclosan kahortaga iyo meesha ka saarida bakteeriyada ee gacmaha.
translated: Ka sokow dusha iyo ilaaliyaha maqaarka, qaababka casriga ah ee casriga ah waxaa ku jiri kara asiidhka (acetic acid, ascorbic acid, ascorbic acid, lactic acid) sida jadwalka pH, antimicrobially firfircoon benzoic acid iyo qaboojiyeyaal kale oo maqaarka ah (aloe vera, fiitamiinnada, menthol, dhirta laga soosaaray). Falanqayn dhamaystiran oo laga sameeyay Jaamacadda Oregon School of Public Health ayaa lagu muujiyey in saabuunta saabuunta saabuunta caadiga ah ee ka hortaga bakteeriyada heerka macaamilka ee ay ku jiraan triclosan marka laga hortago cudurka iyo in ay bakteeriyada ka saaraan gacmaha.

sourceString: Hot water that is comfortable for washing hands is not hot enough to kill bacteria.
targetString: Biyaha kulul ee gacantu qaadi kartaa maaha biyaha kulul ee baakteeriyada dilaya.
translated: Biyo kulul oo raaxo u ah in gacmaha la mayro, kuma kulula kulula in ay dilaan bakteeriyada.

sourceString: Bacteria grow much faster at body temperature (37 °C).
targetString: Taranka bakteeriyada ayaa bata marka heerkulka jirku noqdo (37°C).
translated: Bakteeriyada ayaa si xawli ah uga soo baxda heerkulka jirka (37°C).

sourceString: However, warm, soapy water is more effective than cold, soapy water at removing natural oils which hold soils and bacteria.
targetString: Laakiin, biyaha diiranee saabuunta leh waxa ay ka waxtar badan yihiin biyaha qabaw ee saabuunta leh marka la eego maydhisa saliida dabiiciga ah ee markaa ciida iyo baakteeriyada qabata.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, biyaha diiran ee saabuunta leh ayaa ka waxtar badan biyaha qabow ee saabuunta badan leh marka loo eego saliidaha dabiiciga ah ee ciidda iyo bakteeriyada qabata.

sourceString: Contrary to popular belief however, scientific studies have shown that using warm water has no effect on reducing the microbial load on hands.
targetString: Si kasoo horjeeda waxa ay dadku aaminsan yahay, daraasad saynisyahano ayaa muujinaysa in isticmaalka biyaha diiran ayna wax saamayn ah ku lahayn yaraynta cayayaanka saaran gacmaha.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, waxa ka soo horjeeda aaminsanaanta caanka ah, daraasad cilmiyeedyo la sameeyay ayaa muujiyey in adeegsiga biyo diirran aysan wax saamayn ah ku lahayn yaraynta culeyska miyirbial-ka ee gacmaha.

sourceString: A hand sanitizer or hand antiseptic is a non-water-based hand hygiene agent.
targetString: Gacmo nadiifiyaha ama gacmo cayayaan ka dilaha waxaa weeye nadiifiye gacanta oo markaa biyo aan loo isticmaalin.
translated: Gacmo nadiifiyaha ama jeermis dile gacmo kaymdhiga (hand antiseptic) waa nadiifiye gacmaha oo aan biyo ku salaysnayn.

sourceString: In the late 1990s and early part of the 21st century, alcohol rub non-water-based hand hygiene agents (also known as alcohol-based hand rubs, antiseptic hand rubs, or hand sanitizers) began to gain popularity.
targetString: Dhamaadkii 1990-yaadkii iyo horaantii qarnihii 21aad, gacmo nadiifiyaha biya aan loo isticmaalin ee aalkoloda leh (oo sidoo kale loo yaqaanay gacmo lagu jijibiyaha alkohooshe leh, cayayaan ka dilaha gacmaha ee lagu jijibiyo, ama gacmo nadiifiye) ayaa markaa soo caan baxay.
translated: Dhamaadkii 1990-yadii iyo horaantii qarnigii 21aad, gacmo nadiifiyaha gacmo nadiifiyaha ee aan biyo ku salaysnayn ee aalkolada lagu masaxo (oo sidoo kale loo yaqaano gacmo isku xoqidda aalkolada, ka hortagga gacmaha lagu jijibiyo, ama gacmo nadiifiyaha) ayaa bilaabay in ay caan noqdaan.

sourceString: Most are based on isopropyl alcohol or ethanol formulated together with a thickening agent such as Carbomer (polymer of acrylic acid) into a gel, or a humectant such as glycerin into a liquid, or foam for ease of use and to decrease the drying effect of the alcohol.
targetString: Badankood waxaa weeye aalkoloda isopropyl ama kuwa ethanol ay samaysay oo markaa uu la socdo kuwa lagu dhuubo ee Carbomer (polymer ee acrylic aashato) oo markaa laga dhigay jeel, ama humectant sida glycerin oo dareere laga dhigay, ama xumbadu si markaa si fudud loogu isticmaali karo oo noola yareero saamaynta qalalka ee aalkolada.
translated: Badanaa waxay ku salaysanyihiin aalkoladda isopropyl ama ethanol oo ay la socoto oo ay weheliso waxyaabo qaro weyn sida Carbomer (polymer of acrylic acrylic acid) oo galay jel, ama humectant sida glycerin oo dareere laga dhigay, ama xumbo si loo fududeeyo isticmaalka iyo in la yareeyo saameynta qalalan ee aalkhoolka.

sourceString: Adding diluted hydrogen-peroxide increases further  the antimicrobial activity.Hand sanitizers containing a minimum of 60 to 95% alcohol are efficient germ killers.
targetString: Marka lagu daro aalada hydrogen-peroxide la milay waxa ay kordhisaa hawsha dilida cayayaanka.Nadiifiyaha gacmaha ee markaa ay ku jirto ugu yaraan 60 ilaa 95% aalkolo waxa ay ku filan tahay dilida jeermiska.
translated: Ku darista hydrogen-peroxide la qasiy oo la daray waxay sii kordhisaa waxqabadka antimicrobial. Nadaafada gacmaha ee ay ku jiraan ugu yaraan 60 ilaa 95% aalkoolada ayaa ah kuwo wax ku ool ah oo dilajeerka.

sourceString: Alcohol rub sanitizers kill bacteria, multi-drug resistant bacteria (MRSA and VRE), tuberculosis, and some viruses (including HIV, herpes, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, influenza, and hepatitis) and fungi.
targetString: In alkahoosha gacmaha lagu nadiifiyo waxa uu dilaa baaktiiriyada, baakteeriyada dawadu ayna dilin (MRSA iyo VRE), qaaxada, iyo fayrusyada qaar (oo ay ku jiraan HIV, herpes, RVS, rhinovirus, vaccinai, hargabka, iyo jooniska) iyo fayruska.
translated: Nadaafada alcohoosha lagu jijibiyo waxay dilaan baakteeriyada, bakteeriyada dawooyinka badan ee u adkaysata (MRSA iyo VRE), qaaxada, iyo fayraska qaar (oo ay ku jiraan HIV, herpes, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, hargabka, iyo cagaarshowga) iyo fayraska.

sourceString: Alcohol rub sanitizers containing 70% alcohol kill 99.97% (3.5 log reduction, similar to 35 decibel reduction) of the bacteria on hands 30 seconds after application and 99.99% to 99.999% (4 to 5 log reduction) of the bacteria on hands 1 minute after application.Hand sanitizers are most effective against bacteria and less effective against some viruses.
targetString: Aalkolada gacmaha lagu jijibiyo ee nadiifiyaha ahi ee uu ku jiro 70% aalkolada waxa ay dishaa 99.97% (3.5 duwaanka yaraynta, sidoo kale 35 yaraynta tirada) baakteeriyada gacaha saaran 30 ilbidhiqsi kadib marka la mariyo iyo 99.99% ilaa 99.999% (4 ilaa 5 duwaan yarayn) bakteeriyada gacanta saaran 1 daqiiqo kadib marka la mariyo.Gacme nadiifiyaha ayaa wax wanaagsan ka tara bakteeriyada oo waxa badan kama taraan fayrasyada.
translated: Nadaafada khamriga lagu masaxo ee ay ku jiraan 70% aalkooladaha ayaa dila 99.97% (3.5 duqeynta dukaanka, si la mid ah 35 yaraynta decibel) ee bakteeriyada gacamaha saaran 30 ilbiriqsi kadib marka la mariyo iyo 99.99% ilaa 99.999% (4 ilaa 5 gacmo dhimis) bakteeriyada gacanta ku jirta 1 daqiiqo kadib marka la codsado. Nadaafada gacmaha ayaa ah kuwa ugu waxtarka badan ka hortaga bakteeriyada wayna ka waxtar yar yihiin fayruusyada qaar.

sourceString: Alcohol-based hand sanitizers are almost entirely ineffective against norovirus (or Norwalk) type viruses, the most common cause of contagious gastroenteritis.Enough hand antiseptic or alcohol rub must be used to thoroughly wet or cover both hands.
targetString: Gacmo nadiifiyaha alkohoosha leh badanaa waxba kama taraan norovirus (ama Norwalk) fayrusyada ah kuwaas oo ah kuwa ugu badan ee keena gestroentertis. Waa in gacmaha jeermis dile ama alkohool wanaagsan loo isticmaalaa isku xoqa inta ay qoyan yihiin ama si wanaagsan loo wada gaadhsiiyaa labada gacmood.,
translated: Gacmo nadaafada alcohoosha ku salaysani gebi ahaanba waxba kama taraan fayruuska norovirus (ama Norwalk) ee fayruusyada nooca loo yaqaan, kuwaas oo ah kuwa ugu badan ee keena caloosha iyo fayruska caloosha ee caloosha. Gacmo ka hortaga ama aalkhoosha oo kugu filan waa in loo isticmaalaa in si fiican loo qoyay ama lagu daboolo labada gacmoodba.

sourceString: The front and back of both hands and between and the ends of all fingers are rubbed for approximately 30 seconds until the liquid, foam or gel is dry.
targetString: Xaga hore iyo dhabarka labada gacmood iyo inta u dhaxeyssa iyo dhamaadka dhamaan faraha ayaa la isku xoqayaa celcelis ahaan 30 ilbidhiqsi ilaa inta dareeraha, xumbada ama jeelku ay engego.
translated: Qaybaha hore iyo dhabarka labada gacmood iyo inta u dhaxeysa iyo darafyadda dhammaan faraha ayaa la isku xoqayaa qiyaastii 30 ilbidhiqsi ilaa dareeraha, xumbada ama jeelku ay engegaan.

sourceString: Finger tips must be washed well too, rubbing them in both palms.The US Center for Disease Control and Prevention recommends hand washing over hand sanitizer rubs, particularly when hands are visibly dirty.
targetString: Faraha caaradooda waa in sidoo kale la maydhaa, labada calaacalood la isku xoqaa. Xarunta Maraykanka ee Xakamaynta iyo Kahortaga Xanuunadu waxa ay ku talinaysaa gacmo maydhiga gacmaha dushooda lagu xoqayo gacmo nadiifiyaha, gaar ahaan marka ay gacmuhu aad u uskag yihiin.
translated: Faraha caarada waa in sidoo kale la maydhaa, iyadoo labada timirba lagu xoqdo. Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo ka Hortaga Cudurada ee Maraykanka waxay ku talinaysaa in gacmo maydhiga la dul mariyo gacmo nadiifiyaha gacmaha, gaar ahaan marka ay gacmuhu yihiin kuwo wasakhaysan.

sourceString: The increasing use of these agents is based on their ease of use and rapid killing activity against micro-organisms; however, they should not serve as a replacement for proper hand washing unless soap and water are unavailable.
targetString: Isticmaalka badan ee waxyaabahan waxa ay ku xiran tahay isticmaalkooda fudud iyo dilitaankooda wax ku oolka ah ee cayayaanka; laakiin, waa inayna noqon badalka gacmo nadiifiyaha munaadabka ah iyada oo la waayo saabuun iyo biyo mooyee.
translated: Isticmaalka sii kordhaya ee dallaalkaas waxay ku salaysan tahay fududaantooda isticmaalka iyo waxqabadka dilka degdegga ah ee ka dhanka ah cayayaanka; si kastaba ha ahaatee, ma aha inay u adeegaan sidii beddelka gacma-dhaqashada habboon haddii aanay saabuun iyo biyo laga heli karin.

sourceString: Frequent use of alcohol-based hand sanitizers can cause dry skin unless emollients and/or skin moisturizers are added to the formula.
targetString: Isticmaalka joogtada ah ee gacmo nadiifiyaha alkohoosha leh waxa uu keeni karaa maqaar qalal iyada oo ay ku jiraan maqaar qooye iyo/ama emollients qaacidada.
translated: Isticmaalka joogtada ah ee gacmo-mareenka aalkoluhu wuxuu keeni karaa maqaar qalalan haddii aan lagu darin maqaarka emollients iyo/ama huurka maqaarka oo aan lagu darin qaacidada.

sourceString: The drying effect of alcohol can be reduced or eliminated by adding glycerin and/or other emollients to the formula.
targetString: Saamaynta qalaylka ee alkohoosha waxaa lagu yarayn karaan ama meesha lagaga saaraa glycerin iyo/ama emollient kale oo qaadida laguu daro.
translated: ["Saamaynta qalaylka ee alkoolada waxaa lagu yarayn karaa ama la baabi'in karaa iyadoo glycerin iyo/ama emollients kale lagu daro qaacidda."]

sourceString: In clinical trials, alcohol-based hand sanitizers containing emollients caused substantially less skin irritation and dryness than soaps or antimicrobial detergents.
targetString: Tijaabada caafimaadka, gacmo nadiifiyaha aalkolada leh ee markaa uu ku jiro emollients keeno dhibta maqaarka ee yar iyo qalaylka marka loo eego saabuunta ama saabuunta cayayaanka disha.
translated: Tijaabada caafimaad, gacmo nadiifiyaha gacmo nadiifiyaha ee aalkoolada ee ay ku jiraan emollients ayaa sababa in xanaaqa maqaarka iyo qalayl yaraado marka loo eego saabuunta ama qalabka cayayaanka dila.

sourceString: Allergic contact dermatitis, contact urticaria syndrome or hypersensitivity to alcohol or additives present in alcohol hand rubs rarely occur.
targetString: Xasaasiyada taabashada dematitis, qaadida xanuunka urticaria ama kacsanaanta ee alkohoosha ama waxa la socda alkohoosha ee gacmo isku xoqa ayaan badanaa iman.
translated: Xasaasiyada taabashada dematitis, qaadida xanuunka urticaria ama kacsanaan badan oo alcohol ah ama waxa lagu daro ee ku jira alcohoosha gacmo isku xoqidda dhif ayaa dhacda.

sourceString: The lower tendency to induce irritant contact dermatitis became an attraction as compared to soap and water hand washing.
targetString: Heerka hoose ee lagu yaraynayo dhibta taabashada dematitis ayaa markaa noqota mid laga helo marka loo eego fardhaqa saabuunta iyo biyaha.
translated: Meelaha hoose ee lagu yaraynayo in la yareeyo taabashada xajiinta ee dermatitis ayaa noqota mid soo jiidatay marka la barbar dhigo saabuunta iyo biyaha gacmo maydhiga.

sourceString: Despite their effectiveness, non-water agents do not cleanse the hands of organic material, but simply disinfect them.
targetString: Inkasta oo ay leeyihiin saamayn, wixii biyaha aan ahayn kama dhaqaan gacmaha wixii dabiici ah, kaliya jeermiska ayay ka dilaan.
translated: Inkastoo ay waxtar leeyihiin, dawooyinka aan biyaha ahayni kuma nadiifiyaan gacmaha maaddooyinka dabiiciga ah, laakiin si fudud ayay u jeermiyaan.

sourceString: It is for this reason that hand sanitizers are not as effective as soap and water at preventing the spread of many pathogens, since the pathogens still remain on the hands.
targetString: Waana sababta keentay in gacmo nadiifiyuhu ayna wax u tarin sida saabuunta iyo biyaha kahortaga faafitaanka cayayaanka, maadaama uu cayayaanku saarnaan doono gacmaha.
translated: Sababtaas ayey u tahay in gacmo nadiifiyaha aysan sida saabuunta iyo biyaha waxtarka ugu lahayn ka hortagga faafitaanka jeermis badan, maadaama jeermiska jeermiska uu weli gacanta ku sii jiro.

sourceString: Alcohol-free hand sanitizer efficacy is heavily dependent on the ingredients and formulation, and historically has significantly under-performed alcohol and alcohol rubs.
targetString: Gacmo nadiifiyaha aan alkahoosha lahayn waxa uu si wayn ugu tiirsan yahay waxa uu ka samaysan yahay iyo qaacidada, oo waxa uu weligiiba wax wayn tari jiray marka lala isticmaalo alkahoosha ee alkohoosha la isku jijibiyo.
translated: Waxtarka gacmo nadiifiyaha aan alkahoosha lahayni wuxuu si wayn ugu tiirsan yahay waxyaabaha uu ka kooban yahay ee uu ka kooban yahay iyo qaabaynta, oo taariikh ahaan wax badan ayaa lagu sameeyaa khamriga iyo khamriga oo aan la isticmaalin.

sourceString: More recently, formulations that use benzalkonium chloride have been shown to have persistent and cumulative antimicrobial activity after application, unlike alcohol, which has been shown to decrease in efficacy after repeated use, probably due to progressive adverse skin reactions.
targetString: Dhawaan, kuwa soo baxay oo loo isticmaalo benzalkonium chloride ayaa lagu arkay joogtayn iyo urur hawsha cayayaan dilida kadib arka la mariyo, si ka duwan aalkolada, taas oo markaa lagu arkay waxyar yaro marka si joogto ah loo isticmaalo, maadaama oo ay u badan tahay in maqaarku uu la qabsado.
translated: ["Dhawaanahan, qaababka loo isticmaalo benzalkonium chloride ayaa la muujiyey in ay leeyihiin hawlo joogto ah oo wadareed antimicrobial ah ka dib marka la mariyo, si ka duwan aalkolada, taas oo la muujiyey inuu hoos u dhacay waxtarka ka dib markii si joogto ah loo isticmaalo, ay u badan tahay in ay sabab u tahay faa'iidada maqaarka ee sii kordhaysa."]

sourceString: Many people in low-income communities cannot afford soap and use ash or soil instead.
targetString: Dad badan oo bulshada dakhligoodu hooseeyo ah ma awoodaan sabuunta oo waxa ay isticmaalaan taas badalkeed danbaska ama ciida.
translated: Dad badan oo bulshooyinka dakhligoodu hooseeyo ah ma awoodaan saabuunta oo waxay isticmaalaan bedelkeeda dambaska ama ciidda.

sourceString: Ash or soil may be more effective than water alone, but may be less effective than soap.
targetString: Danbaska ama ciida ayaa biyaha kaligood dhaama, laakiin waxa ay ka waxtar yar yihiin saabuunta.
translated: Dambaska ama ciidda ayaa laga yaabaa inay biyaha oo kaliya ka waxtar badan yihiin, laakiin waxaa laga yaabaa inay ka waxtar yar yihiin saabuunta.

sourceString: One concern is that if the soil or ash is contaminated with microorganisms it may increase the spread of disease rather than decrease it.
targetString: Hal walaac oo jira ayaa ah in ciida ama danbuska inay la socdaan cayayaan taas oo markaa kordhinaysa faafitaanka xanuunka halka uu ka dhimi lahaa.
translated: Hal walaac ayaa ah in ciidda ama danbaska ay ku qasmaan cayayaanka in ay kordhiso faafitaanka cudurka halkii ay ka yarayn lahayd.

sourceString: Like soap, ash is also a disinfecting agent because in contact with water, it forms an alkaline solution.
targetString: Sida saabuunta, danbasku waxaa weeye sidoo kale nadiifiye maadaama oo marka uu biyaha la falgalo, uu sameeyo isku dar alkaline ah.
translated: Sida saabuunta oo kale, dambasku waa sidoo kale jeermis dileyaasha sababtoo ah marka uu biyaha la kulmo, wuxuu sameeyaa xalalka alkaline ah.

sourceString: WHO recommended ash or sand as alternative to soap when soap is not available.
targetString: WHO waxa ay ku talinaynaa in danbaska ama niista ay badali karaan sabuunta marka aan saabuun la heli karin.
translated: WHO waxay ku taliyaan in dambaska ama ciiddu ay beddel u noqdaan saabuunta marka aan saabuun la helin.

sourceString: Correct handwashing technique recommended by the US Centers for Disease Control  for prevention of transmission of disease includes the following steps:
targetString: Farsamada gacmo maydhiga ee saxda ah ee ay ku taliyaan Xarunta Kahortaga iyo Xakamaynta Xanuunada Maraykanka ee lagaga hortago gudbinta xanuunka waxaa kamid ah talaabooyinka soo socda:
translated: Farsamada gacmo-dhaqashada saxda ah ee ay ku talisay Xarunta Xakamaynta Xanuunada Ee Maraykanka ee looga hortago gudbinta xanuunka waxaa ka mid ah talaabooyinka soo socda:

sourceString: Wet hands with warm or cold running water.
targetString: Gacmaha waxa aad ku qoysaa biyo diiran ama biyo qabaw oo socda.
translated: Gacmaha waxa aad ku qoslisaa biyo diiran ama biyo qabow oo socda.

sourceString: Running water is recommended because standing basins may be contaminated, while the temperature of the water does not seem to make a difference.
targetString: Biyaha socda waxaa loogu taliyaa maadaama oo biya taagan ay dhici karto inay wasakhoobaan, oo heerkulka biyaha ayaan keeneynin farqi.
translated: Biyo qul qul qulqata ayaa lagu talinayaa sababtoo ah biyo-xireennada taagan ayaa laga yaabaa inay wasakhaysan yihiin, halka heerkulka biyahana ay u muuqato inaanay isbeddel sameynayn.

sourceString: Lather hands by rubbing them with a generous amount of soap, including the backs of hands, between fingers, and under nails.
targetString: Maqaarka gacmaha marka si wanaagsan loogu xoqo saabuunta, oo ay ku jiraan dhabar gacmaha, faraha dushooda, iyo cidiyaha hoostooda.
translated: Gacmaha maqaarka marka lagu xoqo xaddi deeqsi ah oo saabuun ah, oo ay ku jiraan dhabarka gacmaha, faraha dhexdooda, iyo cidiyaha hoostooda.

sourceString: Soap lifts germs from the skin, and studies show that people tend to wash their hands more thoroughly when soap is used rather than water alone.
targetString: Saabuuntu waxa ay maqaarka ka qaadaa jeermiska, oo daraasaduhu waxa ay muujinayaan in dadku si wanaagsan u maydhaan gacmahooda marka ay isticmaalaan saabuun marka loo eego marka ay biyo kaliya isticmaalaan.
translated: Saabuuntu waxa ay maqaarka ka qaaddaa jeermiska, daraasaduhuna waxa ay muujinayaan in dadku ay si fiican u dhaqdaan gacmahooda marka ay isticmaalaan saabuun marka loo eego biyo oo keliya.

sourceString: Scrub for at least 20 seconds.
targetString: Waxa aad isku xoqdaa ugu yaraan 20 ilbidhiqsi.
translated: Xoqdo ugu yaraan 20 ildhiqsi.

sourceString: Scrubbing creates friction, which helps remove germs from skin, and scrubbing for longer periods removes more germs.
targetString: Isku xoqidu waxa ay abuurtaa xoqitaan, taas oo markaa ka caawisa in jeermiska maqaarka laga mariyo, oo markaa isku xoqa dheeri waxa uu maqaarka ka bixiyaa jeermisyo farabadan.
translated: Isku xoqidda waxay abuurtaa khilaaf, kaas oo ka caawiya in jeermiska maqaarka laga soo saaro, oo isku xoqdo muddo dheer ayaa jeermisyo badan ka saarta.

sourceString: Rinse well under running water.
targetString: Hoos dhigida biyo socda.
translated: Biyo socda hoostaga.

sourceString: Rinsing in a basin can recontaminate hands.
targetString: In lagu dariyo kuwa taagan waxa ay dib u uskagayn kartaa gacmaha.
translated: In lagu mayro weysada dib u tirin kartaa gacmaha.

sourceString: Dry with a clean towel or allow to air dry.
targetString: Ku qalajinta tuwaalka ama in hawadu qalajiso.
translated: Ku qalajiyo tuwaal nadiif ah ama u oggolow in hawo qalalan.

sourceString: Wet and moist hands are more easily recontaminated.The most commonly missed areas are the thumb, the wrist, the areas between the fingers, and under fingernails.
targetString: Gacmaha qoyan ama yara qoyani ayaa si fudud u wasakhoobi karaan.Meelaha ugu badan ee laga boodo waa suulka, curcurka, aaga u dhaxeeya faraha, iyo cidiyaha hoostooda.
translated: Gacmaha qoyan iyo kuwa qoyan si fudud ayay isu karsan yihiin. Meelaha ugu badan ee la laʼyahay waa suulka, curuqda, aaga faraha u dhaxeeya iyo cidiyaha hoostooda.

sourceString: Artificial nails and chipped nail polish may harbor microorganisms.
targetString: Cidiyaha samayska ah iyo cidiyaha rinjiga lamariyo waxa ku hoos dhuuman kara cayayaanka.
translated: Cidiyaha macmalka ah iyo cidiyaha la mariyo cirridka ayaa ku hoyan kara cayayaanka.

sourceString: Moisturizing lotion is often recommended to keep the hands from drying out; dry skin can lead to skin damage which can increase the risk for the transmission of infection.
targetString: In looshin lagu qooyo ayaa badanaa lagu taliyaa si ayna gacmuhu u qalalin; maqaarka qalalan waxa uu horseedi karaa waxyeelo maqaarka ah taas oo markaa kordhinaysa khatarta in caabuqa uu gudbiyo.
translated: looshin huurka ayaa inta badan lagula talinayaa in gacmaha laga ilaaliyo in aysan qallajin; Maqaarka qalalan waxa uu keeni karaa dhaawac maqaarka ah taasoo kordhin karta halista infekshanka uu ka gudbo.

sourceString: Various low-cost options can be made to facilitate hand washing where tap-water and/or soap is not available e.g. pouring water from a hanging jerrycan or gourd with suitable holes and/or using ash if needed in developing countries.In situations with limited water supply (such as schools or rural areas in developing countries), there are water-conserving solutions, such as "tippy-taps" and other low-cost options.
targetString: Waxyaabo kala duwan oo jaban ayaa la samayn karaa si markaa loo fudueeyo gacmo dhaqida marka biyaha tuubada iyo/ama sabuunta aan la heleynin, sida, in biyaha laga soo shubto jerikaan ama meelo leh daloolo wanaagsan iyo/ama isticmaalka danbaska hadii aad ku sugan tahay dalalka soo koraya.Marka lagu jiro xaalad biyo yaraan ah (sida dugsiyada ama aaga miyiyaada dalalka soo koraya), waxaa jira qaab biyaha loo kaydsan karo, sida "caagar yar oo meel lagasoo laalaadsado" iyo ikhtiyaaro kale oo jaban.
translated: Waxaa la samayn karaa xulashooyin kala duwan oo jaban si loo fududeeyo gacmo dhaqida meesha biyaha tuubada iyo/ama sabuunta aan la heli karin sida. in biyaha laga soo shubo jeerikaan laalaaday ama gourd leh godad ku habboon iyo/ama isticmaalida danbaska hadii dalalka soo koraya loogu baahdo. Marka lagu jiro biyo yarida xaddidan (sida dugsiyada ama dhulka miyiga ee dalalka soo koraya), waxaa jira xalal biyaha lagu kaydiyo, sida "tubabyo liita" iyo ikhtiyaarro kale oo jaban.

sourceString: A tippy-tap is a simple technology using a jug suspended by a rope, and a foot-operated lever to pour a small amount of water over the hands and a bar of soap.
targetString: Caagar yar oo meel lagasoo laalaadsadaa waxaa weeye teknooloojiyad fudud oo loo isticmaali karo caaga laga soo laalaadiyay xadhid, oo markaa lasoo janjeedhiyay si markaa biyo yar uu usoo saari karo si gacmaha loogu maydho iyo sabuun.
translated: Tubada cago-maroojinta ah waa tikniyoolajiyad sahlan oo la isticmaalayo garaasiin xadhig laga hakiyey, iyo lever lugu qalay si ay inyar oo biyo ah gacmaha ugu shubto iyo sabuun.

sourceString: Effective drying of the hands is an essential part of the hand hygiene process, but there is some debate over the most effective form of drying in public washrooms.
targetString: Gacmaha in si wanaagsan loo qalajiyo ayaa qayb muhiim ah ka ah nidaamka nadiifinta, laakiin waxa uu muran ka taagan yahay waxtarta gacmo qalajinta meelaha dadku wadaagaan.
translated: Gacmaha oo si wax ku ool ah loo qalajiyo ayaa qayb muhiim ah ka ah habka nadaaminta gacanta, laakiin waxaa jira dood ku saabsan nooca ugu waxtarka badan ee qalajinta meelaha dadku ku dhaqaan.

sourceString: A growing volume of research suggests paper towels are much more hygienic than the electric hand dryers found in many washrooms.
targetString: Daraasado badan ayaa muujinaya in tuwaalkau aad uga nadaafad badan ayahay marka loo eego qalajiyaha gacmaha ee laydhka ah ee ku yaal suuliyo badan.
translated: Daraasad soo kordhaysa ayaa tilmaamaysa in tuwaalka tuwaalku aad uga nadaafad badan yahay marka loo eego qalajiyaha gacmaha ee korontada ee laga helay qolal badan oo lagu dhaqdo.

sourceString: In 2008, a study was conducted by the University of Westminster, London, and sponsored by the paper-towel industry the European Tissue Symposium, to compare the levels of hygiene offered by paper towels, warm-air hand dryers and the more modern jet-air hand dryers.
targetString: Sanadkii 2008, daraasad ayaa waxaa sameysay Jaamacada Westminster, London, waxaana kafaalo qaaday warshadaha tuwaalka waraaqaha ee European Tissue Symposium, in la isbarbar dhigo heerarka nadaafadda ee ay bixiyaan tuwaalada waraaqaha, qalajiyeyaasha hawada-diirran iyo kuwa qalajiyeyaasha diyaaradda-hawada oo casri ah.
translated: In 2008, daraasad ay sameeyeen University of Westminster, London, oo ay maalgelisay warshadaha waraaqaha-tuwaalka ee simistarka Nussue Yurub, in la is barbar dhigo heerarka nadaafadda ay bixiyaan shukumaan warqad, qalajiyo gacanta diiran-hawada iyo qalajiyeyaasha gacanta jet-hawada dheeraad ah oo casri ah.

sourceString: After washing and drying hands with the warm-air dryer, the total number of bacteria was found to increase on average on the finger pads by 194% and on the palms by 254%.
