targetString: Kadib marka la dhaqo gacmaha oo lagu qalajiyo hawada diiran, tirada bakteeriyada ee laga heley waxa ay korodhay faraha 194% iyo calaacashane 254%.
translated: Ka dib marka la dhaqo iyo gacmo la qalajiyo hawada diiran, tirada guud ee bakteeriyada ayaa la ogaaday in ay celcelis ahaan ku kordhiso farqiga faraha 194% iyo timirta 254%.

sourceString: Drying with the jet-air dryer resulted in an increase on average of the total number of bacteria on the finger pads by 42% and on the palms by 15%.
targetString: In lagu qalajistaa hawada diyaaradu wax aay kordhisay celelis ahaan wadarta tirada baakteeriyada faraha 42% iyo baabacooyinka 15%.
translated: Qalajiyaha qalajiyaha hawada ee jet-hawada ayaa keenay in celcelis ahaan uu kordhay tirada guud ee bakteeriyada ee ku taala suufka farta farta 42% iyo timirta 15%.

sourceString: After washing and drying hands with a paper towel, the total number of bacteria was reduced on average on the finger pads by up to 76% and on the palms by up to 77%.The scientists also carried out tests to establish whether there was the potential for cross contamination of other washroom users and the washroom environment as a result of each type of drying method.
targetString: Kadib marka la dhaqo oo lagu qalajiyo gacmaha tawalad, bakteeriyada waxa ay hoos uga dhacdaa faraha ilaa 76% iyo calaacashane ilaa 77%.Saynisyahanada ayaa sidoo kale sameeyeen shaybaaro lagu ogaanayo hadii ay jiraan oo ay iman karaan isku gudbin meelaha kale ee gacmaha lagu dhaqo iyo deegaanka lagu dhaqo taas oo markaa ka timaado qaabka qalajinta.
translated: Ka dib markii la dhaqo oo la qalajiyo gacmo lagu qalajiyo shukumaan warqad ah, tirada guud ee bakteeriyada ayaa celcelis ahaan hoos loogu dhigay dhanka suufka faraha iyadoo la gaarsiiyay illaa 76% iyo timirta ilaa 77%. Saynisyahanadu waxay sidoo kale sameeyeen baaritaano lagu ogaanayo in ay jirto suurtagalnimada faddarka isdhaafsiga ah ee dadka kale ee isticmaala qolalka dharka iyo deegaanka meelaha lagu dhaqdo ay sabab u tahay nooc kasta oo ah qalajinta.

sourceString: The jet-air dryer, which blows air out of the unit at claimed speeds of 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph), was capable of blowing micro-organisms from the hands and the unit and potentially contaminating other washroom users and the washroom environment up to 2 metres away.
targetString: Qalajiyaha hawada diyaarada, kaas oo markaa meel kasoo saarata hawada ku socota xawaare 180 m/ilbiriqsigii (650km/saacadii; 400mph), waxa uu awood u yeeshay inuu buufiyo cayayaanka gacmaha saaran oo waxa uu wasakheeyay meesha iyo dadkale ee meesha isticmaalaya iyo deegaanka lagu dhaqanaayo kuwaas oo ilaa 2 mitir isu jira.
translated: Qalajiyaha hawada diyaarada, oo hawada ka soo baxa hawada ku yaala agagaarka ayaa sheegtay xawaare dhan 180 m/s (650km/saacadii; 400mph), ayaa awood u yeeshay inuu cayayaanka ka afuufo gacmaha iyo qaybta oo ay suurtagal tahay inuu wasakheeyo dadka kale ee isticmaalaya qashin-dhaqashada iyo deegaanka lagu dhaqdo oo u jira illaa 2 mitir.

sourceString: Use of a warm-air hand dryer spread micro-organisms up to 0.25 metres from the dryer.
targetString: Isticmaalka hawada diiran qalajiyaha ah waxa uu faafiyaa cayayaanka ila 0.25 mitir in u jirta qalajiyaha.
translated: Isticmaalka hawo diiran qalajiyaha ayaa faafiya cayayaanka micro-cayayaanka ilaa 0.25 mitir oo u jirta qalajiyaha.

sourceString: Paper towels showed no significant spread of micro-organisms.In 2005, in a study conducted by TÜV Produkt und Umwelt, different hand drying methods were evaluated.
targetString: Tawalatyada laguma arag wax faafin ah oo wayn oo cayayaanka ah.2005 kii, daraasad ay sameeyeen TUV Produkt iyo Umwelt, oo qaababka kala duwan ee gacmo qalajinta ah ayaa la qiimeeyay.
translated: Tuwaalada lagu tukumo ma muujin wax faafin ah oo wayn oo cayayaanka. Sanadkii 2005,daraasad ay samaysay TÜV Produkt und Umwelt, waxaa qiimeeyay hababka kala duwan ee gacmo qalajinta.

sourceString: The following changes in the bacterial count after drying the hands were observed:
targetString: Isbadalka soo socda ee tirada baakteeriyada kadib marka la qalajiyo gacmaha ayaa la arkay:
translated: Isbadalka soo socda ee tirada bakteeriyada ka dib markii la qalajiyo gacmaha ayaa la arkay:

sourceString: Many different hand dryer manufacturers exist, and hand driers have been compared against drying with paper towels.
targetString: Shirkado badan oo kala duwan oo sameeya soosaaristayaasha gacmaha ayaa jira, iyo qalabka qallajinta ayaa isbarbardhig lagu sameeyay qalajinta waraaqaha.
translated: Shirkado badan oo kala duwan oo soo saara farsameeyaha gacmaha ayaa jira, iyo qalabka qallajinta ayaa isbarbardhig lagu sameeyay qalajinta waraaqaha.

sourceString: Hand washing using hand sanitizing wipes is an alternative during traveling in the absence of soap and water.
targetString: Gacmo dhaqida iyada oo la isticmaalayo gacmo nadiifiyaha masaxaada ah waxaa weeye qaab kale oo markaa la isticmaali karo marka la socdaalayo hadii ayna jirin saabuun iyo biyo.
translated: Gacmo maydhiga iyadoo la isticmaalayo gacmo nadiifinta masaxaada ayaa iyana ah mid kale oo markaa la raaco markaa la raaco iyadoo aanay jirin saabuun iyo biyo.

sourceString: Alcohol-based hand sanitizer should contain at least 60% alcohol.
targetString: Gacmo nadiifiyaha alkohoosha leh kaas oo alkohoosha ku jirtaa ay tahay 60%.
translated: Gacmo-dhaqtarka alcohoosha ku salaysan waa in ay ku jiraan ugu yaraan 60% khamri.

sourceString: Medical hand-washing became mandatory long after Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis discovered its effectiveness (in 1846) in preventing disease in a hospital environment.
targetString: Farxalka caafimaadka ah ayaa la waajibiyay kadib markii uu dhakhtarka reer Hangari Ignaz Semmelweis uu arkay faa'idadeeda (1846) ee kahortaga xanuunada deegaanka isbitaalka.
translated: Gacmo maydhiga caafimaadka ayaa khasab noqday muddo dheer ka dib markii uu dhakhtarka reer Hangariga Ignaz Semmelweis uu ogaaday waxtarka (1846) ee ka hortagga cudurrada deegaanka isbitaalka.

sourceString: There are electronic devices that provide feedback to remind hospital staff to wash their hands when they forget.
targetString: Waxaa jira aalado elektoroonig ah oo markaa xasuusiya shaqaalaha isbitaalka inay maydhaan gacmahooda marka ay iloobaan.
translated: Waxaa jira aalado elektaroonik ah oo keena jawaabo si loo xasuusiyo shaqaalaha isbitaalka inay dhaqaan gacmahooda marka ay iloobaan.

sourceString: One study has found decreased infection rates with their use.
targetString: Hal daraasad ayaa lagu ogaaday heerarka caabuqa hoos udhaca isticmaalkooda.
translated: Hal daraasad ayaa lagu ogaaday hoos udhaca heerka caabuqa ee isticmaalkooda.

sourceString: Medical hand-washing is for a minimum of 15 seconds, using generous amounts of soap and water or gel to lather and rub each part of the hands.
targetString: Gacma dhaqa caafimaadka waa ugu yaraan 15 ilbiriqsi, iyada oo la isticmaalayo xaddi badan oo saabuun iyo biyo ah ama jel si aad u masaxdo oo u xoqdo qayb kasta oo ka mid ah gacmaha.
translated: Gacmo dhaqida caafimaadku waa ugu yaraan 15 ilbiriqsi, iyadoo la isticmaalayo xaddi badan oo saabuun iyo biyo ah ama jel si aad u masaxdo oo u xoqdo qayb kasta oo ka mid ah gacmaha.

sourceString: Hands should be rubbed together with digits interlocking.
targetString: Gacmaha waa in la isku jijibiyaa iyada oo la is dhax gelinayo.
translated: Gacmaha waa in la isku xoqo iyadoo la isdhexgelinayo.

sourceString: If there is debris under fingernails, a bristle brush may be used to remove it.
targetString: Hadii qashin ku hoos jiro cidiyaha, burush ayaa loo isticmaali karaa si looga saaro.
translated: Hadii qashin ku hoos jiro cidiyaha, burush ayaa loo isticmaali karaa si looga saaro.

sourceString: Since germs may remain in the water on the hands, it is important to rinse well and wipe dry with a clean towel.
targetString: Maadaama oo jeermisku uu kusii jirayo biyaha gacmaha ku jira, waxaa muhiim ah in si wanaagsan loogu radiyo oo markaa lagu qalajiyo tuwaal nadiif ah.
translated: Maadaama jeermisku uu ku sii jiro biyaha gacmaha ku jira, waxaa muhiim ah in si wanaagsan loo raacsiiyo oo lagu qalajiyo tuwaal nadiif ah.

sourceString: After drying, the paper towel should be used to turn off the water (and open any exit door if necessary).
targetString: Kadib marka la qalajiyo, xaanshida tawalatka ayaa loo isticmaali karaa in biyaha lagu xiro (iyo in lagu furo albaabka laga baxayo hadii ay daruuri noqoto).
translated: Ka dib marka la qalajiyo, xaashiyaha tuwaalka waa in loo isticmaalaa in biyaha lagu damiyo (oo lagu furo albaabka laga baxo hadii ay daruuri noqoto).

sourceString: This avoids re-contaminating the hands from those surfaces.
targetString: Waxa aad iska ilaalisaa in gacmahaaga aad dib uga qaadaan uskaga meelahaas.
translated: Waxay taasi iska ilaalisaa in gacmahaaga dib looga dhigo in ay dib uga soo laabtaan meelahaas.

sourceString: The purpose of hand-washing in the health-care setting is to remove pathogenic microorganisms ("germs") and avoid transmitting them.
targetString: Sababta gacmaha loo dhaqayo habdhismeedka daryeelka caafimaadka waa in meesha laga saaro uskaga cayayaanka ("jeermiska") lagana fogaado gudbinta.
translated: Ujeeddada gacmo-dhaqashada goobaha daryeelka caafimaadka waa in meesha laga saaro cayayaanka cayayaanka ("jeermiska") oo aan la iska ilaalin gudbin.

sourceString: The New England Journal of Medicine reports that a lack of hand-washing remains at unacceptable levels in most medical environments, with large numbers of doctors and nurses routinely forgetting to wash their hands before touching patients, thus transmitting microorganisms.
targetString: Wargesyka New England ee Caafimaadka ayaa laga qoray in faraxal la'aanta aan laga ogolayn badanaa meelaha caafimaadka, taas oo tiro badan oo dhakhtaro iyo kaaliyayaal caafimaad ahi ay iloobaan inay si joogto ah u dhaqaan gacmahooda kahor inta ayna taaban bukaanka, markaa ay gudbiyaan cayayaanada.
translated: Wargeyska New England ee caafimaadka ayaa qoray in gacmo-dhaqashada aan la aqbali karin ay ka jirto inta badan deegaannada caafimaadka, iyadoo tiro badan oo dhakhaatiir iyo kalkaaliyayaal caafimaad ah ay si joogto ah u iloobaan inay dhaqaan gacmahooda ka hor inta aysan taaban bukaanada, sidaasna ay u gudbiyaan cayayaanka.

sourceString: One study showed that proper hand-washing and other simple procedures can decrease the rate of catheter-related bloodstream infections by 66 percent.The World Health Organization has published a sheet demonstrating standard hand-washing and hand-rubbing in health-care sectors.
targetString: Daraasad ayaa muujinaysa in gacmo maydhiga munaasabka ah iyo nidaamyada kale ee fudud ay yareeyaan xadiga caabuqa dhiiga ee kaadida u mara boqokiiba 66. Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunku waxa ay baahisay in waraaqo ay ku qoran yahay heerka gacmo maydhiga iyo gacmo isku xoqa ee waaxda daryeelka caafimaad.
translated: ["Daraasad ayaa muujisay in gacmo maydhiga habboon iyo nidaamyada kale ee fudud ay yarayn karaan xadiga caabuqa dhiiga ee kateetarka la xidhiidha 66 boqolkiiba. Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka ayaa daabacday waraaq muujinaysa heerka gacmo maydhiga iyo gacmo-dhaqashada caadiga ah ee waaxda daryeelka caafimaadka."]

sourceString: The draft guidance of hand hygiene by the organization can also be found at its website for public comment.
targetString: Tilmaamaha qabyada ah ee nadaafada gacmaha ee hay'ada waxaa laga heli karaa websaytka si ay shacabku uga faaloodaan.
translated: ["Tilmaamaha qabyada ah ee nadafdada gacmaha ee hay'adda waxaa laga heli karaa boggeeda internetka si ay dadweynaha uga faalooto."]

sourceString: A relevant review was conducted by Whitby et al.
targetString: Naqdinta ku munaasabka ah waxaa weeyey Whitby et al.
translated: Dib u eegis ku haboon waxaa qabtay Whitby et al.

sourceString: Commercial devices can measure and validate hand hygiene, if demonstration of regulatory compliance is required.
targetString: Aalado la iibiyo ayaa lagu cabiri karaan oo lagu xaqiijinta karaa nadaafada gacmaha, hadii loo baahdo in lasoo bandhigo u hogaansanka shuruudaha.
translated: Aaladaha ganacsiga ayaa cabbiri kara oo lagu xaqiijin karaa nadaafadda gacmaha, haddii loo baahdo in la soo bandhigo u hoggaansamo sharciyeed.

sourceString: The World Health Organization has "Five Moments" for washing hands:
targetString: Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka waxa ay leedahay "Shan Wakhti" oo gacmaha la maydho:
translated: Hay\'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka waxa ay leedahay "Shan Daqiiqo" oo gacmaha la mayddo:

sourceString: after exposure to blood/body fluids
targetString: kadib marka la taabto dhiig/dheecaanka jidhka
translated: ka dib marka la tabiyo dhiig/dheecaanka jirka

sourceString: before an aseptic task, and
targetString: kahor inta aanad inta aan la qaban shaqo wasakh keeneysa, iyo
translated: kahor inta aan la hubin hawl aseptic ah, iyo

sourceString: after patient care.The addition of antiseptic chemicals to soap ("medicated" or "antimicrobial" soaps) confers killing action to a hand-washing agent.
targetString: kadib marka bukaanka loo adeego.Sidoo kale kiimikada saabuunta disha jeermiska ("saabuunta dawo lagu daray" ama "cayayaanka laysa") ficilka dilida cayayaanka marka gacmaha lagu dhaqo.
translated: daryeelka bukaanka kadib. In lagu daro kiimikada dawooyinka dila saabuunta ("saabuunta la daweeyay" ama "cayayaanka cayayaanka" lagu daro) waxay tallaabo dil ah u gudbisaa gacmo-dhaqida.

sourceString: Such killing action may be desired prior to performing surgery or in settings in which antibiotic-resistant organisms are highly prevalent.To 'scrub' one's hands for a surgical operation, it is necessary to have a tap that can be turned on and off without touching it with the hands, some chlorhexidine or iodine wash, sterile towels for drying the hands after washing, and a sterile brush for scrubbing and another sterile instrument for cleaning under the fingernails.
targetString: Ficilka noocaas ah ee dilidu waxaa loo baahan karaan kahor inta aan la samaynin qaliin ama meesha aadka looga dilo cayaayaan caabuqa keena.Waa in lagu xoqaa 'halka' gacan ee wax lagu qalayo, hadii loo baahdo in tuubada iyada oo aan la taaban is furi karta oo isna xiri karta, xoogaa chlorheidine ama iodine ayaa lagu dhaqi, towaal nadiif ah si loogu qalajiyo gacmaha kadib dhaqida, iyo burush nadiif ah oo lagu xoqo iyo agab kale oo la nadiifiyay oo lagu nadiiyo cidiyaha hoostooda.
translated: ["Tallaabada dilka noocan oo kale ah waxaa la rabi karaa ka hor inta aan la samayn qaliin ama goobaha ay aadka ugu badan yihiin noolayaasha u adkaysta antibiyootikiyada. Si aad 'u xoqdo' gacmihiisa qalliin lagu sameeyo, waxaa lagama maarmaan ah in la helo tuubo la damin karo oo la damin karo iyada oo aan lagu taaban gacmo, qaar chlorhexidine ama iodine, tuwaallo nadiif ah oo lagu qalajiyo gacmaha marka la mayro kadib, iyo burush nadiif ah oo la xoqo iyo alaab kale oo nadiif ah oo lagu nadiifiyo cidiyaha hoostooda."]

sourceString: All jewelry should be removed.
targetString: Dhamaan waxa la isku qurxiyo waa in la iska saaraa.
translated: Dhamaan isku-darka isku-darka ah waa in laga saaro.

sourceString: This procedure requires washing the hands and forearms up to the elbow, usually 2–6 minutes.
targetString: Nidaamkani wuxuu u baahan yahay in ladhaqo gacmaha iyo gacanta inta hore illaa xusulka, inta badan 2-6 daqiiqadood.
translated: Nidaamkani wuxuu u baahan yahay in la dhaqo gacmaha iyo gacmaha ilaa gacmaha ilaa xusulka, inta badan inta badan 2-6 daqiiqo.

sourceString: Long scrub-times (10 minutes) are not necessary.
targetString: Mudada dheer oo la isku xoqo (10 daqiiqo) looma baahna.
translated: Muddada dheer ee la isku xoqo (10 daqiiqo) looma baahna.

sourceString: When rinsing, water on the forearms must be prevented from running back to the hands.
targetString: Markii la biyo raacinaayo, biyaha gacmaha dhudhuka waa in laga hortago intaysan dib ugu dhicin gacmaha.
translated: Marka la biyo raacinayo, biyaha gacmaha ku jira waa in laga hortago in ay dib ugu soo socdaan gacmaha.

sourceString: After hand-washing is completed, the hands are dried with a sterile cloth and a surgical gown is donned.
targetString: Kadib marka la dhameeyo maydhista gacmaha, gacmaha waa in lagu nadiifiyaa more nadiif ah iyo waa in marada qaliinka la xidhaa.
translated: Ka dib marka la dhammaystiro maydhashada gacmaha, gacmaha waxa lagu qallajiyaa maro sterile ah, waxaana la xidhaa goonno qalliin ah.

sourceString: To reduce the spread of germs, it is better to wash the hands or use a hand antiseptic before and after tending to a sick person.
targetString: Si loo yareeyo faafitaanka jeermiska, waxaa wanaagsan in la dhaqo gacmaha ama la isticmaalo jeermis ka dilaha gacmaha kahor iyo kadib marka loo adeegayo qofka xanuunsanaya.
translated: Si loo yareeyo faafitaanka jeermiska, waxaa fiican in gacmaha la dhaqo ama la isticmaalo jeermis ka dilaha gacmaha kahor iyo kadib marka loo jiheeyo qofka xanuunsanaya.

sourceString: For control of staphylococcal infections in hospitals, it has been found that the greatest benefit from hand-cleansing came from the first 20% of washing, and that very little additional benefit was gained when hand cleansing frequency was increased beyond 35%.
targetString: Si loo xakameeyo caabuqa staphylococcal ee isbitaalka, waxaa la ogaaday faa'dada ugu badan ee gacmo dhaqida inay ka timaado dhaqida hore boqol kiibo 20%, oo waxaa laga dheefaa wax yar marka dhaqida joogtada ahi ay ka badato boqol kiiba 35%.
translated: ["Si loo xakameeyo caabuqa staphylococcal ee isbitaalada, waxaa la ogaaday in faa'iidada ugu badan ee gacmo-nadiifintu ay ka timaado 20% hore ee maydhashada, iyo in faa'iidada dheeriga ah oo aad u yar laga helay marka inta jeer ee gacmo nadiifinta la kordhiyo wixii ka dambeeya 35%."]

sourceString: Washing with plain soap results in more than triple the rate of bacterial infectious disease transmitted to food as compared to washing with antibacterial soap.Comparing hand-rubbing with alcohol-based solution with hand washing with antibacterial soap for a median time of 30 seconds each showed that the alcohol hand-rubbing reduced bacterial contamination 26% more than the antibacterial soap.
targetString: Ku dhaqida saabuunta caadiga ahi waxa ay sadex jibaar gaarsiisaa kala qaadida xanuunada caabuqa bakteeriyada ee cuntada marka loo eego ku dhaqida sabuunta jeermiska disha. Marka la barbar dhigo gacmo ku masixida aalkolada iyo gacmo ku dhaqida saabuunta bakteeriyada disha ee wakhti dhaxaad ah ilaa 30 ilbiriqsi mid walba waxaa lagu arkay in aalkolada lagu masaxo gacmuhu ay bakteeriyada hoos u dhigaan boqol kiiba 26% marka loo eego saabuunta jeermiska disha.
translated: Ku dhaqida saabuunta saabuunta cad waxay keentay in in ka badan saddex jibaar heerka cudurada faafa ee bakteeriyada ee cuntada loo gudbiyo marka loo eego ku maydhashada saabuunta bakteeriyada disha. Isbarbardhiga gacmo lagu masaxo iyo xalka aalkoliga ku salaysan iyo gacmo maydhiga saabuunta bakteeriyada disha ee wakhti dhexdhexaad ah oo ah 30 ilbidhiqsi midkiiba wuxuu muujiyay in gacmo-marinta aalkhoosha ay hoos u dhigtay bakteeriyada 26% marka loo eego saabuunta bakteeriyada disha.

sourceString: But soap and water is more effective than alcohol-based hand rubs for reducing H1N1 influenza A virus and Clostridium difficile spores from hands.Interventions to improve hand hygiene in healthcare settings can involve education for staff on hand washing, increasing the availability of alcohol-based hand rub, and written and verbal reminders to staff.
targetString: Laakiin saabuunta iyo biyaha ayaa ka waxtar badan alkohoosha gacmaha lagu masaxo yaraynta H1N1 hargabka A fayruska ah iyo Clostridium hoos u dhiciisa gacmaha. Wax ka qabadka nadaafada gacmaha ee bahdhismeedka daryeelka caafimaad waxa ku jiri kara barista shaqaalaha gacmo maydhiga, kordhinta helitaanka alkohoosha gacmaha lagu masaxo, iyo qoraalka iyo hadalka xasuusinta shaqaalaha.
translated: Laakiin saabuunta iyo biyaha ayaa ka waxtar badan alkoolada gacmaha lagu masaxo si loo yareeyo fayruuska H1N1 influenza A fayraska iyo Clostridium difficile spores oo gacmaha ka soo baxa. Wax ka qabadka lagu hagaajiyo nadaafadda gacmaha ee goobaha daryeelka caafimaadka waxa ka qayb qaadan kara waxbarasho shaqaalaha ah oo ku saabsan gacmo maydhiga, taas oo kordhinaysa helitaanka helitaanka gacmo-masax ku salaysan ee alcohoosha, iyo xusuusin qoraal iyo afka ah oo la siiyo shaqaalaha.

sourceString: There is a need for more research into which of these interventions are most effective in different healthcare settings.
targetString: Waxaa loo baahan yahay daraasad dheeraad ah oo lagu sameeyo kuwan ka ugu haboon habdhismeedka daryeelka caafimaadka ee kala duwan.
translated: Waxaa loo baahan yahay in daraasad dheeraad ah lagu sameeyo kuwan wax ka qabadka ugu badan ee goobaha daryeelka caafimaadka ee kala duwan.

sourceString: In developing countries, hand washing with soap is recognized as a cost-effective, essential tool for achieving good health, and even good nutrition.
targetString: Dalalka soo koraya, gacmo ku maydhashada saabuunta ayaa loo yaqaan inay tahay ka ugu jaban, oo ah shay daruuri ah oo lagu gaadho caafimaad wanaagsan, iyo xataa nafaqada wanaagsan.
translated: Dalalka soo koraya, gacmo ku maydhashada saabuunta ayaa loo aqoonsadaa inay tahay mid kharash leh, oo ah aalad muhiim u ah in lagu helo caafimaad wanaagsan, iyo xataa nafaqo wanaagsan.

sourceString: However, a lack of reliable water supply, soap or hand washing facilities in people's homes, at schools and at the workplace make it a challenge to achieve universal hand washing behaviors.
targetString: Laakiin, maadaama oo ay ku yar yihiin biyuhu, saabuun iyo ama xarumaha farxalku ee guryaha dadka, dugsiyada iyo goobaha shaqada waxaa ku adag in laga dhabeeyo habdhaqanka farxalka ee caalamiga ah.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, hadii aan la haysan biyo la isku halayn karo, saabuun ama xarumaha farxalka lagu maydho ee ku yaala guryaha dadka, dugsiyada iyo goobaha shaqada waxay caqabad ku noqotaa in la helo dabeecadaha farxalka lagu maydho ee caalamka.

sourceString: For example, in most of rural Africa hand washing taps close to every private or public toilet are scarce, even though cheap options exist to build hand washing stations.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, badanaa miyiga Afrika waxaa ku yar tuubooyinka lagu farxalanayo ee gaar loo leeyahay ama suuliyaasha shacabka ku garab yaala way yar yihiin, in kasta oo ay tahay ikhtiyaarka ugu jaban ee jira in la dhiso meelo lagu farxasho.
translated: Tusaale ahaan, inta badan miyiga Afrika waxaa ku yar tuubooyinka lagu farxalo ee kudhowdey suuli kasta oo gaar loo leeyahay ama suuliga dadweyne oo dhan, inkastoo ikhtiyaarkaas oo aad u jaban ay jiraan si loo dhiso xarumo gacmo-dhaqasho.

sourceString: However, low hand washing rates rather can also be the result of engrained habits rather than due to a lack of soap or water.
targetString: Laakiin, farxal yaraantu waa habdhaqan laga dhaxlay saabuun iyo biyo la'aanta ka jirta.
translated: ["Si kastaba ha ahaatee, heerka gacmo maydhashada oo hoos u dhacay ayaa la badin karaa sidoo kale waxay ka dhalan kartaa caadooyinka la xardhay oo qotoma intii ay ka dhalan lahaayeen saabuun la'aan ama biyo la'aan awgeed."]

sourceString: The promotion and advocacy of hand washing with soap can influence policy decisions, raise awareness about the benefits of hand washing and lead to long-term behavior change of the population.
targetString: Wacyi gelinta iyo u ololeynta farxadka iyada oo saabuun la isticmaalayo waxa ay saamayn kartaa go'aamada xeerka, waxa ay abuuri kartaa wacyi gelin ku saabsan faa'dada farxalka oo waxa ay keeni kartaa is badal habdhaqanka ah oo mudada dheer ah oo shacabka ah.
translated: ["Dhiirrigelinta iyo u ololaynta farxalka iyadoo saabuun lala socdo waxay saamayn kartaa go'aamada siyaasadda, waxay kor u qaadi kartaa wacyi gelin ku saabsan faa'iidooyinka farxalka iyo waxay horseedi kartaa isbedelka habdhaqanka ee wakhtiga dheer ee dadweynaha."]

sourceString: For this to work effectively, monitoring and evaluation are necessary.
targetString: Si tan si wax ku ool ah loo gaadho, waxaa loo baahan yahay kormeer iyo qiimayn.
translated: Si tan loo gaaro si wax ku ool ah, waxaa loo baahan yahay kormeer iyo qiimeyn.

sourceString: A systematic review of 70 studies found that community-based approaches are effective at increasing hand washing in LMICs, while social marketing campaigns are less effective.One example for hand washing promotion in schools is the "Three Star Approach" by UNICEF that encourages schools to take simple, inexpensive steps to ensure that students wash their hands with soap, among other hygienic requirements.
targetString: Qiimayn lagu sameeyay 70 daraasadood ayaa lagu ogaaday in qaababka bulshada ku salaysan uu wax ku ool yahay kordhinta farxalka ee LMICs, halka ololaha ka dhaadhicinta bulshadu aanu waxtar badan lahayn. Hal tusaale oo wacyi gelinta farxalka ah ee dugsiyadu waa "Qaabka Sadexda Xidigood" ee UNICEF kaas oo ay ku dhiiri gelinayso dugsiyada inay qaadaan talaabooyin fudud, talaabooyin aan qaali ahayn si loo xaqiijiyo in ardaydu ay ku farxashaan saabuun, iyo sidoo kale shuruudo kale oo nadaafada ah.
translated: Dib u eegis nidaamsan oo lagu sameeyay daraasadihii 70 ayaa lagu ogaaday in hababka ku salaysan bulshadu ay wax ku ool ka yihiin kordhinta farxalka ee LMIC yada, iyadoo ololaha suuqgaynta bulshadu ay yihiin kuwo aan waxtar lahayn. Mid ka mid ah waxa tusaale loo soo qaatay dhiirigelinta farxalka ee dugsiyada waa "Sadexda Xidigood wanaajiya" ee UNICEF, kaas oo ku dhiirigeliya dugsiyada inay qaadaan tallaabooyin fudud oo aan qaali ahayn si loo xaqiijiyo in ardaydu ay saabuun ku dhaqaan gacmaha iyo sidoo kale shuruudo kale oo xagga fayadhowrka ah.

sourceString: When minimum standards are achieved, schools can move from one to ultimately three stars.
targetString: Marka heerka ugu yar la gaadho, dugsidu waxa ay meesha ka saarayaa sadexda xidigood ee ugu sareeya.
translated: Marka heerka ugu hooseeya la gaaro, dugsiyadu waxay ka guuri karaan hal ama ugu dambeyn saddex xidigood.

sourceString: Building hand washing stations can be a part of hand washing promotion campaigns that are carried out in order to reduce diseases and child mortality.
targetString: Samaynta meelo lagu farxasho waxa ay qayb ka noqon karaan ololaha wacyi gelinta farxalka ee la qaadayo si loo yareeyo xanuunada iyo dhimashada ilmaha.
translated: Samaynta meelo lagu farxasho waxa ay qayb ka noqon karaan ololeyaasha dhiirigelinta farxalka ee la fuliyo si loo yareeyo cudurrada iyo dhimashada ilmaha.

sourceString: Global Hand washing Day is another example of an awareness-raising campaign that is trying to achieve behavior change.As a result of the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, UNICEF promoted the adoption of a handwashing emoji.
targetString: Maalinta Caalamiga ah ee Farxalka waxaa weeye tusaale kale oo lagu samaynayo wacyi gelin taas oo lagu doonayo in lagu badalo habdhaqanka. Safmarka coronavirus 2019-20 dartiis, UNICEF waxa ay wadaa olole lagula qabsanayo farxalka.
translated: Maalinta Caalamiga ah ee Farxalka waa tusaale kale oo ku aaddan wacyi gelinta oo lagu doonayo in lagu gaaro isbedelka habdhaqanka. Natiijada ka dhalata cudurkii caalimka ahaa ee coronavirus ee 2019-20, UNICEF waxay dhiirigelisay ansixinta farax dhaqashada qanjidhada gacmo-dhaqashada.

sourceString: Few studies have considered the overall cost effectiveness of hand washing in developing countries in relationship to DALYs averted.
targetString: Dhawr daraasadood ayaa lagu eegey qaab jaban oo farxalka dalalka soo koraya  looga sameeyo oo la xidhiidha DALYs dabelkeeda.
translated: Dhawr daraasadood ayaa lagu tixgeliyey waxtarka guud ee qiimaha lagu leeyahay farxalka dalalka soo koraya ee la xidhiidha DALYs ee laga celinayo.

sourceString: However, one review suggests that promoting hand washing with soap is significantly more cost-effective than other water and sanitation interventions.
targetString: Si kastaba ha noqotee, hal mid oo kamid ah kuwa lagu taliyay ee dhiirrigelinta gacmo-dhaqashada saabuunku ay aad uga qiimo badan tahay waxtarka ka badan waxqabadyada kale ee biyaha iyo fayadhowrka.
translated: Si kastaba ha noqotee, hal mid ayaa lagu taliyay in dhiirrigelinta farxalka lagu mayddo saabuun ay si wayn uga khidan tahay waxtar waxtar badan marka loo eego waxqabadyada kale ee biyaha iyo fayadhowrka.

sourceString: The importance of hand washing for human health – particularly for people in vulnerable circumstances like mothers who had just given birth or wounded soldiers in hospitals – was first recognized in the mid 19th century by two pioneers of hand hygiene: the Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis who worked in Vienna, Austria and Florence Nightingale, the English "founder of modern nursing".
targetString: Muhiimiyada uu farxalku u leeyahay caafimaadka bila aadamka – gaar ahaan dadka ku jira xaalada nugul sida hooyada iminka dhashay ama askarta dhaawactay ee ku jira isbitaalada – ayaa markii ugu horeesay la aqoonsaday bartamihii qarnigii 19-aad oo waxaa aqoonsaday laba hogaamiye oo nadaafada gacmaha ah: Dhakhtarka Hangari u dhashay ee Ignaz Semmelweis oo ka shaqayn jiray Vienna, Awstariya iyo Florence Nightingale, oo Ingiriis ahaan "aas aasihii kaaliyaha caafimaadka casriga ah".
translated: Muhiimada uu gacmahu u leeyahay caafimaadka bini\'aadamka - gaar ahaan dadka ku jira duruufaha nugul sida hooyooyinka dhawaan dhalay ama askarta dhaawacmay ee isbitaalada ku jira - waxaa markii ugu horaysay la aqoonsaday bartamihii qarnigii 19-aad oo ay aqoonsadeen laba hormuud oo ah nadaafada gacmaha: dhakhtarka Hangari ee Ignaz Semmelweis oo ka shaqeyn jiray Vienna, Austria iyo Florence Nightingale, oo Ingiriis ah "aas aasihii kalkaalisada casriga ah".

sourceString: At that time most people still believed that infections were caused by foul odors called miasmas.
targetString: Waqtigaas badanaa dadku waxa ay aaminsanayaayeen in caabuqa uu keeno urta loo yaqaan miasmas.
translated: Waqtigaas badanaa dadku waxay aaminsanaayeen in caabuqa uu keeno urogta miasmas.

sourceString: In the 1980s, foodborne outbreaks and healthcare-associated infections led the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to more actively promote hand hygiene as an important way to prevent the spread of infection.
targetString: 1980yaadkii, caabuq ka dhashay cuntada iyo daryeelka caafimaadka caabuq la xidhiidha ayaa keeney in Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo Kahortaga Xanuunada Maraykanka inay si firfircoon u bilawdo wacyi gelinta nadaafada gacmaha taas oo markaa ah qaab muhiim ah oo lagaga hortago faafitaanka caabuqa.
translated: 1980maadkii, dilaacitaanka ka dhashay cuntada iyo daryeelka caafimaadka caabuqa la xidhiidha ayaa horseeday in Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo kahortaga Xanuunada Maraykanka ay si firfircoon u dhiirigeliyaan nadaafada gacmaha taas oo ah dariiq muhiim ah oo lagaga hortago faafitaanka caabuqa.

sourceString: The outbreak of swine flu in 2009 and the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 led to increased awareness in many countries of the importance of washing hands with soap to protect oneself from such infectious diseases.
targetString: Safmarkii hargabkii swine ee 2009-kii iyo safmarka COVID-19 ee 2020-ga ayaa kordhiyay wacyi gelinta dalal badan oo ah muhiimiyada ku faraxalashada sabuunta si markaa la iskaga ilaaliyo xanuunada.
translated: Dilaacitaanka daacucunka doofaarka ee 2009 iyo faafitaanka COVID-19 ee 2020 ayaa horseeday in dalal badan la wacyigeliyo oo muhiim u ah in gacmaha lagu maydjiyo saabuun si uu naftiisa uga badbaadiyo cudurada faafa ee noocaas ah.

sourceString: For example, posters with "correct hand washing techniques" were hung up next to hand washing sinks in public toilets and in the toilets of office buildings and airports in Germany.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, waraaqo ku saabsan "farsamada saxda ah ee farxalka" ayaa lagu soo dhajiyay farxalka agtiisa meelaha suuliyada dadka ka dhaxeeya iyo suuliyada dhismayaasha xafiisyada iyo madaarada Jermalka.
translated: Tusaale ahaan, waraaqo ay ku qoran yihiin "farsamooyinka saxda ah ee farxalka" ayaa lagu soo dhejiyey meelaha ku xiga gacmaha lagu dhaqdo ee ku yaalla musqulaha dadweynaha iyo musqulaha dhismayaasha xafiisyada iyo garoomada diyaaradaha ee Jarmalka.

sourceString: The phrase "washing one's hands of" something, means declaring one's unwillingness to take responsibility for the thing or share complicity in it.
targetString: Kalmada "dhaq mid gacamihiis" ee wax, waxay ka timid in uu qof diido masuuliyad kor u ridashada wax ama wadaagista kaas.
translated: Oraahda ah \'dhaq mid gacma\'diisa" wax, waxay la micno tahay in qof kale uu diidan yahay inuu mas\'uuliyadda ka qaado waxan ama uu la wadaago isku xiiqsanaanta.

sourceString: It originates from the bible passage in Matthew where Pontius Pilate washed his hands of the decision to crucify Jesus Christ, but has become a phrase with a much wider usage in some English communities.
targetString: Waxa ay ka timid baybalka weedha ku taal ee Matthew taas oo Pontius Pilate uu iska maydhay gacmahiisa wixii go'aan ah ee lagu dilayay Ciise Misiixi, laakiin waxa uu noqday kalmad balaadhan oo si wayn loo isticmaalo bulshooyinka qaar Ingiriiska.
translated: ["Waxay ka soo jeeddaa baybalka baybalka ah ee ku taala Matthew halkaas oo Pontius Pilate uu gacmihiisa ku maydhay gacmihiisii go'aankii lagu iskutallaabta ku qodbayay Ciise Masiix, laakiin waxa uu noqday kalmo leh adeegsi ballaaran oo aad u balaaran oo laga isticmaalo bulshooyinka qaar Ingiriiska."]

sourceString: In Shakespeare's Macbeth, Lady Macbeth begins to compulsively wash her hands in an attempt to cleanse an imagined stain, representing her guilty conscience regarding crimes she had committed and induced her husband to commit.
targetString: Shakespeare Macbeth, Lady Macbeth waxa ay bilawday inay si qasab ah gacmaheeda u dhaqdo si iskuday ah si ay u nadiifiso wasakhda mala awaalka ah,iyada oo matalaysa damiirkeedii dambiga ahaa ee ku saabsan dambiyada ay gashay isla markaana ay ninkeeda u horseeday inuu sameeyo.
translated: Shakespeare Macbeth, Lady Macbeth waxa ay bilowday in ay si qasab ah gacmaheeda u dhaqdo iyada oo isku dayaysa in ay nadiifiso wasakhda la malaynayo, iyadoo matalaysa damiirkeedii dambiga ahaa ee ku saabsanaa dambiyadii ay gashay oo ay ninkeeda u horseeday inuu sameeyo.

sourceString: It has also been found that people, after having recalled or contemplated unethical acts, tend to wash hands more often than others, and tend to value hand washing equipment more.
targetString: Waxaa sidoo kale la ogaaday in dadka, kadib marka ay xasuustaan ama ay sameeyaan ficil damiirka u daran, inay badanaa maydhaan gacmaha si kasii badan intii hore, oo waxa ay isku dayaan inay qiimeeyaan agabka lagu farxasho intii hore wax ka badan.
translated: Waxa kale oo la ogaaday in dadku, kadib marka ay xasuustaan ama ay ficileeyaan ficillo anshax daro ah, ay u muuqdaan in ay inta badan maydhaan gacmaha in ka badan inta kale, waxayna u badan yihiin inay qiimeeyaan qalabka lagu farxasho gacmo maydhiga.

sourceString: Furthermore, those who are allowed to wash their hands after such a contemplation are less likely to engage in other "cleansing" compensatory actions, such as volunteering.
targetString: Intaa waxaa sii dheer, kuwa loo oggol yahay inay gacmahooda dhaqaan ka dib markii laga fiirsado sidaas oo kale uma badna inay ku lug yeeshaan falal kale oo "nadiifin" ah, ficilkaasi, sida ikhtiyaarka.
translated: Intaas waxaa sii dheer, kuwa loo ogol yahay inay gacmahooda dhaqaan ka dib marka laga fiirsado sidan oo kale u badan tahay in ay ku lug leeyihiin ficilada kale ee "nadiifinta" ee magdhowga, sida iskaa wax u qabso.

sourceString: Religions prescribe hand washing for both hygienic and symbolic purposes.Symbolic hand washing, using water but no soap to wash hands, is a part of ritual hand washing featured in many religions, including Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah and netilat yadayim in Judaism, Lavabo in Christianity, and Wudhu in Islam.Religions also prescribe hygienic hand washing, especially after certain actions.
targetString: Diimaha ayaa qeexa falxalka iyo nadaafada hab ku dayasho leh. Calaamada farxalka, iyada oo la isticmaalayao biyo aan saabuun lahayn si loogu farxalo waxaa kamid ah farxalka ku jira diimo badan, oo ay kamid yihiin Baha'i Diinta ah, Hinduusimka, tevilah iyo netilah yadayim ee Judaidm-ka, Lavabo ee Kiristanka iyo Wudhu ee Islaamka. Diimaha ayaa sidoo kale u qora farxalka, gaar ahaan ficilada qaar la sameeyo.
translated: ["Diimaha ayaa waxay u qoraan gacmo-dhaqashada labadaba nadaafadda iyo astaanta labadaba. Farxalka calaamadaysan, oo la isticmaalayo biyo laakiin aan saabuun lahayn in gacmaha lagu maydho, waa qayb ka mid ah gacmo dhaqashada caanka ah ee lagu ciyaaray diimaha badan, oo ay ka mid yihiin Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah iyo netilat yadayim ee Yuhuudda, Lavabo ee kirishtaanka, iyo Wudhu ee Islaamka.Diimaha ayaa sidoo kale qeexaya farxalka nadaafadda, gaar ahaan ficilada qaar ka dib."]

sourceString: Hinduism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands after using the toilet.
targetString: Hinduism, Judaism, iyo Islaamka ayaa waajibiya in la faraxasho marka suuliga laga soo baxo.
translated: Hinduism, Judaism, iyo Islaamka ayaa waajibiya in la gacmo dhaqo marka suuliga laga soo galo.

sourceString: And, Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands before and after every meal.
targetString: Iyo, Hinduuga, Buddhsm, Sikhim, Yahuudda iyo Islaamka ayaa waajibiya faraxalka kahor iyo cuntada.
translated: iyo, Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism iyo Islaamka waxay waajibiyaan inay gacmo dhaqaan ka hor iyo ka dib cuntada kasta.

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19
targetString: Xakmaynta khatarta goobta shaqada ee COVID-19 waxaa weeye barnaamijyo lagu dabaqayo amaanka shaqada iyo qaabka caafimaadka ee loo xakamaynayo waxyeelo si looga hortago xanuunka coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19).
translated: Xakamaynta halisaha shaqada ee COVID-19

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19 are the application of occupational safety and health methodologies for hazard controls to the prevention of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: Qaabka saxda ah ee xakamaynta khatarta goobta shaqadu waxay ku xidhan tahay goobta shaqada iyo shaqooyinka, waxay ku xidhan tahay qiimaynta khatarta ee isha meesha uu qofka kasoo gaadhi karo, inta uu le'eg yahay xanuunku bulshada dhaxdeeda, iyo xaaladaha khatarta ee shaqaalaha shakhsiyaadka ah kuwaas oo u nugul inay qaadaan COVID-19.
translated: Xakamaynta halista goobta shaqada ee COVID-19 waa adeegsiga badbaadada shaqada iyo hababka caafimaad ee xakamaynta halista si looga hortago cudurka coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19).

sourceString: The proper hazard controls in the workplace depend on the worksite and job task, based on a risk assessment of sources of exposure, disease severity in the community, and risk factors of individual workers who may be vulnerable to contracting COVID-19.
targetString: Sida ay sheegeen Maamulka Caafimaadka iyo Amaanka Shaqada Maraykanka (OSHA), marka uu yaraado khatarta inuu dadka soo gadho isaga oo shaqada ku jira waxay yaraynaysaa in shaqada lagu kala qaado shacabka iyo daka wada shaqaynayaayi, taas oo loo baahan yahay talaabooyin aas aasiga ah oo lagaga hortagayo faafitaanka caabuqa, oo ay ku jiraan gacmo maydhis, ku dhiiri gelin shaqaalaha inay gurigooda joogaan hadii ay xanuunsanayaan, qabaan xanuun neefsiga ah, oo ay si joogto ah nadaafada ugu dadaalaan oo ay jeermiska ka dilaan goobta shaqada.
translated: ["Xakamaynta khatarta saxda ah ee goobta shaqada waxay ku xiran tahay shaqada iyo shaqada shaqada, iyadoo lagu salaynayo qiimaynta khatarta ilaha xanuunka, cudurka ba'an ee bulshada dhexdeeda, iyo asbaabaha khatarta ee shakhsiyaadka shaqaalaha ah kuwaas oo laga yaabo inay u nugul yihiin in ay ku dhacaan COVID-19."]

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers, for which basic infection prevention measures are recommended, including hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: Khatarta waxoogaaga ah ee shaqada waxaa kamid ah dadka looga baahan yahay inay dadka aan la garaynin ama looga shakisan yahay COVID-19 inay macaamilaan ama u dhawaada, laakiin ay dhici karta inuu ka qaaday caabuqa bulshaamada inta uu u socdaalay dibada.
translated: ["Marka loo eego hay'adda ilaalinta shaqada iyo caafimaadka ee dalka Maraykanka (OSHA), shaqooyinka khatarta daran waxay si yar ula xiriiraan dadweynaha iyo dad kale oo la shaqeeya, kuwaas oo lagula talinayo tallaabooyinka ka hortagga caabuqa asaasiga ah, oo ay ku jiraan gacmo maydhiga, ku dhiirigelida shaqaalaha inay guryahooda joogaan haday xanuunsadaan, hab-dhiska neef-mareenka, iyo joogtaynta nadiifinta iyo jeermiska joogtada ah ee nadiifinta iyo jeermiska jeermiska jawiga shaqada."]

sourceString: Medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact with people who are not known or suspected with COVID-19, but may be infected due to ongoing community transmission or international travel.
targetString: Kuwaas waxaa kamid ah shaqaalaha ay isasoo gaadheen shacabka guud sida dugsiyada, deegaanada shaqo ee dadku ku badan yihiin, iyo tukaamada dadka badan.
translated: Shaqooyinka khatarta dhexdhexaadka ah ee khatarta u ah ayaa ka mid ah kuwa u baahan in si joogto ah loola tacaalo ama si dhaw loola tacaalo dad aan la aqoon ama looga shakisan yahay COVID-19, laakiin waxaa laga yaabaa inay qabaan cudurka sababo la xiriira gudbinta bulshada ee socda ama safar caalami ah.

sourceString: This includes workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.
targetString: Iska ilaalinta khatarta ee kooxdan, sidoo kale talaabooyinka kahortaga caabuqa ee aas aasiga ah, oo ay ku jiraan mishiinada neefsiga ee isticmaala hawo nadiifiyaha aadka u tayo sareeya, wax ka ilaaliya hindhisada dadka kale, iyo in la helo agabka ilaalinta shakhsi ahaaneed ee la heli karo hadii qofka ay isasoo gaadhaan cid qabta COVID-19.
translated: Arrintan waxaa ka mid ah shaqaalaha xiriirka la leh dadweynaha guud sida dugsiyada, jawiga shaqada ay dadku aadka u badan yihiin, iyo qaar ka mid ah goobaha tafaariiqda ee xajmiga badan yahay.

sourceString: Hazard controls for this group, in addition to basic infection prevention measures, include ventilation using high-efficiency air filters, sneeze guards, and having personal protective equipment available in case a person with COVID-19 is encountered.
targetString: OSHA waxay eegeysaa daryeelka caafimaadka iyo shaqaalaha waayeelka ah ee ay isasoo gaadheen cid aan la garanaynin ama dadka looga shakisan yahay COVID-19 waxaa loo arkaa inay tahay khatar sare, taas oo kordhinaysa khatarta hadii shaqaalaha uu qabto nidaam guud, ama uruurin ama ka shaqayn muunada ah, oo loo yaqaan ama looga shakiyo qofka inuu qabo COVID-19.
translated: Xakamaynta halista kooxdan, marka lagu daro tallaabooyinka asaasiga ah ee ka hortagga caabuqa, waxaa ka mid ah hawo-mareenka iyadoo la adeegsanayo shaandhaynta tayada sare ee hawada, ilaalada hindhisada, iyo haysashada qalabka difaaca ee shakhsiyadeed ee la heli karo haddii qofka qaba COVID-19 lala kulmo.

sourceString: OSHA considers healthcare and mortuary workers exposed to known or suspected person with COVID-19 to be at high exposure risk, which increases to very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected person with COVID-19.
targetString: Xakamaynta waxyeelada ee shaqaalahaas oo ay ku jiraan xakamaynta farsao ee qolka hawo nadiifiya ee cadaadiska negetifka, iyo agabka ilaalida shakhsi ahaaneed ee munaasabka ah ee shaqada.
translated: OSHA waxay u aragtaa shaqaalaha daryeelka caafimaadka iyo shaqaalaha gaadiidka ee u nugul dadka la yaqaan ama laga shakisan yahay ee qaba COVID-19 in ay halis sare ugu jiraan, taasoo kor u qaadaysa khatarta u saraysa haddii shaqaaluhu ay sameeyaan nidaamka hawada kicinta, ama ay ka soo saaraan ama ka maareeyaan tijaabooyinka laga soo qaatay, la yaqaan ama looga shakisan yahay qofka qaba COVID-19.

sourceString: Hazard controls appropriate for these workers include engineering controls such as negative pressure ventilation rooms, and personal protective equipment appropriate to the job task.
targetString: Faafitaanka COVID-19 waxa uu ku yeelan karaa saamayn xun goobta shaqada.
translated: Xakamaynta khatarta ku haboon shaqaalahan waxaa ka mid ah kontaroolada injineernimada sida qolalka hawo-siinta cadaadiska xun, iyo qalabka ilaalinta shakhsi ahaaneed ee ku haboon shaqada.

sourceString: COVID-19 outbreaks can have several effects within the workplace.
targetString: Shaqaalaha waxaa dhici karta inayna ka maqnaanin goobta shaqada xanuun darteed, ay macquul tahay in loo baahdo inay daryeelaan mid kale, ama baqi inuu asiibi karo ah.
translated: Dilaaca COVID-19 wuxuu yeelan karaa saamayno dhawr ah gudaha goobta shaqada.

sourceString: Workers may be absent from work due to becoming sick, needing to care for others, or from fear of possible exposure.
targetString: Qaababka ganacsiga ayaa is badali kara, taas oo ah alaabta loo baahan yahay, iyo qaabka loo heleyo alaabaadkan (sida in la iibsado saacada aan saxmada ahayn ama in guriga la iskugu keeno ama iyada oo gaadhiga lagu jiro in la iibsado).
translated: Shaqaalaha ayaa laga yaabaa in ay shaqada ka maqan yihiin ayadoo ay xanuunsanayaan awgood, u baahan yihiin in dadka kale la daryeelo ama ay ka baqaan suuragalnimada in ay suuragal tahay in qofka soo gaaro uu ku dhaco.

sourceString: Patterns of commerce may change, both in terms of what goods are demanded, and the means of acquiring these goods (such as shopping at off-peak hours or through delivery or drive-through services).
targetString: Ugu danbayntii, alaabaadka ka yimaada meelaha uu aadka ugu habsaday COVID-19 waxaa dhici kara in khalkhal uu soo galo. Qorshaha u diyaar garawga iyo ka jawaabida xanuunka caabuqa ah ayaa loo adeegsan karaa si uu kuugu hago talaabooyinka is ilaalinta inuu ina hago..
translated: Hannaanka ganacsiga ayaa is bedeli kara, labadaba marka laga eego waxa alaabta laga dalbaday iyo habka lagu heli karo alaabtaas (sida wax ka adeegashada saacadaha ka baxsan peak-ka ama adeegyada gaarsiinta ama adeega la maro).

sourceString: Lastly, shipments of items from geographic areas severely affected by COVID-19 may be interrupted.An infectious disease preparedness and response plan can be used to guide protective actions.
targetString: Qorshayaasha lagaag jawaabayo khatarta la xidhiidha goobaha shaqada ee kala duwan iyo shaqooyinka, oo ay ku jiraan meelaha laga qaadayo, xaalada khatarta ee ka imanaysa guriga iyo bulshada, iyo xaaladaha khatarta ee shaqada shakhsi ahaaneed sida da'da wayn ama mushkilada caafimaadka mudada dheer.
translated: Ugu dambayn, shixnadaha alaabada ka imanaya meelaha juqraafi ahaaneed ee uu saameeyay COVID-19 ayaa laga yaabaa in la joojiyo. U diyaargarowga cudurrada faafa iyo qorshaha ka jawaabidda ayaa loo isticmaali karaa si loo hago ficilada difaaca.

sourceString: Plans address the levels of risk associated with various worksites and job tasks, including sources of exposure, risk factors arising from home and community settings, and risk factors of individual workers such as old age or chronic medical conditions.
targetString: Waxa ay sidoo kale sheegaan daruuriyaadka lagaga jawaabayo khatarahaas, iyo qorshaha lagu baxsanayo hadii xaalad ka timaado safmarkan.
translated: ["Qorsheyaashu waxay wax ka qabanayaan heerarka khatarta la xidhiidha shaqooyinka kala duwan iyo hawlaha shaqooyinka, oo ay ku jiraan ilaha lagu arki karaa, waxyaabaha khatarta ah ee ka dhasha guryaha iyo goobaha bulshada, iyo waxyaabaha khatarta ah ee shaqaale shakhsiyadeed sida da'da ama xaaladaha caafimaad ee daba dheeraaday."]

sourceString: They also outline controls necessary to address those risks, and contingency plans for situations that may arise as a result of outbreaks.
targetString: Qorshayaasha u diyaar garawga iyo jawaabta xanuunada caabuqa waxa dhici karta inay ka waajibaan ama ay badalaan talooyinka.
translated: Waxay sidoo kale qeeeynayaan xakamaynta lagama maarmaanka ah in wax laga qabto khatarahaas, iyo qorshayaasha degdegga ah ee xaaladaha ka dhalan kara dilaacyada.

sourceString: Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may be subject to national or subnational recommendations.
targetString: Jawaabta wax ku oolka ah ee faafitaanka xanuunka waxaa kamid ah yaraynta isku gudbitna ee shaqaalaha, ilaalinta dadka ku jira khatarta ugu badan ee inuu saamayn caafimaad daro xun ku yeesho, in la wado shaqada ganacsi, iyo in la yareeyo saaayta xun ee shirkada kale ee wax laga iibsado.
translated: U diyaargaroobista cudurada faafa iyo qorsheyaasha wax ka qabashada waxaa laga yaabaa in lagu soo rogayo talooyin qaran ama kuwa aanan caadi ahayn.

sourceString: Objectives for response to an outbreak include reducing transmission among staff, protecting people who are at higher risk for adverse health complications, maintaining business operations, and minimizing adverse effects on other entities in their supply chains.
targetString: Adkaanshaha xanuunka ee bulshada uu ganacsigu uu ku yaalo waxa uu saamaynayaa jawaabta la qaadayo.
translated: ["Ujeedooyinka looga jawaabayo ka jawaabista dilaacitaanka waxaa kamid ah yareynta isu gudbinta shaqaalaha, in la ilaaliyo dadka khatarta ugu jira dhibaatooyin caafimaad oo aad u xun, dayactirka howlaha ganacsi, iyo in la yareeyo waxyeelada xun ee hay'adaha kale ee ku jira sahaydooda."]

sourceString: The disease severity in the community where the business is located affects the responses taken.
targetString: Sida ay u kala sareeyaan xakamaynta waxyeelada waxa nidaam shaqo u tahay isticmaalka balaadhan ee amaanka iyo caafimaadka shaqada ee xakamaynta khatarta kooxeed si wax ku ool ah.
translated: Cudurka halista ah ee ku dhex jira bulshada ku nool ganacsiga ayaa ah mid saameeya jawaabaha la bixiyey.

sourceString: The hierarchy of hazard controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to group hazard controls by effectiveness.
targetString: Halka aan la xadidi karin waxyeelada COVID-19, qaabka ugu wax oolsan ee loo xakamayn karaa waa in la sameeyo xakamayn, uu daba socdo xakamaynta maamulka, iyo ugu danbayntii agabka ilaalada shakhsi ahaaneed.
translated: Madaxda kontoroolka xakamaynta khatarta waa qaab si weyn loogu isticmaalo badqabka iyo caafimaadka shaqada si loo kontoroolo khataraha waxtarka leh.

sourceString: Where COVID-19 hazards cannot be eliminated, the most effective controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and lastly personal protective equipment.
targetString: Samaynta xakamaynta waxaa kamid ah in shaqaalaha laga xidho khatarta waxyeelo ee shaqada iyada oo aan la isku halaynaynin habdhaqanka shaqaalaha, waxaana uu noqon karaa qaabka ugu kharashka yar ee xal ah ee la dhaqan gelin karo.
translated: Meelaha aan la cirib tiri karin khataraha COVID-19, kontoroolada ugu waxtarka badan waa kontoroolada injineernimada, oo ay ku xigaan kontoroolka maamul, iyo qalabka ugu danbeeya ee ilaalinta shakhsi ahaaneed.

sourceString: Engineering controls involve isolating employees from work-related hazards without relying on worker behavior, and can be the most cost-effective solution to implement.
targetString: Xakamaynta maamulku waxaa weeye is badal nidaamka ama xeerka ah kaas oo uga baahan shaqalaaha ama cida loo shaqeeyo inay talaabo qaado.
translated: ["Xakamaynta injineernimada waxaa lugu gelayaa in shaqaalaha laga go'dooro khataraha la xiriira shaqada iyada oo aan lagu tiirsanayn habdhaqanka shaqaalaha, wuxuuna noqon karaa xalka ugu kharashka badan ee lagu hirgelin karo."]

sourceString: Administrative controls are changes in work policy or procedures that require action by the worker or employer.
targetString: Agabka ilaalinta shakhsi ahaaneed (PPE) waxaa loo arkaa inay ka waxtar yar yihiin samaynta iyo dhaqan gelinta xakamaynta, laakiin waxay kahortagi karaan caabuqyada qaar.
translated: Xakamaynta maamulku waa isbeddelka siyaasadda ama nidaamyada shaqada, kuwaas oo u baahan in uu shaqaalaha ama shaqa-bixiyaha u baahan yahay tallaabo tallaabo ah.

sourceString: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some exposures.
targetString: Nooc kasta oo PPE ah waa in lagu doortaa khatarta shaqaalaha, inay si wanaagsan ugu galaan oo ay munaasab yihiin (sida, neefsiga), in si joogto ah oo munaasab ah loo xidho, si joogto ah loo baadho, hagaajiyo, oo loo badalo, oo si haboon la iskaga saaro, nadiifiyo, oo loo kaydiyo ama tuuro si markaa looga hortago in caabuq ay keenaan.
translated: Qalabka difaaca shakhsiyadeed (PPE) waxaa loo arkaa mid ka waxtar yar marka loo eego injineernimada iyo kontaroolada maamulka, laakiin waxay kaa caawin kartaa ka-hortagga qaar ka mid ah u-dhacyada.

sourceString: All types of PPE must be selected based upon the hazard to the worker, properly fitted as applicable (e.g., respirators), consistently and properly worn, regularly inspected, maintained, and replaced, as necessary, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.
targetString: Sida ay dhigayaan Maamulka Caafimaadka iyo Badbaadada Shaqada Maraykanka (OSHA), shaqooyinka khatarta yar waxay ay yihiin isasoo gaadh dadka oo yar iyo dadka wada shaqaynayaayi.
translated: Dhammaan noocyada PPE waa in la soo xulay iyada oo ku salaysan halista ay shaqaalaha, si habboon loogu rakibay sida lagu dabaqi karo (tus. tusaale ahaan, neef-mareennada), si joogto ah oo si joogto ah oo habboon loo xirto, si joogto ah loo baaro, loo ilaaliyo, loo ilaaliyo, loona beddelo, sida loo baahdo, oo si habboon looga saaro, la nadiifiyo, loona kaydiyo ama la tuuro si looga fogaado ama la tuuro si looga fogaado faddarka.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers.
targetString: Talaabooyinka kahortaga xanuunka ee aas aasiga ah ee lagula taliyo dhamaan goobaha shaqada waxaa kamid ah in si joogto ah oo wanaagsan  loo maydho gacmaha, in shaqaalaha lagu dhiiri geliyo inay joogaan guriga hadii ay xanuunsanayaan, qabaan xanuun neefsiga ah oo ay ku jirto inay afka iyo sanka qabsadaan hadii ay qufacaan oo ay hindhisaan, in la siiyo kilinigis iyo salada qashinka, loo diyaariyo inay meel kale kasoo shaqayn karaan ama in shaqada la isku habeeyo wakhtiyada lasoo galayo hadii loo baahdo, in laga wacyi shaqaalaha inay wada isticmaalaan agab iyo qalab, iyoinay si joogto ah u nadiifiyaan iyo jeermiska uga dilaan goobta shaqada.
translated: Sida laga soo xigtay Maamulka Badbaadada Shaqada iyo Caafimaadka Shaqada ee Maraykanka (OSHA), shaqooyinka khatarta khatarta soo gaadhista oo hooseeya waxay xiriir shaqo oo yar la leeyihiin dadweynaha iyo dadka kale ee la shaqeeya.

sourceString: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette including covering coughs and sneezes, providing tissues and trash receptacles, preparing for telecommuting or staggered shifts if needed, discouraging workers from using others' tools and equipment, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: In markaba la soo saaro oo meel lay aysoleet gareeyo shakhsiga laga yaabo inuu keeno caabuq taas oo ah talaabo muhiim ah oo markaa lagu ilaalinayo shaqaalaha, macaamiisha, booqdayaasha, iyo dadka kale ee goobta shaqada jooga.
translated: Tallaabooyinka ka hortaga caabuqa ee aasaasiga ah ee lagu taliyey dhammaan goobaha shaqada waxa ka mid ah gacmo maydhiga soo noqnoqda iyo gacmo maydhiga oo dhamaystiran, dhiirigelinta shaqaalaha inay guryahooda joogaan haddii ay xanuunsan yihiin, hab-dhiska neef-mareenka oo ay ku jiraan daboolida qufaca iyo hindhisada, bixinta unugyada iyo qashinka qashinka, diyaarinta isgaarsiinta ama isbedelka istaraatijiyada haddii loo baahdo, ka niyad-jabinta shaqaalaha inay isticmaalaan qalabka iyo qalabka dadka kale, iyo dayactirka nadiifinta iyo nadiifinta jawiga shaqada ee caadiga ah iyo jeermiska jawiga shaqada.

sourceString: Prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals is a critical step in protecting workers, customers, visitors, and others at a worksite.
targetString: Xarunta Kahortaga iyo Xakamaynta Xanuunada Maraykanka (CDC) waxay ku talinaysaa in shaqaalaha qaba calaamada xanuunka daran ee neefsiga inay joogaan gurigooda ilaa inta ay ka baaba'ayso xumadu, raadka xumadu, iyo calaamado kale ugu yaraan 24 saacadood iyaga oo aan isticmaalin dawooyinka yareeya ama wax ka badala xumaha, iyo inay leeyihiin xeer fasaxa xanuunka oo dabacsan, kaas oo u ogolaanaya shaqaalaha inay joogaan gurigooda oo ay daryeelaan cidii xubinta qoyska ah ee xanuunsanaysa, iyo in shaqaalaha ay ka warqabaan xeerarkan.
translated: ["Aqoonsiga degdegga ah iyo go'doominta shakhsiyaadka laga yaabo inuu cudurka qabo ayaa ah tallaabo muhiim ah oo lagu ilaalinayo shaqaalaha, macaamiisha, dadka soo booqanaya, iyo kuwa kale ee jooga goobo shaqo."]

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.
targetString: Sida ay dhigayso OSHA, shaqooyinka leh khatarta yar waxaa kamid ah kuwa dadku si joogto ah isasu gaadhaan ama macaamilka la isku jirsanayo wax ka yar lix fuudh (1.8 m) dadka aan la garanaynin ama looga shakiyo inay yihiin bukaan COVID-19, laakiin ay dhici karto inay qabaan SARS-CoV-2 maadaama oo uu yahay xanuun ku faafa oo ka jira aaga ganacsigu ku yaalo, maadaama oo shakhsi u socdaalay meel kale oo kamid ah meelaha looga shakiyay COVID-19 baahintiisa.
translated: Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo ka hortagga cudurada ee Maraykanku (CDC) waxay kula talinaysaa shaqaalaha qaba calaamadaha lagu garto jirrada neef-mareenka in ay guryahooda joogaan illaa ay ka jiraan qandho, calaamadaha xummad, iyo wax calaamado ah oo kale ugu yaraan 24 saacadood iyada oo aan la isticmaalin qandho-yaraynta ama daawooyinka kale ee calaamadaha badala, iyo in ka tegidda cudurku ay dabacsanaadaan,  in shaqaalaha loo ogolaado in ay guriga joogaan si ay u xanaaneeyaan xubin ka mid ah qoyskaaga oo jiran iyo in shaqaaluhu ay ka warqabaan siyaasadahan.

sourceString: According to OSHA, medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) of people who are not known or suspected COVID-19 patients, but may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 due to ongoing community transmission around the business location, or because the individual has recent international travel to a location with widespread COVID-19 transmission.
targetString: Kuwas waxaa kamid ah shaqaalaha tagay meelaha shacabka sida dugsiyada, meelaha shaqada ee aadka u saxmada badan, iyo meelaha ay dadku ku badan yihiin ee tukaamada. Samaynta xakamayntu tan iyo kooxaha khatarta badan ku jira waxaa kamid ah in la sameeyo hawo nadiifiye tayo sareeya, la kordhiyo xadiga hawo nadiifinta, samayn wax u dhaxeeya sida caag la iska dhax arkayo oo qabta hindhisada, iyo lala sameeyo daaqad qofka gaadhigiisa isaga oo ku jira loogu adeego. Kamaynta maamulka ee tan iyo kooxda khatarta badan ku jirta waxaa kamid ah in lagu dhiiri geliyo shaqaalaha xanuunsanaya inay gurigooda joogaan, ay ku badalaan kulanka foolk-foolka ah maqal iyo muuqaal, in la habeeyo wakhtigan shaqada, in la joojiyo wixii socdaal ah ee aan daruuriga ah ee meelaha uu ka jiro COVID-19, in la sameeyo qorshe xidhiidh xaalada degdeg ah oo ay ku jirto in laga wada hadlo shaqaalaha walaacaalooda, in la siiyo shaqaalaha macluumaadkii ugu danbeeyay iyo in lagu tabo baro xaaladaha khatarta COVID-19 iyo habdhaqanka ilaalinta, lagu tobobaro shaqaalaha cida ay tahay inay isticmaasho dharka ilaalada iyo qalabka sida loo isticmaalo, in la siiyo khayraad iyo deegaan shqo oo markaa horseedaysa nadaafada shakhsi ahaaneed, in lagu khasbo gacmo maydhiga joogtada ah, xadidaada macaamiisha iyo dadka soo gali kara goobta shaqada, iyo in lasoo dhigo calaamado gacmo nadiifin ah iyo talaabooyinka lagaga hortago COVID-19. Taas oo ku xidhan shaqada, shaqaalaha ay yartahay inuu soo gaadho waxaa dhigi kara inay u baahan karaan inay xidhaan agabka ilaalinsha shakhsi ahaaneed oo ay ku jiraan isku darta golofis, dirayska, waji gashad, ama wajiga inay xidhaan, ama muraadayo.
translated: Marka loo eego OSHA, shaqooyinka khatarta gaadhista dhexdhexaadka ah waxaa ka mid ah kuwa u baahan in si joogto ah loola tacaalo ama aad ugu dhawaado lix fiidmeet (1.8 m) ee dadka aan la aqoonin ama looga shakisan yahay bukaanada COVID-19, balse waxaa laga yaabaa in ay ku dhacaan cudurka SARS-CoV-2 sababo la xiriira gudbinta bulshada ee socota ee ku xeeran goobaha ganacsiga, ama sababtoo ah shaqsiga ayaa dhawaan safaro caalami ah ku tagay goob uu ku faafay oo uu ku faafay COVID-19.

sourceString: These include workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.Engineering controls for this and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneeze guards, and installing a drive-through window for customer service.Administrative controls for this and higher risk groups include encouraging sick workers to stay at home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, discontinuing nonessential travel to locations with ongoing COVID-19 outbreaks, developing emergency communications plans including a forum for answering workers’ concerns, providing workers with up-to-date education and training on COVID-19 risk factors and protective behaviors, training workers who need to use protecting clothing and equipment how to use it, providing resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, requiring regular hand washing, limiting customers' and the public's access to the worksite, and posting signage about hand washing and other COVID-19 protective measures.Depending on the work task, workers with at least medium exposure risk may need to wear personal protective equipment including some combination of gloves, a gown, a face shield or face mask, or goggles.
targetString: Shaqaalaha ku jira kooxdan khatarta kujirta badanaa ma isticmaalaan neefsiga.
translated: Waxaa kamid ah shaqaalaha xiriirka la leh dadweynaha guud sida dugsiyada, jawiga shaqada ay dadku ku badan yihiin, iyo qaar ka mid ah goobaha tafaariiqda ee xajmigoodu aad u sareeyo. Injineernimada gacanta ku this iyo ka sareeya kooxaha halista ka mid ah rakibidda filtarrada hawada-oolnimada sare, kordhaya heerka hawo, ku rakibidda caqabado jirka sida balaastikada ilaalada hindhiso caag ah oo nadiif ah, iyo rakibidda daaqad drive-dhex adeegga macaamiisha. Kontoroolada maamul ee kooxaha khatarta ugu sareeya waxaa ka mid ah in lagu dhiirigeliyo shaqaalaha xanuunsan inay guryahooda joogaan, bedelaadda kulamada fool ka fool ka foolka ah ee ay la yeeshaan isgaarsiinta dalwaddii, sameynta isbeddello isdabajoog ah oo isdabajoog ah, joojinta safarada aan laga maarmin ee goobaha uu ka dilaacay COVID-19 ee socda, sameynta qorshayaasha isgaarsiinta degdegga ah oo ay ku jiraan fagaaraha looga jawaabayo walaaca shaqaalaha, in shaqaalaha la siiyo waxbarasho iyo tababaro ku saabsan arrimaha khatarta COVID-19 iyo dabeecadaha difaaca,  tababbarka shaqaalaha ah ee looga baahan yahay inay isticmaalaan ilaalinta dharka iyo qalabka sida loo isticmaalo, bixinta ilo iyo jawi shaqo oo kor u qaadaya nadaafadda shakhsi ahaaneed, u baahan in gacmaha oo joogto ah la dhaqo, yaraynta macaamiisha iyo dadweynahaba in ay helaan goobta, iyo in ay saxiixaan saxiixyada ku saabsan gacmo maydhiga iyo talaabooyinka kale ee difaaca COVID-19. Iyadoo ku xidhan hawsha shaqada, shaqaalaha leh ugu yaraan khatarta khatarta dhexdhexaadka ah ayaa laga yaabaa inay u baahan yihiin inay xirtaan qalabka difaaca shakhsiga oo ay ku jiraan isku darka gacmo gashi, goonni, gaashaan wajiga ama maaskaro wajiga, ama goggles.

sourceString: Workers in this risk group rarely require use of respirators.
targetString: Hadii uu qofku xanuunsado isaga oo diyaarad saaran, qaabka saxda ah ee xakamaynta ee shaqaalaha iyo dadka kale ee rakaabka ah loo ilalain karo waxaa kamid ah in qofka dadka kale laga dhax saaro oo markaa loo jirsiiso 6 fuudh, in hal qof lagu qoro qofka aadka u xanuunsaday, iyo in lasiiyo waji gashad qofka xanuunsanaya ama laga dalbado qofka xanuunsayaa inuu afka iyo sanka xidho oo uu saarto kilinikis marka uu qufacayo ama hindhisayo.
translated: Shaqaalaha ku jira kooxdan halista leh ayaa dhif u baahan isticmaalka neef-mareennada.

sourceString: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Shaqaalaha diyaaradu waxa ay xidhanayaan golofiska caafimaadka ee marka kaliya la isticmaalo marka ay u adeegayaan qof xanuunsanaya oo rakaab ah ama ay dheecaadn taabanayaan ama meelo ay dhici karto inuu jeermisku ku fadhiyo,  iyo agab ilaalo shakhsi ahaaneed oo dheeraad ah hadii qofka xanuunsaya ee rakaabka ahi uu qabo xumad, si joogto ah u qudacayo, ama uu neefsigu ku adkaado.
translated: Haddii uu qofku ku xanuunsado diyaarad, maamulida haboon ee lagu ilaaliyo shaqaalaha iyo dadka kale ee rakaabka ah waxaa ka mid ah in qofka xanuunsan iyo dadka kaleba laga kala sooco meel fogaansho ah 6 fiit, in la qotomiyo hal ka mid ah shaqaalaha oo u adeega qofka xanuunsan, iyo in qofka xanuunsan la siiyo maaskarada wajiga ama in qofka buka laga dhaadhiciyo in uu afka iyo sanka ku daboolo nuugyo marka ay qufacayaan ama hindhiso.

sourceString: Cabin crew should wear disposable medical gloves when tending to a sick traveler or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated surfaces, and possibly additional personal protective equipment if the sick traveler has fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.
targetString: Golofiska iyo shayada kale ee marka kaliya la isticmaal waa in lagu ridaa bacda qashinka kiimikada, oo meelaha la taataabtay ee wasakhda ahna waa in la nadiifiyaa oo jeermiska laga dilaa. Wixii maraakiibka ganacsi ah, oo ay ku jiraan maraakiibta dalxiiska iyo maraakiibta kale ee rakaanka, waxyaabaha lagaga hortagi karo khatarta waxaa kamid ah in dib loo dhigo socdaalka qofka xanuunsayo, in qofku uu meel isku xidho, iyo in loo fidiyo qofka daryeel caafimaad markaba hadii uu qofku leeyahay xumad ama xanuuno kale inta uu saaran yahay.
translated: Shaqaalaha qolka waa in ay xirtaan gacmo gashi caafimaad oo la tuuri karo marka ay u muuqdaan in safar socod buka ama taabashada dheecaanka jirka ama meelaha laga yaabo in ay wasakhaysan yihiin, iyo suurto gal ah qalab dheeraad ah oo difaaca shakhsi ahaaneed haddii qofka xanuunsani uu qabto qandho, qufac joogta ah, ama neefsashada oo ku adag.

sourceString: Gloves and other disposable items should be disposed of in a biohazard bag, and contaminated surfaces should be cleaned and disinfected afterwards.For commercial shipping, including cruise ships and other passenger vessels, hazard controls include postponing travel when sick, and self-isolating and informing the onboard medical center immediately if one develops a fever or other symptoms while on board.
targetString: Caadiyan, waa in caafimaad ahaan lala socdaa qofka qolkiisa ku shax xidhan. Dugsiyada iyo xarumaha daryeelka caruurta, CDC waxay ku talinaynaa in mudo yar la xidho si loo nadiifiyo ama jeermiska looga dilo hadii qof qaba caabuqu uu yimid dugsiga iyada oo aan la eegeynin inuu gaadhsiiyay bulshada iyo in kale.
translated: Gloves-yada iyo waxyaabaha kale ee la tuuro waa in lagu tuuraa bacda bayohasardka, meelaha wasakhaysanna waa in la nadiifiyaa oo laga nadiifiyaa oo laga nadiifiyaa cudurka dib. Maraakiibta ganacsiga, oo ay ku jiraan maraakiibta dalxiiska iyo weelasha kale ee rakaabka, xakamaynta khatarta waxaa ka mid ah dib u dhigista safarada marka aad xanuunsanayso, iyo in la is karitiilo oo lagu wargeliyo xarunta caafimaadka markaba haddii qofku galo qandho ama astaamo kale inta uu saaran yahay.

sourceString: Ideally, medical follow-up should occur in the isolated person's cabin.For schools and childcare facilities, CDC recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
targetString: Marka uu jiro caabuq dhexe ama daran oo bulshada ah, khidada kala fogaanshaha dadka ayaa la dhaqan gelinayaa sida in la joojiyo safarada waxbarasho, isku imaatinada, iyo inay si kale dad badan iskugu yimaadaan sida waxbarashada la wada joogo ama fasalada farshaxanka ama cuntooyinka maqaaxida, in la kordhiyo masaafada u dhaxaysa miisaska, in la isku habeeyo wakhtiga imaatinka iyo wakhtiga la baxayo, xadidaada booqashooyinka aan loo baahnayn, iyo isticmaalka xafiis gaar ah oo caafimaad oo meel kale ku yaal wixii caruur ah ee lah calaamado sida hargabka oo kale ah.
translated: ["Sida ugu fiican, dabagal caafimaad waa in ay ku dhacdaa qolka qofka go'doonsan. Dugsiyada iyo xarumaha xanaanada caruurta, CDC waxay ku talinaysaa in la xidho waqti gaaban si loo nadiifiyo ama jeermis jeermis laga sameeyo haddii qof cudurka qaba uu ku jiro dhismaha dugsiga iyadoon loo eegin in bulshada ay faafiso."]

sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
targetString: Marka uu jiro caabuq aad u baahdan oo bulshada deegaanka ah, marka laga tago khidada kala fogaanshaha dadka, inla balaadhiyo xidhitaanka dugsiga ayaa la isla eegayaa. Ciidamada bilayska ee qabanada shaqada maalintii, waxa ay CDC u aragtaa in khatartooda caafimaadku uu yar yahay.
translated: Marka ay jiraan ugu yaraan u gudbinta bulshada dhexdhexaad ah, xeelado kala fogaansho bulsho ayaa la hirgelin karaa sida joojinta safarrada duurka, kiniisadaha, iyo kulamada kale ee waaweyn sida waxbarashada jireed ama fasalada heesaha ama cuntooyinka maqaayadaha, kordhinta meelaha u dhexeeya miisaska, waqtiyada imaanshaha iyo eryidda, xaddididda booqdayaasha aan laga maarmin, iyo in la adeegsado meel gaar ah oo xafiis caafimaad oo loogu talogalay carruurta qaba calaamadaha sida cudurka dabeysha.

sourceString: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.For law enforcement personnel performing daily routine activities, the immediate health risk is considered low by CDC.
targetString: Saraakiisha bilayska ee ay isasoo gaadhaan dadka lagu xaqiijiyay ama looga shakiyay inay qabaan COVID-19 waxaa lagula talinayaa inay raacaan isla tilmaamahaas ay raacayaan farsamo yaqaanada caafimaadka degdega ah, oo ay ku jiraan agabka ilaalinta shakhsi aahaneed.
translated: Marka ay jirto isu-gudbin wax ku ool ah oo ka dhex jirta bulshada maxalliga ah, marka lagu daro istaraatiijiyadaha kala fogaanshaha bulshada, waxaa laga yaabaa in la tixgeliyo eryidda dugsiyada la kordhiyay. Shaqaalaha sharci fulinta ee sameeya hawlo joogto ah maalin walba, khatarta caafimaad ee degdegga ah waxaa loo arkaa inay hoosayso CDC.

sourceString: Law enforcement officials who must make contact with individuals confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19 are recommended to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical technicians, including proper personal protective equipment.
targetString: Hadii ay isasoo gaadhaan marka uu qabanayo qofka, shaqaaluhu waa inuu nadiifiyaa oo uu jeermiska ka dilaa suunkooda shaqada iyo agabka kahor inta aanu dib ugu isticmaalay iyada oo adeegsanaya buufinta nadiifinta qoyska ama masaxaad, oo uu raaco nidaamka heerka shaqada ee caadiga ah ee wasakhda iyo tuurista PPE-ga la isticmaalay ee ay ku jiraan dharka wasakhda ah maydhistooda.
translated: Saraakiisha sharci fulinta ee ay tahay in ay la xiriiraan shaqsiyaadka la xaqiijiyay ama looga shakiyay in ay qabaan COVID-19 ayaa lagu talinayaa in ay raacaan tilmaamaha la midka ah kuwa ay ka mid yihiin farsamoyaqaannada caafimaadka degdegga ah, oo ay ku jiraan qalabka ilaalinta shakhsiyeed ee saxda ah.

sourceString: If close contact occurs during apprehension, workers should clean and disinfect their duty belt and gear prior to reuse using a household cleaning spray or wipe, and follow standard operating procedures for the containment and disposal of used PPE and for containing and laundering clothes.
targetString: OSHA waxa ay u aragtaa in daryeelka caafimaadka qaar iyo dhimashada shaqalaaha inay aad u badan tahay ama ay tahay heerka khatarta sare ee qaadida.
translated: Haddii xiriir dhow dhaco inta lagu jiro baqdin, shaqaalaha waa in ay nadiifiyaan oo nadiifiyaan suunka waajibkooda iyo qalabkooda ka hor inta aan dib loo isticmaalin isticmaalka buufinta nadiifinta guryaha ama in la tirtiro, oo ay raacaan nidaamyada hawlgalka caadiga ah ee lagu xakameeyo iyo in la tuuro PPE-yada la isticmaalay iyo in lagu xakameeyo iyo lagu dhaqo dharka.

sourceString: OSHA considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk.
targetString: Shaqooyinka khatartooda in laga qaado ay sareyso waxaa kamid ah bixinta daryeelka caafimaadka, taageerada, shaybaadhka, iyo shaqaalaha gaadiidka caafimaadka kuwaas oo uu asiibay ama looga shakiyay inay qabaan COVID-19.
translated: Waxey u aragtaa in daryeelka caafimaadka qaarkood iyo shaqaalaha qalabka laga dhigo ay halis sare ama sareeyaan oo khatarta soo gaadhista ah.

sourceString: High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Tani waxa ay noqotaa khatar badan hadii shaqaalaha qabana shaqada, ama ka shaqaynaya qaadida ama baadhita muunada, wixii looga shakiyo ama lagu og yahay ee ah bukaanka COVID-19.
translated: Khatarta saraysa ee shaqooyinka waxaa kamid ah bixinta daryeelka caafimaadka, taageerada, shaybaarka, iyo shaqaalaha gaadiidka caafimaadka kuwaas oo la ogyahay ama looga shakisan yahay in ay bukaanada COVID-19 qabaanayaan.

sourceString: These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Nidaamka shaqada ee guud waxaa kamid ah, sifada, qaabak uu u qufacayo, bronchoscopies, daawaynta daryeelka ilkaha qaar iyo shaybaadhka, ama muunada adag qaadideeda.
translated: Kuwani waxay noqdeen khatar aad u saraysa hadii shaqaaluhu ay sameeyaan hannaan sababa hawada, ama ay soo ururiyaan ama ay ka tacaalaan tijaabooyinka bukaanada COVID-19 ee la yaqaano ama laga shakisan yahay.

sourceString: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
targetString: Shaqooyinka khatarta badan ee dhimashada ah waxa kamid ah shaqaalaha ka shaqeeya diyaarinta maydhka dadka la og yahay ama looga shakiyo COVID-19 wakhtigan ay dhimanayaan; kuwan ayaa leh khatar aad u badan hadii ay qaliin ku samaynayaan maydka. Xakamaynta farsamo ee dheeraadka ah ee kooxda khatarta ku jirta waxaa kamid ah qolka lagu soo xidho bukaanka la og yahay inuu qabo ama looga shakiyo COVID-19, oo ay ku jiraan shaqada guud ee markaa loo qabtay.
translated: Nidaamyada aerosol-dhaliya waxaa ka mid ah intubation, hannaanka induction qufac, bronchoscopies, qaar ka mid ah nidaamyada ilkaha iyo imtixaanada, ama ururinta tijaabooyinka invasive.

sourceString: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
targetString: Cadaadiska gaarka ah ee negetifka ah ee gaarka ah waxaa loo samayn karaa habdhismeedyada daryeelka caafimaadka iyo meelaha lagu aaso dadka.
translated: Khatarta dhimashada ee khatarta sare leh waxaa ka mid ah shaqaale ku lug leh diyaarinta jidhka dad la ogaa ama looga shakiyay kiisaska COVID-19 ee covid-19 xilliga ay dhinteen; kuwani waxay noqdaan khatar aad u sarreeya haddii ay sameeyaan jeermis. Injineernimada dheeraadka ah ee kooxahan khatarta ah waxaa ka mid ah qolalka kalitalisnimada bukaanada leh ama laga shakisan yahay EE COVID-19, oo ay ku jiraan marka la sameeyo hababka kicinta buufiska.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: Muunada waa in lagaga sheeqeeyaa tacadirka Biosafety Heerka 3 aad ah.
translated: Cadaadiska takhasuska ah ee taban ayaa laga yaabaa inay ku haboon tahay meelaha qaar ka mid ah daryeelka caafimaadka iyo goobaha meydadka laga dhigo.

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka (WHO) waxay ku talinaysaa i bukaanka lasoo dhigayo in loo saaro meel gaar ah oo lagu sugo taas oo ku xidhan hadii looga shakisan yahay COVID-19. Sidoo kale PPE-ga kale, OSHA waxay ku talinaysaa in neefsiga dadka ka shaqaynaya meel u jirta 6 fuush bukaanka la og yahay, ama looga shakiyo inuu qabo, ama qaaday SARS-CoV-2, iyo dadka u samaynaya daawaynta guud.
translated: Tiaadhadhada waa in lagula tacaalaa taxadarka biosafety Level 3.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: Maraykanka, NIOSH N95-ka ay ansixisay ee waji gashadka filterka leh ee neefsiga ah ama waa n loo isticmaalaa si wanaagsan, neefsiga qoraalka ah ee barnaamijka ilaalada oo ay ku jiraan tijaabinta inuu ku xidhmay, tobobar, iyo shaybaadhka caafimaad.
translated: ["Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka (WHO) waxay ku talinaysaa in bukaanada soo galaya loo kala sooco goobo kala duwan oo sugitaan ah taas oo ku xidhan haday yihiin qof looga shakisan yahay inuu yahay kiisas looga shakiyay covid-19.
