Marka laga soo tago PPE kale, OSHA waxay ku talinaysaa neef-mareenada kuwa ka shaqeeya 6 cagood gudahood ee bukaanada la og yahay inay yihiin, ama looga shakisan yahay inay qabaan SARS-CoV-2, iyo kuwa sameeya hababka kicinta aerosol."]

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: Noocyada kale ee neefsiga waxa ay bixin karaan ilaalo wayn iyo hormar raaxada shaqaalaha ah. WHO kuma taliso in wajiga oo dhan la duubo, maadaama oo COVID-19 uu yahay xanuun neefsi oo aanu ku gudbin dheecaanka jidhka.
translated: Wadanka Maraykanka, NIOSH oo ansixisay N95-ka shaandhaynta neef-mareenka wajiga ama si ka fiican waa in loo isticmaalaa iyadoo la eegayo barnaamij dhamaystiran, oo lagu qoray ilaalinta neef-mareenka oo ay ku jiraan taam-baarista, tababarka, iyo baaritaannada caafimaadka.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: WHO waxay kaliya ku talisaa in la xidho waji gashadka qaliinka shaqaalaha jooga meesha laga galayo shaybaadhka.
translated: Noocyada kale ee neef-mareenka waxay siin karaan difaac weyn iyo hagaajinta raaxada shaqaalaha. WHO kuma talinayso in la daboolo, maadaama COVID-19 uu yahay cudur neef-mareen halkii lagu kala qaadi lahaa dareeraha jirka.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: Dadka qaadaya muunada neefsiga, daryeelaya, ama qaadaya bukaanka COVID-19 iyad aoo aanay jirin daawayn guud, WHO waxay ku talisaa in xidhaan waji gashadka qaliinka, golofis, ama wajiga duubtaan, dirays iyo golifis xidhaan.
translated: WHO waxay ku talineysaa oo kaliya maaskarada qalliinka ee shaqaalaha baaritaanka dhibcaha gala.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: Hadii la samaynayo daawayn keeni karta caabuq, waji gashadka qaliinka ayaa lagu badlaayaa N95 ama FFP2 waji gashadka ah.
translated: Kuwa ka aruurinaya tijaabooyinka neefmareenka, daryeelidda, ama gaadiidka bukaanada COVID-19 iyada oo aan lahayn wax nidaam ah oo dhaliya aerosol, WHO waxay kugula talinaysaa maaskarada qalliinka, muraayadaha, ama gacmo gashi wajiga, goonnada iyo gacmo gashi.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: Maadaama oo helitaanka PPE uu yar yahay calaamka, WHO waxay ku talinaysaa in la yareeyo baahida loo qabo PPE taas oo ah in maqal iyo muuqaal dadka lagu daweeyo, wax loo dhaxaysiiyo sida daaqad nadiif ah, taas oo u sahlaysa dhamaan dadka ku lug leh daryeelka tooska ah ee gelitaanka qolka uu ku jiro bukaanka COVID-19, in la isticmaali kaliya PPE daruuriga ah shaqooyinka gaar, in lasii wado isticmaalka isla waji gashadkaas iyada oo aan la iska saarin inta dhawrka bukaan loo adeegayo oo isku xanuun qaba, in lala socdo oo la isku duba rido iibka PPE, iyo in dadka laga wacyi geliyo inay isticmaalaan waji gashadka dadka xanuunsanaya.
translated: Haddii la sameeyo qalliinka aerosol-ka sameeya, maaskarada qalliinka waxaa lagu beddelaa neef-mareenka N95 ama FFP2.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: HALKA Maarso 4, 2020, waxaan bayaaiyay Xaaada Degdeg ah ee ka jirta California taas oo uu keeney khatarta COVID-19;
translated: Maadaama oo ay jirto in keenista caalamiga ah ee dawada aanay ku filnayn, who waxay ku talinaysaa in la yareeyo baahida loo qabo PPE iyada oo loo marayo telemedicine, caqabado jireed sida daaqadaha nadiifka ah, taasoo u oggolaanaysa oo keliya kuwa ku lugta leh daryeelka tooska ah inay galaan qol bukaan COVID-19 qaba, iyadoo la adeegsanayo oo kaliya PPE-da ee lagama maarmaanka u ah hawsha gaarka ah, sii wadida isticmaalka isla neef-mareenka iyada oo aan la iska saarin iyada oo aan la daryeelin bukaano badan oo qaba isla baaritaanka,  kormeerka iyo iskudubaridka silsiladda sahayda ee PPE, iyo niyad-jabinta isticmaalka maaskaro loogu talagalay dadka aan calaamadaha muujinayn.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: KU SOCOTA: Dhamaan shaqaalaha Hay'ada Wikimedia
translated: ["KU SOO DHOWAADA: Katherine Maher, Maamulaha Mu'asasada Wikimedia"]

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: KHADKA MAWDUUCA: [Covid-19] Bayaaminta culayska iyo u diyaar garawga mustaqbalka
translated: TO: Dhamaan shaqaalaha Wikimedia Foundation

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: TAARIIKHDA/SAACADA LA DIRAY: 14 Maarso, 2020, 00:24 UTC
translated: MUUQAALKA UJEEDKA: [Covid-19] Iftiiminta culasha iyo diyaarinta mustaqbalka

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: LIISANKA: CC0: Wax lambar ah lama sheegin
translated: TAARIIKHDA DIR: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: Waxa aanu isku aragnay xaalad adag bishan.
translated: Licensing: CC0: No xuquuqda la ilaaliyo

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: Safmarka COVID-19 waxaa weeye shay cadeeyay isdhax galka bilaa aadanka caalamka iyo masuuliyada midba midka kale ka saaran.
translated: Bishan waxaan ku aragnaa duruufo cajiib ah.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: Awood uma lihin joojinta faafitaanka xanuunkan, laakiin waanu garanaynaa qaabka la isku halayn karo ee lagaga jawaabayo garawsha , qada shaqaynta iyo bulshada caalamka dhisideeda taas oo markaa hawlbawle u ah hay'adan.
translated: ["Safmareenka COVID-19 waa wax cadeynaya isku xirnaanta bini'aadamka aduunka oo dhan iyo mas'uuliyada ka saaran in midka kale aynu is leenahay."]

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: Tani waxay muujinaysaa dadaalka iyo danaynta aanu ku aragnay dhamaan shaqaalaheena ee iimeelka, wada hadalka iyo wada sheekeysiga taas oo si wayn u xaqiijinaysa cajiibnimada bilaa aadanka aanu nasiibka u helnay in aanu la shaqayno.
translated: Ma horudhac u hayno caqabadaha, laakiin waxaan ognahay in jawaabteena ugu wanaagsani ay ku tiirsan tahay dareen-darrada caalami ah, iskaashiga, iyo dhismaha bulsho ee xudunta u ah ururkan.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: Waxa aan kaga faanayo ma jiro dhamaan inaan wada shaqayno.
translated: ["Saaxiibtinimada iyo daryeelka aan ku aragnay dhammaan asxaabteena email, wicitaanada, iyo sheekaysiga waa ansaxinta cajiibka ah ee bini'aadamka cajiibka ah waxaan nasiib u leenahay inaan la shaqayno."]

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: Todobaadkii lasoo dhaafay, qof ayaa soo dhigay mahadnaq shaqadeena ah.
translated: Ma aanan kari waayin mahad-celin iyo isla weyni inaan dhammaantiin ku tiriyo in aad tihiin asxaabtiina.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: Waxa ay i xasuusiyeen sida ay caalamka wax ku ool ugu tahay in wakhti xaadirkan ay galaan Wikipedia, iyo calaamada awooda badan ee ay u tahay isha macluumaadka muhiimka ah inay online ku jirto oo markaa ay heli karaan dhamaan.
translated: Asbuucii la soo dhaafay, qof ayaa ila wadaagay qiimeyntooda ku aaddan shaqadeena.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: Shaqadaada ayaa macquul ka dhigaysa, hadii websaytku uu sii jiro ama hadii shaqaalaheena lasiiyo mushahar ama amaanka bulshooyinka.
translated: Waxay i xasuusiyeen sida ay macnaha u leedahay in dunidu ay awood u yeelato in ay hadda u jeesato Wikipedia, iyo calaamad awood leh oo ay tahay in khayraadkan muhiimka ahi uu khadka u ahaado mid khadka tooska ah oo ay dadka oo dhan ula heli karaan.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: Caalamku waxa uu u baahan yahay macluumaadka Wikipedia uu bixiyo, iminka wakhti kasta si kasii badan.
translated: Shaqadaadu waxay tani suurtagelinaysaa, haddii aad goobaha joogeyso ama aad mushahar sii wadato ama saaxiibadeen ay mushahar qaataan ama bulshadeena ay bad-baadiyaan.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: Wakhti xaadirkan oo kaliya aan ahayn waxa aanu qabanayno, laakiin sida aanu u qabanayno, ayaa saamayn wayn ku leh caalamka.
translated: Dunidu waxay u baahan tahay macluumaadka ay Wikipedia bixiso, oo hadda ka badan sidii hore.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: Maadaama oo uu muhiim tahay shaqadani iyo kaalintaada, waxa aanu samayn doonaa hagaajin muhiim ah oo sida aanu u wada shaqayno ah, laga bilaabo todobaadkan.
translated: Tani waa daqiiqad aan kaliya waxa aan sameyno, laakiin sida aan u sameyno, ay saameyn macno leh ku yeeli doonto dunida.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: In aanu habayno shaqooyinkeena iyo jadwalkeena.
translated: Muhiimadda ay leedahay howl-galkan iyo kaalinta aad ku leedahay, ayaa waxaanu samayn doonnaa isbedel muhiim ah oo ku aaddan sida aan u wada shaqeyno, laga bilaabo isbuucan soo socda.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: Sida uu hore u sheegey Robyn, kooxda-c ayaa kulmay habeen hore si ay uga wada hadlaan qaabka iyo jadwalka maalmaha iyo bilaha soo socda.
translated: Hagaajinta shaqadayada iyo jadwaladeena

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Wada sheekeysigaa, waxa aanu ku eegnay wixii aanu u aragno inay tahay jawaabta munaasabka ah ee waxa aanu wajahayno iyo qaabka ugu wanaagsan ee hay'ada loo sii wadi karo wakhtigan.
translated: Sida uu horay u sheegay Robyn, c-team ayaa xalay kulmay si ay uga wada hadlaan qaabkeena iyo jadwalka maalmaha iyo bilaha soo socda.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: Waxa aanu si balaadhan doonaynaa in meesha aanu uga saarno warwarka oo aanu taageerno shaqadeena mudada dheer.
translated: ["Wada hadalkaas, waxaan tixgelinay waxa aan u malaynay inuu yahay jawaab habboon oo laga bixinayo waxa aan wajahayno iyo habka ugu wanaagsan ee lagu ilaalin karo hay'adda waarta inta lagu jiro waqtigan."]

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: Hadii aad u baahato isku soo celin, waa caadi.
translated: Aad iyo aad ayaan u rabnay in aan meesha ka saarno culayska oo aan taageerno howlgalkayaga muddada fog.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: Dhamaan shaqaalaheena, qansaraaslayaasheena, iyo shaqaalaha heshiiska lagula jiro:
translated: Haddii aad u baahantahay inaad dib u diirsato, taasi waa caadi.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: waxa aanu maalintii shaqayn doonaa 4 saacadood, ama 20 saacadood todobaadkii ilaa inta wargelin kale ay soo baxayso.
translated: Shaqaalaha, qandaraaslayaasha iyo shaqaalaha heshiisyada oo dhan:

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: Ma bayaaminayno fasax - hadii aad shaqayn karto saacadaha caadiga ah, oo shaqada laguu adeegsan karo.
translated: filashooyinka aan ka filayno maalin walba ee shaqada waxay noqon doontaa 4 saacadood maalintii, ama 20 saacadood todobaadkii ilaa ogaysiis dheer.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: Laakiin, caalamka lama saadaalin karo wakhti xaadirkan, oo hadii aad u baahan tahay inaad daryeesho qof qoyska ah, inaad soo iibsato cunto, ama aad qabato dhakhtarka, badqabkaaga ayaa mudnaantaada ah.
translated: Ma sheegi karno fasax - haddii aad awoodo inaad shaqeyso saacado caadi ah oo badan, safaaraddu way ku isticmaali kartaa.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: Lama soconayno wakhtigaaga.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, adduunku hadda waa mid aan la saadaalin karin, iyo haddii aad u baahan tahay in aad daryeelto kuwa aad jeceshahay, qaadato raashinka, ama takhtarka u tag, wanaaggaagu waa mudnaanta koobaad.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: Hadii aad xanuunsanayso, ha shaqaynin.
translated: Annagu ma aanu raad raacayno waqtigaaga.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: Anaka oo carabaabayna, laakiin odhanayna.
translated: Haddii aad xanuunsan tahay, ha shaqaynin.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: Looma baahna maalmod fasax xanuun ama PTO in la dalbado - kaliya u sheeg maamulahaaga oo kooxdaada ka caawi inay jadwalkooda habaystaan oo ay markaa u sameeyaan wakhti ay shaqooyinka muhiimka ah loo qabto.
translated: Tani waa in ay socotaa iyada oo aan la dhihin, laakiin waxaanu leennahay.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: (Hadii lagaa talo COVID-19, fadlan u sheeg Bryan ee T&C Ops loo yaqaan T&C ayaa kaa caawin kara taageerada oo markaa xaqiijinaya in xaaladaada sida haboon laguu fiirsado si loo maamulo).
translated: Maalmo jiran ama PTO looma baahna - kaliya u sheeg maamulahaaga oo ka caawi kooxdaada dib u eegista jadwalka iyo jadwalka si loo hubiyo in meelaha muhiimka ah ee shaqada laga daboolay.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: Mushaharka saacadaha si buuxda ayaa loo bixin doonaa.
translated: (Haddii lagaa helo COVID-19, fadlan Bryan gudaha T&C Ops u sheeg si T&C Ops loo ogaado si T&C ay uga caawiso taageerada iyo in la hubiyo in xaaladaadu ay ka hesho taxadar ku haboon xagga maareynta).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: Waxa aanu hore u nidhi, oo nagala go'an in aanu u hogaansano cida aan heshiiska kula jirto iyo saacadaha shaqaalaheena.
translated: Waxaa la siiyay dadka Saacadda (Qiyaame) si buuxda.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: Qof kasta waxa lagu siin doonaa mushaharka saacadiihii caadiga ahaa ee uu shaqayn jiray ee xaaladaha caadiga ah.
translated: Waxaan hore u nimid, oo aan dib u soo qaadanay si aan u sharfno ballanqaadkeena qandaraaslayaashayada iyo asxaabta shaqaalaha saacadaha ah.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: Taas waxa kamid ah hadii aad xanuunsato oo aanad shaqayn karin.
translated: Qof kasta waxaa mushaar la siinayaa ayadoo lagu saleynayo saacadihii caadiga ahaa ee uu soo shaqeeyay.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: Hadii aad doonayso inaad shaqayso, waanu ku caawin doonaa.
translated: Tan waxaa ku jira haddii aad xanuunsan tahay oo aad shaqayso.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: Dad badan ayaa u adeegsada shaqada qaab ay isku buuqa iskaga yareeyan ee caalamka ku xeeran.
translated: Haddii aad doonayso inaad shaqayso, waanu ku taageeraynaa.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: Waxa bixinayaa abaal marin cajiib ah, gaar ahaan wakhtiga noocan oo kale ah.
translated: Dad badan ayaa ka shaqeeya waxay u adeegsadaan sidii ay uga dhiirrigelin lahaayeen walaaca ay ku hayaan aduunka aynu jaarka ku ahnahay.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: Mar kale ayaan ku celinayaa, tani waa daryeelka naftaada.
translated: Waxa aan sameyno waxa uu noqon karaa mid si cajiib ah abaal ugu kicin kara, gaar ahaan xilliyadaan oo kale.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: Kaliya waxa aanu dalbaynaa waa inaad la xidhiidho maamulahaaga, si markaa aanu u ogaan kartno waxa aanu filan karno oo markaa u habayn karno shaqada.
translated: Mar labaad tani waxay ku saabsan tahay is-ilaalisgaaga.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: Shaqooyinka qaar ayaa loo arkaa inay daruuri yihiin.
translated: Weydiintayadu waxa weeye inaad la xiriirto maamulahaaga, sidaas darteed waxaannu ognahay waxa laga filan karo oo ku haboon karaa sida ay tahay.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: Waxaa jira waxyaabo ay tahay inaynu sii wado qabashadooda.
translated: Shuqullada qaarkiis waxaa loo arkaa inay muhiim tahay.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: SRE, HR Ops, Kalsoonida & Amaanka, iyo Dhaqaale uruurinta kooxda (iyo waxyeebo kale) ayaa ah shaqooyinka daruuriga ah ee markaa u baahan taageerada dheeraadka ah.
translated: Waxaa jira waxyaabo ay tahay inaan sii wadno.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: Waxa aanu bilaabi doonaa nidaamka dhamaan waaxaha si markaa aanu u heli karno ujeedooyinka wakhtigan oo markaa diirada u saari karno taageerada shaqooyinkeena daruuriga ah.
translated: Kooxda SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, iyo kooxaha lacag aruurinta (oo ay ka mid yihiin kuwa kale) waxay qabtaan shaqo muhiim ah oo laga yaabo inay u baahato taageero dheeri ah.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: Waxaa jira wax badan oo nooloo qaban karo, waxa aanu kaliya diirada saari doonaa mashaariicda daruuriga ah.
translated: Waxaan bilaabi doonaa howl aan la yeelanno waaxaha oo dhan si aan u qiimeyno ujeeddooyinka hadda jira oo aan diiradda saarno ugu wareejino taageeridda waxa muhiimka u ah hadafkeena.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: In iminka la yareeyaa waxyaalo hadhaw ah keeni mayso.
translated: Waxaa jira waxyaabo badan oo aan wax inoo qaban karno dhamaanteen, dhamaanteen waxaynu diiradda saari doonaa mashaariicda ugu muhiimsan.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: Ma qorshaynayno in "laba jeer la galo shaqada" marka uu xanuunka laga gudbo.
translated: Hoos u dhac hadda waxyeello ma gaari doonto hadhow dambe.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: Lagaagama fadhiyo in aan shaqayso wakhti dheeraad ah si aad wakhtiga shaqada ku eeg tahay aad ugu dhamayn karto taas oo aan wakhtigan macquul ahayn.
translated: Ma qorshaynayno in aynu tagno "laba-jibbaar ah si ay u qabsato" marka uu cudurka safmarka ahi ka dhammaado.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: Waxa aanu aqbalnay in xaaladu ay isbadalshay, oo waxa aanu samayn doonaa bartilmaaeed csuub iyo wakhti munaasab ku ah.
translated: Waxa aan lagaa filayn doonaa in saacado dheeraad ah aad shaqeyso si aad u buuxiso waqtiyada kama dambeysta ah oo hadda aan macqul ahayn.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: Maxaa ku dhacay APP (Qorshaynta Sanadkii)?
translated: Waan aqbalnaa in duruufaha ay isbedeshay, waxaana ka shaqeyn doonnaa dejinta bartilmaameedyo cusub iyo jadwallo ay ku habboon yihiin.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: Si loo habeeyo waaqiciga cusub iyo shaqada maalintii ee saacadaha la filanayo, waxa aanu qorshaynaynaa in la habeeyo wakhtiga lagu bixinayo Qorshaha Sanadkii ee 2020-2021.
translated: Maxaa ku dhacaya APP-ka (Qorshaha Sanadlaha ah)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: Waxa aanu doonaynaa in aanu soo jeedino kordhin qorshaha 2019-2020 si markaa wakhti loo siin karo miisaaniyada si shaqaalaha loogu ogolaado inay mudnaanta siiyaan shaqooyinka daruuriga ah, daryeelka nafta, iyo daryeelka qoyska inta lagu jiro qaabilaada dadka u baahan ama doonaya inay shaqeeyaan wakhti kayar intii hore dhawrka todobaad ee soo socda.
translated: Si aan ula qabsano xaqiiqdeena cusub iyo rajada saacadaha shaqo ee maalinlaha ah, waxaan ku talo jirnaa inaan hagaajino jadwalka loogu talagalay bixinta qorshaheena sanadlaha ah ee 2020-2021.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: Waxa uu kordhinta wakhtigani aad u yaraynayaa culayska shaqada ee qorshaha wakhtigan iyo cadaadiska hay'ada oo dhan.
translated: Ujeedadeenu waa in aan soo jeedino fidinta qorshaheena 2019-2020 kaas oo u ogolaanaya waqti dheeraad ah oo loogu talagalay miisaaniyadda si loogu oggolaado shaqaalaha inay mudnaanta siiyaan shaqada muhiimka ah, is-daryeelka, iyo daryeelka dadka la jecel yahay iyada oo la meelmarinayo kuwa u baahan ama raba inay shaqeeyaan jadwalkii yaraa ee toddobaadyada soo socda.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: Waxa aanu bari doonaa qorshaheena Gudida todobaadka soo socda oo waxa aanu cusboonaysiin doonaa wakaalada iyo kooxaha talaabooyinka xiga sida ugu dhakhsaha badan ee aannu u xaqiijino.
translated: Waqtiga fidintani waxay si weyn u yaraynaysaa culayska shaqo ee qorshaynta ee hadda jira iyo cadaadiska ka jira guud ahaan ururka oo dhan.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: Waad ku mahadsan tahay kooxda APP ee hogaanka arrintan.
translated: Isbuuca soo socda ayaanu soo jeedineynaa gudiga, waxaanan guddida u soo gudbin doonaa warbixinta aanu u soo saarnay ergooyinka iyo kooxaha ku aaddan tallaabooyinka xiga, isla marka aan helno xaqiijinta.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: Xaalada xafiiska, soo gaadhida iyo nadiifinta.
translated: Waad ku mahadsan tahay kooxda APP hoggaankaaga tan.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: Todobaadkii lasoo dhaafay, waxa aanu ogaanay in mid kamid ah shaqaalaha SF ka shaqeeyaa ay dhici karta inuu asiibay fayruska COVID-19.
translated: Xaaladda Xafiiska, bandhigga, iyo nadiifinta

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: Laakiin, iyada oo laga xatadirayo, waxa aanu shaqaalaysiinay koox jeermiska ka disha xafiiska San Francisco o dhan.
translated: Asbuucii lasoo dhaafay, waxaan ogaanay in mid ka mid ah saaxiibadeena saldhigoodu yahay SF laga yaabo in uu la kulmay fayruuska COVID-19.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: Ka faa'idaysiga dawada jeermiska disha ee loogu talo geley isbitaalakada si jeermiska looga dilo meelaha la taataabto, iyo sidoo kale qaybta soo dhawaynta iyo wiisha lagu tago dabaqyada.
translated: Si kastaba ha noqotee, taxadar badan awgeed, waxaanu u adeegsanay shaqaale nadaafadeed oo laga sameeyay jeermiska si ay u jeermiyaan dhammaan meelaha sare ee xafiiska San Francisco.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: Dhismaha waxa uu leeyahay nidaam daryeelka ah oo markaa looga faa'idaysan karo taageerada amaanka ee dadka kiraystayaasha ah.
translated: Waxay adeegsadeen xalka ka hortagga fayraska ee darajada isbitaalka si ay u jeermiyaan meelaha sare ee dusha sare, iyo sidoo kale bangiyada dabaq-geeyaha ee gala dhulkayaga.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: Waxa aanu ku kalsoonahay in xafiisku uu diyaar inoo noqon doono marka aanu doono in aanu kusoo noqono.
translated: Wuxuu dhismuhu u shaqeysiinayaa habka loo wajaho waajibaadka daryeelka ee isticmaalka alaabooyinka lagu taageerayo badqabka kireystahooda.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: Xafiiskeena DC waxa uu ku yaalaa WeWork, kaas oo nala wadaagay nidaamkiisa COVID-19 naaka iyo dhamaan shaqaalaha DC ka shaqeeya.
translated: ["Waxaan dareemeynaa raaxo in xafiisku uu ahaan doono mid si fiican ugu diyaar garoobaya markii aan go'aansano inaan dib u laabanno."]

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: Todobaadkii lasoo dhaafay, xafiiskeena DC waxaa loo wareejiyay in gebi ahaanba guriga laga soo shaqeeyo taas oo waafaqsan tilmamaamaha ay la wadaageen San Francisco.
translated: Xafiiskeena DC wuxuu ku yaalaa Wework, kaas oo nala wadaagay annaga iyo dhammaan xubnaha shaqaalaha DC ee fadhigoodu yahay DC.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: Sida ay yaqaanaan qaar kamid ah shaqaalaheena NYC, waxa aanu sidoo kale ka wada hadlanay sidii loo kiraystan lahaa meel Brooklyn ah.
translated: Laga soo bilaabo isbuucii lasoo dhaafay, xafiiskeena DC wuxuu u dhaqaaqay qaab si buuxda u fog oo waafaqsan hagitaankii lala wadaagay San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: Wada hadalkaasi uu socda laakiin dib ayuu u dhacay.
translated: Sida ay qaar ka mid ah saaxiibadeenna ku salaysan NYC yaqaanaan, waxaan sidoo kale wada hadal ku saabsan in la dhiso goob brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: Qaar kamid ah shaqaalaheena ayaa meel kale kasoo shaqaynaya markii ugu horeysay.
translated: Wadahadaladan way sii socdaan balse waxaa laga yaabaa inay dib u dhacaan.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: Shaqaalaheena mudada dheer guriga ku dhax shaqaynaya ayaa garanaya in aan taas habeyn karno, oo waxa aanu doonaynaa in talin qaar kaa siino:
translated: Qaar ka mid ah asxaabteena ayaa markii ugu horeysay ka shaqeeya meel fog.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Waxa aad wakhtiga kulanka kusoo koobtaan hal ama ugu badnaan labba saacadood.
translated: Saaxiibadeena mudada fog joogay way og yihiin in ay noqon karto is-habeyn, waxaana aan rabnay in ay talo ku siiyaan:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: Hadii loo baahan yahay madal ka dheer, waxa aad isla eegtaan inaad u jaajbisaan mudo dhawr ayaamood ah.
translated: In la yareeyo muddada shirarka ugu badnaan hal ama laba saacadood oo isa soo taraya.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Kulanka sida cad loo cadeeyay, waa inaad yeelataa ajande, oo soo dir warbixin lasii akhriyo arka hore.
translated: Haddii kulamo dheer loo baahan yahay, ka fiirso sida ay u kala jabi karaan dhowr maalmood gudahood.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Waxa aad samaysaa fiidyaw toos ah, oo waxa aad isticmaashaa agabka sida Google Docs iyo Zoom si markaa loo fududeeyo oo loo xidhiidhitaa.
translated: Si cad u qeex kulanka, aad leedahay ajendale, oo ka hor u soo dira qalabka akhriska.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Waxa aad hogaamisaa fududaynta kulan kasta, qof ayaa la soconaya wada sheekeysi wixii su'aalo ah oo markaa la socona liiska dadka hadlaya, oo qof ahaa ka caawin doona qaadida qoraalada (ama inuu isku daro qoraalada la qaaday).
translated: Samee video default ah, qalab sida Google Docs iyo Zoom si loo fududeeyo iskaashi nool iyo xiriir.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Waxa aad soo dirtaa iimeel waaxda taageerada farsamo hadii aad u baahan tahay sameedo haboon.
translated: ["Hayso hogaan si loo fududeeyo kulan kasta, qof si uu ula socdo sheekaysiga su'aalaha iyo la socoshada liiska guddoomiyaha baarlamaanka, iyo qofka ka caawiya in ay qaataan qoraalada (ama samayn note-qaadashada iskaashi)."]

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Waxa aad isticamashaa nususaacahaaga wanaagsan.
translated: Dir email ah si ay u taageero tech haddii aad u baahan tahay headset a raaxo leh.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Waxa aad ka qayb gashaa #remoties idaacadaha aha ee Slack ee wada hadalka dadka la wada shaqeeyo ee ku saabsan qaybinta shaqada
translated: U istiimood magdhawga fayodhawga haddii aad hesho wax yar.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Kooxda Shaqada Waaxda Shaqaalaha ayaa eegaya tilmaamo webinar ah oo markaa lagu kordhinayo taageerada qaybinta shaqada ee Aas Aasiga ah.
translated: Ku biir channel #remoties ee Slack si aad ula hadasho saaxiibadaa oo ku saabsan shaqada qaybiyey

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: Todobaadkii lasoo dhaafay waxa aanu ka dalbanay bulshada inay helaan joojinta munaasabadaha deeqda lacagta Wikimedia, sida tafatirka, ilaa inta ay WHO ku dhawaaqayso in safmarku uu dhamaaday.
translated: ["Kooxda Hawlgallada HR waxay eegeysaa tilmaanta ergooyinka ergonomics ee fadhigoodu yahay Webinar si ay u taageerto kororka shaqooyinka loo qaybiyey ee ka jira Hay'adda Aasaasiga oo dhan."]

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Waxa aanu u sheegnay in aanu fahanay in dalabkeenii la joojiyay iyo xadidaadaha kale ee markaa lagu soo rogi karo ei markaa loo buuxiyo deeqa ay ogolaaday hawlaha ah iyo in aan cidna ayna ku mudan ciqaab dib u dhiga ama wax ka badalka yoolashan.
translated: Toddobaadkan la soo dhaafay waxaanu dalbanay dhammaan dadka helay deeqaha bulshadu in la joojiyo munaasabadaha dadweynaha ee ay wikimedia maalgeliso, sida wax-bedelada, ilaa Who ay ku dhawaaqdo in cudurka faafa uu dhamaaday.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Todobaadka soo socda waxa aanu raaci doonaa tilmaamo dheeraad ah oo Wikimenia ah iyo deegaamada kale iyo shirarka bulshada ee heerkulka ah.
translated: Waxaan ogeysiineynaa in aan fahanay in codsigayaga in la baajiyo iyo xanibaadaha kale ay suurta gal ka dhigi karto mid aan suurtagal aheyn in howlaha deeqaha ee lagu heshiiyey ay dhammaystiraan iyo in aan qofna la ganaaxin doonin in uu dib u dhigo ama wax ka bedelo himilooyinkaas.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Qaabka guud ee bulshooyinka caalamka waxa aad moodaa inay murugo  leedahay khalkhalka laakiin waxa aanu aaminsanahay bayaaminta iyo awooda diirada lagu saarayo bulshadooda, Wikimedia iyo sida kale.
translated: Toddobaadka soo socda waxaan daba gali doonnaa hagitaan dheeri ah oo ku saabsan Wikimania iyo shirarka kale ee bulshada goboleed iyo mawduucyadaba.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Marka lagasii socdo, CRT waxay ka shaqaynaysaa inay samayso bog Meta-Wiki ah si loo bixiyo meelo bulshada ah oo lagula soconayo saamaynta iyo la socodka xidhiidhka aanu la leenahay.
translated: Dareenka guud ee ka imaada bulshada caalamka ayaa u muuqata mid murugo ka ah carqaladaynta laakiin wax laga naxo cadaynta iyo awoodda ay u leeyihiin inay diiradda saaraan bulshadooda, Wikimedia iyo si kale.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: La socodka wixii arrimo ah ee la xidhiidha COVID-19
translated: Marka hore la sii wado, CRT waxay ka shaqeyneysaa in ay bog ka samaysato Meta-Wiki si ay u siiyaan boos ay bulshada ku kormeeraan saameynta oo ay u raacaan isgaarsiintayada aan la yeelanno.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Waxa aanu soo diri doonaa casuumad Khamiiska soo socota, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT kulan shaqaalaha oo gaar ah.
translated: Xiriirinta arrimaha la xiriira COVID-19

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Waxa aanu uga faa'idaysan doonaa wakhtigaas in aanu bixino macluumaadka dheeraadka ah, ka jawaabto su'aalo oo aan wakhti dheeraad ah gelino in dadka kale aanu isku xidhano.
translated: Waxaan u soo diri doonaa martiqaad jadwalkaaga Khamiista soo socota, 14:00 UTC / 07:00 PT shir shaqaalaha gaarka ah.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Waynu ku wada jirnaa oo waxaynu gacan uga gaysan doonaa si kasta.
translated: ["Waxaan markan u isticmaali doonnaa in aan wadaagno wax cusub oo dheeri ah, ka jawaabno su'aalihiinna, waxaan ku qaadan doonaa waqti aan isku xirno midba midka kale."]

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Wakhti xaadirkan, waxa kuusii soconaya in macluumaadku uu kaasoo gaadho iimeelkan, iyo wixii kale ee daruurigaah ee macluumaadka la xidhiidha COVID-19, ee Xafiiska Wiki.
translated: Waxaan wada joognaa arrintan si wadajir ah iyo halkanba si aan u caawino si kastaba ha ahaatee ee aan awoodno.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: CRT ayaa ka shaqayn doona gelinta bogagan iyo dhamaan macluumaadka oo hal meel ah.
translated: Isla markaa, waad sii wadi kartaa inaad hesho macluumaadka emailkan, iyo dhamaan macluumaadka kale ee muhiimka ah ee la xidhiidha COVID-19 ee Xafiiska Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: Waxa aanu sidoo kale ka shaqaynaynaa in aanu xidhiidhka joogtayno shaqaalaha degan dalalka wakhti xaadirkan uu saamayn wayn uu ku yeeshay.
translated: ["Hay'adda CRT ayaa bogagtan iyo dhamaan macluumaadkaba hal meel ku xajin doonta."]

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Hadii aad qabto wax su'aalo ah, oo ku saabsan socdaal, munaasabado, baahinta tooska ah ee shaqada ee waawayn, ama cabaqado internetka ah, ama wax kale oo aad u baahan tahay, fadlan haka gaban inaad wargeliso oo aad la shaqayso CRT.
translated: Waxaan sidoo kale ka shaqeyneynaa in aan si joogto ah ula xiriirno shaqaalaha ku nool dalalka waqtigan xaadirka aadka u daran ay saameysay.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Waxa aanu halkan u joognaa in aanu ku caawino oo aan kuula shaqayno sida loogu baahdo.
translated: ["Haddii aad qabtid wax su'aalo ah oo ku saabsan safarka, dhacdooyinka, goobo shaqo oo waaweyn, ama caqabad caymiska, ama wax kasta oo kale oo aad u baahan kartaa caawimaad, fadlan ha ka waaxin inaad ogeysiiso oo aad la shaqeyso CRT.."]

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Hadii aad hayso arrin sir ah ama xasaasi ah, fadlan iimeel ugu dir Bryan Judan - Maamulaha Shaqala Caalmaka ee Waaxda Shaqaalaha.
translated: Waxaan halkaan u joognaa in aan ka caawino bixinta taageero iyo liaise haddii loo baahdo.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Waxba kamid ah isbadalan waa in aan loo arag culays shaqadeena ah iyo waajibaadkeena.
translated: Haddii aad qabto arin qarsoodi ah ama xasaasi ah, fadlan email bryan Judan - Agaasimaha Hawlgallada Caalamiga ah ee HR International.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: Laakiin, waxaa weeye aqoonsiga wakhtigan, oo shaqooyinka iyo waajibaadka waxa ay u badan tahay inay la qabsan doonaan sidii horena ay ula qabsadeen.
translated: Midna isbeddeladan waa in aan loo arkin mid ka tagaya shaqadayada iyo waajibaadkeena.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: Waxaa jira talaabooyin aanu u aragno inay daruuri u yihiin taageerada dhaxdeena si markaa aaun usii wadno shaqada, oo uu dhaqaaqeenu u bixiyo taageero ee ay u baahan yhiin, iyo caalamka adeega ay ku tiirsan yihiin.
translated: Balse, waxay yihiin aqoonsi xilligan la joogo, shaqadeena iyo waajibaadkeenna ay u baahan tahay in ay ula qabsadaan sidii aynaan hore ugu baran.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: Shaqadeena qorshaysan waxa ay halkaa ugu sugnaan doontaa marka wakhtigeedu yimaado.
translated: Kuwani waa tallaabooyinka aan aaminsannahay inay lagama maarmaan u tahay in midka kale la taageero si aan u sii wadno shaqadooda, aan u siinno dhaqdhaqaaqyadeenna taageerada ay u baahan yihiin, iyo dunida adeega ay ku tiirsan yihiin.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: Wakhti xaadirkan, waxa la gaadhay wakhtigii uu midba midkeena kale taageeri lahaa oo aynu samaynsan lahayn makaanka shaqooyinka muhiimka ah ee todobaadyada iyo bilaha soo socda.
translated: Howlaheena noo qorsheysan ayaa halkaas joogi doona annaga oo sugeysa marka xilligu soo gaaro.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: Waxa aanu u baahanahay dhamaantiin inay taasi dhacdo, oo waxa aanu doonaynaa dhamaantiin in aad naftiina daryeeshaan iyo qoysaskiisa si markaa aanu wax kuugu tari karno marka baahidu timaado.
translated: Waxa aanu ilaa hadda la joogaa markii la is-kaalmeyn lahaa oo boos loo abuuri lahaa hawlaha muhiimka ah ee iman doona toddobaadyada soo socda iyo suurtagalnimada bilaha soo socda.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: Iminka, fadlan -- maydh gacmahaaga oo ha taaban wajigaaga!
translated: Waxaan idinkaga baahannahay dhammaantiin si aad taasi u dhacdo, sidaas darteed waxaan idinkaga baahanahay dhamaantiina inaad nafsadaada iyo ehelkaada daryeeltaan si aad adigu isugu noqotaan meelaha ugu fiican marka baahidu ka dhalato.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, iyo Tony S), iyo inta kale ee Kooxda Hogaanka  (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, iyo Toby N).
translated: Hadaba, fadlan-- gacmaha iska dhaq oo ha taaban wajigaaga!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: Fayruska SARS-CoV-2 oo uu keeno COVID-19 (xanuunka coronavirus 2019), taas oo ah xanuun faafaa oo neefsiga ah kaas oo markii ugu horeysay lagu ogaaday Diseember 2019, Wigan, Hubei, Jayna.
translated: Katherine, CRT ah (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, iyo Tony S), iyo inta kale ee Kooxda Hoggaanka (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, iyo Toby N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: ACE2 waxa uu kasoo horjeedaa hawsha la xidhiidhi angiotensim- badala enzyme (ACE) isaga oo yaraynaya xadiga angiotensin-II oo kordhinaya Ang (1-7) kaas oo ka dhigaya dawo wanaagsan oo markaa bartilmaameedsata xanuunka wadnaha. ACE2 waxaa sidoo kale weeye meesha laga soo galo unuyada coronaviruska qaar.
translated: ["B'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) waa enzyme ku xiran dusha sare (xubinta unugyada) ee unugyada sambabada, halbowlaha wadnaha, kelyaha iyo mindhicirrada."]

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: Nuqulka bilaa aadanka ee enzyme waxaa badanaa loo yaqaan hACE2.
translated: ACE2 waxay ka hortagaysaa dhaqdhaqaaqa enzyme-ka angiotensin-beddelaya ee la xiriira (ACE) iyada oo hoos u dhigaysa xaddiga angiotensin-II iyo kordhinta Ang (1-7) taas oo ka dhigaysa bartilmaameedka daroogada idimaatin ee lagu daweeyo cudurrada wadnaha. ACE2 wuxuu sidoo kale yahay barta laga soo galo unugyada coronavirus qaarkood.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: Angiostensin-badalka enzyme 2 waxaa weeye sinki uu ku jiro metalloenzyme oo ku yaal dusha endothelial iyo unugyada kale.
translated: ["Nooca bini'aadamka ee enzyme waxaa badanaa loo yaqaanaa hACE2."]

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: ACE2 borootiinta ah waxaa ku jira N-terminal ah oo peptidase M2 meelaas ah iyo C-terminal oo aaga qaada aysiidha rental amino ah.
translated: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 waa zinc oo ku jira metalloenzyme oo ku yaalla dusha sare ee unugyada endothelial iyo unugyada kale.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: ACE2 waxa weeye nooc kaliya oo I xabka borootiinta ah, kaas oo leh aaga enzymatically firfircoon oo markaa gaadha dusha unuga ee sanbabka iyo unugyada kale.
translated: Borotiinka ACE2 wuxuu ka kooban yahay domain N-terminal peptidase M2 iyo domain -terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: Aagaga unugyada dheeraadka ah ee ACE2 waxa ay ku xardhan yihiin aaga unuga kaas oo qaada enzyme loo yaqaan sheddase, oo keena borootiin milanta oo waxa uu ku baxaa xidida dhiiga oo waxa uu burburiyaan wixii kaadida laga soo saaray.
translated: ACE2 waa borotiin hal-pass ah oo xuubka ku jira, oo leh unugyada enzymatically firfircoon ee u nugul dusha sare ee unugyada sambabada iyo unugyada kale.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: ACE2 waxa uu ku jiraa badanaa unugyada: ACE2 waxa uu weeraraa xabka unuga caadiyan sanbabka nooca II alveolar unugyada ah, enterocytes ee xiidmaha yar, xididka iyo unugyada endothelial kala duwan iyo unugyada murqaha ee badanaa unugyada.
translated: ["ACE2 waxa uu ka yimaadaa unugyada unugyada ka baxsan unugyada unugyada ayaa waxaa kala qaada enzyme kale oo loo yaqaan 'sheddase', borotiinka ka dhashayna wuxuu ku sii daayaa qulqulka dhiigga ugu dambeyntiina kaadida ayaa lagu shubaa."]

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2mRNA kalma ah waxaa sidoo kale laga helaa cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, iyo unugyada maskaxda.
translated: ACE2 wuxuu joogaa inta badan xubnaha: ACE2 wuxuu ku xiran yahay xuubka unugyada unugyada alveolar nooca sanbabada ee II, enterocytes ee xiidmaha yaryar, unugyada endothelial arterial iyo xididada iyo unugyada muruqyada siman ee halbowlaha inta badan xubnaha.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: Shaqada kowaad ee ACE2 waxaa weeye inay noqoto dheelitirka ACE.
translated: ACE2 mRNA muujinta waxaa sidoo kale laga helaa kortex-ka maskaxda, striatum, hypothalamus, iyo maskaxda.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: Hormoonada ACE cleaves angiotensin I ee duubka murqaha ee angiotensin II.
translated: Shaqada koowaad ee ACE2 waa in ay u dhaqmaan sidii dheelitirka counter-ka ee ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE2 waxa kasoo qaadaa carboxyl-terminal amno aysiidh phenylalanine angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-lle-His-Pro-Phe) iyo hydrolyses oo uu geliyaa vasodalitor angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-lle-His-Pro-OH).
translated: ["ACE waxay qoorta ku samaysaa hormoonka angiotensin I ee hormoonka 'vasoconstricting angiotensin II'."]

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: ACE2 waxa uu sodo kale kasoo qaadaa tiro kale oo peptides ah oo ay ku jiraan [des-arg9] - bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A iyo ghrelin.
translated: ACE2 ayaa markaa kala jeexjeexa amino acid amino acid phenylalanine ka angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Vaal-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) wuxuuna hydrolyses ku shubaa angiotensin vasodilator (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 waxa uu sidoo kale maamulaa socodka xabka ee neutral amino acid ee laga qaadayo SLC6A19 oo markaa lagu sheegey xanuunka Hartnup.
translated: ACE2 wuxuu sidoo kale furi karaa dhowr peptides kale oo ay ku jiraan [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, iyo ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: Borootiinta wadida xabka, ACE2 waxa uu yahay meesha laga galo ee wayn ee unuga ee coronavirus qaar, oo ay ku jiraan HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (fayruska keena SARS); SARS-CoV-2 (fayruska keena COVID-19).
translated: ACE2 ayaa sidoo kale nidaamiya ka ganacsiga ka ganacsiga ee dhexdhexaadka ah ee amino acid-ka SLC6A19 waxaana uu ku lug yeeshay cudurka Hartnup.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: Gaar ahaan, isku darka kor u kaca botooriinta S1 ee SARS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV2 ee aaga enzymatic ee ACE2 ee dusha unuga ee ka yimid endocytosis iyo gudbinta ee fayriska iyo enzyme yada ee endosomes ee ku yaala unuyada gudahooda.
translated: Sida borotiinada transmembrane, ACE2 wuxuu u adeegaa barta ugu weyn ee soo galitaanka unugyada qaar ka mid ah coronaviruses, oo ay ku jiraan HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (fayruuska keena SARS); iyo SARS-CoV-2 (fayruuska keena COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: Nidaamkan dhan waxa uu u baahan yahay in la hormariyo botooriinta S ee borootiinta serina sida ee TMPRSS2, ee sanka laga qaado taas oo wakhti xaadirkan la baadhayo inay tahay dabiib borootiin. Taasina waxay horseedi kartaa mala awaalka hoos u dhigaya heerarka ACE2, unuga dhexdiisa, taas oo gacan ka gaysan kara la dagaalanka xanuunka.
translated: Si gaar ah, xakamaynta kororka borotiinka S1 ee SARS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV2 ee qaybta enzymatic-ka ee ACE2 ee dusha sare ee unugyada waxay keenaysaa in la joojiyo endocytosis iyo isu-guurka fayruuska iyo enzyme labadaba endosomes ee ku yaalla unugyada gudahood.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: Laakiin, bulshooyinka xirfadaha badan iyo ururada xeerarka sameeyay waxay ku taliyeen in lasii wado heerka sii socodka qaadashada ACE iyo daawaynta ARB.
translated: Hannaankan gelitaanka wuxuu sidoo kale u baahan yahay qiimeynta borotiinka S ee uu sameeyo borotiinka S ee uu sameeyo borotiinka serine protease-ka ee TMPRSS2, xanibaadinta taas oo uu ku socdo baaritaanka hadda sida daaweyn suurtagal ah. Tani waxay keentay in la malaynayo in hoos u dhaca heerarka ACE2, ee unugyada, ay caawin karaan la dagaalanka caabuqa.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: Qiimayn isdaba joog ahayd iyo qiimaynta birta oo la baahiyay Juulay 11, 2012, ayaa lagu ogaaday in "isticamalka neefsiga ACE uu la xidhiidhay hoos u dhig wayn oo 34% ah khatarta xanuunka sanbabka marka loo eego xakamaynta."
translated: ["Si kastaba ha noqotee, bulshooyin badan oo xirfadlayaal ah iyo hay'adaha nidaamiya ayaa ku taliyay in la sii wado heerarka xakamaynta ACE ee caadiga ah iyo daaweynta ARB."]

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: Sidoo kale, "khatarta sanbab xanuunka ayaa sidoo kale ku yaraan kara bukaanka lagu daweeyo neefsiga ACE kaas oo markaa khatar sare ugu jira sabab xanuun, gaar ahaan dadka uu faaliga iyo wadne xanuunka qaba.
translated: Dib u eegid nidaamsan iyo falanqaynta Meta-falanqaynta oo la daabacay July 11, 2012, ayaa lagu ogaaday in "isticmaalka xannibaadaha ACE ay la xiriirto hoos u dhac weyn oo ah 34% hoos u dhaca khatarta neef-mareenka marka la barbar dhigo kontaroolada."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: Isticmaalka neefsia ACE kaas oo la xidhiidha sanbab xanuunka dhimashada ka timaada ayuu yareeyaa, in kasta oo najiitada ay aad uga waxtar yarayn marka loo eego khatarta guud ee xanuunada sanbabka."
translated: Intaas waxaa dheer, "khatarta neef-mareenka ayaa sidoo kale hoos udhacday bukaanada lagu daaweeyay kuwa xakameeya ACE kuwaas oo khatar sare ugu jira inuu ku dhaco cudurka sanbabka, khaas ahaan kuwa qaba stroke iyo wadna la\'aanta.

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: Isku darka ilaa aadanka ee ACE2 (rhACE2) taas oo guudmar u ah daawaynta novel ee dhaawaca sanbabka ee daran, iyo in hormar lagu sameeyo hemodynamics-ka baabacada iyo ogsajiinta cufan ee doofaarka oo leh calaamado xanuun daran oo neefsiga ah oo leh lipopolysaccharide.
translated: Isticmaalka xakamaynta ACE ayaa sidoo kale lala xiriiriyay hoos u dhaca dhimashada la xiriirta cudurka sanbabka, inkastoo natiijada ay ka yara adkaadeen khatarta guud ee burukiito."

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Kala badh nolosha rhACE2 bilaa aadanka waxaa weeye ilaa 10 saacadood oo waxa uu ku salaysan yhaay ficilka 30 daqiiqo oo dheeraad ah oo mudada wax ku oolka ah (mudada) 24 saacadood.
translated: ["ACE2 bini'aadamka ee isku dhafan (rhACE2) ayaa la suro galiyay inuu yahay daaweyn cusub oo loogu talagalay dhaawaca ba'an ee wadnaha, waxayna u muuqatay in ay hagaajinayaan hemodynamics sambabada ah iyo dheregsanaanta oksijiin ee doofaarka leh lipopolysaccharide-ka oo ay keento cudurka dhibaatada ba'an ee neef-mareenka."]

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: Dhawr daraasadood ayaa sheegaya in rhACE2 uu yahay dawo waxtar u leh dadka aad qaadain karin dawada neefsiga ee renin-angiotesin (dawada neefsiga RAS) ama xanuunka wareega angiotensin II uu kordhay. Ku shubida rhACE2 ayaa lagu qiimeeyay tijaabo xarun caafimaad oo daawaynta xanuunada neefsiga ee daran.
translated: ["Nolosha nuska ah ee rhACE2 ee bini'aadamka waa qiyaastii 10 saacadood iyo bilaabashada ficilka waa 30 daqiiqo marka lagu daro socodka saameynta (mudada) ee 24 saacadood."]

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: b'Bat SARS-sida coronavirus WIV1 (Bat SL_CoV-WIV1), sidoo kale waxaa loo yaqaan SARS-sida coronavirus WIV1, waxaa weeye xanuun neefsiga oo daran ee coronavirus (SARSr-CoV) oo markaa laga soo qaaday fiidmeer la dhaqday oo Jayniis ah (Rhinolophus sinicus).
translated: ["Natiijooyin dhowr ah ayaa soo jeedinaya in rhACE2 uu noqon karo daroogo rajo leh oo loogu talagalay dadka aan u dulqaadanayn in ay noqdaan kuwa aan u dulqaadanayn nidaamka caadiga ah ee renin-angiotensin inhibitorsin (RAS inhibitors) ama cudurrada marka ay wareegaan angiotensin II ayaa sare loo qaadayaa. RhACE2-da la geliyay ayaa lagu qiimeeyay tijaabooyinka caafimaad ee loogu talagalay daaweynta astaanta dhibaataysan ee neef-mareenka ba'an."]

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: Dawlado kala duwan ayaa soo saaray ama ku taliyay, saraakiisha dawlada ayaa taageerada deegaanmada iyo meelaha qaar.
translated: Barnaamijyada b\'COVID-19 waa barnaamijyo tabab-tartiib ah oo loogu talagalay in lagu caawiyo raadraaca xiriirka si looga jawaabo cudurka saf-mareenka ah ee 2019-20 ee coronavirus, sida habka lagu ogaanayo dadka ("xiriirada") ee laga yaabo inay la kulmeen qof xanuunka qaba.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: Dhawr nidaam ayaa la sameeyay app-ka lagula soconayo.
translated: Codsiyo badan ayaa la sameeyay ama la soo jeediyay, iyadoo ay jirto taageero rasmi ah oo ay dowladdu ka hesho dhulal iyo maamul-goboleedyo qaarkood.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: Walaacyada sirta ayaa ka yimid, gaar ahaan nidaamyada ku salaysan la socodka goobta uu ku sugan yahay isticmaalaha app-ku.
translated: Barnaamijyo dhowr ah ayaa la sameeyay oo loogu talagalay barnaamijyadda baafinta xiriirka dhismaha.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: Qaabka ka yar kaas waxaa kamig ah isticmaalka falaadha Buluutuutka ee lagu duwaan gelinayo inta isticmaalka taleefanka kale sita la isku jirsaday.
translated: Walaaca khaaska ah ayaa lasoo saaray, gaar ahaana ku saabsan nidaamyada ku salaysan dabagalka goobta juquraafi ee dadka isticmaala appka.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Abriil 10, 2020, Google iyo Apple ayaa si wada jir ah ugu dhawaaqay in ay dhax gelin doonaan qaab lagu xoojinayo app-ka Buluutuutka si toos ah Android-kooda iyo iOS obeerin sistemyadooda.
translated: Waxyaabaha aan faraha badanayn ee lagama maarmaanka ah waxaa ka mid ah isticmaalka calaamadaha Bluetooth ee lagu qoro u dhowaanshaha isticmaalaha ee telefoonnada gacanta ee kale.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: Jayna, dawlada Jayna, oo la socota Alipay, waxa ay sameeyeen app u ogolaanay dadka muwadiniinta inay eegaan hadii uu qofku u dhawaaday cid qabta COVID-19.
translated: 10kii Abriil 2020, Google iyo Apple waxay si wadajir ah ugu dhawaaqeen in ay isku dari doonaan waxqabadka si ay u taageeraan barnaamijyada ku salaysan Bluetooth-ka oo kale si toos ah u gala nidaamyadooda hawlgalka Android iyo macruufka.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: Waxa lagu isticmaalaa wax ka badan 200 oo magaalo Jayna. Singaaboor, app loo uaqaan TraceTogether ayaa la isticmaalaa.
translated: Wadanka Shiinaha, ayaa dawlada Shiinaha oo ay la kaashanayso shirkada Alipay waxay soo dirtay app muwaadiniinta u ogolaanaya inay iska hubsadaan inay la kulmay dad qaba COVID-19 iyo in kale.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: App-ka waxa sameeyay bulshada IT ee deegaanka, waxaa lasoo daayay isaga oo furan oo waxa lagu wareejinayaa dawlada. Waqooyiga Macedonia waxa ay samaysay "StopKorona!", oo ah app Bulutuut ku shaqeeya oo lagula socdo isasoo gaadhka dadka qaba xanuunka oo markaa bixiya jawaab degdeg ah oo maamulka daryeelka caafimaadka ah.
translated: Waxaa laga isticmaalaa in ka badan 200 oo magaalo oo Shiinaha ah. Dalka Singapore, waxaa laga isticmaalayaa app la yiraahdo TraceTogether.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: App-ka waxaa sameeyay Wasaarada Isgaadhsiinta iyo Teknooloojiyada iyo Wasaarada Caafimaadka.
translated: App-kan waxaa soo saartay bulshada deegaanka ee IT, waxaana la sii daayay isagoo ah il furan, waxaana loo gacan galin doonaa dowladda. Waqooyiga Makedoniya ayaa bilaabay "StopKorona!", oo ah app fadhigiisu yahay Bluetooth si loo raad raaco saamiga uu la kulmo dadka ay suurtagal tahay inuu cudurku ku dhaco iyo inuu jawaab degdeg ah u bixiyo mas\'uuliyiinta daryeelka caafimaadka.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: Abriil 14 2020, app-ka waxa uu sugayaa ansixinta Google Play Store iyo Apple App Store.
translated: App-ka waxaa soo saaray wasaaradda isgaarsiinta iyo tiknoolajiyada iyo wasaaradda caafimaadka.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: Abriil 12, dawlada waxay sheegtey in meel wanaagsan uu marayo app-ka la socodka u dhawaanshaha dadka qaba, oo markaa uu soo bixi doonto todobaad gudihii. Sidoo kale waxaa la qorshaynayaa in Ayrlaan, iyo Faransiiska app-ba lamid ah ("StopCovid").
translated: Laga bilaabo 14kii Abriil 2020, barnaamijka waxaa sugayay ansixinta Google Play Store iyo Apple App Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: Awstaraaliya iyo New Zealand labaduba waxay ka fikirayaan inay dhaqan geliyaan app-babka Singaaboor ee TraceTogether app-ka ah iyo BlueTrace nidaamka ah. Ruushka waxa ay wadaa app-ka deegaanka qofka ku xidhaya laga helo COVID-19 ee degan Moscow, kaas oo loogu talo geley in lagu xaqiijiyo in aan guriga aanu kasoo bixin.
translated: 12kii Abriil, dowladdu waxay sheegtay in app-ka raadraaca xiriirka uu ahaa mid heer horumarineed oo heer sare ah, lana diyaarin doono in la geeyo todobaadyo gudahood. App la mid ah ayaa la qorsheeyay in Ireland, iyo Faransiiska ("StopCovid").

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: Ross Anderson, boroofeesar injineerinka ambiga ah oo ka socda Jaamacada Cambridge, ayaa soo saaray liis mushkiladaha ka iman kara nidaamka app-kan ku salaysan, oo ay ku jiraan been ka sheeg cida qabta iyo inay wax tarkoodu ay liitaan hadii isticmaalka app-ku ay ku xadidan yihiin tiro yar oo kaliya oo dad ah.
translated: ["Labaduba Australia iyo New Zealand waxay ka fakarayaan barnaamijyo ku saleysan barnaamijka 'TraceTogether' ee ka soo baxa Singapore iyo hab-maamuuska BlueTrace. Ruushka ayaa damacsan inuu soo saaro app geofencing ah oo loogu talagalay bukaanada laga helay COVID-19 ee ku nool Moscow, oo loogu talagalay in lagu hubiyo in aysan guriga ka bixin."]

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: Ka jawaabida walaacyada faafitaanka ayaa been abuur noqonaya ama waxyeelada app-ka "coronavirus", Apple waxa ay samaysay xadidaad taas oo hay'ada noocyadeed ay ku dari karaan coronavirus app-la xidhiidha App Store-ka, kaas oo kaliya ku xadidan "saraakiisha" ama hay'ada waawayn.
translated: ["Ross Anderson, oo ah bare cilmiga injineernimada amniga ee jaamacadda Cambridge, ayaa soo saaray tiro dhibaatooyin ah oo wax ku ool ah oo ka imaan kara nidaamyada app-ka ku saleysan, oo ay ku jiraan waxyaabo been ah oo aan waxtar lahayn iyo suurtagalnimada waxtar la'aanta haddii app-ka uu la wareego uu ku kooban yahay oo keliya qayb yar oo ka mid ah bulshada."]

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: Google iyo Amazon ayaa sidoo kale xadidaad lamid ah sameeyay.
translated: Wax ka qabashada walaacyada ku saabsan faafitaanka barnaamijyada qaldan ama waxyeelada leh ee "coronavirus", Apple waxay xaddidaysaa noocyada ururada ku dari kara appyada la xiriira coronavirus Apps-keeda App Store, taas oo ku xadidaysa kaliya "rasmi ah" ama haddii kale ururo sumcad leh.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: Dadka sirta u ololeeya ayaa muujiyay walaac ku saabsan mushkilad ay keeni karta la socodka dadka badan iyada oo la isticmaalayo app-babka coronavirus, gaar ahaan hadii loo sameeyay la socodka dadka dhismaha ah si loola tacaalo safmarka coronavirus oo la qaybiyo marka khatarta laga gudbo.
translated: Google iyo Amazon waxay dhaqangeliyeen xanibaado la mid ah.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: Amnesty International iyo wax ka badan 100 hay'adood oo kale ayaa soo saaray bayaan ay ugu baaqayaan in la xadido kormeerka noocan oo kale ah.
translated: Ololeyaasha arimaha khaaska ahi waxay codka ku adkeeyeen walaaca ay qabaan ee ku aaddan saamaynta kor joogtaynta balaaran ee la adeegsanayo baarayaasha coronavirus, gaar ahaan ku saabsan in kaabayaasha ilaalinta ee la abuuray si loola tacaalo cudurka safmarka ah ee coronavirus la burburiyo marka khatarta la dhaafo.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: Hay'adu waxa ay soo saartay sideed shuruudood oo mashaariicda dawlada ah:
translated: Amnesty International iyo in ka badan 100 hayʼadood oo kale ayaa soo saartay bayaan ay ku baaqayaan in la xaddido ilaalinta noocan oo kale ah.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: kormeerka waxa uu noqonayaa "sharci, daruuri oo munaasabb ah";
translated: ["Hay'adaha ayaa ku dhawaaqay siddeed shuruudood oo ku xiran mashaariicda dowladda:"]

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: meesha ka saarida la socodka iyo kormeerka ayaa ahaa weedha iftiimaysa;
translated: korjoogtaynta waa inay ahaataa "sharci, lagama maarmaan ah oo qiyaas ahaan";

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: isticmaalka macluumaadka waxaa kaliya lagu xadidadayaa wixii ujeedo COVID-19 ah;
translated: kordhinta korjoogtaynta iyo kor joogtaynta waxay yeelan lahayd clauses qorrax dhaca;

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: amaanka macluumaadka iyo sirta waxaa la ilaalin karayay si loo muujiyo in ilaalintu uu ku salaysan yahay cadaymo;
translated: isticmaalka macluumaadka waa in lagu xaddidaa ujeedooyinka COVID-19;

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: kormeerka dhijitaalka ah ayaa lagaga hortagi karaa takoorka iyo muquuninta;
translated: amniga xogta iyo qarsoodiga waa in la ilaaliyo oo la muujiyo in la ilaaliyo iyada oo ku saleysan caddaymaha;

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: wixii macluumaad ah ee lala wadaago cid kale waa inuu sharcigu dhigayaa;
translated: korjoogtaynta digital qasab ku noqon lahaa in laga fogaado sii xumeeya takoorka iyo kicinta;

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: waxaa ay tahay inuu jiro wax ka ilaalinaya lagu tacadiyo iyo xuquuqda dadka muwaadiniinta ah ee lagaga jawaabayo tacadiga;
translated: xog kasta oo lala wadaago dhinacyada saddexaad waa in loo qeexi karaa sharciga;

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: ka qayb galka wax ku oolka ah ee dhamaan "dadka dantu kaga jirto" waxa ay u baahan doonaan, oo ay jiraan khabiirada caafimaadka shacabka iyo kooxaha la muquuniyay. German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) iyo Wariyayaasha Bilaa Xuduuda ah (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) ayaa soo saaray sidoo kale liis la eegayo.
translated: in ay jirto in la ilaaliyo ka hortagga kufsiga iyo xuquuqda muwaadiniinta in ay ka jawaabaan tacaddiyada;

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: Qorshaha ay ku taliyeen Google/Apple waxaa loogu talo geley in lagaga jawaabo mushkilada kormeerka joogtada ah iyada oo meesha laga saarayo qaabka lagula soconayo aaladaha obereetin sistemkooda marka aan loo baahnayn.
translated: Ka qaybgal macno leh oo ay sameeyaan dhammaan "saamileeyda khuseeya" ayaa loo baahan yahay, oo ay ku jiraan khubarada caafimaadka dadweynaha iyo kooxaha la haysto. Naadiga Kombiyuutarka Fowdada ka dhex-taagga ah ee Jarmalka (CCC) iyo Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) ayaa sidoo kale soo saaray liiska baadhitaanka.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: Dalalka qaar ayaa isticmaala networki deegaanka ah si ay ula socdaan app-babka, kuwaas oo meesha ka saaray baahida loo qabay soo dejisashada app iyo awooda in la socodka.
translated: Qorshaha Google/ Apple ee la soo jeediyay ayaa qorshaynaya in wax looga qabto dhibaatada joogtada ah ee ilaalinta adoo ka saarey habka raadinta nidaamyada hawlgalka qalabkooda mar dambe aan loo baahneyn.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: Israaiil, nidaamka la socodka shabakada ayaa la ansixiyay.
translated: ["Qaar ka mid ah dalalka isticmaalo raadraaca goobta network-ku salaysan halkii apps, baabi'inta labada baahida loo qabo in la soo bixi app iyo awoodda si looga fogaado raadraaca."]

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: Xalalka networkiga ee laga heleyo meelaha isku midka ah ayaa leh mushkilad sirta ah oo mustaqbalka ah.
translated: ["In Israa'iil, raadraaca shabakadda ku salaysan ayaa la ansixiyay."]

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: Laakiin, dhamaan nidaamyadu leh serferka dhexe loola baahna in laga helo macluumaadka goobta qofka; nidaamyo la ilaaliyay sirtooda oo badan ayaa la sameeyay oo isticmaala serfer dhexe kalya si ay u xidhiidhaan dhaxdoodu (eeg qaybta hoose).
translated: Xalalka ku salaysan shabakada kuwaas oo helitaanka xogta meesha cayriin waxay leeyihiin dhibaatooyin muhiim ah oo ku imaan kara gaarka ah.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: Koonfurta Kuuriya, nidaam aan app lahayn ayaa lagula socdaa isku dhawaanshaha.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, dhammaan nidaamyada la server dhexe ma u baahan tahay in ay helaan xogta meesha shakhsiga ah; Tiro ka mid ah nidaamyada ilaalinta gaarka ah ayaa la abuuray kuwaas oo isticmaala server-yada dhexe ee kaliya isgaarsiinta (eeg qaybta hoose).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: Halkii laga isticmaali lahaa app u gaar ah, nidaamku waxa uu soo uruuriyaa macluumaadka la socodka ee meelo kala duwan oo ay ku jiraan macluumaadka la socodka aalada mobile-ka iyo macluumaadka wax ku iibsiga kaadhka, oo waxaana loogu daraa wargelintan la sameeyay oo fariimo qoraal ah dadka ay dhici karto inay qabaan caabuqa.
translated: Dalka Kuuriyada Koonfureed, waxaa loo adeegsaday nidaam aan app-ka ku salaysnayn oo lagu sameeyo raadraaca xiriirka.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: Sidoo kale iyada oo la isticmaalayo macluumaadka digniinta isku dhawaanahsha, dawladu waxay sidoo kale macluumaadka goobta ka dhigta mid cid walba heli karto, mararka qaar la ogol yahay maadaama oo ay adag tahay in la badalo sharciga sirta macluumaadka kadib markii uu safmarka MERS uu dalka ku habsaday.
translated: Halkii uu isticmaali lahaa app u gaar ah, nidaamku wuxuu soo uruuriyay raadraaca macluumaadka laga helay ilo kala duwan oo ay ka mid yihiin qalabka moobiilka raadraaca xogta iyo xogta macaamilka kaararka, waxaana la isku daray kuwan si ay u curiyaan ogeysiisyo loo marayo fariimaha qoraalka ah ee shakhsiyaadka ay suurtagal tahay inuu ku dhaco cudurka.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: Macluumaadkan waxaa laga heli karaa meel kasta oo tirada app-ka iyo websaytyada. Dalalka ay ku jiraan Jermanu waxay eegeysaa nidaamyada ilalaisa sirta iyo kuwa cid walbaaba geli karaan.
translated: Waxaa intaa dheer in macluumaadkan loo isticmaalo si loo feejignaado xiriirrada suurtagalka ah, dawladdu waxay sidoo kale ka dhigtay macluumaadka goobta oo si cad loo heli karo, taas oo sabab u ah isbeddelllo fog oo lagu sameeyey sharciyada gaarka ah macluumaadka marka MERS uu dalkaas ka dilaacay.

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: Abriil 6, 2020, faahfaahinta lama soo saarin.
translated: Macluumaadkan waxaa dadweynaha looga heli karaa arrimo la xiriira arrimo la xiriira barnaamijyo kala duwan iyo bogagga shabakadda. Dalalka uu ku jiro Jarmalka waxaa lagu tixgeliyaa in ay adeegsadaan nidaam dhexe iyo nidaamyo lagu ilaaliyo sirta gaarka loo leeyahay.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: La socodka sirta la ilaaliyay waxaa weeye nuxur balaadhan, taas oo lagu samaeyay daraasan balaadhan oo macluumaadka ah oo socotay ilaa 2013. 7 Abriil 2020, koox khabiiro tobanaan ah ayaa ka shaqaynayay xal sirta ilaalin kara, sida isticmaalka Buluutuutka Tamarta Yar (BLE) si loogu helo aaga dadka kale taleefankoodu ku sugan yahay.
translated: Laga soo bilaabo 6dii Abriil 2020, faahfaahinta weli lama shaacin.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Laakiin, PEPP-PT waxay isku duba ridaysaa dadaalka uu ku jiro qaab meel kaliya ah iyo mid baahsan, oo mana aha qaab kaliya. Nidaamka meesha kaliya ah waxaa kamid ah La Socodka Aaga Sirta La Ilaaliyay oo La Daadajiyay (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Lambarka Xidhiidhka Kumeel Gaadhka ah (TCN, fka Lambarka Wakhtiga Xidhiidhka, CEN), Nidaamka Sirta Xasaasiga ah iyo Qaab La Socodka Xidhiidhka Mobile-ka (PACT) iyo kuwa kale.
translated: Ilaalinta Gaarka ah-ilaalinta raadraaca xiriirka waa fikrad si fiican loo aasaasay, oo leh jirro badan oo suugaanta cilmi baaris ah oo soo taxane ah ugu yaraan 2013.As ee 7dii Abriil 2020, in ka badan darsin kooxo khubaro ah ayaa ka shaqeynayay xalal khaas ah oo saaxiibtinimo leh, sida isticmaalka Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) si loo galo u dhawaanshaha qofka isticmaala ee telefoonnada gacanta ee kale.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: Nidaamyadan, ogaanshaha macluumaadka shakhsi ahaaneed ma dhaafo aalada, oo dhamaan qaababka waxa ay ka dhacaan aalada.
translated: Si kastaba ha noqotee, PEPP-PT waa dadaal iskaashi kaas oo ka kooban qaabab la xariira ama la xarrimay, mana aha hal borotokool.
