Hababka la baahiyay waxaa ka mid ah Baadhitaanka Qarsoodiga ah ee La Ilaaliyo Gaarka ah (DP-PPT / DP-3T), Lambarrada Xiriirka Ku Meelgaarka ah (TCN, Lambarrada Fka Contact, CEN), Asaasiga Ah ee Xasaasiga ah ee Xasaasiga ah iyo Qaababka Baadhitaanka Moobaylka (HESHIISKA) iyo kuwo kale.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: Kooxda Sirta ee MIT Media Lab waxa ay sameeyeen SafePaths, madal loo isticmaalayo farsamooyinka ilaalinta sirta marka la uruurinayo ee la qaadayo goobta ama dhabada macluumaadku iskugu imanayaan si loola socdo faafitaanka COVID-19.
translated: In hab-maamuuska, xogta shakhsiga lagu garan karo marnaba ka tago qalab, oo dhan oo u dhigma dhaco on-qalab.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: Iyada oo laga duulayo daraasada laga heley waraaqaha cad "Apps Gone Rogue: Ilaalinta Sirta Shakhsi Ahaaneed ee Safmarka" waxa ay soo saartaan Maarso 2020. Dadaal kale oo lamid ah madasha SafeTrace ee uu qoray Enigma MPC, shirkad samaysa teknooloojiyada taas oo markii hore lagu sameeyay MIT Media Lab.
translated: Kooxda Khaaska ah ee MIT Media Lab waxay horumarinaysay SafePaths, oo ah madal loo adeegsado in la isticmaalo farsamooyinka ilaalinta gaarka loo leeyahay marka la aruurinayo lana isticmaalayo xogta goobta ama wadooyinka isgoyska si loola socdo faafitaanka COVID-19.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: SafeTrace waxa uu ka faa'ideeyaa teknooloojiyada haadhweerka taas oo u sahlaysa dadka isticmaalayaasha inay wadaagaan macluumaadka xasaasiga ah ee goobta iyo macluumaadka caafimaadka oo lala wadaago dadka kale ee isticmaalaya iyo saraakiisha, iyada oo aan la dhaawacaynin sirta macluumaadka.
translated: Waxay ku salaysan tahay cilmi baaris ka timid wargeyska caddaanka ah ee "Apps Gone Rogue: Joogtaynta Asaasiga Shakhsiyadeed ee Safe MPC, oo ah shirkad horumarinta teknoolajiyada gaarka ah oo sidoo kale asal ahaan laga aasaasay MIT Media Lab.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: Abriil 5, 2020, Iskaashiga TCN ee caalamka oo ay aas aaseen kooxaha iska kaashta waxa isku qaabka ah iyo nidaamyada sida wayn isku saarmaya, yoolku waa in la yareeyo qurubyada, oo loo sahlo isku xidhanka caalamka ee la socodka iyo app-ka digniinta, qaab muhiim ah oo lagu gaadhayo in si balaadhan loo dhaqan geliyo.
translated: SafeTrace waxay isticmaashaa teknoolajiyada hardware-yada ammaan ah si ay ugu oggolaato dadka isticmaala inay la wadaagaan xogta xasaasiga ah ee goobta iyo caafimaadka dadka isticmaala iyo saraakiisha, iyada oo aan wax u dhimayn asaasiga ah ee xogtaas.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: Abriil 9, 2020, dawlada Singaaboor ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay furtay nidaamka BlueTrace iyada oo isticmaalaysa app-ka dawlada ee rasmiga ah.
translated: 5tii Abriil 2020, Isbahaysiga caalamiga ah ee TCN waxaa aasaasay kooxo isku duba riday waxa aasaasay waxa muhiimka u ahaa hab la mid ah oo inta badan isku duuban hab-maamuuska, iyada oo ujeeddadu ahayd in la yareeyo kala-qaybsanaanta, iyo in loo sahlo is-dhexgalka caalamiga ah ee raadinta iyo ka-digista barnaamijyada, arrin muhiim ah oo lagu gaaro gaarista korsasho baahsan.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: Abriil 10, 2020, Google iyo Apple, shirkadaha maamulka Android iyo iOS madalaha mobile ee ah, waxay ku dhawaaqeen barnaamij lagula soconayo isku dhawaanshaha, taas oo la sheegey inuu ilaalinayo sirta, oo koobsaday isku darta teknooloojiyada Tamarta yar ee Bulutuutka iyo inkiribshinka ilaalinta sirta.
translated: 9-kii Abriil 2020, dowladda Singapore ayaa ku dhawaaqday in ay si cad u soo saartay hab-maamuuska BlueTrace ee uu adeegsado app-ka rasmiga ah ee dowladda.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: Waxay sidoo kale baahiyeen waxa ay ka kooban yahay teknooloojiyada asalaka ah ee nidaamku isticmaalayo.
translated: On 10 April 2020, Google iyo Apple, shirkadaha gacanta ku dhufto mobile Android iyo macruufka, ku dhawaaqay hindisaha ah raadraaca xiriir, taas oo ay sheegeen in la ilaaliyo lahaa gaarka ah, ku salaysan isku dar ah oo ah technology Bluetooth Low Energy iyo cryptography gaarka ah loo ilaaliyo.

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: Sida ay sheegeen Apple iyo Google, nidaamka waxaa loogu talo geley in uu noqdo sadex waji:
translated: Waxay sidoo kale daabaceen faahfaahinta tiknoolajiyada aasaasiga ah ee loo adeegsado nidaamkan.

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: qaybta agabka oo dawlada u sahlaysa inay abuurto app-bab la socodka coronavirus oo si rasmi ah u ilaalinaya sirta
translated: Sida laga soo xigtay Apple iyo Google, nidaamka waxaa loogu talagalay in lagu hirgeliyo saddex marxaladood:

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: inay dhax geliyaan shaqada iOS iyo Android Google iyo Apple qorshahood ay doonayaan inay kaga jawaabaan qaadista iyo joogteynta mushkilada kormeerka iyad aoo marka kowaad lagu qaybinayo nidaamka oo cusboonaysiinta obeetin sistemka, oo kadibna looga saarayao marka ay khatarta meesha ka baxdo si lamid ah.
translated: hirgalinta qalabka si ay awood ugu yeeshaan dawladaha inay abuuraan barnaamijyada baadhitaanka coronavirus ee gaarka loo leeyahay oo rasmi ah

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: Samaybta dawda b'COVID-19 waxa weli socda daraasadeed lagu samayn lagaa talaal ama dawo lagu daweeyo oo meesha ka saaraysa mushkilada xanuunka 2019-20 coronavirus (COVID-19).
translated: isdhexgalka of shaqeynayaan this si toos ah u galay macruufka iyo AndroidGoogle iyo Apple ayaa qorshaynaysa in wax laga qabto dhibaatooyinka qaadashada iyo ilaalinta joogtada ah by marka hore qaybinta nidaamka iyada oo loo marayo updates nidaamka qalliinka, ka dibna ka saaro si la mid ah mar khatarta ayaa ka baxday.

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: Tani waa hal khad oo cilmi baadhista sayniska taas oo wakhti xaadirkan la isticmaalay si loogu sameeyo daawayn amaan ah oo wax ku ool ah COVID-19.
translated: ["Dib-u-habaynta b'Drug (oo sidoo kale loo yaqaano repurpoposing daroogada, dib-u-habaynta, dib-u-hawsha ama isbedelka daaweynta daaweynta daawada) waa repurposing of daawo cudur ama xaalad caafimaad oo ka duwan kii markii hore la sameeyay."]

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: Daraasado kale ayaa ku saabsan jihaynta oo ay ku jirto samaynta talaal iyo ku dhubin unugyad dhiiga ee COVID-19. SARS-CoV-2 waxa uu leeyahay ilaa 66 dawo oo borootiinta ah, taas oo midkiiba ay leeyahay goobo la isku daray n oo badan oo ligand ah.
translated: Tani waa hal mar baaritaan cilmiyeed kaas oo hadda lagu daba jiro si loo sameeyo daawayn amaan ah oo waxtar leh oo COVID-19 ah.

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: Qiimaynta goobahaas la isku daray waxa ay bixiyaan saadaal macquul ah oo lagu samaynayo borootiin wax ku ool ah oo fayrus disha COVID-19.
translated: Jihooyinka kale ee cilmi-baarista waxaa ka mid ah horumarinta tallaalka COVID-19 iyo in plasma-da ka bogsado. SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu leeyahay qiyaastii 66 borotiino daroogada lagu daaweyn karo, kuwaas oo mid kastaa uu leeyahay goobo badan oo ku xirma ligand.

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: Waxaa kamid ah botooriinta la bartilmaameedsanayo SARS-CoV-2 ee ugu muhiimsan papain-sida protease, RNA ku tiirsan RNA polymersare, helicase, S borootiin, iyo ADP ribophosphatase.
translated: Falanqaynta goobaha ku xiran waxay bixiyaan mashruuc macquul ah oo lagu samaynayo dawo waxtar leh oo fayras ah oo ka dhan ah borotiinka COVID-19.

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: Hussein A A, et al waxa uu daraasadeeyay dhawr curiye taas oo kadibna loo isticmaalay oo laguna qiimeeyay waxay ka samaysan yihiiin si lamid ah dawooyinka sare ee la ansixiyay si loo xawaareeyo waxa ay ka kooban tahay dawada lagula dagaalamayo SARS-CoV-2 ee daraasada tijaabada kahor si loogu soo saaro qaabka daraasada tijaabada.
translated: Borotiinka ugu muhiimsan ee SARS-CoV-2 ee bartilmaameedka ah waa borotiin u eg sida papain, RNA ku tiirsan RNA polymerase, helicase, borotiinka S, iyo ADP ribophosphatase.

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: Chloroquine waxaa weeye dawo lagula dagaalamo malariyada taas oo sidoo kale loogu isticmaalay qaar akmid ah xanuunada difaaca si toos ah.
translated: Hussein A A, et al wuxuu daraaseeyay xarumo dhawr ah oo musharrax kuwaas oo markaa tayleeyay islana falanqeeyay isla eg kooda lafahooda oo leh daroogada ugu sareeya ee la ansixiyay si loo dardar galiyo si loo dardar galiyo kobcinta daroogada anti-SARS-CoV-2 oo awood leh ee daraasaddiisa caadiga ah in lagula taliyo qaab daraasadeed caafimaad.

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: Maarso 18, WHO waxay ku dhawaaqday in chloroquine iyo wixii la xidhiidha hydroxychloroquine inay noqon doonaan qaar kamid ah afarta dawo ee qayb ka noqonaya daraasada tijaabada caafimaadka ee Midawga.
translated: Chloroquine waa dawo ka hortaga malaariyayaasha taas oo sidoo kale loo isticmaalo in lagula dagaalamo cudurrada isdifaaca jirka.

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: Badhasaabka New York Andrew Cuomo waxa uu ku dhawaaqay in tijaabooyinka Gobolka New York ee chloroquine iyo hydroxychloroquine ay bilaa doonaan 24 Maarso. 28 Maarso, FDA waxay ogolaaday isticmaalka hydroxychloroquie sulfate iyo chloroquine phosphate oo lagu istimcaalka Ogolaanshaha Isticmaalka Xaalada Degdeg ah (EUA).
translated: 18 Maarso, WHO waxay ku dhawaaqday in chloroquine iyo hydroxychloroquine la xiriira ay ka mid noqon doonaan afarta daawo ee la baray oo qayb ka ah tijaabada midnimada midnimada.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: Daawaynta umay ansixin FDA si loogu sameeyo tijaabo caafimaad waxaana lagu ansixiyay oo ay hoos timaadaa EUA kaliya iyada oo ah daawayn tijaabo ah oo xaalada degdeg ah loogu isticmaalayo bukaanka la dhigay isbitaalka laakiin aan loo haynin daawayn tijaabo caafimaad ku jirta.
translated: Guddoomiyaha New York Andrew Cuomo ayaa ku dhawaaqay in tijaabada gobolka New York ee tijaabada chloroquine iyo hydroxychloroquine la bilaabi doono 24ka Maarso.28ka Maarso, FDA waxay oggolaatay isticmaalka sulfate hydroxychloroquine iyo phosphate chloroquine iyadoo la raacayo oggolaansho degdeg ah oo loo adeegsanayo (EUA).

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: CDC waxa ay sheegtey in "isticmaalka, xadiga, ama mudada hydroxychloroquine ee prophylaxis ama daawaynta SARS-CoV-2 caabuqa ah" aan weli la ogaan.
translated: Daaweynta lama ansixin nidaamka tijaabada caafimaad ee FDA waxaana loo idmaday sida hoos yimaada EUA oo kaliya sida daaweyn tijaabo ah oo loogu talagalay isticmaalka xaaladaha degdegga ah ee bukaanada isbitaalada la jiifiyay balse aan awoodin inay helaan daaweyn tijaabo caafimaad.

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: Dhakhaatiirtu waxay sheegeen inay isticmaalaan dawadan mark ay hirin dawo "ikhtiyaar kale oo jiraayi".
translated: CDC waxay sheegtay in "isticmaalkii, qaadashada, ama mudada hydroxychloroquine ee loogu talagalay ka hortagga ama daawaynta caabuqa SARS-CoV-2" aan wali la samayn.

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: Koox daraasadeed oo Turkish ah ayaa Istanbul ku sameeyay daraasad yar iyada oo ay isticmaalayaan chloroquine lagu daray zinc, fiitaamiin A, fiitaamiin C iyo fiitaamiin D.
translated: Dhakhaatiirtu waxay sheegeen in ay isticmaalayaan daroogada marka "aysan jirin wax kale oo ikhtiyaar ah".

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: Daraasado waawayn ayaa ka socda Jaamacada Duke iyo Jaamacada Oxford.
translated: Koox cilmi baaris Turkish ah oo ku sugan Istanbul ayaa samaynaya daraasad yar oo ku saabsan isticmaalka chloroquine marka la isku daro zinc, fitamiin A, fitamiin C iyo fitamiin D.

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: Dugsiga Caafimaadka NYU Langone waxa uu wadaa tijaabada amaanka iyo wax ku oolnimada isticmaalka kahortaga ee hydroxychloroquine.
translated: Daraasado waaweyn ayaa ka socda Duke University iyo University of Oxford.

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: Tijaabooyin caafimaad oo Jayna ku samaysay Wuhan iyo Shenzhen waxaa lagu sheegey in lagu arkay in favipiravir "waxtarkeedu cad yahay"
translated: NYU Langone Medical School ayaa samaynaya tijaabo ku saabsan badqabka iyo waxtarka isticmaalka ka hortagga ee hydroxychloroquine.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: Bukaano 35 ah oo ku sugan Shenzhen waxaa laga waayay qaybta 4 maalmood ah, halka mudada xanuunka uu ahaa 11 maalmood 45 bukaan oo aan la siinin dawada.
translated: Wuhan iyo Shenzhen ayaa sheegay in favipiravir uu ahaa "mid si cad waxtar u leh".

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: Daraasad lagu sameeyay 240 bukaan oo qaba xanuunada sanbabka, kala badh ayaa lasiiyay favipiravir oo kala badhna waxaa lasiiyay umifenovir.
translated: 35 bukaan oo Shenzhen ah ayaa laga helay baaritaanno xun muddo dhexdhexaad ah oo 4 maalmood ah, halka mudada xanuunku uu ahaa 11 maalmood oo ka mid ah 45-tii bukaan ee aan helin.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: Hay'ada Dawooyinka Talyaaniga ayaa shacabka u sheegtey inay jiraan cadaymo sheegaya in dawada weli la tijaabinayo oo ay weli hordhac tahay.
translated: Daraasad lagu sameeyay magaalada Wuhan oo ku saabsanaa 240 bukaan oo qaba xanuunka sambab-baxa, kala bar ayaa lasiiyay favipiravir kala barkiisna waxay heleen mamifenovir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: Abriil 2, Jermalku waxa uu ku dhawaaqay in uu ka iibsanayo dawo Jabaan kaydkeeda, oo uu u isticmaali doono in ciidanku dawadaas keeno isbitaalada jaamacadaha, halaas oo dawada loo isticmaali doono in lagu daweeyo bukaanada COVID-19.
translated: ["Hey'adda daawooyinka ee Talyaaniga ayaa dadweynaha xasuusisay in caddaymaha jira ee lagu taageerayo daawada ay yartahay hordhacana ay tahay mid hordhac ah."]

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Si lagu daabacay South Chine Morning Post, Shinzo Abe waxa uu u jawaabay maamulka Trump ee ku saabsan iibsiga dawada. Dawada waxaa dhici karta inayna waxba u tarin xanuunada fayruska uu marka hore tarmay.
translated: 2-dii Abriil, Jarmalku wuxuu ku dhawaaqay inuu soo iibsan doono dawada Japan si ay kayd u hesho, oo ay u isticmaalaan militariga inay dawadani gaarsiiyaan isbitaalada jaamacadaha, halkaas oo dawada loo isticmaali doono in lagu daweeyo bukaanada COVID-19.

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: Waxaa dhici karta inayna amaan ahayn inay isticmaalaan dumarka uurka leh ama kuwa isku dayaya inay qaadaan.
translated: Sida laga soo xigtay wargeyska South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe ayaa xeelado ku sameeyay maamulka Trump oo ku saabsan iibsiga daroogada. Daroogadu waxaa laga yaabaa inay waxtar yar tahay xaaladaha halista ah ee jirada halkaas oo fayrusku uu horay u tarmay.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: Hal daraasadeed oo lagu sameeyay lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), isku darta dawada fayruska ee lopinavir iyo ritonavir, "ayaan wax faa'ido ah lagu arag".
translated: Waxaa laga yaabaa inaysan ahayn ammaan ah oo ay isticmaalaan haweenka uurka leh ama kuwa isku dayaya inay uureeyaan.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: Dawada waxaa loogu talo geley dadka la nool HIV si ayna u badalin isku darka protease.
translated: Daraasad lagu sameeyay lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), oo isku dhafan oo ah dawooyinka fayraska ee lopinavir iyo ritonavir, ayaa lagu soo gabagabeeyay in "aan faa\'iido la arkayn".

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: Koox cilmi baadhayaal ah oo ka socota Jaamacada Colorado ayaa isku dayaya inay wax ka badalaan dawooyinka si ay u helaan curiyayaal isku daraya protease-ka SARS-CoV-2. Waxaa jira dhaleecayn ay bulshada sayniska oo ku saabsan jihaynta khayraadka si dib loogu isticmaalo wixii sida gaarka ah loogu sameeyay HIV/Aydhis.
translated: Daawooyinka waxaa loogu tala galay inay xakameeyaan HIV inuu ku tarmo iyagoo ku dhagay protease-ka.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: WHO waxay ku dartay lopinavir/ritonavir tijaabada Midnimada ee caalamiga ah.
translated: Koox cilmi baareyaal ah oo ka tirsan jaamacada Colorado ayaa isku dayaya inay wax ka bedelaan daawooyinka si ay u helaan xaruun ku xidhan boorsada SARS-CoV-2. Waxaa jira dhaleeceyn bulshada sayniska ah oo ku saabsan in ay hagayaan kheyraadka lagu hagayo dawooyinka sida gaarka ah loogu sameeyay HIV/AIDS.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: Remdesivir waxa curiyay oo sameeyay Gilead Sciences si loogu daweeyo fayruska Ebola iyo fayruska Marburg. Gilead Sciences waxay markii danbe soo saareen Remdesivir kaas oo lahaa hawlo dawada faryiska ah ee vitro oo dhawr filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo, iyo corona - fayrus ah.
translated: WHO waxay ku dartay lopinavir/ritonavir tijaabada Solidarity tijaabada caalamiga ah.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: Hal mushkilad ayaa ah in daawaynta loo sameeyay in la iskaga caabiyi badalka ay horseedi karto dhawr xanuun iyo safmar.
translated: Remdesivir waxaa abuuray oo soo saaray Gilead Sciences oo ah daaweyn loogu talagalay cudurka fayraska Ebola iyo caabuqyada fayraska Marburg. Gilead Sciences ayaa si isdaba joog ah u ogaaday in Remdesivir uu lahaa dhaqdhaqaaqa fayruuska ee yiinka ee ka dhanka ah fayruusyo badan oo filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, iyo fayrasyada corona-ka.

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: Qaar kamid ah daraasad lagu sameeyay remdesivir ayaa muujinaya inay leedahay caqabad sare oo hide sidaha ah oo iska caabin ah. Waxaa jira dhawr tijaabo caafimaad oo socda, oo ay ku jiraan laba lagu samaynayo Isbitaalada Jaamacada Cleveland; mid kamid ah dadka qaaba xanuunka oo sahlan iyo kuwa qaba xanuunka oo aad u daran.
translated: Hal arin oo la xidhiidha daawaynta fayraska ayaa ah kobcinta iska-caabinta iyada oo loo marayo isbadelo horseedi kara cudur aad u daran iyo isu gudbin.

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: Waxaa jira tijaabo caafimaad oo socda oo qaadashada fiitaamiin C ee dadka la dhigay isbitaalka iyo kuwa qaba xanuunada daran ee COVID-19; laba placebo oo la xakameeyay (Jayna, Kanada) iyo hal aan la xakamaynin (Talyaaniga).
translated: Qaar ka mid ah daraasadaha hore ee hordhaca ah ayaa soo jeedinaya in remdesivir laga yaabo inay leedahay xayndaabka hidde-sidaha ee sare ee iska caabinta. Waxaa socda dhawr tijaabo caafimaad oo ay ka mid yihiin laba ay sameeyeen Isbitaalada Jaamacadda Cleveland; mid loogu talogalay dadka qaba xanuun dhexdhexaad ah, mid kalena loogu talogalay dadka qaba xanuunada halista ah ee dheeraadka ah.

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: Gobolka New York ayaa bilaabay tijaabada antibootiga azithromycin 24 Maarso 2020.
translated: Waxaa jira saddex tijaabo caafimaad oo socda oo ah fitamiin C-da xididka laga qaaday ee loogu talagalay dadka isbitaalada la jiifiyay ee aadka u xanuunsan ee COVID-19; laba placebo gacanta (Shiinaha, Kanada) iyo mid ka mid ah kontoroolka lahayn (Italy).

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: Xarunta Qaran ee Jabaan ee Caafimaadka iyo Dawooyina Caalamka (NCGM) waxa ay qorshaynaysaa tijaabada caafimaad ee Teijin Alvesco (ciclesonide), dawada la nuugo ee corticosteroid ee xiiqda, si loogu daweeyo bukaanka kahor inta ayna yeelan xanuunka novel coronavirus.
translated: Gobolka New York wuxuu bilaabay tijaabooyinka azithromycin antibiyootiga 24kii Maarso 2020.

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: Waa qaab angiotensin-loo badalayo enzyme 2, tijaabada Wajiga II ayaa ku socoto 200 oo bukaan oo laga soo qaata dadka uu xanuunka adag hayo, loona dhigay isbitaalka Denmark, Jarmany, iyo Awstariya si loo ogaado saamaynta daawaynta wax ku oolka ah.
translated: ["Xarunta Qaran ee Japan ee Caafimaadka Caalamiga ah iyo Daawada (NCGM) waxay qorshaynaysaa tijaabo caafimaad oo loogu talagalay Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), oo ah corticosteroid la neefsado oo loogu talagalay neefsashada, si loogu daweeyo bukaanada ku dhaca calaamadaha hore ee uu ku dhacay coronavirus cusub."]

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: Cilmi baadhayaal ka socda Montreal Heart Institute ee Kanada ayaa wakhti xaadirkan baadhaya kaalinta colchicine ay ka ciyaari karto yaraynta ololka iyo mushkilada baabacada ee bukaanka leh xanuunka waxoogagaa ah ee COVID-19.
translated: ["Waa qaab ka mid ah enzyme 2 ee badalaya angiotensin, oo ah wajiga II tijaabada ah ayaa socda oo leh 200 oo bukaan oo laga qori doono kiisaska halista ah ee isbitaalada la dhigay ee Danmark, Jarmalka, iyo Austria si loo go'aamiyo waxtarka daaweynta."]

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: Daraasada, oo loo bixiyay COLCORONA, waxa loosoo qaatay 6000 oo qof oo waawayn oo ah 40 jir iyo wixii ka wayn oo laga heley COVID-19 oo markaa leh xanuun dhexaad ah oo aan u baahan in isbitaal la dhigo.
translated: Cilmi-baarayaal ka socda Montreal Heart Institute ee Canada ayaa hadda daraasad ku leh doorka colchicine ee yareynta bararka iyo dhibaatooyinka ka dhasha sambabada ee bukaanada ka soo gaaray calaamadaha fudud ee COVID-19.

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: Dumarka uurka leh ama naaska nuujinaya ama aan qaadan dhalmo baajiye wanaagsan uma qalmaan.
translated: ["Daraasaddan oo lagu magacaabo COLCORONA ayaa lagu shaqaalaysiiyaa 6000 qof oo qaangaar ah oo da'doodu ka wayn tahay 40 sano iyo dadka ka wayn oo laga helay COVID-19, lana kulma calaamado fudud oo aan u baahnayn in isbitaal la dhigo."]

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: Dhawr anticoagulants ayaa la wadaa tijaabadooda Talyaaniga.
translated: Dumarka uur leh ama naas nuujinaya ama aan lahayn hab wax ku ool ah ee ka hortagga uurka ma qalmo.

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.
targetString: Molokuyuurada miisaanka yar ee heparin ayaa si balaadhan loogu isticmaalaa daawaynta bukaanka, taas oo keentey in Hay'ada Dawooyinka Talyaanigu ay soo saarto tilmaamaha sida loo isticmaalayo.
translated: Dalka Talyaaniga ayaa laga baarayaa dhowr anticoagulants.

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: Daraasad xarumo badan ah oo 300 oo bukaan ka qayb galayaan ayaa loo isticmaalaya enoxaparin sodium ee prophylaxis iyo dawo lagu daweeyo oo lagaga dhawaaqay Talyaaniga Abriil 14.
translated: ["Heparin-miisaankiisu hooseeyo oo molecular-ka ah ayaa loo isticmaalayaa in lagu daweeyo bukaanada, taas oo keentay in Hay'adda Daawooyinka ee Talyaanigu ay daabacdo tilmaamo ku saabsan isticmaalkeeda."]

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.
targetString: Maadaama oo SARS-CoV-2 uu yahay fayrus, saynisyo badan ayaa diirada saaraya dib u isticmaalka dawada hore loo ansixiyay ee fayruska taas oo la sameeyay wixii ka horeeyay inta aanu safmarku soo bixin MERS, SARS iyo fayruska Galbeedka Nile.
translated: Daraasad badan oo lagu sameeyay 300 oo bukaan oo baaraya isticmaalka enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis iyo daaweynta daaweynta ayaa lagaga dhawaaqay Talyaaniga Abriil 14.

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: Ribavirin: ribavirin ayaa lagu taliyay in lagu daweeyo COVID-19 si ku cad tilmaamaha nuqulka 7aad ee Jayna.
translated: Maadaama SARS-CoV-2 uu yahay fayruus, taxadar badan oo cilmiyeed ayaa diiradda lagu saaray dib-u-dhigista daawooyinka ka hortagga fayraska ee la ansixiyay kuwaas oo loo sameeyay dilaaca hore sida MERS, SARS, iyo fayraska West Nile.

sourceString: Ribavirin: ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Umifenovir: umifenovir ayaa lagu taliyay in lagu daweeyo COVID-19 si ku cad tilmaamaha nuqulka 7aad ee Jayna.
translated: Ubavirin: ribavirin waxaa lagu taliyay daaweynta COVID-19 sida ku cad tilmaamaha nuqulka 7-aad ee Shiinaha

sourceString: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Antibootiga qaar ayaa la ogaaday in ay dhicin karto in dib loogu isticmaalo daawaynta COVID-19.
translated: Umifenovir: umifenovir waxaa lagu taliyay in lagu daweeyo COVID-19 sida ku cad tilmaamaha daabacaadda 7aad ee Shiinaha

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 qaataha): Ayay Jayna Ansixisay.
translated: Qaar ka mid ah dawooyinka antibiyootikda oo la ogaaday inay suuragal tahay in dib loo dhiirigeliyo daaweynta COVID-19:

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: Sidoo kale tijaabada Talyaaniga iyo Jayna. Eeh Tociluzuman#COVID-19.
translated: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Waxaa ansixiyay Shiinaha.

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: Weli ma cada xaalada ka iman karta inta uurka la leeyahay oo ay ku jiraan macaanka, wadne xanuunka, hypercoagulability ama kacsanaan taas oo khatar dheeraad ah ku keeneysa dadka uurka leh maadaama oo loogu talo geley dadka aan uurka lahayn. Macluumaadka kooban ee laga hayo, u wareego qaybta sadexaad ee uurka ayaa dhici karta inayna iman, ama inay siday ku timaadaa ay yaraato.
translated: Sidoo kale tijaabooyinka Talyaaniga iyo Shiinaha. oo arag Tocilizumab#COVID-19.

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: In kasta oo aanu jirin talaal dhamaystay tijaabada, waxaa jirta dhawr iskuday oo socda oo lagu doonayo in lagu sameeyo talaal.
translated: ["Tallaalka b'A COVID-19 waa talaal male awaal ah oo ka hortaga cudurka coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19)."]

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: Dhamaadkii Febraayo 2020, Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka (WHO) waxay sheegey inayna filanaynin in la helo talaal SARS-CoV-2, fayrus daran, in la helo 18 bilood ee soo socda.
translated: Inkastoo aanay jirin tallaal aan dhamaystirnayn tijaabooyin caafimaad, haddana waxaa jira iskudayo badan oo la doonayo in lagu sameeyo tallaalka noocan ah.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: Shan talaal ayaa lasoo xushay Waji I ee daraasada amaanka ee Abriil.
translated: ["Dabayaaqadii Febraayo 2020, Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka (WHO) ayaa sheegtay in aysan filayn talaal ka dhan ah SARS-CoV-2, oo ah fayruuska sababa, uu heli karo wax ka yar 18 bilood gudaheed."]

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: COVID-19 waxaa la ogaaday Diseember 2019.
translated: Shan qof oo ku tartamayay tallaalka ayaa lagu daraaseeyay wajiga I-aad ee daraasadda badbaadada bishii April.

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: Safmar balaadhan oo wada gaashay caalamka 2020, kaas oo horseeday in maalgalin iyo dawlo badan oo daraasadeed lagu sameeyo sidii loo heli lahaa talaal.
translated: COVID-19 waxaa la ogaaday Diseembar 2019.

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Hay'ado badan ayaa isticmaalaya cayayaan si looga sameeyo talaalada SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Dilaac balaaran ayaa ku faafay aduunka sanadka 2020, isagoo horseeday maalgashi badan iyo waxqabad cilmi baaris si loo sameeyo tallaalka.

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Sida la sheegey Abriil, barnaamika CEPI ayaa wada samaynta talaalka oo markaa ku socda xawaare, awooda soo saarka, samaynta miisaanka, iyo helitaanka caalamka.
translated: ["Hay'ado badan ayaa adeegsanaya hidda-sidaha la daabacay si ay u yeeshaan tallaalada suurtagalka ah ee ka dhanka ah SARS-CoV-2."]

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: Abriil, Saynisyahabo CEPI ayaa sheegey in 10 madalood oo teknooloojiyad ay socdaan oo daraasadeed oo lagu samanayo inta lagu jiro horaanka 2020 talaal wax ku ool ah oo COVID-19 ah.
translated: Bishii Abriil, hindisaha CEPI ee hindisaha horumarinta talaalka ayaa ah xawliga, awooda wax soo saarida, dejinta qiyaasta, iyo helitaanka caalamiga ah ee caalamiga ah.

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: Madalaha waawayn ayaa bartilmaameedsanaya samaynta amaanka Waji I ee daraasada oo ay ku jiraan:
translated: Bishii Abriil, saynisyahannada CEPI waxay sheegeen in 10 goobood oo kala duwan oo tiknoolajiyad ah ay ku socdeen daraasad iyo horumarin inta lagu guda jiro horaantii 2020 si loo abuuro talaal waxtar leh oo ka hortaga COVID-19.

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: nucleic aysiidh (DNA iyo RNA) (Waji I waxaa la samaynayaa oo lasoo saarayaa talaalka lasoo xulanayo: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
translated: Bartilmaameedyada ugu waaweyn ee loo hormariyay daraasaadka nabadgelyada ee Phase I waxaa ka mid ah:

sourceString: nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
targetString: qaabka fayruska (Wajiga I smaaynta iyo lasoo baxaya talaalka: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus nooca 5 fektor)
translated: nucleic acid (DNA iyo RNA) (Wajiga I ee sameeya iyo talaalka talaalka: Moderna, mRNA-1273)

sourceString: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)
targetString: Sida ay sheegeen saynisyahanada CEPI Abriil, 115 isku gayn talaal oo lagala soo baxay samaynta hore ee talaalka, oo waxaa la xaqiijiyay 78 mashruuc oo socda (79, sida ay sheegeen Milken Institute), 37 kuwa kale sheegeen, laakiin macluumaad yar ayaa laga hayaa (taas oo la sheegey in la qorsheeyay ama la nashqadeeyay).
translated: qalabka cayayaanka fayraska (Wajiga I ee sameysma iyo shuruunta talaalka: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus nooca 5 vector)

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: Wajiga I-II ee tijaabada ee la qorsheeyay ee amaanka iyo immunogenicity shaybaadhka ah, caadiyan si nasiib ah loola soo baxay, xakamaynta placebo, oo goobo badan ah, inta la ogaanayo wax cad, oo xadi wax ku ool ah.
translated: Sida ay saynisyahano CEPI sheegeen bishii Abriil, 115 musharax oo tallaal wadar ah ayaa ku jira heerarkii hore ee horumarinta, iyadoo 78 ka mid ahi ay xaqiijiyeen inay yihiin mashaariic firfircoon (79, sida laga soo xigtay Milken Institute), iyo 37 qof oo kale oo ku dhawaaqay, laakiin macluumaadka dadweynaha oo yar ayaa la heli karaa (oo loo malaynayo inay qorshaynayaan ama la qorsheeyay).

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: Tijaabada Wajiga III caadiyan waxa aku jira ka qayb gal badan, oo ay ku jiraan kooxda la xakamayeeya, iyo wax ku oolnimo tijaabada ee dalaalka kahortaga xanuunka, iyada oo lala socdo saamaynta xun ee ka faa'idaysiga xadida.
translated: ["Tijaabada Wajiga III waxay samaysaa hordhac ah ee badqabka iyo baaritaanka difaaca jirka, caadi ahaan waa mid aan kala sooc lahayn, laguna xakameeyo placebo, iyo meelo badan, iyada oo la go'aaminayo qiyaaso sax ah oo wax ku ool ah."]

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: 79ka talaal ee socda (ee la xaqiijiyay horaankii Abrii 2020), 74 ayaa weli aan lagu qiimayn bilaa aadanka (weli "tijaabada kahor" ayay daraasadu maraysaa).
translated: Tijaabada Wajiga III sida caadiga ah waxaa ku lug leh ka-qaybgalayaasha badan, oo ay ku jiraan koox kontorool, iyo waxtarka tijaabada ee tallaalka si looga hortago cudurka, iyada oo lala soconayo saameynta xun ee qiyaasta ugu fiican.

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: Ilaa 24 Janaayo 2020, Awstaraaliya, Jaamacada Queensland waxay ku dhawaaqday baadhitnaka talaalka molokulaarada ee macquulka ah kaas oo wax ka badali doona hide sidaha borootiinta fayruska si markaa loo sameeyo ficil difaac.
translated: 79 ka mid ah musharraxiinta tallaalka ee horumarinta firfircoon (oo la xaqiijiyay horaantii Abriil 2020), 74 weli kuma jiraan qiimaynta bina aadamka (walina cilmi baaris "preclinical" ah)

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: Ilaa 24 Janaayo 2020 Kanada, Xarunta Talaalka Caalamiga ah (VIDO-InterVac) ee Jaamacada Saskatcheman ayaa ku dhawaaqday bilawga shaqada talaalka, taas oo lagu doonayo in lagu bilaabi tijaabada bilaa aadanka 2021.
translated: Qiyaastii 24kii Janaayo 2020 ee Australia, Jaamacadda Queensland ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay baarayso suurtagalnimada in talaal molecular ah oo hidde ahaan wax ka bedeli doona borotiinka fayraska si loo kiciyo falcelinta difaaca jirka.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: Mashaariicda soo saaraya talaalka ayay ku dhawaaqday Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo Kahortaga Xanuunada Jayna 26 Janaayo 2020, Jaamacada Hong Kong 28 Janaayo.
translated: ["Qiyaastii 24Kii Janaayo 2020 ee Canada, Xarunta Caalamiga ah ee Talaalka (VIDO-InterVac) ee Jaamacadda Saskatchewan ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay bilowdo shaqada talaalka, iyada oo ujeedkeedu yahay in ay bilaabaan baaritaanka bini'aadamka sanadka 2021."]

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: Ilaa 29 Janaayo 2020, Shirkada Dawooyinka Janssen, oo uu ay hogaaminayso Hanneke Schuitemaker, ayaa ku dahwaaqay inay bilaabeen samaynta talaal.
translated: Mashaariicda horumarinta tallaalka ayaa lagaga dhawaaqay Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo Ka Hortagga Cudurada Shiinaha 26 janaayo 2020, iyo Jaamacadda Hong Kong 28 Janaayo.

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: Janssen waxay soo wada saarayaan talaal afka laga qaado biotechnology, Vaxart.
translated: Qiyaastii 29kii Janaayo 2020, Shirkadaha daawooyinka ee Janssen oo ay hoggaaminayso Hanneke Schuitemaker ayaa ku dhawaaqay inay bilaabeen shaqo ku saabsan samaynta talaalka.

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: Maarso 18, 2020, Emergent BioSolutions ayaa ku dhawaaqay inay soo wada saarayaan Vaxart talaalka.
translated: Janssen wuxuu si wadajir ah u hormaridayaa talaalka afka oo uu la socdo lammaanaha bayotechnoolajiyadda, Vaxart.

sourceString: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.
targetString: Febraayo 8 2020, shaybaadhka OncoGen ee Roomaaniya ayaa baahiyay warbixin in uu nashqadeeyay talaal lamid ah ka loo isticmaalo kaansarka neoantigen talaalka ah ee daawaynta.
translated: Maarso 18, 2020, Emergent BioSolutions ayaa ku dhawaaqay inay soo saarayaan Vaxart si loo sameeyo talaalka.

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: Maarso 25 madaxa cilmi baadhista ee hay'ada ayaa ku dhawaaqay in ay soo gunaanadeen samaynta talaalka oo ay markaa bilaabayaan tijaabada.
translated: 8-dii Febraayo 2020, shaybaarka OncoGen ee ka dhisan Romania ayaa daabacay waraaq ku saabsan naqshadda talaalka oo ay ku qoran tahay tiknoolajiyad la mid ah tallaalka kansarka neoantigen.

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.
targetString: Febraayo 27 2020, shirkada ay kaabto Generex, NuGenerex Ummo-Ancology, ayaa ku dhawaaqay in ay bilaabayaan mashruuc talala oo laga sameeyay li-Key peptide talaal ah oo COVID-19 ah.
translated: 25kii Maarso ayaa madaxa machadka cilmi baadhistu ku dhawaaqay in ay soo dhameystireen tallaalka la hago, ayna bilaabayaan baaritaanka.

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: Waxay doonayaan inay soo saaraan talaalka lasoo xusho ee markaa lagu tijaabin karo bilaa aadanka "90 maalmood gudahood."
translated: 27kii Febraayo 2020, shirkad hoosaad ah oo ka socota Generex, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay bilaabayaan mashruuc talaal si loo abuuro talaalka ii-keyga ee peptide-ka covid-19.

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: Maarso 5 2020, Jaamacada Washington ee St. Louis ayaa ku dhawaaqday mashruuca samaynta talaalka.
translated: Waxay doonayeen inay soo saaraan musharax talaal oo laga baari karo bini\'aadanka dhexdiisa "90 maalmood gudahood."

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Maarso 5 2020, Waaxda Cilmi Baadhista Ciidanka Maraykanka iyo Waaxda Talista ee Fort Detrick iyo Hay'ada Ciidamada Walter Reed Cilmi Baadhista Silver Springs, oo labaduba ku yaala galbeedka Maryland, ayaa ku dhawaaqay inay ka shaqaynayaan talaal.
translated: Maarso 5, 2020, Jaamacadda Washington ee magaalada St. Louis ayaa ku dhawaaqday mashaariicda ay ku horumarinayso talaalka.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.
targetString: Ilaa 10 Maarso 2020, Emergent Biosolution waxay ku dhawaaqeen inay la shaqaynayso Novavax Inc.
translated: Maarso 5, 2020, Cilmi Baadhista Caafimaadka ee Ciidamada Maraykanka iyo Taliska Materiel ee fort Detrick iyo Machadka Walter Reed Army Institute of Research ee Silver Spring ee ku yaalla Silver Spring, oo labaduba ku yaalla galbeedka Maryland, ayaa ku dhawaaqay inay ka shaqeynayaan tallaalka.

sourceString: Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.
targetString: soo saaritaanka iyo samaynta talaalka.
translated: Qiyaastii 10kii Maarso 2020, Daawooyinka Cusub ee Muuqata ayaa ku dhawaaqay in ay la safatay Novavax Inc.

sourceString: in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.
targetString: Sidoo kale waxay dadku ku dhawaaqeen inay qorshaynayaan tijaabada caafimaadka kahor iyo Wajiga I ee tijaabada caafimaadka Juulay 2020 ugu danbayn.
translated: dhanka horumarinta iyo soo saaridda talaalka.

sourceString: The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.
targetString: Maarso 12 2020, Wasiirka Caafimaadka Hindiya ayaa ku dhawaaqay inay la shaqaynayaan 11 qof oo aysoleeshin ku jira, oo ay dedejinayaan si ay ugu yaraan u qaadato wareeg hal sano iyo badh ah ilaa labad sano in la sameeyaa talaalku.
translated: Iskaashatadu waxay sidoo kale ku dhawaaqday qorshayaasha baaritaanka caafimaadka caafimaadka iyo tijaabada wajiga I ee tijaabada ah ugu dambeyntii July 2020.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Maarso 12 2020, Medicago, shirkad bayooteknoolooji ah oo ku taal Magaalada Quebec, Quebec, ayaa sheegtey inay wado samaynta waxyaabo lamid ah coronavirus oo ay qayb kamid ah lacagtiisa bixinayso Hay'ada Kanada ee Daraasada Caafimaadku.
translated: ["Maarso 12, 2020, Wasaarada Caafimaadka ee Hindiya ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay la shaqeynayaan 11 go'doon ah, iyo in xitaa si xawli ah loo raaco ay qaadan doonto ugu yaraan qiyaastii hal iyo barkiis ilaa laba sano si loo sameeyo tallaalka."]

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported development of a coronavirus-like particle under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
targetString: Talaalka laga soo xusho ee shaybaadhka, tijaabada bilaa aadanka ee qorshaynsan Juulay ama Agoosto 2020.
translated: Maarso 12, 2020, Medicago, oo ah shirkad cilmiga bayotekoolajiyada noolaha ah oo ku taalla Quebec City, Quebec, ayaa ka warbixisay horumarinta shay u eg coronavirus oo ayadoo lagu maalgelinayo qayb ka timid Machadyada Kanada ee Daraasaadka Caafimaadka.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.
targetString: Horaantii todobaadkaan, The Guardian ayaa daabacay in Madaxweynaha Maraykanka Donald Trump uu siiyay CureVac "lacag badan si ay kaligood u qiimeeyaan talaalka Covid-19", in kasta oo ay dawlada Jermalku ay kasoo horjeedsatay.
translated: Musharraxa talaalku wuxuu ku jiraa baaritaano shaybaar, iyada oo la qorsheeyay in baniʼaadamka laga baaro bisha Luulyo ama Agoosto 2020.

sourceString: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that the US President Donald Trump had offered CureVac "'large sums of money' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", against which the German government protested.
targetString: Maarso 17 2020, Shirkada dawooyinka Maraykanka ee Pfizer ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay la shaqaynayso shirkada Jermalka ee BioNTech si ay uga wada shaqeeyaan mRNA-talaalka ah.
translated: Horaantii asbuucaas, wargeyska The Guardian ayaa soo warisay in Madaxweynaha Mareykanka Donald Trump uu CureVac usoo bandhigay "lacago badan\' oo loogu talagalay gaar ahaan in la gaaro tallaalka Covid-19", oo ay ka soo horjeesatay dowladda Jarmalku.

sourceString: On 17 March 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop a mRNA-based vaccine.
targetString: Talaalka ah mRNA waxa loosoo xushay BNT162, kaas oo wakhti xaadirkan lagu tijaabinayo inta aan caafimaad ahaan la tijaabin oo lana filanayo in la bilaabo tijaabada caafimaadka Abriil 2020.
translated: Bishii Maarso 17, 2020, shirkada dawooyinka ee Maraykanka ee Pfizer ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay iskaashi la leedahay shirkada Jarmalka ee BioNTech si wada jir ah loo soo saaro talaalka ku salaysan mRNA.

sourceString: mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, currently in pre-clinical testing with clinical trials expected to begin in April 2020.
targetString: Talyaaniga Maarso 17 2020, Takis Biotech, shirkad Talyaani ah oo baayootek ah ayaa bayaamisay inay heli doonaan natiijada tijaabada caafimaad kahor Abriil 2020, oo talaalka ay doortaan la bilaabi doono in lagu tijaabiyo bilaa aadanka dayrta.
translated: BNT162 oo ah tallaalka ku salaysan mRNA, ayaa hadda ku jira tijaabada ka hor tijaabada iyadoo tijaabada caafimaad ee la filayo inay bilaabanto Abriil 2020.

sourceString: In Italy on 17 March 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have pre-clinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate could begin human testing by fall.
targetString: Faransiiska 19 Maarso 2020, Iskaashiga Barnaamijka U Diyaar Garawga Safmarka (CEPI) waxay ku dhawaaqeen in US$4.9 milyan oo maal galin ah oo COVID-19 ah oo daraasada talaalka iskaashiga ee Istitut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Fuyeena, Astariya), Jaamacada Pittsburgh, taas oo ka dhigaysa wadarta CEPI ee maalgelinta talaalka COVID-19 lagu samanayo oo ah US$29 milyan.
translated: ["Talyaaniga 17kii Maarso 2020, Takis Biotech, oo ah shirkad talyaani ah oo ah bayatariga ayaa ku dhawaaqay inay samayn doonaan natiijooyin baaritaan oo tijaabo ah oo ka horeeyay bilawga Abriil 2020 iyo musharaxa ugu dambeeya ee talaalka ayaa bilaabi kara baadhitaanka bini'aadanka marka la gaaro dayrta."]

sourceString: In France on 19 March 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to US$29 million.
targetString: CEPI cida kale ee ay ka kaashanayaan ee ka maalgelinaysa samaynta talaalka COVID-19 waa Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, Jaamacada Hong Kong, Jaamacada Oxford, iyo Jaamacada Queensland.
translated: Faransiiska 19kii Maarso 2020, Isbahaysiga U Diyaargarowga U Diyaargarowga Cudurka Safmareenka (CEPI) ayaa ku dhawaaqay maalgalin US $ 4.9 milyan ah oo lagu maalgelinayo urur cilmi baadhista tallaalka COVID-19 oo ay kujirto barnaamijka "Institut Pasteur", Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), iyo Jaamacadda Pittsburgh, taas oo wadarta guud ee maalgashiga CEPI ee horumarinta tallaalka COVID-19 ka dhigaysa US $ 29 milyan.

sourceString: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland.
targetString: Maarso 20 2020, saraakiisha caafimaadka ee Ruushka ayaa ku dhawaaqay in saynisyahanadu ay bilaabeen ku tijaabinta xayawaanka til talaal oo lasoo xushay oo kala duwan.
translated: La-hawlgalayaasha kale ee maalgashiga ee CEPI ee horumarinta tallaalka COVID-19 waa Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, Jaamacadda Hong Kong, Jaamacadda Oxford, iyo Jaamacadda Queensland.

sourceString: On 20 March 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.
targetString: Cilmi baadhayaasha Imperial College London waxay ku dhawaaqeen in 20 Maarso 2020 ay samayn doonaan talaal RNA oo COVID-19 ah oo iskii ah.
translated: Maarso 2020, masuuliyiinta caafimaadka ee Ruushka ayaa ku dhawaaqay in saynisyahanno ay bilaabeen in ay bilaabeen baaritaanka xayawaanka ee lix qof oo kala duwan oo talaal ah.

sourceString: Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.
targetString: Talaalka waxa ay xusheen 14 maalmood gudahood markii ay ogaadeen safmarkii Jayna.
translated: Kulliyadda Imperial College ee London ayaa ku dhawaaqay 20-kii Maarso 2020 inay samaynayaan talaal is-kororsi ah oo ku saabsan RNA-da ee COVID-19.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.
targetString: Dhamaadkii Maarso, dawlada Kanada ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay C$275 milyan ay ku maal gelinayso 96 mashruuc oo daraasadood oo markaa lagula dagaalamayo COVID-19, oo ay ku jiraan dhawr talaal oo lasoo xudhay oo shirkado iyo jaamacada Kanada ay wadaan, sida barnaamijyada Medicago iyo Jaamacada Saskatchewan.
translated: Musharaxa talaalka ayaa lagu sameeyay 14 cisho gudahood laga bilaabo markii uu xigitaanka ka helay Shiinaha.

sourceString: In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago and University of Saskatchewan initiatives.
targetString: Ilaa wakhtigaas, dawlada Kanada ayaa ku dhawaaqday C$192 mliyan oo si gaar ah loogu sameeyay talaalka COVID-19, iyo qorshaha lagu samaynayo ee qaran "kaydka talaalka" ee dhawr talaal oo cusub oo loo isticmaali karo safmarka kale ee coronavirus marka uu yimaado.
translated: Dabayaaqadii Maarso, dawlada Canada ayaa ku dhawaaqday in C$275 milyan oo lagu maalgelinayo 96 mashruuc oo cilmi baaris oo ku saabsan dawooyinka lagaga hortagayo COVID-19, oo ay ku jiraan musharaxiin badan oo talaalka ah oo ka socda shirkadaha iyo jaamacadaha Kanada, sida medicago iyo jaamacadaha Saskatchewan.

sourceString: Around the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million specifically for developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: Abriil 2 2020, cilmi baadhayaasha Jaamacada Pittsburg Waaxda Dawooyinka ayaa sheekey in la tijaabiyo PittCoVacc, talaal COVID-19 oo jiirka lagu tijaabinayo, kuwaas oo sheegey in "MNA ay bixinayso talaalka SARS-CoV-2  S1 oo markaa antigent gaarka ah ee antiboodhigu ka jawaabo ah [jiirka] kaas oo markaa bilaabmaya 2 todobaad kamid marka la isku mudo."
translated: Isla waqtigaas, dawlada Canada ayaa ku dhawaaqday C$192 malyan oo dollar si gaar ah oo loogu talagalay in lagu sameeyo talaalka COVID-19, iyadoo la qorshaynayo in la dhiso bangi qaran oo ah "talaal" oo ah dhowr talaal oo cusub oo la isticmaali karo haddii uu dilaac kale oo coronavirus ku dhaco.

sourceString: On 2 April 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on testing of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [in the mice] that were evident beginning 2 weeks after immunization."
targetString: Kanada 16 Abriil 2020, Jaacamada Waterloo Waaxda Dawooyinka ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay samaysay talaal DNA-ga ah oo markaa sanka laga qaadan karo.
translated: 2dii Abriil 2020, cilmi baareyaal ka socda Jaamacadda Pittsburgh School of Medicine ayaa sheegay in laga baaray PittCoVacc, oo ah suurtagalnimada tallaalka COVID-19 ee jiirarka, iyagoo sheegay in "MNA ay muujisay talaalka SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit subunit ayaa keenay jawaabo antigen-yada u khaas ah antigen-ka u gaarka ah [jiirarka] kuwaas oo si cad u bilaabmay 2 todobaad ka dib tallaalka."

sourceString: In Canada on 16 April 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.
targetString: Iyada oo la isticmaalayo bacteriophages, DNA waxa loogu talo geley in lagu badalo baakteeriyada bilaa aadanka su loosoo saaro fayrus wax u eeg oo aan waxyeelo lahayn, kaas oo samayn kara nidaamka difaaca jidhka si loosoo saaro antiboodhi loogu talo geley fayruska SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Kanada 16kii Abriil 2020, Jaamacadda Waterloo School of Pharmacy ayaa ku dhawaaqday qaabka talaalka ee DNA-da looga taliyo inuu yahay suurtogalnimada in lagu buufiyo sanka.

sourceString: Using bacteriophages, the DNA will be designed to replicate inside human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which may stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Maarso 2020, dawlada Maraykanka, warshadaha, iyo sadex jaamacadood ayaa isku keeney khayraadka si ay u helaan kombuyuuyar gaar ah oo IB ah, kaaas oo macluumaadkiisa laguu kaydiyo khayraadka Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, iyo Google.
translated: ["Iyadoo la adeegsanayo bacteriophages, DNA waxaa loogu talagalay inay ku taranto gudaha bakteeriyada bini'aadamka si ay u soo saarto qaybaha sida fayruuska aan waxyeello lahayn, kuwaas oo kicin kara habka difaaca jirka si uu u soo saaro anti-boodhiyo ka hortaga fayraska SARS-CoV-2."]

sourceString: In March 2020, the US government, industry, and three universities pooled resources to access supercomputers from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.
targetString: Taalaalada qaar ayaa leh isku wax qabad, sidoo kale loo yaqaan wax qabad aan la cayimin.
translated: Bishii Maarso 2020, dawladda Maraykanka, warshadaha, iyo saddex jaamacadaha pooled khayraadka si ay u helaan supercomputers ka IBM, oo ay weheliso kheyraadka kumbuyuutarada daruuriga ka Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, iyo Google.

sourceString: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.
targetString: Taasi waxay ka dhigan tahay in laga faa'ido karo wax ka badan kahortaga xanuunka.
translated: Tallaalada qaarkood waxay leeyihiin saameyn caafimaad, sidoo kale waxaa loogu yeeraa (non-specific effects).

sourceString: That means they can have benefits beyond the disease they prevent.
targetString: Tijaabada nasiibka ah ee dheeraadka ah ee Awstariya ayaa lagu doonayaa xakamaynta ku biirida 4,170 shaqaale oo daryeelka caafimaadka ah.
translated: ["Taas macnaheedu waxa weeye in ay faa'iidooyin ka heli karaan cudurka ka hor-tagga ah."]

sourceString: A further randomized trial in Australia is seeking to enrol 4,170 healthcare workers.
targetString: Waxaa macquul ah in talaalka la sameeyay in aanu amaan ahayn ama aanu waxba tarin.
translated: Tijaabo dheeraad ah oo kala sooc lahayn oo ka socda Australia ayaa lagu doonayaa in la qoro 4,170 shaqaale caafimaad ah.

sourceString: It is possible vaccines in development will not be safe or effective.
targetString: Daraasadaha hordhaca ah ee talaalka lagu qiimeeyo waxtarkiisa iyada oo la isticmaalayo COVID-19 gaar ah ee xayawaanka, sida jiirka lagu muday ACE2, shaybaadhada kale ee xayawaanka, iyo wixii aan bilaa aadan ahayn, waxay muujinayaan in amaanka heerka 3 ee talaabooyinka safmarka ah ee lagaga shaqaynayo fayrus nool, iyo wada shaqaynta caalamiga ah ee lagu xaqiijinayo heerarka nidaamka amaanka ah.
translated: Waxaana suurto gal ah in tallaalada hormarintu aanu noqonayn mid badqaba ama waxtar leh.

sourceString: Early research to assess vaccine efficacy using COVID-19-specific animal models, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and non-human primates, indicate a need for biosafety-level 3 containment measures for handling live viruses, and international coordination to ensure standardized safety procedures.
targetString: Talaalka SARS iyo MERS ayaa lagu tijaabiyay qaababka aan bilaa aadan ahayn.
translated: ["Daraasad hore oo lagu qiimaynayo waxtarka tallaalka iyadoo la adeegsanayo qaababka xayawaanka gaarka ah ee COVID-19, sida jiirarka ACE2-transgenic, xayawaanka kale ee shaybaarka, iyo mudnaanta aan bini'aadamka ahayn, waxay tilmaamayaan baahida loo qabo talaabooyinka xakamaynta heerka 3aad ee biosafety-ka si loo maareeyo fayrasyada nool, iyo isuduwidda caalamiga ah si loo hubiyo nidaamyada badbaadada ee caadiga ah."]

sourceString: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.
targetString: Ilaa 2020, lama hayo dawo ama talaal inaga ilaalisa SARS kuwaas oo lagu arkay inay yihiin amaan oo waxna u tara bilaa aadanka.
translated: Talaalada ka dhanka ah SARS iyo MERS ayaa lagu tijaabiyay noocyada xayawaanka aan aadanaha ahayn.

sourceString: As of 2020, there is no cure or protective vaccine for SARS that has been shown to be both safe and effective in humans.
targetString: Sida lagu sheegey warbixinaha daraasada ee lasoo saaray 2005 iyo 2006, aqoonsiga iyo samaynta talaalka novel iyo dawooyinka lagu dawaynayo SARS ayaa mudnaan u ahayn dawladaha iyo hay'ada waaxda caafimaadka ee caalamka oo dhan. Sidoo kale ma jiro talaal lagaga hortago MERS.
translated: ["Ilaa iyo 2020, majirto talaal daawo ama difaac ah oo loogu talagalay SARS kaas oo la ogaaday inuu yahay mid amaan ah oo waxtar u leh bini'aadanka."]

sourceString: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of novel vaccines and medicines to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health agencies around the world.There is also no proven vaccine against MERS.
targetString: Markii uu soo baxay MERS, waxa loo arkayay in cilmi baadhista jirta ee SARS lagu heli karo shax wax ku ool ah oo lagu sameeyo talaalka iyo daawaynta caabuqa MERS-CoV.
translated: ["Sida laga soo xigtay waraaqaha cilmi baarista ee la daabacay sanadihii 2005 iyo 2006, aqoonsiga iyo horumarinta talaalka cusub iyo daawooyinka lagu daweeyo SARS wuxuu mudnaanta koowaad u ahaa dawladaha iyo hay'adaha caafimaadka dadweynaha ee adduunka dacaladeeda. Ma jiro tallaal la xaqiijiyay oo ka dhan ah MERS."]

sourceString: When MERS became prevalent, it was believed that existing SARS research may provide a useful template for developing vaccines and therapeutics against a MERS-CoV infection.
targetString: Maarso 2020, waxaa jiray (DNA ah) talaal MERS ah kaas oo dhamaystirtay wajiga I ee tijaabada bilaa aadanka, iyo sadex kale oo socda, dhamaan waa talaal fayruska ah, laba adenoviral fayruska ah (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac), iyo hal MVA fayruska ah (MVA-MERS-S).
translated: Markii MERS uu faafay, waxaa la rumeysanaa in cilmi baarista SARS ee jira ay keeni karto tusaalooyin waxtar leh oo lagu horumariyo talaalo iyo daawayn ka dhan ah caabuqa MERS-CoV.

sourceString: As of March 2020, there was one (DNA based) MERS vaccine which completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three others in progress, all of which are viral-vectored vaccines, two adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).
targetString: Baraha bulshada waxaa lasoo dhigay boro bogaando lagu sheegeyo in fayruska keenay COVID-19 la garanayo oo talaalka hore loo sameeyay.
translated: Laga soo bilaabo Maarso 2020, waxaa jiray hal (DNA saldhigiisu yahay) tallaalka MERS kaas oo dhameystiray tijaabooyinka caafimaad ee wajiga I-aadmiga, iyo saddex kale oo horudhac ah, oo dhammaantood ah tallaallo fayruus lagu gubay, laba adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac), iyo hal MVA-dulmaray (MVA-MERS-S).

sourceString: Social media posts have promoted a conspiracy theory claiming the virus behind COVID-19 was known and that a vaccine was already available.
targetString: Shirkadaha ayaa soo dhigay baraha bulshada ee kala duwan shirkada hore ee taxanaha hide sidaha iyo talaalka xanuunada kale ee coronavirus sida SARS coronavirus.
translated: Baraha bulshada ayaa baraha bulshada lagu baadhay in la dhiirrigeliyo aragti ah oo ah in fayruska ka dambeeya COVID-19 la ogaaday iyo in talaal hore loo heli jiray.

sourceString: The patents cited by various social media posts reference existing patents for genetic sequences and vaccines for other strains of coronavirus such as the SARS coronavirus.
targetString: b' Coronavirus waa koox fayrusyo xidhiidh leh oo markaa uu keeno xayawaanka wax jaqsiiya iyo shimbiruhu.
translated: Shatiyada ay soo xigteen baraha bulshada ee kala duwan ayaa tixraacaya shatiyada jira ee taxanaha hidde sidaha iyo tallaalka noocyada kale ee coronavirus sida coronavirus-ka SARS.

sourceString: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Calaamadaha caamka ah ee lagu yaqaan waxaa kamid ah xumad, qufac, iyo neefsiga oo dhiba qofka.
translated: ["Xanuunka b'Coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) waa cudur faafa oo uu sababo astaanta neef-mareenka ba'an ee coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2)."]

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Calaamado kale waxaa kamid ah daal, murqo xanuun, shuban, cunaha oo xidhma, urta oo meesha ka baxda, iyo calool xanuun.
translated: Calaamadaha caamka ah waxaa ka mid ah qandho, qufac iyo neefsasho yaraan.

sourceString: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of smell, and abdominal pain.
targetString: Marka la qaado ilaa inta calaamado la yeelanayo waxa caadiyan u dhaxaysa ilaa shan maalmood laakiin waxa ay u dhaxayn kartaa laba ilaa afar iyo toban maalmood.
translated: Calaamadaha kale waxa ka mid noqon kara daal, murqo xanuun, shuban, dhuun xanuun, ur xanuun, ur xanuun iyo xanuun caloosha ah.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: In kasta oo badanaa ay keento xanuun yar, waxaa jrii kara xanuun sanbabka ah oo fayrus iyo in unugyo badan shaqada joojiyaan.
translated: Waqtiga laga bilaabo u nuglaanta ilaa marka calaamaduhu bilaabmaan waxay caadi ahaan ku dhawdahay shan maalmood, laakiin waxay u dhaxayn kartaa laba ilaa afar iyo toban maalmood.

sourceString: While the majority of cases result in mild symptoms, some progress to viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.
targetString: Abriil 17 2020, wax ka badan 2.24 milyan oo kiis ayaa la sheegey oo ku sugan 210 dal iyo deegaano, taas oo keeney dhimashada wax ka badan 153,000 oo ruux.
translated: Inkastoo kiisaska intooda badan ay keenaan calaamado fudud, qaar ka mid ah waxay u gudbaan cudurka viral pneumonia iyo xubno badan oo fashilmaya.

sourceString: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.
targetString: Wax ka badan 568,000 oo ruux ayaa ka bogsaday. Fayrusku waxa marka kowaad isku gudbia dadka marka ay isku dhawaadaan, iyo xataa dhibcaha candhuufta ah ee qofka kasoo duulaysa marka uu qufaco, hindhiso ama uu hadlo.
translated: Ilaa iyo 17kii Abriil 2020, in ka badan 2.24 milyan oo kiisas ayaa laga soo sheegay guud ahaan 210 dal iyo deegaan, taas oo dhalisay in ka badan 153,000 oo dhimasho.

sourceString: More than 568,000 people have recovered.The virus is primarily spread between people during close contact, often via small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing, or talking.
targetString: In kasta oo dhibcanahan ay keeno neefsiga, waxa ay caadiyan ku dhacaan dhulka ama meelaha la taataabto halka iyada oo la kala fog yahay la kala qaadi lahaa.
translated: In ka badan 568,000 qof ayaa bogsaday. Fayruusku wuxuu ugu horeyn ku faafaa dadka inta ay kula xiriiraan dhow, badanaaba iyada oo loo marayo dhibco yar-yar oo ay soo saaraan qufac, hindhiso, ama hadal hayn.

sourceString: While these droplets are produced when breathing out, they usually fall to the ground or onto surfaces rather than being infectious over long distances.
targetString: Dad badan ayaa ku qaadi kara marka ay taabtaan meel uu dul saaran yahay oo ay kaidbna taabtaan indhahooda, sankooda, ama afkooda.
translated: Inkastoo dhibco-dhibcahaas la soo saaro marka la neefsado, badanaa waxay ku dhacaan dhulka ama meelaha sare halkii ay ka qaadi lahaayeen in ka badan meelaha ay ku dhacaan masaafada dheer.

sourceString: People may also become infected by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: Fayrusku waxa uu meel saarnaan karaa isaga oo nool ilaa 72 saacadood.
translated: Waxaa kaloo laga yaabaa in dadka ay ku dhacaan cudurka inay taabtaan meel wasakhaysan kadibna ay taabtaan indhaha, sanka ama afka.

sourceString: The virus can survive on surfaces up to 72 hours.
targetString: Waxa uu ugu faafitaan badan ayahy sadexda maalmood ee ugu horeeya kadib marka calaamaduhu soobaxayaan, in kasta oo ay macquul tahay in la isku gudbiyo wixii ka horeeya inta aan calaamado la yeelan. Qaabka caadiga ah ee lagu ogaado waa in qoraalka markaa ah ee jawaabta celinta polymerase (rRT-PCR) ee muunada duufka.
translated: Fayruusku wuxuu ku noolaan karaa goobaha laga dusha joogo ilaa 72 saacadood.

sourceString: It is most contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.The standard method of diagnosis is by real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) from a nasopharyngeal swab.
targetString: Isticmaalka waji gashadka ayaa kula taliyaa dadka looga shakiyo inay qabaan fayruska iyo dadka daryeela.
translated: Wuxuu aad u badan yahay inta lagu jiro saddexda maalmood ee ugu horeeya ee ka dambeeya bilawga calaamadaha, inkastoo faafitaanka laga yaabo inay suurtagal tahay ka hor inta aysan calaamaduhu soo muuqan iyo marxaladaha dambe ee cudurka. Habka caadiga ah ee baadhitaanka waa by dhabta ah ee transcription polymerase silsilad reverse reaction (rRT-PCR) ka dheregka dheriga nasopharyngeal.

sourceString: The use of masks is recommended for those who suspect they have the virus and their caregivers.
targetString: Talada isticmaalka waji gashadka ee shacabka guud way kala duwan tahay, oo maamulka qaar ayaa ka diga isticmaalkooda, qaar ayaa lagu taliya isticmaalkooda, iyo kuwa kalena waxay ka dhigeen waajib.
translated: Maaskarada ayaa lagu taliyaa isticmaalka maaskarada dadka ka shakiya inay qabaan fayruuska iyo dadka kale ee ku jira.

sourceString: Recommendations for mask use by the general public vary, with some authorities recommending against their use, some recommending their use, and others requiring their use.
targetString: Wakhti xaadirkan, ma jirto talaal uu leeyahay oo gaar ah ama dawo u cayiman oo lagu daweeyo fayruska COVID-19.
translated: Talooyinka loo jeediyo inay adeegsadaan daboolka ay adeegsadaan dadweynahu way kala duwanyihiin, iyadoo masuuliyiinta qaar ay ku taliyaan in aan la isticmaalin, qaarkoodna ay ku talinayaan in la isticmaalo, qaarna ay u baahan yihiin isticmaalkooda.

sourceString: Currently, there is no vaccine or specific antiviral treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: Isku gudbin mudo dheer ah xanuunka ah ayaa lagu sheegey badanaa dalalka dhamaan lixda deegaanka ee WHO ay ka shaqayso.
translated: Hadda, ma jirto tallaal ama daawayn khaas ah oo fayraska lagaga daweeyo COVID-19.

sourceString: Local transmission of the disease has been recorded in most countries across all six WHO regions.
targetString: Caabuqyadaasi waxa weeye fayrusyada asxaanta u ah ama keena calaamada sida hargabka oo kale sida xumad, daal, iyo neefta oo qofka baqata.
translated: Gudbinta maxalliga ah ee cudurka ayaa laga diiwaan geliyay dalalka intooda badan dhammaan lixda gobol ee who.

sourceString: Those infected with the virus may be asymptomatic or develop flu-like symptoms such as fever, cough, fatigue, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Calaamadaha soo baxaya waxaa kamid ah mushkilad neefsiga ah, laab xanuun joogto ah ama cadaadis, dawakhaad, lugaynta oo adkaata, iyo wajiga ama danbaha oo buluug noqda; waxaa lagu taliyaa in markaba la doonto daawayn hadii calaamadahani ay jiraan.
translated: Dadka qaba fayraska waxay noqon karaan calaamado aan lagu garto ama ay yeeshaan calaamadaha u eg ifilada sida qandho, qufac, daal, iyo neefsasho yaraan.

sourceString: Emergency symptoms include difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.
targetString: Quwa aan sidaa u baahsanayn, calaamadaha neefsiga ee sare sida hindhiso, san duuf leh ama cunaha oo xidhma ayaa dhici karta in la arko.
translated: Calaamadaha degdegga ah waxaa ka mid ah neefsashada oo ku adkaata, feedha xanuun joogto ah ama cadaadis joogto ah, wareer, soo kicidda oo ku adkaata iyo wejiga oo bushimaha ama bushimaha; waxaa laga waaninayaa in si dhakhso ah looga fiiriyo caafimaad, haddii ay calaamadahaan la socdaan.

sourceString: Less commonly, upper respiratory symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose or sore throat may be seen.
targetString: Calaamadaha caloosha sida yalaalugo, hunqaaco, iyo shuban ayaa lagu arkay tiro kala duwan.
translated: Si aan caadi ahayn, calaamadaha neefmareenka sare sida hindisidda, sanka oo daadato oo daadato ama dhuun xanuun ayaa laga yaabaa in lagu arko.

sourceString: Gastrointestinal symptoms such as nausea, vomiting and diarrhoea have been observed in varying percentages.
targetString: Kiisaska qaar Jayna ayaa markii hore lagu arkay laab xanuun iyo wadne garaac xoogan.
translated: Calaamadaha caloosha ee xiidmaha sida lalabbada, matag iyo shuban ayaa lagu arkay boqolkiiba oo kala duwan.

sourceString: Some cases in China initially presented only with chest tightness and palpitations.
targetString: Meelaha qaar, xanuunku waxa uu noqon karaa sanbab xanuun, inay shaqayn waayeen unugyo badali, iyo dhimasho.
translated: Kiisaska qaar ee Shiinaha ayaa markii hore la soo gudboonaaday oo keliya laab-qaboojinta iyo laab-jabka.

sourceString: In some, the disease may progress to pneumonia, multi-organ failure, and death.
targetString: Tani waxaa loo yaqaan mudada bilaa calaadamada.
translated: Qaar ka mid ah, cudurka waxaa laga yaabaa inuu u badhdo cudurka sanbabka, xubno badan oo fashilma iyo dhimasho.

sourceString: This is called the incubation period.
targetString: Mudada bilaa calaamaha COVID-19 caadiyan way gaaban yihiin oo waxay noqon karaan shan ilaa lix maalmood kuwaas oo qaar badan ay noqon karaan laba ilaa 14 maalmood.
translated: Tan waxaa la yiraahdaa xilliga xanaanada.

sourceString: The incubation period for COVID-19 is typically five to six days but may range from two to 14 days.
targetString: 97.5% dadka yeesha calaamadaha waxay ku yeeshaan 11.5 maalmood marka ay qabaan caabuqa. Warbixinaha ayaa muujinaya in ayna dhamaan dadka qaadaa yeelan calaamadaha.
translated: Mudadda cudurka uu ku faano ee COVID-19 caadi ahaan waa shan ilaa lix maalmood laakiin waxay u dhaxayn kartaa laba ilaa 14 maalmood.

sourceString: 97.5% of people who develop symptoms will do so within 11.5 days of infection.Reports indicate that not all who are infected develop symptoms.
targetString: Kaalinta calaamadahan ay ku leeyihiin faafitaanka weli lama garanayo; laakiin, cadaymaha hordhaca ahi waxa ay sheegayaan in ay gacan ka gaystaan faafitaanka xanuunka.
translated: 97.5% dadka calaamadaha ku dhaco sidaas ayey samayn doonaan 11.5 maalmood gudahood oo caabuqa ah. Warbixintu waxay sheegaysaa in dhammaan dadka qaba cudurku aysan yeelan calaamadaha.

sourceString: The role of these asymptomatic carriers in transmission is not yet fully known; however, preliminary evidence suggests that they may contribute to the spread of the disease.
targetString: Tirada dadka calaamadaha yeeshaa inta ay ka yihiin dadka xanuunka qaada lama garnaayo wakhti xaadirkan oo daraasad ayaa lagu wadaa, Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo kahortaga Xanuunada Kuuriya (KCDC) waxay sheegtey in 20% dhamaan inta la xaqiijiyay ee xanuunado ay yeeshaan calaamado inta ay isbitaalka ku jiraan.
translated: Dowrka ay sidayaashan calaamadaha muujinayaan ay ku leeyihiin isu gudbinta ayaan wali si buuxda loo garanayn; Si kasta ha ahaatee, cadeymo hordhac ah ayaa muujinaya in ay wax ka tari karaan faafitaanka cudurka.

sourceString: The proportion of infected people who do not display symptoms is currently unknown and being studied, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) reporting that 20% of all confirmed cases remained asymptomatic during their hospital stay.
targetString: Gudida Caafimaadka Qaran ee Jayna waxa ay bilaabeen inay ku daraan kiisaska calaamdah leh kiisaska maalin kasta laga bilaabo 1 Abriil; oo 166 qof oo qaba caabuqa maalintaas, 130 (78%) ayaa yeeshay calaamado wakhtiga la baadhayay.
translated: Saamiga dadka qaba cudurka ee aan calaamadaha muujinin hadda lama garanayo lana daraaseeyo, iyadoo xarumaha xakamaynta iyo ka hortagga cudurada ee Korea ee (KCDC) ay sheegtay in 20% kaysaska la xaqiijiyay ay yihiin kuwo aan wax calaamad ah lahayn mudada ay cisbitaalku ku jireen.

sourceString: China's National Health Commission began including asymptomatic cases in its daily cases on 1 April; of the 166 infections on that day, 130 (78%) were asymptomatic at the time of testing.
targetString: Xaakada iyo candhuufta qaar ayaa caaqi kara tiro badan oo fayruska ah.
translated: Gudiga Qaran ee Caafimaadka Shiinaha ayaa bilaabay in kiisaska aan calaamadaha la karin lagu daro kiisaska maalinlaha ah 1-dii Abriil; 166 caabuq ee maalintaas, 130 (78%) waxay ahaayeen kuwo aan wax calaamad ah ku laheyn xilliga baaritaanka.

sourceString: Both sputum and saliva can carry large viral loads.
targetString: Candhuufta tirada badan sidaa waxay soo saartaa dhibco badan oo marka loo eego inta aan sidin ah.
translated: Sputum-ka iyo candhuufta labadaba waxay qaadi karaan culaab waaweyn oo fayrus ah.
